user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Elizabeth M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXuhhJ3L27gYQJMwvKARhYEqE4v9PowLqfpDtvNV5G-CUir9-oeQg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hani Kobob open up a restaurant! Food is amazing! Brings me back to my hometown in west Los Angeles which is when I last had Persian food. You guys do not disappoint. Just delicious food. Soo happy you guys are here in Maple Ridge.
Keep doing what you are doing 😊","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPYRBOZ_kJZgllXS0fFclxS4JEuPogcefv-9_jn&fid=0x0:0xb7a90fbebcbd630"],"When":"2024-7-19"},{"Name":"LYN A.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbOeXMk917Ajuv93CQ42rgHtfKnVrXaFwxZQZZGpFsFZ-2N8Wf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I highly recommend trying the delicious kebab at Hani Kebab in the Haney mall food court.  The food is tasty and the portions are generous. The owner provides excellent service as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9pBZb44PILF46Tr8sBKeAPM93DOEXAHhvHp8F&fid=0x0:0xb7a90fbebcbd630"],"When":"2024-12-10"},{"Name":"Susara Van Der Heever","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVhwzWStf91I4uoXX8CxsgEENJopYYOOdTSmiLz9yRBzK30CDNd=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hani Kebab in Maple Ridge is an absolute gem! The food was outstanding – everything was packed with flavor, fresh, and beautifully presented. The kebabs were tender and juicy, and the spices were just perfect. The service was top-notch as well; the staff was attentive, friendly, and made us feel right at home. It’s rare to find a place where both the food and service are equally amazing, but Hani Kebab delivered on every level. Highly recommend this place for anyone looking for delicious, authentic food and a wonderful dining experience!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Josh Woolgar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVgz3VfDT9HwXIZMM-_pOdiCbrHemy_2r-gjg2BoMFxbozJyz4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely huge portions!!! I got the number 1 ground beef option and it was really good! The staff are very friendly and offered us some red spice which was a great touch","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipObzCwB61pW-YhCchbogNe51Eqi19zV8Puac55-&fid=0x0:0xb7a90fbebcbd630"],"When":"2024-7-7"},{"Name":"ClayPhoenix4","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVelJECogE7AFzsG2ZmzVGlq92_4MqwMY_QK6n2nHeBRJeGCXg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If I told you that I just got back from camping up in Harrison and on my last night I was joined by Bigfoot himself (and he really does drink Kokanee lol) there is no way you would believe me!

But this story is true.  There really is a spot for authentic Persian food; and it's in a dump of a mall in Maple Ridge. The portions are massive,  the food is awesome,  and the people that are working there greet you with a smile. There is even 3 different types of rice you can get with your meal. I highly recommend you ask for some of the red powder spice for your food to take it to the next level. They also have a nice hot sauce too! I had a chicken and beef skewer combo and I will certainly be back to try some other stuff I saw on display too.
Thanks for the fantastic lunch.😀","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOdGu0BDd1grVfiwIAxdJkXSgJFj-ZUbQopF1hZ&fid=0x0:0xb7a90fbebcbd630"],"When":"2024-6-23"},{"Name":"Jovelyn Rimando","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKsYQEuf-HbNcGuK304rveatZBvuqVQR33ng8N-3aVxgzaYKg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My experience here was great. My family love Iranian foods. The servings was so generous my son cant stop eating all the food i take home. For sure i will buy more of your foods. thank you so kuch","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOM7U2W8ry8ad72bP6M3wb0chPHHPPxfu8IftcY&fid=0x0:0xb7a90fbebcbd630"],"When":"2024-10-18"},{"Name":"M Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIsGv955Ri875E7vGmsYaHqa37baEVpl4eh0b_zeRaT_a88ew=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"All the positive reviews for this family run establishment are correct. We had the steak kebab and Chicken drumstick. The portions are so large we couldn’t finish it. The food has such good flavour! Note: they are open late, after Haney Mall is closed. We did takeout at 7:30pm, which requires you call ahead, wait about 15 min, and you pay and grab your food at the back door. (See my photo for a pic as it can be easily missed). You can just pull up in your car and the door is right there. Easy peasy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjfFx6dfw50pU3WzJ4M91QgV1ezNJkiGJ2DRbz&fid=0x0:0xb7a90fbebcbd630"],"When":"2024-2-15"},{"Name":"Ben Chua","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUCSW5TKJ19PNA5OJkbpbbOOnA0K2QN6aO0WAwwmH4V0bXfi0sR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered Ghabeli which is only available every Friday Saturday and Sunday. It's lamb stew too very delicious. The owner is very kind as well highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP1i61ssq2fSzR6TpQQP9Z3XZ2OBdXxt3eBnIWR&fid=0x0:0xb7a90fbebcbd630"],"When":"2024-11-26"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"nayomi dilrukshi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKUCBqCVJYhiKOPG_Kq_gOhjPW_v7_VxNNSwZohvuvtYylBWA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited Ronny's Bistro and had the pleasure of trying their Carbonara Pasta. The dish was absolutely delicious, with the perfect blend of creamy sauce, crispy bacon, and well-cooked pasta. The garlic bread served alongside was a great addition, adding a nice crunch to the meal. The presentation was also spot-on, making the experience even more enjoyable.

I’ll definitely be coming back to try more of their menu. Highly recommend this spot for pasta lovers!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMaEK7fNQtkSFNPotrNYUgfjhfNSjiO8AvXjjsC&fid=0x0:0x6f3e2391bba5bfd9"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Mitch C.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUigQKnsqnd6-ECKxiWLF3yOJGPZULiTcrsHXswZ-6rjxY7_wxITQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Ordered breakfast. Both were overcooked. Accidents can happen 🤷 I specifically asked for soft scrambled eggs. The server repeated "scrambled"
I repeated *SOFT* scrambled. My friend ordered medium basted. They were full on hard cooked. Sausages were flavorless. Trouble is noone came back to check after food was delivered. The opportunity to fix it was there, but not attempted. Nice location in the industrial area along the river. Hope experience is not the normal one.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNU-Nn9IIeVfJMSqROBLEDHykrBkx6OEpeIFRRm&fid=0x0:0x6f3e2391bba5bfd9"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"Ramesh Perera","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVyGA6fUD6Xdk_4LzEtJUlIgguhCdAdAHW5zHo_49OVhxbKNfQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently picked up Ronny's Bistro's homemade meat lasagna, shepherd's pie, and borscht, and I was happy with my purchase! The lasagna is rich and comforting, filled with a perfect blend of meats and cheeses, with a "sparkle of love" that you can truly taste. The shepherd's pie is hearty and flavorful, packed with tender beef and vegetables. To top it all off, the borscht was delicious and made my meal complete. Highly recommend Ronny's Bistro for anyone looking for quality homemade meals. Five stars all the way! I will come again for some more homemade frozen meals which are ready to eat or bake.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMt_LVJr_jvqfhe-y5mx7EM3w-uoORR9PRmPiBp&fid=0x0:0x6f3e2391bba5bfd9"],"When":"2024-9-4"},{"Name":"Vilma Yoder","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVCshCxnZzZyI6-eeQNlvQN0OkpVSmJm4fyuNm5pzhGp74l2Yk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My husband and I were looking for a place to eat breakfast and found this cute restaurant. Inside they were playing wonderful music, then we noticed their homey decorations that made our experience pleasant. The food was out of this world delicious. I ordered the croissant and was fully satisfied after eating it. The dish came with fried potato cubes that were crunchy and perfectly seasoned.
Friendly staff, they were smiling from ear to ear and it made us feel welcomed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOBO3tyyjhDNM1tNx859qD5jS1XXy9hIXtwRoU&fid=0x0:0x6f3e2391bba5bfd9"],"When":"2024-7-8"},{"Name":"Cheryl Kathler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK9TQWPDmnOA_h-SxOo5p_UwYGe8FJqXXhmMfPn2eJzdkrxrQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My friend brought me here for lunch.  It is in an unassuming location, but as soon as you walk in, it feels very welcoming and fun.  The food was so fresh and tasty (right down to the homemade pesto).  The owner is very generous and friendly and in spite of being busy, we had a great conversation with her.  I will be back.  There is a lot on the menu that I want to try.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9kTzAEXk3C5wUNJiWdqz0mBEPbELl4D8xE-wg&fid=0x0:0x6f3e2391bba5bfd9"],"When":"2024-6-29"},{"Name":"D S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKuROdrsF7vogaT38uZexLigYz1e5VXiDiWb4Iq30REJ6CyNw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Outstanding food and great ambience. Casual and clean diner. Lots of HD and other motorcycle paraphernalia. Great for everyone including families. Their cheesecakes are to die for and are made on site, but only once a week...so plan accordingly as they sell out quickly. Clean washrooms and adequate space between tables. It's located in the Industrial part of Maple Ridge, but very easy to get to. This place was previously Summer's Diner and IMO, the food is much better now. It is easily some of the best food in Maple Ridge. The only thing that needs work is the time to receive your food. We have been there a few times in the last month and the service is slow. Once, it took 45 minutes to receive our food and the restaurant was not busy. It is still worth the visit though, so go when you're not in a rush. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOtk_X-IZD8h_XnLaTeGdaOnNBH-YgSk-No4Vid&fid=0x0:0x6f3e2391bba5bfd9"],"When":"2024-5-26"},{"Name":"Udari Nisansala","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWI5wgDzbdl2O6sXNemlC6v7mOL_F2kJd_iqTO2aXvqKDlmspov=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I can't say enough good things about the Special Ronny's Burger at Ronny's Bistro! This burger is an absolute masterpiece. The beef patty was juicy and flavorful, topped with crispy bacon, fresh lettuce, and a perfectly balanced sauce that tied everything together. The bun was soft yet sturdy, holding all the delicious ingredients without falling apart.

The fries served on the side were golden and crispy, making this meal all the more satisfying. If you're a burger lover, this is a must-try. Five stars all the way!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBvKBSnlZbJoXfkBEAcB7lA18EhUfIVup5SFaA&fid=0x0:0x6f3e2391bba5bfd9"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Saumya Siriwardhana","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJ1IunhRfABP7fGLICHAl6HNIBzYnUAQpkceKd0QliRu_wwec=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had the Lasagna Bolognese at Ronny’s Bistro today, and it was absolutely incredible! The layers of pasta were perfectly cooked, the meat sauce was rich and flavorful, and the cheese was perfectly melted and golden. The portion was just right, and it came with a side of fresh Caesar salad and delicious toasted bread, which made the meal even more enjoyable. The menu has so many tempting options, and I’m already looking forward to coming back to try more dishes. Highly recommend this place if you’re looking for a memorable meal!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOWKizfqDXJL0AdpuRTM2XNleCPoObL6bbEOOvz&fid=0x0:0x6f3e2391bba5bfd9"],"When":"2024-8-21"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Star Forbes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVX3bxa6epj-Pmj6Ysk7djR6GPyFN2Nb3oWlupv9ZY8ucFacX7F=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was incredible the calamari was the best I've ever had..beat out some 5 star restaurants even. The taziki needs some work but the batter was amazing and squid tender. The platter for 2 combo one was delicious 😋 large portions enough for another meal. We will be back for sure!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcseKveiRS0TQicvgRksF3wM4fgUNOqn_2VpPt&fid=0x0:0xf5cb376f8ad99a7e"],"When":"2024-11-19"},{"Name":"Angela Longo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWY1oq49pKa6hIgCWasLoQyfZXLAxCQ6hu--JV9EUi6xd7-tSw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We had a double celebration, but when I called the restaurant, I only acknowledged my daughter’s birthday. It was our first time at this Greek restaurant, and we were quite excited to go there. I reserved the table over the phone. Whoever answered the phone was kind; nothing negative to say. I asked where to park, and the lady gave me the directions. When we finally went to have dinner, our server took a little bit of time to show up. My son was already there waiting for us, so he knew where we had to sit. When the server came after a while, her demeanor was not what I was expecting. It’s possible that we got her on a bad day, but she was seriously down, and we had to wait almost until our dinner was over for her to warm up. The food was okay. We ordered calamari and spanakopita for appetizers, and for entrees, we had shrimp souvlaki with pita bread,  salmon souvlaki, and my kids had chicken souvlaki. My daughter found the rice bland, while the shrimps were good. There is street parking in front of the restaurant, and you can park at the back only after 5 p.m.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPeRPnf1VYzzb39CpNn_Ei4uu082NkYwEEQEQSJ&fid=0x0:0xf5cb376f8ad99a7e"],"When":"2024-12-3"},{"Name":"Naser","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0-YQ8zU5RxMjX7Szhrzpzf3k8mT3TPmCIoVpC7Yu8SS5YsZfI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is one of the best in Maple Ridge. Kind of home made food !
All the food we tried  were really good and l found them  similar to Persian cuisine.
I like the relaxing environment inside which is designed by lots of plants and light blue color.
I went there with  my wife and the kiddos.  We tried for the appetizer the combo1  but forgot to take photo .for dinner we tried combo number 1 . For dinner l chose combo dinner 1 which l loved its Lamb Chops . Steak & Scallops was tasty too as l tried some from my wife order. its good to know that some of them are similar to dinner combo 1.
In general l liked every thing from food, environment, and Friendly staff!
Will definitely come back here with family . Thanks","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjDUXMTkD3UsznFEVyVi7G2un72yWT86h34I5P&fid=0x0:0xf5cb376f8ad99a7e"],"When":"2023-2-15"},{"Name":"Cameron Appleby","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIfK7DVoNWzY4Tr2axkV9NzU-d_f97Lv-kg87iMyzH8Sw9NTw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a very enjoyable dinner here. We were a large party, but all food came at the same time and was very hot and fresh. We enjoyed the saganaki as an appetizer, and had the calamari dinner. Well battered and delicious, the Greek rice and potato were excellent. Wish there was more of the Greek salad it was so good. The home made hummus is also a must try! Only note was the cocktails weren’t the best, but only $7 which is far cheaper than anywhere else! Staff were incredibly friendly and accommodating.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXkZHyeFHJdmQtM7UAdBKSL17l4fpf_vYafF8K&fid=0x0:0xf5cb376f8ad99a7e"],"When":"2023-8-5"},{"Name":"Alannah Banovac","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzEi2rC9FWIP0WU-iu4d8hkn6PybBsafilbsJrLsiOYj6Y0u-B=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was so good!!! Definitely the best Cesar salad and calamari we’ve had in a while.  Our waitress was lovely.  Big restaurant and very festive.  I imagine without Covid it would be packed!!  We will definitely make the drive out again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPfRljMz-RUso2nOVf_oVfGgJE81zhowA5J751D&fid=0x0:0xf5cb376f8ad99a7e"],"When":"2020-11-24"},{"Name":"Steve Beckett","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLvkyDhleIuENlzBAHj2NCgWKF9hnT3DHRngvRO8uUtvdNAqg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"It's really gone downhill. Prices have gone way up and quality of the food way down.  I ordered the barbecued chicken and pasta and when they brought it to me it had a tiny piece of chicken and a rack of ribs.I said I didn't order the ribs so they took it back, took the ribs off and gave me back the tiny piece of chicken. Then charged me 32 dollars. I left still hungry. Dissapointed","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Faye Cottingham","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV_8s3lDyN2LicCeKEcCn0xxfkQIcL4H-y1ZVypVQd-Da9VXOvP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our senior’s group celebrated the 99th birthday of one of our members at this restaurant last evening.  I want to commend Georgina and all the staff for going above and beyond for this event.  From helping us decorate to serving dinner for 20 people and then lighting sparkler’s for our gent’s Birthday cake it was very much appreciated and helped our celebration run smoothly.  All of us were happy with our meals and the service, and the atmosphere was energetic yet relaxed.  Thanks so much to all of you.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxMd0oFJAQVfkzsYfEq6iCEWf56LIaX5bKybgG&fid=0x0:0xf5cb376f8ad99a7e"],"When":"2024-3-12"},{"Name":"Liam Chubb","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUpaHIWaoaWvNQg7wfzL_wSY3cKRHb5uW8iNsZFFY4VJqmsHCuD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very friendly staff with very high quality food. I ordered a combo #1, and it came out with a very generous plate of lamb, rice, chicken, Greek salad, dolmades, and more. A perfectly large portion for 2 people. Flavours were very good, and interior atmosphere is also awesome. I would absolutely recommend a trip here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-lfnFUONG9uJPndoto7S9fztdh5-N1JsU0Bsa&fid=0x0:0xf5cb376f8ad99a7e"],"When":"2021-9-5"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"ardalan mahjoubi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjC76zpSP_u1iKxJl50EXoC8H3yR8AQLam7nDsdlwVpjDhQPao=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"“Big Feast Bistro is an absolute gem! The food is fresh, flavorful, and thoughtfully prepared, with a great variety of options to please any palate. The cozy atmosphere and friendly, attentive staff make it a perfect spot for a casual meal or a special occasion. Don’t miss their locally-sourced ingredients and creative menu — highly recommend!”","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipORYSHJtVLswL4X-zIBr5A_DI2yw0214FR96G9F&fid=0x0:0x93f62016d3743af"],"When":"2024-11-26"},{"Name":"Izzy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVAgf2kUFFUPOmbKxXV6w4FXEglUD9hHripnX8rOvq95I8uwQcTgA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an amazing experience at this restaurant! As someone who needs gluten-free options, I was thrilled to see so many choices on the menu.

The food was delicious, and the service was fantastic—attentive, friendly, and accommodating. The only hiccup was the choppy radio, but when we asked if they could turn it off, they were incredibly kind and took care of it right away.

Highly recommend for anyone looking for a friendly spot with excellent service!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5eIdOA3ydo5p3PS96aP375FXyb4pIT9Q7hZg-&fid=0x0:0x93f62016d3743af"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Kristine Johnson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVGP_smfmYAXXxdYn6kX34hvFr9mR1IvLF3TA-_x61hquGska6i=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely marvelous server :) I had so many dietary restrictions, and she made sure I got exactly what I could eat. She wasn't short or annoyed at me at all, which I really appreciated. Thank you, nice server ♡
And the salad was delicious as well. I can't wait to go back ♡","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPM3hO99UAYTOGSWLJsttOF_RGvKQHzeznjceFo&fid=0x0:0x93f62016d3743af"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"Maria Teo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLWyktuFjeslZVKUjk8Q5cAT0oRtHf1mhF8v-MshhF0aeQQodU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food was great!! We had the salmon benny (3.5/5) and the pulled pork hash (5/5) for brunch! The bistro was clean and has nice decor. Our service was a bit slow when we dine in but staff members were very friendly. I would definitely go back 😄","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPWHOuxTroWCk7vTSJMMFIzHhTvLZau6tGyPwj&fid=0x0:0x93f62016d3743af"],"When":"2024-8-29"},{"Name":"Mehr Poulad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKnMmsASCmXLOvaFhR1RoQ03vxNx7oVUBdwy_npEYvb7k7uZA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great spot in maple ridge with really good food and service. The tacos were amazing. Gets really busy during peak times so be ready to wait.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMqgiVxecbAj9pT8-aq7nxoDkzoio8mxgqR3kxf&fid=0x0:0x93f62016d3743af"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"Kyle G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK72jrQUOno3MgtLl1WKy-Lz_eO61EdbiS2qO4YAE9hJAly_w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Quite far from Vancouver.

Came here to meet some friends for Saturday brunch.

Ordered the Big Feast Grilled Club and sneaked a few bites of the Breakfast sandwich.

The grilled club had thick crisp bacon, chicken breast, lots of mayo, shredded lettuce and a side of salted fries. The club was a bit messy/fell apart, fries were crisp and salted just right. Overall the club was good and would order again.

My sneak bites of the breakfast sandwich with roti as the bun were good but the side roasted potatoes were a bit burnt and carbonized which was a bit off putting. I would try the breakfast sandwich next time but with a different side maybe with fries if they could substitute. The carbonized potatoes were just off putting and I don’t think I’d enjoy the rest of the meal because of that.

Staff were nice and attentive always came by refilling beverages.

I would recommend and definitely say give it a try if in the neighbourhood but not so much trek from Vancouver.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUmd2RqDI-EfOrMMgoERD42-nQGneS23YaRbxL&fid=0x0:0x93f62016d3743af"],"When":"2024-6-9"},{"Name":"James Mendonca","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKDOYVs1G-8iT9QF6Fj3_nUauDo1DS6zISrEp3lZ9wij4inDQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is fantastic restaurant. I enjoyed everything about this restaurant. The service is optimistic and professional. I like the design of the interior, despite the small venue space. I ate there for lunch and had the Lennon's French Toast. It was the best French toast I have ever had at any establishment. All of the ingredients pay compliments to each other and taste great altogether. The coffee was not just great, it was Grade-A quality. I hope to come back to Big Feast Bistro very soon when I am in Maple Ridge again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3_5WxTHzhY1ttn8VTIuxmZW2fbMK6T64vznqn&fid=0x0:0x93f62016d3743af"],"When":"2023-11-28"},{"Name":"Shirley Treger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJHx6Pc61V0ABlvEQKFkcuPpCGH2YyflokfZ6ACHcUWA7KJxg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food is sooo Delicious. I would definitely recommend this to Everyone. Breakfast: What's your story morning glory..Yummy 😋 Meat loaf...just like mama made. My friends and I go there whenever we are in the area.","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Taylor Sayer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJS-Pxy7Duc8XuRPhCyEuLFDSILkRq00Y22KDFMZK0vbJUgsw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Any time I have a reason to come to Maple Ridge, I make sure to stop and get lunch here.  Ahmad's falafel Donair is unmatched by any other in the Fraser Valley.

The atmosphere is always welcoming, and the care + time put into each order is obvious.  Skipping out on this gem is doing yourself a complete disservice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSsw2nN-r_aF-unX0hWOjWSSs4kjesSVzaacm4&fid=0x0:0xf43225677c301c54"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"Josue Martinez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVB9iP3R6I6FZpy9H8WyJhX8c1eNzd2ohTQqXoqbwY8kya4TQ7-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Their donair poutine is amazing. Great portion size and the flavours are amazing. Try their green salsa if you like spicy as well. Wonderful flavour. Staff is very friendly and helpful too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOrr9Z3RfBlypOyAGcGDswVgsZdJ5GzA2eLQ-Nb&fid=0x0:0xf43225677c301c54"],"When":"2024-11-28"},{"Name":"Chef Chris","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUux-_NBHpjEM-R3l8XA6JvOde-YenIZmfqE50ky09zR4qyGnCXow=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best donair I've ever had!  The freshness, flavor, and seasoning are all on point.
Maple Ridge is lucky to have these guys in our community.
Highly recommended.  I'd give 6 stars if I could.  The staff are also super friendly and kind.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Annie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJAG4UtHNdn-C74S5I053c9lMdRMdh_AH35u090AgjHoFmF2GSW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Oh my goodness - such a lovely and kind owner and the food 10/10. I got 1 chicken and beef plate and hot sauce on the side. Everything is house made and the portions are ridiculous! Absolutely amazing!
My husband could not finish his.
Run, don’t walk - definitely will be back to try the donair and the baklava!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPNOIxKUxPDbTRlGVcdEQdt1d-BKxObJw60EwUz&fid=0x0:0xf43225677c301c54"],"When":"2024-3-8"},{"Name":"rue deda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXibaxGcWhkUgVv8yAdsNj_gFfT8xdcP4x5agl54xhRKeqduIfe-A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Enjoyed my beef Donair, i particularly love how generous they are with meat and toppings, hearty size,had one to go and it was enough for lunch and dinner. Friendly cheerful service too, everything goes better with a smile 😊","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNUTn9lDF3dU2zAMIX2_j5XvJZT6v20SIQTQAYr&fid=0x0:0xf43225677c301c54"],"When":"2024-4-23"},{"Name":"Brendin Harrison","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWNXyJUM3dr8MBd0NKUXLJ_p2DmmzRgyKxdb9YOFSMticORtVTF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely the best Donair I've ever had personally, my wife also very much enjoyed hers.

Hot and fresh!
I had the mix beef and lamb it was amazing.
Will definitely be coming back soon.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nicole Whitford","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVvnWyVN6tGGefkVtv-5nPu0cWHIx_I_rk0RG-o_5e3T0LXY94=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Costumer service was top notch, food was incredible. The chicken donair poutine was unreal. The owner has brought American pops in and we were gifted two for free!!! Our new go-to donair place!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhIldC9h3JkROGJd0PemNmO5e3YPhd_iYsmI-L&fid=0x0:0xf43225677c301c54"],"When":"2024-4-19"},{"Name":"Whittney Paige Theunisz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJNpLVtpUswpbdSbhresK4sT59RrcInGTzLL6vasOffIJCdoI4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was so good and the portions were very generous. My husband and I shared the mixed plate and both came away stuffed!

Probably our favourite donair place in Ridge. The guys were top notch as well, so nice and generous!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMmQaoSdGf3qLCI_wP6RRe0SzJXrUVaVP1iJwWO&fid=0x0:0xf43225677c301c54"],"When":"2024-3-31"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Mackavelli","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVxXMiPu7YMhc1QgReEro0QPoLjSJx18pMrfy-cqK7HWi-EYG6L=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The only thing that saved this meal was the friendly server and the two sausages that were actually cooked properly. Food showed up with no meat, eggs were rubber, hashbrowns were half burnt, bacon cooked well done, ham was overcooked and rubbery also. Bread was absolutely soaked in butter.\n\nI’m not trying to be rude I am just brutally honest, do better next time","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOLKEPX2En6-lnLZ88pBukSB6nBUwAPnQHiBSYk\u0026fid=0x0:0x63c9b20db4c582cf"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"bealatina 143","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW1M2eMZBA9AqqscxNbQV3xS529sLfDb96YTiFfwhk5L7u9iTf3=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had lunch here with my cousin and  We shared a club sandwich, chicken strips and a poutine.  It was delicious. Our server Nikki was  amazing with her radiating smile. she really made our experience here outstanding!  If or when i come back i hope she is my server again because i was so impressed at how well she did your job!  Thank you for the great experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPHUVp2Mb8LSEOEK6WbTcl9IE69f7syVYsTd0aY\u0026fid=0x0:0x63c9b20db4c582cf"],"When":"2024-7-28"},{"Name":"James Inouye","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGMUsvXLijMfgZydLJhU2TpG1bqPFbrelq3iJSQAmmOzYoUfG8Bg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Staff is very friendly and accommodating. The food was excellent and made with care. The coffee was good, and they kept coming around to refill my cup.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8W-4dsx0P0Or3d_ljp7ASfCNVkzFNSreUBVcl\u0026fid=0x0:0x63c9b20db4c582cf"],"When":"2024-12-5"},{"Name":"A.J. Canadian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0mITu_1OR_MuXzhVIkPjHjZnimy2Y-mI64r72OA1Zbucah6-N=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Home restaurant was a great find while I was in Maple Ridge. What a great comfort food restaurant. I enjoyed the homestyle food and fresh ingredients. I even enjoyed a slice of their promoted home made pies that are on display as I entered. Recommended","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOrI777A6I3xtT4h75DfGOF_v54we5KRAu-AB39\u0026fid=0x0:0x63c9b20db4c582cf"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"GHEYF","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXePK0A3xq4DR1S1jf5vf69nXWa8YZB-VEttRoV1BYi31N5oCs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place has me fascinated; it's the perfect stop if you're going to Cultus Lake. Even if you're not going there, it's worth traveling across Canada to try the pies—they're scrumptious! The food is amazing. The atmosphere is very Canadian, making me feel like a tourist, lol. The service is excellent with very friendly people. The ingredients in the food feel very fresh, which makes it special.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2aJVHFpsl_4xj9TDXq_bGhqoYh0UTgehlWqpZ\u0026fid=0x0:0x63c9b20db4c582cf"],"When":"2024-7-6"},{"Name":"Meral","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZgJDSBQQNKp8dP0oLNQ0hDG3ysmSYlwA2fle373dORaWJmgoR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Bought pie for $7+tax+tip so almost $10 for each slice,but to go sizes are so much smaller than what they led us believe. So disappointed. You can see how little that pie is next to my finger and hand cream","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkiP0Y_XmvTIRiEfeApg4CkBT_ktVgZ3GVoRwo\u0026fid=0x0:0x63c9b20db4c582cf"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"Taz e Bear","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWUZQyNVNSfKOL9C89OWIJAxQIkFj-drpgJaXIBnJ3XH8o9jkaH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is one of my favourite restaurants the staff are very attentive. The food is just like the name Home \"cooked\" everything on the menu is awesome never had a bad meal in many years of going. I have taken  my friends and family here their all hocked . We just did Dad's 80th birthday here and everyone was happy with the food the service the whole package. Did I mention they have some of the best Pies I have ever had many people come to just buy the pies to take out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzh0iayn86ffihFCsFPTDtzFbGLnguFR1bfd1R\u0026fid=0x0:0x63c9b20db4c582cf"],"When":"2023-3-13"},{"Name":"J. F","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUvnPrghjIIxyliVLQ5qdXC_aHHLxKWdRLtv7_c0XpUi4UfZmBiFQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great homestyle food and fair prices. Pretty large portions for what you pay for. We went for an early dinner and had The Schnitzel with mushrooms,  it was very good and came with two large pieces!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipML0c-LGPcYxbKjQicXzphekRLAxHeHTj5SfoJC\u0026fid=0x0:0x63c9b20db4c582cf"],"When":"2023-8-5"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Matthew Burger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLJRolkmm2fzfIke3005sW5UKXFG1l2S4OhjL21TYo52WLgLQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My wife and I just celebrated our anniversary at Chameleon in Maple Ridge and were blown away by the food and service. From the amazing flight of margaritas and crispy pork belly, to the beautiful duck and salmon entrées and silky smooth Creme Brule. The food was matched by the super friendly and professional service. The next time we want a fine dining experience, we'll save ourselves the drive into Vancouver and go back to Maple Ridge.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM23BRISycp1Rbn993xX_elG-AFBpZ-v7rCfxsN&fid=0x0:0x9716dc938b2e95cc"],"When":"2024-8-9"},{"Name":"Tabitha Marie Geraghty","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9l1bo7byb7Ucg-7YubvvEIA3WJTeAtKK5wv4tH4R1rOlNJiNsuQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Definitely kudos as we came during the holiday season and it was rushed..

Our server was incredible, the atmosphere and feeling of the holiday season was nice.. the food was good and the cocktails were great.. cost of the cocktails seemed a little bit high considering we were in Maple ridge..

The food was good and the intentions were great I think. Had we been there and ordered just a single meal that was hot and fresh we would have done better..

I will definitely give the chameleon a second try as I love the vibe and think that this type of restaurant is much needed in Maple ridge.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"I M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI1LyaX0CiLTrEq3bzFkA46TOUxf3F2uw04JXuyWMEYipULAA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"First time being in Chameleon restaurant. Very open concept, nice decor. I would say a furniture could be upgraded a bit to more luxury seating or at least more comfortable. Air conditioning was a bit too much on for a cold evening outside so everyone in the restaurant wore their jackets on. The prices for food are apart with some of the expensive restaurants in Maple Ridge. Food was cooked very nice and very flavourful but by the time we got it 2 out of our 3 dishes were already not hot. Service was very good and the ladies are very friendly and professional. Bartender was very good and he made very tasty drinks. Overall a very nice restaurant and very good food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM3u3wArI1S0QGuEnAexQKPIxi7m91IU1WXwgtc&fid=0x0:0x9716dc938b2e95cc"],"When":"2024-2-11"},{"Name":"Jordyn Ellis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXsI3LX_wvDAdV8BpWxjJFMdZu6awlgZNab56wLuIe4uRha2LHqUQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a great restaurant! Came with my family for Mother’s Day. Our server was great and the girl they were training too!
The bartender came over to offer us a round of drinks because, to them, our food was taking a while but honestly it was such a great time to talk and catch up with my family. Overall experience was amazing and super friendly and welcoming! I can’t wait to come back and really wanting to try their brunch on weekends!

We got the house fries to start, soooo good! Then my dad got the pork belly, another amazing starter.

My main was the Seafood Risotto, so filling! Everything was so yummy.

My images consist of the seafood risotto and the butternut squash ravioli (without arugula)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOPD4elmKG2FI9WAamuWkKRE6FXTvT4qdhX4PQ3&fid=0x0:0x9716dc938b2e95cc"],"When":"2024-5-14"},{"Name":"Adrienne Thiery","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUBXCivlSBhJvOBZazHc4ioFjrNhntsDhE4PMl3eZOKT8Bi10S=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a gem of a restaurant. I was sat on the lovely outdoor patio by my server, Kegan, who I am certain has fine dining experience and if he doesn’t then this place has outstanding training because he has that air of grace and courteousness I’ve only seen in fine dining. For the cocktail, I ordered a hibiscus spritzer (made by Kegan) and as soon as I tasted it I knew I was in for a treat regarding the rest of the food because this is a place that takes great care in getting things right. For appie I had the house fries which were cooked with the perfect amount of crisp and served with delicious aioli at well as fresh Parmesan. Also for appie fluffy fresh bread was served with cranberries in whipped butter…this was a stroke of genius, how often does one eat butter and think “wow this is remarkably delicious butter”. For the main course, I had the seafood risotto. It was perfection. Took the little bit I couldn’t finish home with me because I want every bite! I can’t wait to come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipObS2A0Wh_perm73oY3q44eJJ_lPDK8bIi5EyMB&fid=0x0:0x9716dc938b2e95cc"],"When":"2024-8-12"},{"Name":"Lori Maginnis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKXMpF1QdVxNT7xKos53oPkdIhvucK7OFj4gMh8jaKRBtudgw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Thoroughly enjoyed my meal at this restaurant!  Smoked tomato soup and grilled three cheese sandwich on sour dough. Good size portion. Reasonably priced. Very tasty. Soup was served up hot enough that it was hot to the last spoonful. Finished my meal off with a dessert of warm chocolate cake with a delicious chocolate sauce and gelato. I thought the portion was small but it was so rich and so delicious it was enough.

It was quite busy and only one server so it was a little slow but well worth the wait.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"J L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIFhDWn7ZUpLtRn99UuZsUyHFtHtjy_5DOO3shBPyiizb4_vg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time customer, had an anniversary date here. The smells from the open kitchen had me salivating from the moment I entered. Food and service were top notch. Ceasar salad was the best I have ever had. The duck and the tenderloin were absolutely perfect. Very impressed with the desert. We shared a strawberry cheesecake deconstruction. The overall presentation of the food is artful and tidy. The portion sizes were reasonable. Inside the space is fairly small, but tastefully decorated, and lit for romance. Definitely not a cheap date, but worth every penny. I am so glad we chose this place to eat on our anniversary! I would rate 6/5 stars if I could!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"C Akins","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJfJ5TOZAppAoK1v3vAH4WnWh-tBc433e5bioDUDCccco7SkQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hidden gem in Maple Ridge with great food and service. Prawns and oysters were fresh and delicious and the acknowledgement of our anniversary was appreciated.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOnTXw_ll8EK2bg0_AeQ0jD4V8ANr2jDeMMm2NT&fid=0x0:0x9716dc938b2e95cc"],"When":"2024-9-27"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"jasmimaria R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4pJsI6zmjzg6T7Vv1nULcTI0hckuLuMTShtjT6u4cC-gzFPL6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I had a good experience at Sammy J’s in Maple Ridge. The food was delicious, and the customer service was friendly and attentive, which made the visit enjoyable. However, I was disappointed with the drinks. Out of the three different drinks we ordered, all of them were either watered down or lacked flavor. I hope they improve the consistency and taste of their beverages, as this was the only aspect that missed the mark for me. Overall, a great spot for food, but the drinks could use some work.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDiRl-nZy5cP77L5fnmFOLJtL88N6_3XaxGg5Z&fid=0x0:0xf535f635f633f58d"],"When":"2024-10-8"},{"Name":"Fallon Conway","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIRn0Q61dGB1Ogh71s4IMnyPpSgIxz2IAOpiPuQnyr0ts3m-A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our experience was amazing. We went to Sammy J’s as a family. We showed up and got a table right away. Our food came fast and was incredible. Highly recommend any of the bowls. The dips were delicious! Our server Marisa was efficient but also picked up on all of our needs and didn’t rush us through our experience.
Over all it was a 10/10 and definitely recommend this restaurant!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mrityunjay Kumar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK02yKU4inEgudvhGGlKrBrAKZRxhuwnfeJyD_JeTGVlWa7qQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Me and my wife had good time there, it was sunny afternoon and happy hour. We had chicken wings half with sriracha lime and half salt and pepper but I would say the wings quality was amazing. Lindsay served us, she is very charming and good server. We had Guinness beer, good vibes, nice ambience. Will visit again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPixfVGvfjQYbS1HHSlBjrodmEy10jDdg7HXY0E&fid=0x0:0xf535f635f633f58d"],"When":"2024-9-28"},{"Name":"Jessameen Dela Peña","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX9mRpmL8-ZJUG7UPFcnsjzRdxjABif-MswbO1rxgJyyWfns8Jd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I had the Canadian burger, which was good but didn’t stand out as exceptional. The fries were actually the highlight of the meal for me. I also tried the chicken wings, which seemed a bit small and were served in a bowl that made the portion look less impressive. The honey garlic wings were somewhat dry, but the Cajun flavor was fantastic. Overall, it was a mixed experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN5OL_bw8B-kUBbiNtC0Axq7qm7qO8arvvn-P3b&fid=0x0:0xf535f635f633f58d"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"ClayPhoenix4","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVelJECogE7AFzsG2ZmzVGlq92_4MqwMY_QK6n2nHeBRJeGCXg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We managed to get in without a reservation on Father's Day without any delays, but had to sit at a bar stool high table because all other tables for 2 were allegedly reserved (even though we could clearly see there was 2 booths by front window for 2 but dirty). I would have gladly waited for them to clean them because I have poor balance due to strokes and asked for a low table or booth but was denied. The tables ended up unused for at least 20 minutes.👎 Lucky for me a brought my percussion gun to use on my leg for most of our time there.
The food is decent and service is ok. The drinks were good and there was lots of people there, but the music is a bit on the loud side. Which is kind of ironic because if you go outside there is a sign asking people not to be loud. 🤔
Hopefully next time I can get a proper chair or booth that will not make the side of my body go completely numb and I can enjoy the atmosphere since they gave us a $10 promo card for "Dads."","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9j41vk7-ebX0mWwHOb3HEIFZ94f8sfoN_rb8c&fid=0x0:0xf535f635f633f58d"],"When":"2024-6-17"},{"Name":"RIO HR","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVIF7GpV4m64oZ0qQLa2t66NMefnxrzruALvqDOSbCmwkvF-Ues=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The girls out here are so dam. Courteous. We sat at the bar and the bartender was such a sweet delight.. knowledgeable and a master at hospitality.. will definitely go back soon.. Sammy j is the place to be for great food, awesome cocktails and drinks and smiles of happiness","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9JiN0_n4boMTj3oipaqeLn1vRMSbG0U0ikbhK&fid=0x0:0xf535f635f633f58d"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"Anna Manansala","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmPEjbEU--G6ZvwM9BF3cXB1twGAgi58wl6xVmDzsfFIrX-aN6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food is great! Yum yum!
Friendly staff.

We had a long day hiking, and my boyfriend brought me here to eat steak. My heart is happy. 🥹💗

(⁠⊃⁠｡⁠•́⁠‿⁠•̀⁠｡⁠)⁠⊃ 🥩🍝🖤✨
May 02 2024 🌸","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOBWfzarkGIsTg2LIUJ1THNwuKIfrkk77qjL4nJ&fid=0x0:0xf535f635f633f58d"],"When":"2024-5-17"},{"Name":"Hangout CAN (出走加拿大)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXLsataZBHdbXdf5fvvtSixzA7_P_SmPgA4k4U2s2VVx5uk12E8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A great meal at Sammy J’s Grill & Bar.
We ordered Sammy’s House Pizza. It is delicious. Cheese pasta, BBQ Wings are tasty as well. The environment of the restaurant is nice and chill. Service is great 😊.
Overall we enjoyed the meal very much.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPt04Ztdx8uPi41vccNzMvvmiEBZPMgA1zPYbN4&fid=0x0:0xf535f635f633f58d"],"When":"2023-6-12"}]

[{"Name":"Jake Maxim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBjxlJeIgfTzkZdhvFXRGr5bxciNoyk6AdIrCffARRZ8c_jnkivQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We went here for our anniversary and had a great time! The waitress was very friendly, the food was super tasty and the atmosphere was perfect. Would recommend for a special night out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOR0k3D31rDIMXpmrgy6Yg8pCUjbGYvZ8mRuwHh&fid=0x0:0xb59e691906a3e81d"],"When":"2024-5-6"},{"Name":"Danielle Self","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKjSvK_MAoc4nRkFbMMJIVs87DVbwX9WsWgaU9Vcup9uEMyMg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food was mouthwatering, packed full of flavour and authentic tasting in every bite, and so worth the visit. Full servings! Servers were personable and helped make the experience what it was. Authentic feel for atmosphere and decor. Had too long of a wait for our meals though - grateful we had a few appetizers to tie us over. Gave only 4 stars for the long wait, but otherwise deserves a 5 ⭐️Would still highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPtgup0Kw3dfNKAP1yisMuPtm1ln0rCTTlMsQiU&fid=0x0:0xb59e691906a3e81d"],"When":"2023-6-17"},{"Name":"Pau-Lin Ngen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYux2bxmNndX1OIzJvZDMUqV3D_LnyzewmMivzJ6au-MZvmUjOoQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Tried the 5 course tasting menu, everything was extreme tasty! Started off with a platter of appetizers (calamari and bruschettas), followed by a trio of pastas and a tangy balsamic vinaigrette salad that led to a surf n turf entree of grilled lamb, chicken, prawn with veggies and ending with a classic tiramisu with an an apricot purée twist ! 😋🤤

Everything was very well seasoned and delicious! I’ve lived in maple ridge my whole life and for some reason I never thought to visit this restaurant lol. Now that I’ve moved to Burnaby, I’ll have to make an effort to visit here again the next time I venture back to MR

The wait time between each dish was a bit long, our entire meal took 3 hrs so one star off for that. Also we told our server we wanted to take home our leftovers but he forgot to pack them up and we forgot to ask about it as we left, would’ve been nice as we had a bit leftover that we would’ve love to finish off the next day 😫😩🥺😢

Overall, a great experience at a MR landmark!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZyBUqJhLBogabhczvMG80XMVsMmzzejGR53ew&fid=0x0:0xb59e691906a3e81d"],"When":"2022-12-19"},{"Name":"Jamak Golshani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWUj2LK0XJaxGCkMdV1Y3vwaPy3axo29-O-pu7Kb7eqy9PgvRrN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Giving four stars because we had to wait an unreasonable amount of time to be served. Otherwise, this would have been an easy 5.  The food is great. Portions are pretty big. If you're not very hungry you can probably share.
This was my second time here. Last time we did lunch. Consistent experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOrTGcGpIaHafbWmiJ476Uus-gblmqmGZkgVZV8&fid=0x0:0xb59e691906a3e81d"],"When":"2022-6-12"},{"Name":"Naser","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0-YQ8zU5RxMjX7Szhrzpzf3k8mT3TPmCIoVpC7Yu8SS5YsZfI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great night with my wife here. Would definitely try here again. Soup was sooo good, sea food and desert was amazing. the old gentleman serving us was really nice and can definitely rate him as one of the best staff l have ever seen in a restaurant. Despite the great tasty food, his warm greeting, and checking several times if we need anything , made a great night for us . Environment was kind of cool and the Italian music was so relaxing. Especially the God father one😊
In general it is one of my great food experience  in Maple Ridge.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2_xT7TfKSry-koe59CCKkYJTWoDH93RtmBU2c&fid=0x0:0xb59e691906a3e81d"],"When":"2022-3-15"},{"Name":"Maya Schouten","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUO9x8oFl1z-2ncMLmfWu71Y053fpa-t4BYxDTv_0_AzOsAsA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I can’t say enough good things about Trattoria restaurant.  The service was warm, friendly and welcoming.  They placed the napkins in our lap and brought out focaccia bread and oil which was lovely.  We ordered the calamari as an appetizer and the batter was perfect, seasoning spot on, and the dipping sauce was divine (I think homemade). The main course was phenomenal.  I ordered the Gnocchi Russa and couldn’t have made a better selection. The gnocchi was perfectly tender, and the sauce was the ideal balance of cream and tomato.  I ordered a cocktail which was perfectly poured.  The ambience was romantic with very Italian-style finishings, and romantic Italian jazz to fit the mood.  The restaurant was spotless and the washrooms were pristine.  I will most definitely return.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcx_hFxwOqG_odHOXyvVCMl74XJTcwW7XuSyI&fid=0x0:0xb59e691906a3e81d"],"When":"2019-5-25"},{"Name":"Lorene Stuart","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJXqnmzUHq9uX8JdgxKRCwjZLhEDZiMKRm3pIucQxFcArTvdg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Service was welcoming, friendly, & timely.
Food was beYond 5 stars..grilled vegetables were perfection.

Dessert was light and flavourful.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcPdFVhwMU_wBAFHsjNZ9w6T_s7RFi_WLe29y_&fid=0x0:0xb59e691906a3e81d"],"When":"2024-5-29"},{"Name":"Byron Kerr","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9mtuZPhaRBlYW6xPRz4QO7Ql9WtzXP7z0AMf0RkySIFpilhY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My first trip to La Trattoria. I had heard tell of the quality of the food. I would not be disappointed. Traditional Italian fare in a cozy, classic environment led to a delicious meal for all.
A skilled cook and attentive owners/servers meant everyone went home sated and satisfied.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFl39lrzQixxtcnbzjSoiq3IEV5kN1kDMlX9db&fid=0x0:0xb59e691906a3e81d"],"When":"2019-10-31"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"shashi kunwar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzBMRxLk_KtTH24JWx0H4EXhP5GNOYpsNCyvkx8jxQxDr-XdCh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best spots for authentic Nepali cuisine! The flavors are truly exceptional—every bite is a delight. I highly recommend the Butter Chicken Momos; they’re an absolute must-try. Can’t wait to visit again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNd4cdi0J5JNjOmLj2xdChHH1PUKpkprV6hw1Mu&fid=0x0:0x58cb2544af0eee2c"],"When":"2024-11-27"},{"Name":"Nihit Malhotra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXfeHWYeDGkDTZNd33AgDsCmLoJ4NSwzG1vpopgAV9OU-hgspcS7Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We’ve visited Mt Everest 8848 twice in the past few months, and both experiences were great overall. The butter chicken momos are an absolute must-try—the gravy is rich and delicious! Chilli momos were also a hit, and the tava chicken had amazing flavor, though the texture was slightly tough on the outside.

On our second visit, we loved the butter chicken momos again and tried the BBQ chicken momos, which didn’t impress us as much. However, the house special chow mein (with chicken, prawns, and egg) were a pleasant surprise—even as someone who doesn’t usually enjoy saucy noodles, I loved them.

The portions are generous, and the staff is very polite and friendly. Definitely recommend this place, especially for the butter chicken momos!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlgMPWOgCbrMmbit3iaDeDGOSPeyBSquv7838s&fid=0x0:0x58cb2544af0eee2c"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"ᇫ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXlngfQVtGilUz62ScjKSTnwc5UnbrCxqB5h7iWhaVLUWtSTDz7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really really good food with very wonderful service, I'll be back to eat here forsure

Edit: I came back the day after and had one of the best meals ever, id recommend coming during lunch time to get the special. The butter chicken momo is out of this world, and if you get a chao mein with it you'll have enough food to feed a family of 4. You will not regret coming here, thank you rajeeb and laxman for the wonderful food. I really appreciate it!
Also the Nepali masala tea is great id get that","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPz3m_t6WJloCn3SAkoIIXsXA1arL4bU82VgU7K&fid=0x0:0x58cb2544af0eee2c"],"When":"2024-10-9"},{"Name":"Adam Tamer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUVReOi9kwYutOGqTk6O5XbycBVvDD5p1KuBhAqqEnPU5K6fel1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"After a hike in MR, we were looking for a later dinner. Upon seeing the reviews we decided to try this place.

So glad we did! The service was incredible! So kind, helpful and fast.

Decided to try the Butter Chicken and the Chilli Chicken Momo based on the reviews. Both were out of this world! Best Butter Chicken sauce I’ve ever had.

Can’t wait to come back and try more things.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMThzhwQSyKTcGz6gqnGoPg-y0Lbv5M22Or1bg6&fid=0x0:0x58cb2544af0eee2c"],"When":"2024-7-14"},{"Name":"Aliz A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUCLUVCARWUQzG9kwVMKWfiRsIBhLU_6JMuFFZXwEGUC6rYLLEo7A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered uber from this Nepalese-Indian fusion restaurant, been wanting to try this place and it did not disappoint in flavours!

What I got:
- House Special ChowMein (Recommend)
- Veggie spring rolls, Nepali Style (Recommend)

Both dishes I highly recommend, even though I got take out. The spring rolls still had a bit of crunch, they serve it with a sweet chilli sauce. The veggie spring rolls are on the small side but flavours were great, has like a cumin/all spice type of note. The ChowMein was delicious!! If you love indo/Chinese flavours, this comes close to comparing flavours but this noodle dish is spice with everything nice!

Overall, I’d come back to try other dishes. Thank you!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOdBX49x9AfR7MwNOQK861a_yG1gjLRJE_uSGwI&fid=0x0:0x58cb2544af0eee2c"],"When":"2024-11-29"},{"Name":"Iceyplz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVzXvKjm8e3vwcZLs5lgD6pZTy1hqvhaCDXCRR_gSyIwonhGwbW=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best momos in town, hands down! The jhol momo is a must-try, especially on a chilly day – it’s the perfect comfort food. The flavorful broth and tender dumplings make for an unbeatable combination. Every bite is packed with authentic taste and warmth. Highly recommend for anyone looking to indulge in delicious, hearty food. This place is a gem!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPCx5YrH-CC6xuD7YqwfsJycoGWzlfTkZChmHe9&fid=0x0:0x58cb2544af0eee2c"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"Avantika kumar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQjFEbM5JO-aYhmaM9SNeCkg0qehBTc5xq5CTV2hkJZDSTKT_K=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They are such nice genuine people working here. There was a mix up with the food but they gave us 2 entire dishes to make up for that. Not only the sweetest people but the most delicious food. The best Nepali restaurant we’ve tried in all years in the lower mainland. Definitely a wonderful neighborhood restaurant to support. They’ve earned us as regulars","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nathan Chang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULis9x-C7u8jouJ6bmV-m7Mb2r-esn5uJaOqGwjwAA9z2MADUV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was quite the culinary experience. The momo’s were warm and delicious. The flavour was clearly there and we had some to take home as they were really filling.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXwoo06FufiPmRM945mtaOx8hlrcogx40JvBhv&fid=0x0:0x58cb2544af0eee2c"],"When":"2024-9-26"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Pratham Yadav","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGCW09thyHU4T1Vmkvf9ZBjoGWF3i0f8djBpDoXMLBVR2pugcQ_A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I got a butter chicken bowl and that was absolutely amazing! Such good flavours in a nicely made balanced fullfilling meal. Top tier","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtdBqUK7RrskQczUlSrV45AI1bFXMdNCvnwaCi\u0026fid=0x0:0xef66e43203229ffc"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLTB8GI_uCLc5Ht3sNjfv8HgyR7Bl8IKyk8E_Wz5jUJjEcUdPc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been coming here for some time now and coming from a Muslim I was so excited to see a new healthy option for halal spots in Maple Ridge. I usually make my own bowl and for the price it’s actually reasonable, I’m always a good full after and the staff are very kind and helpful if I ever have any questions. I’ve become a regular now and it’s always a treat seeing the staff. They always have calming music playing and the atmosphere is very clean. If you haven’t checked it out, please do!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Milad Wahid","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIMJTgbZWm-KuAkSQYeXJ__aBmY6WuoRdvq47vobZHbhnKDtrI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Place is clean, and staff is really nice. The food just hits the spot. I come here after gym for the smoothies, and sometimes for lunch. Highly recommended it, as the food is served fresh. It’s basically like chipotle but 100x better ! And it’s halal","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOI3j1g1ab-s9GeWPu_JfX3Yuew5EwwX5hA_HqQ\u0026fid=0x0:0xef66e43203229ffc"],"When":"2024-5-20"},{"Name":"Simranjot Kaur Mann","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJj_cLjwIZOYbtZHhRvOCAbA-zwJK9KDsQmpvL42UROULXngw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I tried this place for the first time and was amazing. The food was great and the best part is they made everything fresh. Great quality and quantity. The atmosphere was wonderful, people are so pleasant and helpful. Variety of options in the menu. You can get healthy food as well as healthy smoothies at one place. Definitely going back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMVWlgutHtZyeAhM7sgZQ9DcueAyVaIwBohTaUX\u0026fid=0x0:0xef66e43203229ffc"],"When":"2024-2-7"},{"Name":"Erika Capulla","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL3iacE4LMRa4JnnwC--stwEeaK3P7b2_iE1Z9ocaa0PfYeWA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had my lunch at bowland, the food ofc is great, and the service is superb! I like the way hanna and marina guide and help me to build the bowl I wanted and needed for my diet. Will def go back and try their new product","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPfPChTL5MY8C7RNqtRurz0dn099CeqiT0FEZac\u0026fid=0x0:0xef66e43203229ffc"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"Gursewak Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKyeZ0172XJDJ3pxy1qGCEji4Jk_LKqqWXL0zX5iSEj4dTPHw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best Burrito bowls we ever had. Quality and quantity is the best, for the price we paid. Even chipotle and Quesada are mid compared to Bowland, i come from Surrey all the way to Maple Ridge for these bowls and the Mango smoothie.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOrLbIkvo_Z5EUdJs5bTDv0uv0960PByrKgWVll\u0026fid=0x0:0xef66e43203229ffc"],"When":"2024-5-7"},{"Name":"Jenn Henry","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIJfbeGQUNcW8JSmOJSHphuQD5QOBDsfOpX0QgfyhUnUDzEzw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered a bowl with chicken and a chocolate whey smoothie. The chicken was flavourful and soft, the variety of toppings was great including the crunchy chickpeas on top! They had different spice levels to choose from \u0026 everything is customizable to your liking. The whey smoothie was packed with flavour and very filling - I noticed they also offer a vegan protein as well. Overall service was quick \u0026 friendly. Portions were great, I left full and satisfied! Will be going back again :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMj0ehPbJKyfTnykH44pjW7TaxX8b8maoGHqkOa\u0026fid=0x0:0xef66e43203229ffc"],"When":"2023-10-20"},{"Name":"Navdeep Hans","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLx9xXgvww0adxZLtIhz7zICDRcpTnmK-nTnXkgLWQitCRF_A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I returned for the second time today to grab a wrap for lunch in the last few months. The staff is so friendly and welcoming. This spot is excellent, and, best of all, the food is absolutely worth it. I highly recommend giving this place a try; you'll love it!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Immanuel M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURCHQQ_gUlRsGGjwdJWcNj1pi4KH38rEIuyGH3UdE60vvwMfQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a sweet local spot! I came for a latte and was back the next day with my two brothers. Sue was very kind and welcoming. The lattes aren't competition style, but they are humble and strong and delicious. They use local milk and cream in their drinks from a nearby dairy which I think is very cool. I haven't tried any of the food items yet, but I look forward to doing so. The place has a friendly rural vibe, and several of the staff have charming English accents.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-uo9vHKihmm4PGfO8A3MzHj9Hr5U6wMs7m85W&fid=0x0:0x72d39cfafe0163f"],"When":"2024-11-27"},{"Name":"Youstina Daoud","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJeI1oQ6gtNrwqS4A_rt0SN5EVhVkkzvJ-OoWvkrO4SkblbFfs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everything about this place is great!
The food was amazing, we had the farmer's skillet and the classic breakfast, and the hedgehog latte. Definitely recommend all of them.
The servers are nice and the ambiance gives cozy small business vibes.
Will be coming back for sure :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNiE2t5YP74dXAWukeaBO8qyHFt5Ai8ILYG6zK8&fid=0x0:0x72d39cfafe0163f"],"When":"2024-6-1"},{"Name":"Alison Beaumont","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaY6uJGGYnSv8oB2saqACX2u-zKme2d7xoel728eC776GS0LSj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A great breakfast to start the day. Lots of patio space, dogs are welcome with water bowls provided. Wide variety of breakfast items including vegan options too. Service was fantastic too, very attentive. We had the waffles, breakfast poutine and a classic breakfast. All were good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO544TLueAtgq8qDebmD5lBoZMKLsswo7_pRljL&fid=0x0:0x72d39cfafe0163f"],"When":"2024-7-27"},{"Name":"Jane Carter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKiiTPX_fDwYFOprgDX6WAKchWNE78d2wrdQHvem3ChMR34eA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been in the industry and been to countless restaurants in my time in multiple cities. For real, the waffles and the brisket Benny were both the best things I’ve ever had for breakfast. The service was excellent, quick and efficient, we never had to ask for anything. ALSO, the cutest spot ever, the natural wood, chalkboards and ambience was so relaxing with our gingerbread and French toast lattes. If you’re seated near the window, there are horses grazing on the grass across the street, which certainly adds to the charm! I prefer to visit new places but this place just made a regular out of me! Can’t wait to come back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jessica Villavicencio","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV021zJ0YHPNRj720U3KCT1cAiOzy15VDJDOlEMbSztzh-Yapxw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Loved our meals! A little too much sauce (mayo?) Yam fries were on point 👌🏽
Service was really good!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8cQltS2waTyjuTteWKUEndtjI-p2070Ig3moo&fid=0x0:0x72d39cfafe0163f"],"When":"2024-8-13"},{"Name":"Sabina Billo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWX3wIYxJVhRAxcrwANARt3Jv-0wo3d-3r3UXkphNKGDs-nsouR=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Roots Revival Bowl.  Look at this salad bowl.  It tasted as beautiful as it looked.  Like a symphony of flavours and textures. It was an absolute delight.  Beet Root Hummus is out of this world delicious.  The added freshly picked chive flowers were a wonderful touch.  Absolutely stunning! The service was spectacular.  They were all so helpful and friendly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPSy8yYFFHQgMWw1k003o7GtvkiZEDpHm3e3PxX&fid=0x0:0x72d39cfafe0163f"],"When":"2024-7-12"},{"Name":"Parneet Kahlon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqz_l5BzN5_mBY3QC7SEZWEVervEPkE_VocF-ECzkBQsGcdPO6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Place worth visiting while you are in maple ridge… It’s my go to spot for food after hike in golden ears provincial park. They have vegetarian and vegan options aswell. Servers and very pleasant and friendly. Their food always taste fresh. Their vegetables chicken soup is to die for.

Will be back again for sure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQHAM_NoDHWalMqgDq9WUIALcKBBGPqvYHae2W&fid=0x0:0x72d39cfafe0163f"],"When":"2024-1-9"},{"Name":"Stefanie Mendo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUU7lHpscLJbSk-bFdm1Hw09V6ungaauZ2dqJOsoHy0-JA1MHXL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you have a craving for pirogies, then grab Verónica’s Pirogies & Eggs at Humble Roots Cafe, so delicious! They provide great service, lots of veggie and vegan options as well. Next time, I have my eye on the Cheesy Ponderosa Benny. Super cozy ambience and friendly staff.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPBHzSw2aZ_qAu8fsmEXrHbAcNqhSPT7mqQCAnC&fid=0x0:0x72d39cfafe0163f"],"When":"2024-5-30"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Strange Protocol","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJpcS4LA5T7o-BiPIQZEMAIs6czOPJCu3Z_Aks4N2sDFZy5FQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Not sure if something has changed with business ownership but both the food and overall experience has gone down !

1) Got charged for Meat Tacos but I had ordered veggie tacos. Only came to know when I asked them to send me receipt. The cashier confirmed it's veggie but just mislabeled, sure but than I had remind Cashier to refund me the difference which he did but the whole interaction seemed bizarre.

2) Ordered 4 piece chicken meal. Their online menu says it comes with Gravy, but it didn't so I had to buy one. It's fine but no consistency in pricing / displayed menu between online / offline pricing.

3) Food is not great. Veggie tacos were the saddest I ever had, they were very small portioned for what these guys charged. There were barely any beans, sauce. Not even a hot sauce was given on the side, had to settle for bland tacos with poor filling.The taco shell were white and tasted like the one you get from superstore, just not great.  4 piece chicken was meh, it didn't taste same as before ,  soggy ..chewy meat. probably meat was not fresh, who knows. Only good thing was fries were not soggy.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mel Renter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJEfQZDOgiGzmykYdPan5EnxDCYzS6ax3Bu0T-k0IRV3HYDAA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very good, will try most things eventually. Had three beef three chicken tacos on soft flour today. Good value, appreciative staff. For us, the hot sauce in the order was golden. I even called there to find out what kind…home made was the answer. No surprise !","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sarah Derman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXeXMApt_w0BmokoenlHKya2iQgrMJdxA6HQ6y4TkU6YvmIipI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had them come to our grade 7 party at the elementary school. They were great to deal with, decent prices and really great food! Would highly recommend them.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sad Man","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6NHrR0PaN5pDML6wiVposjZvLXjrsyHV9Cssb9Rt_dJH-L8q8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Without a shadow of a doubt, this is one of, if not THE BEST taco places I’ve ever had the pleasure of eating at, and I’m not just saying that because I was ravenously hungry. You’d be missing out if you didn’t eat here at least once.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Hera","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIdYW_WcRSplgCknqyw_ou-UIcLqtlctjImZLTZlLBg4sOZ7tlM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went here 3 times now and service & food are always great. Please give them a try!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ryan Ziebart","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5RLE9bx4QU3El7VapnXcR3LTkWEnowF9-VETyYPASEQgmyO8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The chimichanga was amazing, hug portion. The poutine was absolutely amazing too! The food truck was at Tinhouse brewing (amazing beer too), and was a hit with everyone! Will definitely eat and recommend it to anyone!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"william winslowhansen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJs6UFthdNPb2nMPDzj8Fn1ahJf-ni1YT6iOWaJXFBL1czXpw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Excellent food truck . Had burrito and fried chicken . Fried chicken was different one of a kind and cooked very well .
Spicy .
The beef burritos was fresh and tasty . Could have used more beef and in general I prefer the shredded beef style opposed to ground beef.
Overall tho I’d call this a win .
I’d eat there again .it was pretty good","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dominic Kohler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIr_Rds6INzk8uBD6vTiDGl0q4vd8v53cFPe8-iHXMsWrqpx1g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Finally tried the food truck after seeing all the good reviews. As a celebration for getting my license and being able to drive on my own I stopped by to treat myself. I've heard so many good things. I ended up choosing the large chicken burrito. It was made fresh and ready to go in 5 minutes. Has a few errands to run but it was still hot when I came home. Lots of great flavors going on, I loved the seasoned chicken as well as the choice of veggies also. The rice was quite nice as well, was like a purple color, so that was new for me. Lots of fresh quality ingredients went into this. The Chipotle sauce that comes in it was to die for. It was so good and was a cherry on top to this already good burrito. I highly recommend it to everyone, stop by pick up some beers at Ridgeway and a burrito.","Images":null,"When":""}]
