user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Nidhi Kukreti","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkwLGU0qL5R4gpFxJSktJd2bFgwdSs8uzUdgRJFVvHPQaNnjI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"OMG, I love this cafe. I visited this place with my partner in evening. Everything was so good. I love the ambience, food and drinks. Recommend to set outside in evening, sunset looks amazing.

If you’re nonalcoholic and vegetarian you should try Blended cocktails peach flavour and Mediterranean falafel burger both are amazing. For alcoholic beverage we tried Corona bomb and original Bellini bomb and chicken wings. It taste so good. If you visit this place must try Corona bomb, chicken wings and their burger, they taste amazing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_ArvjDJcwgWIbb7HemgNeVJbeXv5QbLrTASJE&fid=0x0:0xdb1c783ecca39027"],"When":"2024-8-8"},{"Name":"Hay Leigh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3lw-VM_9NiDkl3P2xmDBrgW_mHw454nMiYrvTPrl44QLhjbc7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This was our first time dining at kingfishers, and likely our last. The wait time for food is definitely longer than it should be, perhaps they’re short staffed on bussers and kitchen staff. The chowder is very underwhelming and bland. The wings were decent. The oysters arrived not on ice but in a pool of water. They were replaced but as another diner review stated, they seemed slimy? I wouldn’t recommend getting oysters here.
The burger tasted sort of good but it is thick and on the dry side. The fish and chips seemed to be the only dish that was enjoyed with no complaints. The service was really friendly and accommodating, I feel for the servers as the kitchen is clearly struggling to provide quality dishes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMuxMNOufg28u_6KGNZclsLjNfE_Troz9ZqaNiJ&fid=0x0:0xdb1c783ecca39027"],"When":"2024-8-30"},{"Name":"MAY","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWaprK9T_y6Ya-MZ-gYNQwYVv0YO4LriJa7e6HtacNm__1Wvj4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ordered the halibut burger and fries. Burger was good. Fries were great! Location on the river is very nice and the staff were all friendly and wonderful. Will definitely come back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYTRPm0a0h4igfVbXKb5_9aw4iyjfMFsBEwzDx&fid=0x0:0xdb1c783ecca39027"],"When":"2024-12-17"},{"Name":"Cleemar M (CLM)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGCGYDgdTLDzn3zRPmQzI47thdkSDXTgZ2wOwEV-c1M78oYSBe4Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"For a long time this restaurant was maligned and we did not go. Then we heard new management and went back and it was good. We decided to go back for a non transition time. The potato pave was spectacular and oysters were delicious. the chicken wings were overly salty and the chicken tenders were slightly dry but the salad was good. Service was excellent and the view is always good. The frozen mule was award winning and the margarita was kick arse. Beers and wine are solid and parking is ample. We will be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMrZRPKgwT3O47ybARkJNqte4xCS7-lOuAR-KY7&fid=0x0:0xdb1c783ecca39027"],"When":"2024-5-17"},{"Name":"Anju","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3NBFx2EqwPeNoEkV2MebyCIf0Znuxcr0FFtfaRAHKwPRpguQHlw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"They have a veggie burger which is amazing to see. We rate it 8.5/10. The falafel patty and sauce is really nice but there is a weird dry after taste. But it’s still yummy and would recommend it. Much better than any beyond meat type products.

Bellini 7/0. The ice is yummy but it’s at the top. The bottom tastes too alcoholy

Very nice along the river outside","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMhRgjhISHMh98uNj2jaFOVr7Lm1l9TH1R1Eph-&fid=0x0:0xdb1c783ecca39027"],"When":"2024-6-30"},{"Name":"Genn Richards","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIv-Bp7UhIKlk7R_WNzPvF8-SHy2B8dPh4abiUjm-9Owih0FQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Beautiful sunset dining on the patio.  One of the very few quiet places to enjoy a good dinner.  I had chicken, brie and arugula sandwich on focaccia.  Real chicken breast and not too much bread.  With house side salad was perfect with house wine.  Partner was happy as always with their fish & chips.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQ5A-x7Zl1vfgaAaxS62rOS113eXGACnXnU6Pm&fid=0x0:0xdb1c783ecca39027"],"When":"2024-9-5"},{"Name":"Shawna Tregunna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYTagW2AheSQ7DO79y1mQQdFj6wxJ7_zgBzjQovYKazP5V_Mm_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great view, great service, fantastic food! The salmon trio was excellent, my sister loved her fish tacos, we both commented on how delightful the crab cakes were and the beignets and mousse desserts were sinfully wonderful! After lunch we lingered and worked from our table for a while and it was lovely! Was surprised it wasn’t busier considering what a great experience we had. Will definitely be back when I visit the area again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5IBW8zm9iBC8lVI7T3ab71ardDEoHMh7XsSM&fid=0x0:0xdb1c783ecca39027"],"When":"2023-10-6"},{"Name":"Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLNzJbWMZ95Bu6OYJjVkBX_DVmBC4cvkfu0ynB-Z65Byxh-Kg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had an exceptional evening at the wine and food pairing event! The food was fantastic – every dish reflected the chef’s dedication and artistry in creating a memorable menu. Greg was a warm and attentive host, making sure everyone felt right at home in the relaxed, casual atmosphere. Steve’s insights on the wines added a deeper layer of appreciation to each pairing. It was a wonderfully laid-back yet elevated experience that we’d highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Pizza Studio Maple Ridge
address: 22358 Lougheed Hwy., Maple Ridge, BC V2X 2T4
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Curbside pickup","enabled":true},{"name":"No-contact delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Lunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Dinner","enabled":true}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jai Baska","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJgkVPK_Dkiw14Vm-Aq7um0HdWnamyEkaSho4iN_N9YjX5tLQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Do not recommend. We ordered the cheese lovers and the studio veggie. The sauce was awful on both, it was more of a tomato paste and not a sauce. The pizza dough is too thick and ended up being mushy.
Definitely won't be ordering from these guys again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHDMEihRidrYnZiCYn7vqA7n0FhmOQeXMlj4rw&fid=0x0:0x936d5124f21b01e6"],"When":"2024-7-21"},{"Name":"Lucía Servín","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUS0_1SZzrl8MIWHz7K1wgt06GCwcZ1zKDx5HXdd_56GENeUF_s1A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I cannot recommend this place enough.

The pizza was wonderful; The dough was soft and it reheats nicely. It is not greasy or salty, it's actually just right.

Service was great, the attendant was using a new machine and accidentally overcharged our card. However, they IMMEDIATELY noticed and returned the money. They were very apologetic and kind about it, which is rare nowadays.

Overall this place was just great. I will definitely be making it my usual pizza stop.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOpmnB4BupSydYNDdEUjJ7IPhCu5o650dBOiLID&fid=0x0:0x936d5124f21b01e6"],"When":"2023-3-19"},{"Name":"Preet Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIsErSLsaqmTPJIfLNU0QuSZ_oZ6micYt6hx6KblhQJc9uRnA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had their new samosa pizza last night and it was absolutely delicious 😋
Their baked pasta was also amazing. Just love their pizza. Best in Maple Ridge for sure 👏👍🏻","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNH_4XdzXoOoRuuQ9Y-FilAXy9l6qZqGgPjZhjj&fid=0x0:0x936d5124f21b01e6"],"When":"2023-12-31"},{"Name":"Justin Jack","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ83y92dTYSVI7JzjGk6IzdJ9YPapHBr8qfzRVUGZV_I1l0Bw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The worst lasagna i have ever tried to eat. Just disgusting. Like soup. Pizzas were also just cold and bland missing toppings. Almost 90.00. What a waste of money. Prices are going up and the quality is going strait down. We will never eat here again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"marksfc13","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWaVwWIUJXqYrfKREpaCfryO84EX4-G_JrUFkK12W5gQvu9XlzJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great pizza.  I got a half pepperoni half Hawaiian and it was nicely browned (possibly too much for some people so be aware).  Lots of cheese and quality toppings.   The sauce didn't stand out but that's not necessarily a bad thing.  The crust was buttery and crispy, I enjoyed it a lot.

Excellent pizza overall, I'll order there again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNgTVr49bdFRE2izVbya63mbBNCJxcY5n7KN6I2&fid=0x0:0x936d5124f21b01e6"],"When":"2023-8-3"},{"Name":"Aryan Panech","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL7WJLB1QG4i053CDqUVljjA7cMznQO2bkJD1pz2fG7pVmz1g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pizza Studio is hands down my new favorite pizza spot! From the moment I walked in, I knew I was in for a treat. The concept of building your own pizza with endless toppings and crust options is a dream come true for any pizza lover. The ingredients were incredibly fresh, and the quality was evident in every bite.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Meagan Kreeft","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX9vvQ-w4OF0dgbJRODk7bk1S1LTiSqymMcHk1-A_Upl6vNLUI_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best pizza I've had in ridge! The toppings were fresh and had the perfect amount!
We had the studios veg and man, it's perfection! Can't wait to try more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipObuxDFKPDg8ma8vDB8E6v_csqYYd1gmB_X-F4_&fid=0x0:0x936d5124f21b01e6"],"When":"2023-3-15"},{"Name":"Jass Archy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUoGsMTqlgpyO5rySKF_froj2uVTrKY9ioOVX7wFUHsuM2M6YbXxg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered first time pizza from them, and it was beyond expectations. We asked Kanwar to make Customized pizza 🍕 and he went above and beyond to deliver us the best .
We really enjoyed our pizza . And people working there super welcoming and kind . If you looking for good taste and fresh pizza , highly recommend Pizza studio. Support local 🫶","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjNTSSconUMxdNSksgJ2_swPTRCZjhwjx9L1XZ&fid=0x0:0x936d5124f21b01e6"],"When":"2024-4-1"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Annie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJAG4UtHNdn-C74S5I053c9lMdRMdh_AH35u090AgjHoFmF2GSW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Finally got to the Haney for wings night and they did not disappoint! $6.60 for a dozen and lots of flavours to choose from. We stuck with the tot-chos and wings and definitely will be back to try more from the menu.  The place was bumpin at 6:00 and our server (Michelle) was busy but amazing. Don’t forget the dog treats to go for the pup!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPW9XCqkPYo7Q2tKuRTBXyI0IMqiARmU4NKlFCO&fid=0x0:0xfb07951d10939099"],"When":"2024-7-26"},{"Name":"Sina Fakhari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLV3zvlXpwBhwOvFcWOJVLP1XsIJ0Y8NWvL94iHGx9-K9fgKQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Tonight, instead of going to our usual pub, we decided to try a local one near our house. I ordered mayo garlic chicken wings with blue cheese dip. To my shock and disbelief, they brought me wings that tasted like BBQ. The quality of the wings was terrible—definitely not fresh.

On top of that, they asked us to pay upfront as soon as we placed the order, which was strange and unreasonable. We had to tip without even knowing what kind of service we’d receive. I’ve never experienced being asked to pay before receiving any service.

When I asked the server to check why I got BBQ wings instead of garlic, they had the audacity to lie and tell me it was exactly what I ordered.

Overall, it was an incredibly disappointing experience. Not only did they make us pay, including the tip, before we even got our food, but they also lied to us and provided poor quality food. On top of that, when we raised our concerns, there was no response or resolution. I won’t be returning.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPau853kkNIkHYxeZJr3d94-9BcLlWG69uC_Psm&fid=0x0:0xfb07951d10939099"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Shawn H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUY9e68ZGbCwagZBAeE8RIgIZ2vSkY4Utn2OccYt8ED7dTgePja=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great daily deals and terrific pub food. It might not be a Michelin star setting but is a great place for a bite and a drink. The parking situation is good, and the place is centrally located in Maple ridge. The chef makes his own sauces and they are for sale. Highly recommend picking up the Mayan BBQ sauce at your next visit. Personally I like the vibe and atmosphere of the place but it may not be to everyone's taste. If you have never been it's worth a try! Great job to chef Ryan and his team in the kitchen. Also I've been several times now and service has always been fast and friendly.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cassandra Yaseniuk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVbmUzj3vX3zNWXqT8wGFPZhCr7UnTkbJYnbo60aOnI2_Zz3OJA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"This place is...interesting. The atmosphere isn't amazing, and it doesn't seem very clean inside. There was no drink menu, and the waitress couldn't tell us the specials or what they had on tap without having to constantly run to the bar and check.
The food was decently priced, and not bad for what it was.
Overall, wouldn't recommend it.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dave J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVdGWkXv3KBdawcKYa861DrCqatGIiu-Pc4zF07bXJGsitpkI62=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I'm not a big bar or pub goer. I don't drink much. I generally go for the food. The food here was acceptable. We only had wings so it's hard to say what the rest of the menu is like.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"John Wylie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxiLO8pNw0MKyOXVcjXud9cqdMnsvOkp8gFBJ0P0kvbguNlJHK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Went in for the fishing  chips special with my daughter food was  great with an incredible salad was quite  . Waitress are really good definitely going back again. Maybe try the Monday night, beef dip, and pizza","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Darian Parrish","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUPwIfBv41Nn_c5Hq6HdDpfX2GJtB7dWn3AVKeEhKDy1PKAs0WO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place to go watch the game or just hang out with friends. A bit of a dive but the food is pretty good, they have tons of vegetarian options, and the service is always fantastic!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Garry Hans","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI7F4rQFBsl3lF9Fa4TzFDOOOWwCkB586gPVojIzbAY5K4UDg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We went last Saturday.. we were family of 8 .. when we were at entrance.. the security guy who checks id is so stupid… after checking id’s he told us to BEHAVE INSIDE… like straight up .. we were about to enter and he started giving instructions to behave inside… we went to spend birthday party that guy ruined it.. we right away decide to not to go in there .. instead we went to langley and spent like $900 in different pub happily.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Ustaad G76 MAPLE RIDGE
address: 21768 Lougheed Hwy., Maple Ridge, BC V2X 2S1
status: Closes soon ⋅ 10:30 p.m. ⋅ Opens 11 a.m. Sat

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Max Luo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJOIlU5nJBhhMt4LhC3zOj5-erzOKLJv2GOSpcFK4XvUCtyZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"With stellar ratings of 4.9 in Surrey and 4.6 in Maple Ridge on Google Reviews, I decided to give this highly praised Indian restaurant a shot—and it didn’t disappoint.

From the moment you step inside, it feels like you’ve been transported to India. The ambiance is authentic and immersive, making the experience even more special. Following the waitress’s recommendations, we ordered their signature Lamb Korma paired with the famous Garlic Naan, as well as the classic Butter Chicken served with Fries.

The flavors were rich and aromatic, exceeding my expectations. The Lamb Korma had an incredible depth of spices, while the Butter Chicken was a perfect blend of creamy and tangy flavors. Every bite was flavorful and satisfying, making it easy to see why this place has such high ratings.

Would I come back? Absolutely! For anyone who loves curry or is curious about Indian cuisine, USTAADJ 76 is worth every visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOuhE4PDtYS7uE0jxMzxCeKTR_v2nxsq6C4J1w4&fid=0x0:0x6ccf4a3eef0094e4"],"When":"2024-12-2"},{"Name":"Harjot Singh Thiara","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzOWwYq4K3U1PHL-O7BVjU4O_407b0Owm7Wzd6z3KttiPqwyct=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hi all, I would like to explain my recent visit to Ustad G76, We were group of eight, and I must say, it was an exceptional experience. We ordered $150 worth of food, and every single item was spot on—delicious and perfectly prepared. I was particularly impressed by our server, Shagal, who must have a photographic memory. She effortlessly memorized each member's order and the necessary amendments, ensuring that everything came out exactly as we requested.

A big thanks to Chef Harjap, who did an amazing job in the kitchen and truly made our day special. We enjoyed a delightful spread that included Kadai Paneer, Chana Bhatura, Pav Bhaji, two Veg Thalis, Veg Noodles, Paneer Malai Tikka, and dessert. The portion sizes were generous, far better than what you often find at other restaurants, where you might feel shortchanged.

During the meal, we all sampled each other's food and were consistently amazed by the flavours. I wholeheartedly recommend this restaurant to everyone—it’s truly great! A final shout-out to the restaurant owner for assembling such a brilliant team.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfxj_Kb--lPZA12v6wUlKAUF_cGWY8Y8fVp4EX&fid=0x0:0x6ccf4a3eef0094e4"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Just B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbqlkGphBGO4ZFtnvvHRFErtzljMxdFcSC7D5K0agOlbgekAWrBA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Mmm so good. Every dish that I have tried here is absolutely delicious. The atmosphere in the restaurant is comfortable, inviting and Shagal is very kind, knowledgeable and friendly. I highly recommend that you give them a try, you will not be disappointed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkf_qtas4_paxsJhu4aG1Tj0TwVKTUurFLGvEJ&fid=0x0:0x6ccf4a3eef0094e4"],"When":"2024-8-30"},{"Name":"Anju Garg","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJs_C0AyLXyV9zsoE79mnQhwb9-QfkUY_7BK5NfmZm6p2l9LQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"we ordered dal makhni and we got chicken tadka free. despite being vegetarian for whole life and first meal after karwachauth and you found meat in ur meal. thing which i wasnt expecting. it was really sad and annoying. feel like throwing out. not going to order again 🙏","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDiVtzx27KpOEb2nabatOfuHBL2gRh-QFtj5TC&fid=0x0:0x6ccf4a3eef0094e4"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Elaine Payne","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLi-cZ79vVwFEPuZ0jB7xl3YujoVxBK2BTnin4mf8s3bdVAog=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time at this little place and we will return. The server didn't greet us when we came in so I wasn't sure how it'd be but once she came to take our orders, she was friendly and very helpful.
We have had takeout from another Indian restaurant in town monthly for about 20 years and this is just as good but different than what we're used to.
I can't remember the names of 3 dishes but the butter chicken was tender and delicious, the rice had peas in it and we loved it and we had mango lassis which were very filling but so yummy and the garlic Naan was also so good.

The location isn't great so I think it gets overlooked but I hope people check it out because it's worth it.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mike White","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWxVYwdZXdW6rHD5JUMV8cij2U9tyTjkBrWNk2tBFvnLkXd-3w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow wow. Very good food. Great portions perfect amount of spice.The service was amazing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOk6xzAZ0DY_P6siuZlOyews4hyrjh6MWbL6GNn&fid=0x0:0x6ccf4a3eef0094e4"],"When":"2024-8-31"},{"Name":"Shalini Sehgal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK_xKGlI9Px4AT2Uw-lnQWBNnj60Kyr16zcfO4UtHOgSeYIb_Iu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Amritsari Kulcha was not at all delectable as desired. Didn't have enough flavor,  some more dash of spices, butter and chutney required. Not happy the way it was served and platted. Spoon was placed on the table with just one napkin (no paper mats/plate... Straight onto the table)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-rhMxYdTDHRqUmVKyV8n1Mg_mb3yl4OrWNBEK&fid=0x0:0x6ccf4a3eef0094e4"],"When":"2024-2-19"},{"Name":"Jennifer Osborne","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGAFIwFtDqyI8D36gZAiSDBU2XmVs34SHaebe4yPZ1-D2Xa3xc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place has amazing food and the decor is fun. Great music, good service, I came back two times in a week when I was working in Maple Ridge. Definitely the best Indian restaurant in the area because I tried a few others.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Amelia Dogillo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLI3n3sIIIteMZko94uGOircV6UYTrOYsyZPKoZxduenUr7=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were so Amazed!!! Hamada Fusion is so far the best Filipino restaurant in Maple Ridge. Leslie,the new owner is very kind and welcoming.
The food are excellent, Pork Bellies melts in your mouth. Don’t have to worry about breaking your teeth 😁. Perfect marinade not salty👍
Definitely will recommend to my friends.Overall 6 stars !!!
Thanks for the Lovely dinner. See you soon.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMWTCiJMvzUofII9kJqfq7KlPByUij5_GW5obo&fid=0x0:0xd50fbdbb7cedb58e"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Jessameen Dela Peña","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX9mRpmL8-ZJUG7UPFcnsjzRdxjABif-MswbO1rxgJyyWfns8Jd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"An absolute hidden gem in Maple Ridge! I’m thrilled that I work just 5 minutes away, allowing me to call and quickly pick up my orders. The service is outstanding, especially from Lian. I tried the chicken inasal and grilled pork belly, and both were incredibly authentic. They even served the chicken with calamansi during my first visit, which was fantastic. I’m excited to invite my coworkers and friends to try more items from the menu!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMgzl5GUjBmiE8OzQeAqOUQP6_-6xoJW9kpVcxM&fid=0x0:0xd50fbdbb7cedb58e"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"Karen Joy Gadot","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUcUJuJsi9haQvGlQ3xP1knqepRhj8ALAKNRIkc08XK9SAU4U1l=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We loved their menu options. Their prices are affordable. I loved their saucy squid. The best for me 👌🏻","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIWkKKFTMNIBTD9bP4WkIGHiDLhWt4JnwZ4vUo&fid=0x0:0xd50fbdbb7cedb58e"],"When":"2024-11-16"},{"Name":"Ying Barros","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfu5E3rIJnohmUspeD7IRszRXn4ESz65B-AiOhglNmhFn_6ho=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place had been under new management for only 2 weeks when we ate there 2 days ago. They seem to have kept most of the original menu (and the original chefs) but added a fantastic array of Filipino dishes. Their SILOGS (garlic rice and egg combos) are authentic, taste good, and are reasonably priced. We tried the Crispy Pork Belly silog and the Inihaw na Liempo (Grilled Pork Belly) silog. Both were quite tasty. They have a decent HALO HALO and Muhlach ENSAYMADA is available. I think they are slowly adding more options.
The new owner is pleasant and is very open to suggestions.
I highly recommend this place for anyone craving Japanese, Korean (chicken), and now, Filipino (silog) dishes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkfGjQD5O6d0xeL5fw-F7f0910_ezreJokS4LA&fid=0x0:0xd50fbdbb7cedb58e"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"MR. Fuji","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWI9BaPvhUvWIky3gps8H6cOgOSgY4I4XEo7m0zGTMnWeXYX_ee=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered take out and they were fast!! Super friendly lady greeted me once I arrived to the restaurant :) I ordered their new chicken combo set, and it is delicious! Also the California cone roll is 🔥 💯 10/10 !! , I’ll be ordering from them again !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNWrJ_MTr_Nm5lx2mudmqNI3CWe3-iX-NUDtq3t&fid=0x0:0xd50fbdbb7cedb58e"],"When":"2024-2-10"},{"Name":"Sienna Querubin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ4n-tl6hQU9bQEibY8fr-Nm6PE0t4PI6qXBN6EWwrcipgRmmD8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time we ordered since the new management and its an upgrade. We ordered the bento and the silog. We find the food tasty however my son commented that for the price, they have small serving...

The owner, I think she is is very welcoming! I hope that more locals of MR would come and taste a sample of Filipino cuisine here.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jack Pajak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7kRSq5QM1wGXm36_dbE9YR6CpcUs9VUAhu1SxvpJkrQ-nGO0N=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow, I was very impressed with the quality and taste of the food here. Definitely blown away, truly a hidden gem.  The sushi was fresh, perfect size and flavourful. We also had the fried chicken which was top notch! I'll be back for for the food alone. They had great oldies music playing and decor here was beautiful wood wall art. Highly recommend trying Hamada!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQ_nFRgDKiO5jihheMvnPj7ZwZQfPTTqz2tbxD&fid=0x0:0xd50fbdbb7cedb58e"],"When":"2023-10-13"},{"Name":"Kathy Mae","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKZmkc3k908cxsmCBB2K8vYHucHGQLA4nkTSCVz5EAtRUalPQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The inside of this restaurant is so cute! They provide a wide menu for almost anything you’re craving from Filipino, Western, Korean and Japanese! Service is very welcoming too. Overall experience was really good :)","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"jinhee Choi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLv12D1dUp7fxcV6NS3xJRpAmiob0RH2Bo_SiAxIgnsqIMG3PKE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Highly recommended !
We started our first meal on Sunday at Jimmy’s Lunch Box in maple ridge.It was our first time there, and we ordered the server’s kind recommendations. Pulled pork skillet and eggs Benedict with shredded was amazing! I feel like I’ll want to go again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPYE1amwNbIB-E2dII2Zdu9zos5rugV72ApNIkl&fid=0x0:0x59611bc8262fc104"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"Yeon-jeong Cha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLE9xNVuyMj6yf4UydQM6ulLbBC5vMx06AACG1GFypCXWinBw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I went there with a big group. It was my second time there, the new owner was very nice. I ordered the chicken waffle, some pancakes, french toast, and a sandwich with onion rings. All the food was good. I definitely want to go back with my family.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtGZ8EmQdFjW2KVpE_eUkJfcs2szgoh5GnZ2ci&fid=0x0:0x59611bc8262fc104"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"Dy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXIcI8ZA9E0JLMr6grGqIysSzElCZrGwCQhhhH5NGKCTspJ3-JLVQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The warm onion rings were the best I've ever had. The staff were all incredibly friendly. We ordered the wonton soup, two egg breakfast, and skillet, and every dish was absolutely delicious. Highly recommend this place!

정말 맛있었어요!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOttKg5C1XEQX6f4T0WBwWb8EwFg_oIbC5JqHnS&fid=0x0:0x59611bc8262fc104"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"ClayPhoenix4","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVelJECogE7AFzsG2ZmzVGlq92_4MqwMY_QK6n2nHeBRJeGCXg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have walked past this plenty of times, but never stopped in until now (after reading several good reviews on social media).
It was definitely worth the drive.  Good/ clean food, reasonable prices, and a well presented plates. The service was great and servers are attentive to you even if you are a different table they are waiting on. I think other coffee shops need to come here to learn how to make and present a coffee!  We will be back for sure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO6uUZINCZoKQ2mqg9VaiRuGf-lQsBcQHjyJyiM&fid=0x0:0x59611bc8262fc104"],"When":"2024-5-31"},{"Name":"Yuju Park","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK7YUbT5ICRWYIEoxny3p8mhJo7E4GJlH7z-0QRvSKvcZu8Tg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This cozy brunch spot has such a welcoming and warm atmosphere—The staff are incredibly kind and attentive, making you feel at home. If you visit, I highly recommend adding the wonton soup to your meal. It’s flavorful, comforting, and just what you need to chase the cold away. Definitely a must-try!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNhgvzHj2ye3DGttkL9R7mMcn6m62Ios8jku93p&fid=0x0:0x59611bc8262fc104"],"When":"2024-11-28"},{"Name":"Brianna Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJCxjGqq-S1P9AXC3kyzrcipFbDfAa10QiVhewDcELC-y7EHg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you haven’t tried this spot, you’re seriously missing out. All the servers were so kind and the food was amazing, especially the pulled pork skillet!
Also tried their hand made wonton soup and you can definitely taste the difference that the wontons are hand made, super juicy and tender.
It’s definitely my new go-to brunch spot, and I can’t wait to come back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipORs1c74i358tM_45WF0Sdw4vTE8jO7oYh1JYLG&fid=0x0:0x59611bc8262fc104"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Willow kehler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWrGyM4Cox8sgLgFo2GdYuDP6ylhpy80buz1nGPvDlIYwB5ju7P=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Had a good lunch! Beef bulgogi skillet was amazing! Wish there was a few more iced coffee options","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlPrDoKV5U4ezighE12rKFhPmc5AU4QtFtL6Ua&fid=0x0:0x59611bc8262fc104"],"When":"2024-10-14"},{"Name":"Clara Shin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK8r3qq6Ia1p9jreBiNgO6aoNhyUS6wr0640Ek21mGJv2Pi2Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I usually avoid eating meat when dining out because I am very sensitive to smells. Many restaurants seem to use lower-quality meat, which often has an unpleasant odor. However, I was pleasantly surprised when my friend ordered wontons here, and I decided to try one. They were absolutely delicious! I was told they are handmade, which explains the exceptional taste. I liked them so much that I ordered takeout to enjoy at home. I was also impressed that the packaging they use is made from safe materials without harmful chemicals.

Although it’s a bit far from where I live, I would love to come back often. This place serves incredibly delicious and healthy food. Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Alex","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVxP-ADvohB6hXpEbci04qD4fdlJ8qjEvYJvIIZqjiOIuWU9BVM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Came here for a spontaneous date night. Spacious eating area and live band on weekends so that was nice. Food was really good. The Well Burger is solid. Homemade 6oz patty with a nice char on the outside. Service was a bit slow (we were there about an 1h30mins) however they were hosting what looked like a Christmas staff party for a large group so it was understandable. I also felt like the portion size for the fries that came with the burger was a tad small but everything was hot and fresh so overall it was delicious. Would definitely return!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMk0TReCZMW6ByWvE3B4u4CqyRh0Uy0F3XtYt7K&fid=0x0:0x29766a1c2996e3c1"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Julie B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4pd43YT5KSqkORSPaVbra7_KcodZ1kkwID5yaolZD_WuCOEiQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Had dinner with friends.
Her and I both got the Veal schnitzel, was good but the vegetables were over cooked. The roasted potatoes were ok.
And our other friend got the Ginger Beef and Broccoli, it was meh. Not really anything close to a Ginger beef, more like Hosing cause with beef and broccoli.
Last was the Well Burger. Was OK.

There was only one server and she was extremely run off her feet but she was doing the best she could.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPFCL0kdKDFaAhQxSjUK8C6rhh3pz4aTqtGeUfC&fid=0x0:0x29766a1c2996e3c1"],"When":"2024-1-25"},{"Name":"Barendina Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4gAXNw7bsOWNo-qAPQuFfFYX-uW_wVZHByRe8lPzJaAZZQQG6pQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Wow this place has certainly gone down a long steep hill since 2022.  Paid $18.90 + tip total $22 for this tiny grilled ham & cheese.

Bread was sourdough & EXTREMELY hard.  It tore apart the inside of my mouth. Only 1 thin slice of ham folded in half on my sandwich. Paid $2 for side of gravy, which was only filled a quarter of the way up in small container. What did they expect me to do with that! & that was $19..

What a disappointment. I go to this establishment a few times a month, & I've never been so upset with a meal. No, I did not complain; it is not my nature.

My son also got chicken strips & fries, & his strips were so hard & small & he got about a tablespoon of dip in his small container. 😡

Overall, just a really, really bad experience. I do hope management sees this!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkChnt9LmPwwlV2ou89or3GsgwnAD-iLAsWbS2&fid=0x0:0x29766a1c2996e3c1"],"When":"2024-1-10"},{"Name":"Leah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWt2ep7OMjltFmWQzS3XFoIWjRO47VrI6MupJ2gMQDNDdAaE18CrQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wonderful staff, amazing food, and very enticing atmosphere. We had the Mac n cheese w/broccoli and bacon, the beef dip, and a Ruben. Absolutely amazing and all for a decent price. Would definitely recommend and go again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5qk-4NGeIGRQ2CnV6foYf1wHo9gPWWIFDxTUk&fid=0x0:0x29766a1c2996e3c1"],"When":"2018-7-5"},{"Name":"Grace Baptiste","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYWSGyxL6xv7wCMnONngE95_lFn-QFdC26NOw2Rzl5vHdq9MLmkw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Steak & eggs were delicious. (Not on the menu btw but you can request it) Service was very good and the atmosphere was nice and relaxing. Nice fireplace and open concept. Will try again forsure! Pricing was also good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJKFWp_W7FK46gBxgohi5ezIxjTJY9ssEBXvQz&fid=0x0:0x29766a1c2996e3c1"],"When":"2023-10-10"},{"Name":"ClayPhoenix4","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVelJECogE7AFzsG2ZmzVGlq92_4MqwMY_QK6n2nHeBRJeGCXg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Pre covid this was the place for great deals and good quality food and i would eat dinner here 3 tines a week. But for the past 3-4 years the quality and value of the food has become a complete dumpster fire and 🗑. There are no daily deals, no specials, just the most mediocre food ever. It is so bad that I frequently choose to go hungry than to eat nothing but disappointment. It is now $10 for a bowl of tomato soup or even a simple mushroom soup (not even a protein 🤦)
The only thing keeping the doors open is the casino, because if this was a "stand alone restaurant" it would have closed years ago.
The only savior is the long term staff that all know this place is a joke! I have eaten here tons of times and know the difference between good food and garbage,  so take my advice and eat somewhere else; unless you enjoy breakfast that almost everything gets dumped in the deep fryer flavor where the only savior is the toast. 👎
I give the food ZERO stars if I could and I am being very generous with this review.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Pooja K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI-ssEEl6Av2NXTNEvITlxy4r9NclpyO6oAAInk0KHt0F4u0jQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered their wings and they tasted like they were old had been fried multiple times... were not tasty. Felt gross/sick after eating them. Drinks were ok.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Leah Bruce","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkX62WTTSocBgHktQdxD3aUnx5z9bphuCE7ycZjFNu-MaWl5q7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was our first time here last month and we popped in for lunch. We were very impressed with the $9 price tag on the flatbread pizza so that's what we ordered!! I had the "Mediterranean" which is nicely finished with some fresh, cold cucumber! Delish and took home half for breaky the next day! My husband had the "Pepperoni Plus" and was happy with his choice. Yum! Will be back again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7fAPVAPMax8HEyiSB5gwIRKWXpxfUyDpkvvaj&fid=0x0:0x29766a1c2996e3c1"],"When":"2017-10-5"}]

[{"Name":"John Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLHsD0MIg5ejQBMYDfvkgm3alRYfAgEQQHfz94UREXa0rw3iA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow! Just wow! This place is an absolute gem! I came here to visit some friends and they've recommended coming here. This place blows my mind. The portions are huge, and their quality is superb! I know there are a lot of sushi restaurants in Vancouver, but this place is absolutely a must.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPV79k31E0bLbWOGhfCCkyXX1e1C_VWw8eQEV1t&fid=0x0:0x281ae37263ce53eb"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"Mike Harrison","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLWYvvsnozmeWMkIGxChVYos60eOJErKbp2sLhdMXLOG70BiA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wife and I stopped in here by chance. 100% deserve the 5 stars definitely the best sushi I have ever had. Everything was so fresh and delicious. Plus the presentation was AWESOME. 10 OUT OF 10!!! See you again for sure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMHpP6pcRyfOfDSprBXxaL8Jwdec5XqDpu1BKyP&fid=0x0:0x281ae37263ce53eb"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"Helen Decaire","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKjGLbuu_kh4VagVyQHSQN4yARFXJTgSkPNhSV217uHOdTVn8X=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time at this location.  Best sushi in MR.  You have to come try this restaurant.  Staff are super friendly, great atmosphere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGL4CQcDvBTXiVvGRi4Umo341fAg1Itqh_LZMF&fid=0x0:0x281ae37263ce53eb"],"When":"2024-11-10"},{"Name":"Dana Meng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXWns9Obqs0woSr1Ts68KiDwp_BFLjIHf7KQr8QzjN-qYhkyxpV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was too hungry to take all photos. All rolls were yummy and fresh! It was a small place with 5 tables only, however, the services and foods were all wonderful. Will come back again when we are in maple ridge 👏","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPu-AbUX351_EVEr0WGseORW12BofjC5_GkWd4x&fid=0x0:0x281ae37263ce53eb"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"Pierre Dalumpines","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJWfkkCWqXl3Wah1C6eZHhH1xCsEWhNWNcq_ySw9AMEyi-Fg1P=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We sought this place out as we were craving sushi and rolls. Absolutely blown away by the quality, flavor and freshness! Fast service and reasonable prices too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOWmbBZP-sX03Oy16_dVDhu-MD0tP1oQgn3rN2H&fid=0x0:0x281ae37263ce53eb"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"A L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVDuox32jyJxnkzAm48h5i9Ht66Z7AvtkXQcQV08flbS_JcS1Q6eQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a fantastic find!! We just happened to be in the area and the signage caught my eye. On a whim, we decided to give it a try.

The decor is simple and modern. They have a few small tables, with highchairs and booster seats available for little ones.

We came in for a light snack but ended up ordering a full meal because the there were so many great options to choose from.

The oshi sampler is fantastic!! The perfect way to try 3 different oshi sushi on one plate. I'd highly recommend the oshi bento - it's delicious and you get so much for $19. The popcorn roll was amazing and it comes with a salad, so it's practically a meal on its own.

The staff were incredibly friendly, which was just the cherry on top of the cake!

UPDATE: we've been back multiple times since our initial visit and each time, it gets better (if that's even possible). The snow roll and the salmon/scallop flower are both INCREDIBLE!!! I'm seriously so impressed with this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPWvduQSzsfG2fvmvUO1-_BCzc-SosNsFP80URt&fid=0x0:0x281ae37263ce53eb"],"When":"2024-5-26"},{"Name":"Myeongseon Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKHjh4_B5Gg_MY2sH5o-yYbPDnBQKnCdyPjl2p8KBFvNNvM2Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I visited Hako Sushi yesterday.
I looked forward to it because the reviews were so good!
Everything was better than I expected. The food was so fresh and delicious, and the staffs were so friendly and professional.
I will visit again to eat another menu next time!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOBzJq8cWjRLf9JqBgiXKnzVuCnlDwYq3jkpMle&fid=0x0:0x281ae37263ce53eb"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"Tatiana Machulis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXfiCaI-efpwC7gNnzZVCHlPn4MHsq8B_kMNrTN2tstdUAVMwyt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a great experience we had :) Food was delicious and super friendly service. The restaurant is small, but cozy and with a nice atmosphere. Will definetely go back to try more options from their menu!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNdoGhSZUUlreu9tRvd8S41rcTxkpOTWruuCccU&fid=0x0:0x281ae37263ce53eb"],"When":"2024-8-3"}]

[{"Name":"Dev Deteriorate","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW174d3q1C68k3CIpTb3Y2mjhbzxdBX3351-dOCoOvMShWcsYWq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best Brunch menu i’ve seen in a minute.

Ordered The Lumberjack and it was a little heavy and rich but if you’re really hungry you’ll be happy you went for it.

Good prices too and the staff were awesome.

Surprised I never wandered into the Maple Ridge location before but i’m glad I changed that!

Cheers :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOjHdJYS5Nkx9fp0gQhvGc_wLwJvIRsS9jxVtSb&fid=0x0:0x1bb7ba6b48e843c8"],"When":"2024-9-3"},{"Name":"Nathan Woods","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYlKwIGO9PHjqLgc7mRGN7qYIzJ_Yb1JOij4343pL12ye4fG4D-w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"They get a 3 star.

I always like the food, service is usually exceptional...

But when we we seated in the patio, the table felt... Dirty.

Like built up grease that just doesn't wash off ...

Then, upon actually pausing to look at the table...

We saw this.

Do better Brown's.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOu-pvRvgvZYnUGCvT1etFxOW11BwEvmkgQClgj&fid=0x0:0x1bb7ba6b48e843c8"],"When":"2024-12-11"},{"Name":"Da Wanderer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6gUX2zsQKdIE8uVzYWBnKKtvYQAJfEKJppzMJqd4hE4TuUun8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We dined in with our kids. I was hesitant at first because I am not sure if this is a kid-friendly place to dine. However, it was around 8pm on a holiday and most restaurants were already closed around the area. Coming from a long drive, we decided to take our chance and dined here with the kids. There were only a few diners so it was favorable for us. The food was great. The servers were great and accomodating. We made the right choice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPonaW_Z7yfcVvjv3yeL9nJm_OoHa5JmEnCpAYP&fid=0x0:0x1bb7ba6b48e843c8"],"When":"2023-4-11"},{"Name":"Joanne Antoniak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTQwhPcO13h_HhVjJVUrwpHjU5MeesKhPrxV5pA1ymdZ1edFkY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"First time @ Brown's on a monday for lunch.  Loved it!!  Prices were high but food was good.  Service was outstanding.  Our server was super attentive and friendly - which actually added alot to the overall experience.  We would go back","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNTkxIfAd_HPnYF2aZZhr_Tql6Kz91jKh5igJZV&fid=0x0:0x1bb7ba6b48e843c8"],"When":"2024-3-18"},{"Name":"Uros Nikolic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqZKUGj61BfmTYu8vecdYC7cNoaJsQnfWJB3zipm50mUOPG3Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is awesome if you’re in Maple Ridge area, food menu is versatile my picks are chicken bowl , any burger or steak and desert Oreo cheesecake cookie jar is 🔝 of the notch.
Plenty of parking space, friendly employees so no reason not to stop and try this Browns restaurant.
I recommend and thumbs up for this one","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPyEvQgas5nRKQTc_yyOw_G2KqZoRkkvNH1XjCv&fid=0x0:0x1bb7ba6b48e843c8"],"When":"2024-5-23"},{"Name":"Mary Ann Casusi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUDYtqTjaPWTw4sJbsLutOu3i5uKukdYsEFxa5oNrl4gqQ2CdPYwg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The hosts are always friendly. The food is excellent, and I have never had an unpleasant experience .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPSVsd44mbeLcAZ_UY1k3hCvkg9O9QO5jdpMwR1&fid=0x0:0x1bb7ba6b48e843c8"],"When":"2024-5-29"},{"Name":"Naser","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0-YQ8zU5RxMjX7Szhrzpzf3k8mT3TPmCIoVpC7Yu8SS5YsZfI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I enjoyed the food; the staff was exceptionally welcoming during my dinner. The order arrived promptly, and the food tasted fantastic. The only hiccup in my recent experience was not receiving my second drink, although I was charged for it. However, they promptly corrected the issue.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFfc4LIeQ2jDVOYfU0wgbIHdsMhmtzbdSBJxN-&fid=0x0:0x1bb7ba6b48e843c8"],"When":"2023-10-28"},{"Name":"Andrea Wicki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKwpNPLBT7SuJkViPKkt6ckEWcJSQE26-gbxUe4LDAXZrX3dg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We made a reservation for my daughter’s 19th Birthday. There were 15 of us plus an 18 month old. We were welcomed warmly by all of the staff. Our server, Brooke was very organized and friendly. The food and drinks came out quickly, and they were delicious. We had such a nice evening! Thank you so much to all the staff who made my daughter’s night so memorable. 😊","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Jessameen Dela Peña","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX9mRpmL8-ZJUG7UPFcnsjzRdxjABif-MswbO1rxgJyyWfns8Jd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My first-ever poke experience was fantastic, thanks to a coworker who introduced me to this spot! It was incredibly flavorful, and the promos make it an even better deal, sometimes saving you nearly half the price. The store was also exceptionally clean, which added to the overall experience. Plus, the location is perfect—just a short walk from the bus loop and close to the park.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPP4JTz-O4Bq1-kUZtMCLKhRw2TEbWNWsavfR8a&fid=0x0:0x6b998b5d4e4999ca"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"M. Petr","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4z89Me6qOaraIDGghLnCpRJmrntMOdBCRhpnTB7C9G1NxtXc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Super friendly and helpful staff and great food. Caution on the extras-they can up.
Just like homemade but I didn’t have to make it.
They are new in Maple Ridge and definitely worth checking out.
Poke done right!!

Edit:
SPB is a regular stop for us now when we head out for the evening. We can always count on them for fast yet healthy options when on the run. Sometimes we forget to recognize another reason we continue to return: The Staff!
We enjoyed our dinner there tonight, in fact. We just wanted to take the time to let folks know hat the young person working there tonight, Luke, provided us with exceptional service. He is professional and personable. We know the service industry can be challenging and it's way too easy to post when dissatisfied. Experiences like the one we had tonight, however, are what will keep us coming back to Steve's Poke Bar!!.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzX3RyTVhDyDnaBA9C-HOqVspfa8y1PPgoCaSw&fid=0x0:0x6b998b5d4e4999ca"],"When":"2023-5-3"},{"Name":"Marie craig","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKJ-y4s9oFXK1qOEM2dzdHMCrPCzjet0vfqdlo_WPphrIrEw8g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Music is upbeat  but not ridiculously loud.  Food is fresh and delicious!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0n0Pk0sadq2ixByeZH4D1Kliq8S7ttH4SKy8X&fid=0x0:0x6b998b5d4e4999ca"],"When":"2024-8-30"},{"Name":"Neo Cant","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLsYuyeNSHxlNXWHmpKYCBh5sMpXHGoPo6fBZFyv6OWecPDUw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great environment, love the people and the energy. I feel naturally comfortable being myself, and the conversations, though I am awkward, are very fluid and I felt easily at home. An extra special thank you to those working today :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michaela Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL0rQWXq3YZOfQ9tOD0fuJFYTTxutla_LRwLCaAuWPe2rLw7g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Bought a bowl for my coworker who had never tried before.  She loved it, I left the toppings to employee and she created a great bowl.  My spicy tuna bowl was also right on point.  Excellent service and food!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ariel Vigil Aleman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWKaFyYy0Oc7cqhDIbRlMgmZVEnvSO09NdcAWYz5mce8FUYp7r03Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everything is great, the amount and quality of serving is excellent. Even if you are truly hungry, just add another scope of salmon for $2.80 and you are good to go.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Scott Cadwell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcUPkor7of022PE7mZhl7C4YBstCsnyBss-4DvqhxV-s-fyL4ezQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I have eaten at a few different Steve’s Poke bars and I don’t think I would go back to this one. I ordered online and walked over to the restaurant. It wasn’t that busy, but it was slow. My order didn’t get started till about 15 minutes after I ordered it online. Two people were working and it still took a very long time to get my food. There was only one online order before my order and it took that one a long time to get completed. Very slow service, very slow.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shauna Simrose","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0c5ywtSQiIfpS0gyGI1ztRaG_peUj1ESnFkClvtVGVuJe9uKI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My daughter and I love coming here. Their poké bows are always good!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3M2T0s0sasne6Np87mLbl6uP3DMMD1D1Oi24K&fid=0x0:0x6b998b5d4e4999ca"],"When":"2024-8-17"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Divya Prakash","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNiQrPUZkiYQTnFdP0lhwPK2fJ3DCNtYXc-W7edCuVdf5gJjwD=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I ordered their Raspberry Lemon Cheesecake and it was really disappointing. It was sour, unappetizing and not sweet. I was looking forward to it. Would not order again. Pasta was decent.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPMN1i41zuv-jFmcBrlwaJSZxoBEwb8vdgzuCU2&fid=0x0:0xc63b0c31f63b1714"],"When":"2024-11-27"},{"Name":"Elise Ardizzi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX1tLvG9dk778TfiZNEobPfkCOpjWPfjySchaB-Y7t1mukyJZJB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The King Caesar Review is here! I am here to rate all the Caesar salads world wide … starting at my home in Vancouver. These rating will be heavily based on the Caesar salad it’s self, and not the other food I ordered. I have been eating Caesar salad’s for the past 20 years and thought it’s about time I get serious about these leafy greens covered in cream sauce. I hope your as excited as I am.

Paliotti’s in Maple Ridge- only one other Italian restaurant to choose from

Dressing: creamy base, with a nice lemon coating, heavy garlic (yum), fresh ground pepper and anchovies. Can’t believe I’m saying this but maybe too much sauce.  Definitely tastes homemade though.
Lettuce: romaine, cold and crisp, however cut too large
Croutons: out of a package
Cheese: questionable? Powdered parm on top but within the dressing a thicker heavier tasting cheese I couldn’t figure out.
Bacon: none- which is honestly how I prefer my Caesar’s. Bacon seems to over power the sauce and texture (to me)

I went to this restaurant after 8 years of my mom passing away with my girlfriend. My mom always ordered penne alla vodka. I was searching all over Maple Ridge and could not find it on the menu. This place seemed the most authentic and warm. We obviously has to order the Caesar salad, but I asked if they could do an alla vodka sauce but on my favourite… Gnocchi!
Soooo tender, sauce missing pancetta but still very good and grateful I got to eat in my moms honour

Overall, very authentic, great service and food came quick. There is a creepy table that you can’t site at with the Mona Lisa looking over you but that’s guna stop us from coming back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNuojeziO4jMgePhjk0PXm2X7mUMU0L7plipgTc&fid=0x0:0xc63b0c31f63b1714"],"When":"2024-7-26"},{"Name":"Jacquelyn Johnston","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLfy_pLzvat08k9FzqYD-5djtqo3UfUv3fLgHw-FhXMEBTZ9A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"My friend and I thought we'd try the Wednesday steak or ribs special for $18.95, misleadingly advertised on the outdoor sign as steak and ribs. We arrived about five o'clock and the place filled up steadily until our section was full.
It was my friend's first time there and she appreciated the quaint atmosphere.
She ordered the honey garlic ribs. I was looking forward to the steak, medium rare.
The complimentary foccacia was delicious.
As I can't eat potatoes, I ordered the caesar salad as a substitute.
We had agreed to share a couple of tasting bites of our entrees but when my steak arrived I was having real difficulty cutting through it.
The ribs were good but the portion of potatoes was very small.
The salad was fine, along with the few bites of vegetables.
Unfortunately our server didn't return until I'd eaten all the veg and most of the salad. I'd finally broken down and tried a bite of the steak but it was so chewy I ended up having to leave it on my side plate.
When she did come back I apologized and asked if she could possibly have it thrown back on the grill for a minute, thinking perhaps the rareness was the problem.
She also apologized and said other people had complained and that she'd use her discount.
She brought me a new steak that wasn't much better, to the point that two thirds of the way in my jaw was too sore to continue chewing so I left the remainder on the plate.
When the bill came, she had comp'd the special completely, which was more than I expected and much appreciated.
I wish I'd read the reviews before we went and am reluctant to give a negative review but I see I'm not alone.
If you want a decent steak at that price point I recommend The Reach or The Meridian Arms.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Fred Pisciuneri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLJa1gaoTtY22fdDEqMPm2WTbr81qQ1auvM_vNGloxSwNkGJA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"My friend and I decided to tray this place based on their sign promoting steak or rib dinner
the hostess was very friendly and seated us right away the waitress was also very friendly and took our order promptly
I had the steak special  and minestrone soup
my friend ordered the steak special
the soup was very good one of the better minestrone soups Ive had in a restaurant
the steak on the other hand was very tough I could not chew it and barely cut thru it it was very grizzly and veiny
the waitress came by to ask how the food was so I told her she was very apologetic and said she would have another made up
I had maybe a couple of bites that I could chew thru on the first one
the second one was even worse
I stopped fighting with n it and when the waitress came back I told her
my friend was also struggling with his and got about half of it down after cutting out n odds and end pieces
the waitress apologized again
I felt bad for her and told her it wasn't her fault
she offered us free deserts , as I don't eat dessert due to sugar issues i declined and my friend also declined
she brought the check and charged full amount for everything
when I questioned it she said she would get someone after a few min this lady came out and immediately started in on me with a nasty attitude as if i was trying to pull one over on her
I told her I didn't eat the steak it was sent back to the kitchen
out of 3 steaks 2 and half were sent back
she said again with a snarl this the bill
I walk with a cane as I am disabled so I went to stand up to get my wallet out .she told the girl "take his picture . take his picture loud enough for the other guests to hear in order to embarrass me in front of the whole restaurant. They took my picture and disappeared
I stood there for about 5 min waiting but no one showed up so I left

It really is disappointing to have to   deal with someone like that when the rest of the staff was great . I would gladly have taken a discount and an apology for the bad steaks
I would like the owner to contact me to make amends and I sure hope its not the same lady
either way I would not go back there as a patron as i don't need that stress . I just wanted a nice relaxing dinner","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Karen Norrie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIM0HHV52XWj0DuqS582jUGxsQfKKT4CXIFpksBWsK_BlOh4Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Made a reservation for 20 people a few weeks ago.  Called Sunday to confirm one more person, so 21 people at 6pm for Tuesday.  Arrived on time.  We did get a first drink each.  Took over an hour to get second drink, even when a few of us asked.  We were told it would take another 10 minutes for waitress to come to table, it took longer.  That was the last time it was offered during our evening.  We did ask more than once and waitress never came back.  Other than taking our initial orders and delivering food we were completely ignored.  Table full of empties, what a mess.  No one ever came to clean our table.  Plates were picked up but never any glasses and never any water refills.   We had brought in a cake and those dishes were never picked up. Our time there took 3.5 hours.  It took over an hour to get our bills.  We had school aged children and 3 women in their eighties.  They waited, we all waited over an hour for the bill.  We could not understand why.  One waitress said their machine was 30 years old and it would take awhile.  I saw and watched other tables in restaurant get great prompt service.  Their bills came in a timely matter.  They did not wait over an hour for their bill.
Their tables were cleared upon finishing their meal. We were blatantly ignored. To top off such a rude experience, the waitress hand wrote a 20% forced gratuity on every bill.  We had no prompt service.  That wasn't offered.  Shady business.  Very clear we were ignored as there was a guaranteed 20% tip from us, no matter what little service we got.  They do not get the 20% guarantee from the smaller tables. Very disappointed with paliottis, our group certainly won't be back. We have had many of these gatherings at many different places and have not met such disregard for our dining experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMmYvF6Ijp2OEyDwedI_Puw9G4J-z-wlnNj47RO&fid=0x0:0xc63b0c31f63b1714"],"When":"2024-3-13"},{"Name":"Meghan Klassen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKD-XbXwb6aAq-xlNjuC8BO0xaag0Zq5PBhSx8MCP7PI-YuvQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Services is excellent, but the food is pretty disappointing. Lacked flavour, just plain boxed pasta that you are paying a pretty high price for.
I had the veal Neptune, had very very small amount of seafood and small extremely thin pieces of veal. Pasta had hardly any sauce on it. I dont think we will be returning.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Urszula","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIfU5PKcg9JLueSHqTZ2mNz35scjm_8tfESVV6QKIPy8_jxxg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Decided to try the Tuesday dinner special with my family of four for my birthday; was told that because I didn't  have a reservation they could not accommodate us for dinner for 30 minutes. There was no one waiting for a table and there were numerous tables empty; parking lot was half full. Very disappointing and will not be returning.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Danny Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8eoyUE6az-FmQo7i2mVq5z64Ow48sgKu1EmLZc0zWWN6DMy5asw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The OG Paliotti’s. 35 years and 4 restaurants as a family business for Italian means they must be doing something right. This location is the original; don’t get it confused with the one 3.5km west (also same family but different style).

The food here is great. Portions are generous and they don’t skimp out on the good stuff. That first zing of balsamic vinegar and EVOO with the perfectly toasted focaccia is strangely memorable.

Service was good and suited the occasion.

The only dislike was the desserts. We found that the mains and pasta were really good but the desserts were ok. Worth trying though for sure (esp. the tiramisu).

Nice and cozy, home style feel. Will definitely come again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMc-P5DZTgChPWA0vAaDAPrPbQHg27i08CXYcsR&fid=0x0:0xc63b0c31f63b1714"],"When":"2023-9-15"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ash R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIVYs1oeCHR54zxfCo6bEatUrXY4UJPN4r3IiQiG3icAtrJKA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"HUGE portions, we got 4 items for $17 and the plates were huge! So worth the money, love to support mom and pop shops, you won’t regret it! We all left with takeout containers filled to the brim after we were stuffed. Best egg rolls ever! Great Service, very friendly and accommodating. I’d rate higher if I could. Ps- photos were after we ate some lol","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMh5QUNhT5I-xHPQug30c4P-vOE7Q2a9qZiTzbm&fid=0x0:0xf67d5394cd500611"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Dante","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJJBsnDt-Jyx-wWvCneLo2yoEFwzv6R1zGdLk7DybFf-Xv7HBL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious food served in absurd portion sizes made by a lovely husband and wife team. You will definitely leave with enough food for another meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZRpQbd1dwXrnY6BMQdJFpzOfV_73k8tc9HofC&fid=0x0:0xf67d5394cd500611"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Ash R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUCcJlHwE4izM0F5v3JT69CAyK03CVkDSxImo4puINMRF5V7q8eog=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Was recommended to us, so we ordered two daily specials yesterday for dinner pick up.

Staff: I believe it was the owners that I interacted with. They are so efficient, warm and friendly!

Food: The prices have gone up since the menu pictures posted on here. So the daily special is now $15.95 for 3 items and wonton soup. But the portions are refreshingly large, and the food is delicious! ☺️👍🏽
(Pictured is the mushroom fried rice, pork chop suey and sweet & sour pork. Wonton soup not pictured, but I would say it's a 2 cup sized container).

Parking: There is some street parking out front. Which is great for pick up.

Highly recommend and we will definitely be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMsBCY_VR9xw8nTt6iCU2yAv-5lDUiqwh1mNMAJ&fid=0x0:0xf67d5394cd500611"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"Robyn G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK9GXkw-9s6-iB_2NgpG9t2eLiMtiw6ShgHbyNxnStcj0ZIWA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time we ordered from here. We've tried every other Chinese food place here in maple ridge. Wow we are blown away. This is what you call authentic Chinese food. Big portions. Definitely will be our go to Chinese food restaurant! Highly recommended","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ashley Stanowski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJcBriTpE9lCmUCcexEfwU5vbtIxzzdMxIMDrT2rcWMt02YOQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Don’t let the dated building fool you, this is great food! Everything was cooked perfectly and super flavourful. AND THE PORTIONS ARE HUGE! I had to stop only a third of the way in, I was stuffed! Excellent experience, we are very satisfied and happy. THANK YOU!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOP_uLyk1zMWmgImheBgdF1lLEMymkepPNcc_we&fid=0x0:0xf67d5394cd500611"],"When":"2024-6-23"},{"Name":"SALLY YOUNG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJfcu_oZoQJtUA7Yjtpc8LxpW0k-K7e3GcuoTzP9-IlkP9Llw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had chinese food for Xmas eve. Food was ready on time and we ordered several dishes and all were very good.  The couple who own it are very friendly.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cdn Chick","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU545v6W7r-6x-UEIb8QlKT_isW0v2lWx4NGtJqmJLsyjTjHpg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Small mom and pop restaurant that offers great deals and huge portions!  Best prices in town!  Thanks Peter and Lily!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPLS44vDt8ky1LGFzBKs_z92GM3WACynRcLiMK&fid=0x0:0xf67d5394cd500611"],"When":"2023-7-23"},{"Name":"Simon Joe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0f5G4fJ3M8QEGA_STxGDiI3Ok5iguc7BSlANH3xP15ogo-pLQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a small Chinese restaurant which is most likely run by a husband and wife team. The decoration is dated, but the food tastes really good, even though it may be better if the amount of salt or conditioning can be reduced a bit to suit our lighter taste. We are amazed at the speed of serving & plate sizes. The price is unbeatable too. Three big dishes of fried rice, wonton soup, cheese sandwich and fries offered more than enough for our family of 4 with 2 preteen boys. We can't believe that the total price was only a bit more than $30. What a friendly and down to earth Chinese restaurant with great value for your wallet!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM884l3nRd_9t1-MC5K57XavEsCCX_Wrdh8ccud&fid=0x0:0xf67d5394cd500611"],"When":"2023-8-2"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Colin Hamilton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIk81cVmo3yWDzrWIoGkyXARTxEQPH_Om4zV8kxcEUg4fdCJnE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Friendly staff informed me of a 2 for 1 deal I took them up on.

I had the vegetarian & spicy slices. The Spicy was the better of the two.

It’s good for a quick by the slice value meal.

Getting a 5 for value and service on this visit.

Thanks!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPxjYuYTiesYKG0oW1naL6bTWGNQWohXsgLPWV5&fid=0x0:0x2d2d28039dd51dcc"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"Cherry Lee Lewis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXnuA3vQnKwf1lNDrt1JGHOhbHWNFBnHonFnaTlakiatexqH4A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I’m so shocked there are so many good reviews.  This place is in the mall which closes earlier than their hours. If you try to call you can’t get through. Waited in a back alley and someone finally came out. Pizza was ready 30 mins after the scheduled pick up time. Finally got the pizza home. Missing toppings which we paid extra for. Tastes like nothing special at all. Mall pizza for sure. The free potato wedges look so sad. They should’ve kept those. And the chicken wings don’t look appetizing or even safe to eat really. Super disappointed and absolutely will not be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOBG00UhBP-GCI55PpDhb7Ve6oIaZp-e65AdDPG&fid=0x0:0x2d2d28039dd51dcc"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"Val Chaschin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL4he7g2QeT73c2l1oQEsz4j71iUdgX2RC7dbyAfVG6KqywTg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I always eat right at the mall, the pizza variety is awesome. I've tried so many different kinds of pizza just here at this location.  Delicious everytime. Nice crust. Lots of toppings.  The Garlic sauce drizzled onto is perfect.  Staff is always so happy to see me. Love the smiles on their faces  :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ryan Desjarlais","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-ucWsrH1TkTqVtpMBoFoOqux8C6tKNSg4GgZoLiEAB-Dz49k7=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The place is not their fault. The food is affordable and I like their options. For a budget slice they are swinging quite above their "weight class". They are good people too. I recommend the white cheddar and butter chicken pizzas. Plus 2 slices and a pop for $8.36 isn't a bad deal.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sagar Kansagra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUFfCC3ayWNc19Spi94LLEDa4jNBekhT364NtJHdW8hY9gGnuRDkA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Time for review after visiting couple of times..!

They recently opened, visited on the very first day when they opened after seeing FB post. I tried couple of different slice options and took some for my family. Have to say, we were thoroughly impressed with taste and flavours .Specifically, The pizza base..! I am very particular about it. Have to say, the best I had in recent times. Was really backed to perfection and taste was amazing.

Became my favourite go-to pizza store in the town. Still having the “wow” moment every time I have my first bite..!

Service was with the smile. Full marks..!!Mall timings could be better, specially on weekends.

Overall, must try. Keep the good work guys..!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-_x1Xvly-bZbf8dB_c8YzJHZ3euEPsF2sCyc3&fid=0x0:0x2d2d28039dd51dcc"],"When":"2024-2-3"},{"Name":"Ari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVZFr2lOsm-1DRRKbAML3xGYmN4IFUhEIuuxxMwCh-Sc_HMlQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing price and really good quality pizza. Service was also really friendly and helpful. Portions are large and you pay like $3 for a big slice.

Pizza is perfectly crispy on the bottom and throughout the crust, but not overly crispy. Excellent taste and texture. I'll definitely be coming back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMC5N2fodm5FUjFZUpYYLeoUEpnFWnyLytnbsE&fid=0x0:0x2d2d28039dd51dcc"],"When":"2024-3-17"},{"Name":"Kamal Chhina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXiHvckkaRhsqyvmRR3Npm_dozZm7btyhGV0PJWPZ2IbtAiZ3zR=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Thank you for your response and clarification. I appreciate the effort to accommodate my request, but I would like to highlight a concern regarding the process. On DoorDash, there is no option to add extra toppings or sauces, which makes it challenging to customize the order as desired. This seems to be an issue with the menu setup on your end, and I kindly request that this be reviewed to improve the ordering experience.

Additionally, sauces are an essential part of enjoying a pizza, and their absence significantly affects the meal’s quality. If sauces cannot be included with the order, customers may have to resort to buying them separately elsewhere, which detracts from the overall experience. I hope these concerns are taken into account, and I look forward to an improved process in the future. Thank you for your attention to this matter.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Stephanie H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLssE6AE3ypwWzyGuevuuavFWpeSzYZaZaHEkWTuo5dx58rqA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is the best pizza in town, hands down!! And SO reasonably priced!! They also have stamp cards which are such a great deal, amazing friendly staff, lots of good sauces, tons of great pizza options!! Come and check this place out, you won’t regret it.","Images":null,"When":""}]
