user_reviews: [{"Name":"Elizabeth A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVxfTEWSeX8uYXtcmqTBPDV_ujOByqiofeonLevJdviVTPcCUc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Wings were pretty decent. Service was pretty slow and we had to get up to find the waitress for the bill, but it was busy. What was confusing was that I ordered a Sapporo and got a dark coloured beer instead. Not too sure what it was (it wasn't a Guinness), but it supposedly came out of the Sapporo tap. Thankfully it wasn't a huge deal because my second choice was a Guinness or another dark-coloured beer.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOyTtusXiGeOLST3ayqZvn8rb6MeciAaKveEonG\u0026fid=0x0:0x7b858298d0c2e331"],"When":"2024-12-20"},{"Name":"Madison Bailey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKg_8c4BJ7CfR7Pr54kKUbOvdzzGbRH5vrwUWxRQnSSGOfk2w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"My husband and I went over here for Wing Wednesday and to watch the hockey game the other night. The wings were fine, but the service absolutely tanked. It was a louder night, but not over all super busy. We were sat for over 30 minutes before seeing a waitress, she finally took our drink order and didn’t come back for another 25. If we had seen her running around the restaurant, we would’ve been more inclined to be more patient, as we understand things get busy. She passed us several times, each time without our drinks which could’ve easily been placed on her tray and dropped off. She’d run past our table, tap it and say she was grabbing whatever we had asked for or to take our order, but would take nearly 30 minutes each time to come back. We saw her maybe 3 times, and what should’ve been a quick in and out for some wings, we were there almost 3 hours, had only 1 drink refill and nothing else, never asked us if we needed anything, and you couldn’t catch her otherwise. Also, they cease to mention that pop refills are not free on Wednesdays, which seems like a scam to get you in the end. While it’s just pop, I understand, be upfront with customers so they can decide what they want to do with that information. It wasn’t until we asked for the bill (3 different times) that she finally came and had a second to stop and chat, to which she instantly brought up her children and Christmas coming, which to us felt like tip baiting. Terrible experience, which tanks because the atmosphere seemed like it could be fun, and the food (wings at least) wasn’t bad.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"John","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWw5rMQatibni75tbNpjJbP4ehPrGlbmCLKvcJ6Naf176pomyyjJw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have never been to \"The Reach\" before. I simply popped in as I was early to visit friends in the area. It was 3:30 on a Friday afternoon before the Christmas week ahead. The place was packed, filled with people smiling, laughing, and having fun. I didn't order any food. The people and staff were super friendly, and the price on my favorite craft brew was an amazing $4!!! Plenty of TVs for the sports enthusiasts and KENO as well.\n\nI'll Be Back!! See you there? 😉","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"claudio quinones","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL6KyrjNGdxf2c2scfa5GSK3lpFjNu_-VlN0L2IvDo98alq-A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I find the service was unsatisfactory. After we paid for our first order with the first attendant which she said she was off. I order for a last beer. The next attendant twice came tonight to our table asking if we were done even she saw my glass was still full. We said we’re still ok. Then left and says “ oh G with other costumer”. Felt insulted its just because i ordered with her  just 1 beer and she keeps on coming back if we were done? We were there to relax after a long hour work in the hospital. When we were done nobody came so i left a 10 dollar bill to pay my 1 glass. Good service","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOhdQf_e-04kQfOorEh6Rv942Kr82Ys-KeV9AxS\u0026fid=0x0:0x7b858298d0c2e331"],"When":"2024-9-19"},{"Name":"Katie Muzyka-Parker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUujvnXnZUcxW16GjXXYyNJnygy454waBiPDJjpNZx4eoubQ0iJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I wouldn’t suggest this place for food, maybe drinks? Saturday at brunch and ordered the avocado toast. It was wonder bread with two slices of avocado on it and a poached egg. Sprouts were added to maybe fancy it up but was way too overpowering. Orange juice was watered down with sparkling water… and $4 each. The avo toast was cheap but even at that. Not worth it. Service also wasn’t good… felt like an inconvenience that we were there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOU71a0FBCyCO2V3iLhyDHpBHP98FDydUYwbtyS\u0026fid=0x0:0x7b858298d0c2e331"],"When":"2024-7-13"},{"Name":"Tom Truchan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL5cfIGdJiUAylgwVHFyzlUO7I41GrmqAPVCXOSM5A-5reshQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went here for the first time in years and must be new management because it was way better than before. Was my Birthday and the service was on point with our server checking in on us constantly. The food was delicious. The best deep fried pickles I’ve ever had. And their crispy chicken sandwiches were the bomb. To top it off their prices are very reasonable. Dinner for 2 with 5 drinks for $79. Where do you find that 🤷🏻‍♂️","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mitch C.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUigQKnsqnd6-ECKxiWLF3yOJGPZULiTcrsHXswZ-6rjxY7_wxITQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food and service, good specials and supporting our local community with a team of people supporting fundraisers. Great place for a pint or an event.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN4AljeDmjQASt5kqRq7Ysf77r5yQzSVqHip3kK\u0026fid=0x0:0x7b858298d0c2e331"],"When":"2024-12-5"},{"Name":"Dave J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVdGWkXv3KBdawcKYa861DrCqatGIiu-Pc4zF07bXJGsitpkI62=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I'm not a big bar guy. Went here for company thing. Was busy on a Friday afternoon. Servers were polite and knowledgeable about the products they sold. The food was not great. My sweet potato fries smelled like pee. I didn't eat them. I would give the reach another try. It's possible I'm being over critical.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOBpuJIqji146u-KelAFNQARo68oyNnzYh-SnL1\u0026fid=0x0:0x7b858298d0c2e331"],"When":"2024-9-1"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"todd lazarenko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMWhJK6u9XNG2-gmnhPqFucz9pNeWhp5Mzp9oBrrbII94Vr5o9=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We go to Maple Ridge Keg about once every 2 or 3 months. The food has continued to be consistently good. We almost always sit at the bar as we can walk right in at just about anytime and get seats right away. From the Baked garlic shrimp and the wedge salad to the 12 ounce sirloin, it was all fantastic and we were stuffed. They even gave us a free birthday Billy Miner pie to go with a candle. Courtney was our server working behind the bar. She gave us absolutely flawless service. I am a Maple Ridge Keg alumni so I can certainly appreciate great service paired with great food. Now the Keg ain't cheap, with the 20% tip it was $242.00. I don't mind as we enjoy our meals there. Keep up the great job Courtney and Maple Ridge Keg.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNaACummdyJEVgGY0I39CTjR_UvRfRFIlSt65Y&fid=0x0:0x58172c4aab381a8c"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"Dvir M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUxK6vUXIZPF_mBYpyYRstLoQm3iHWCiUkMzdVCeCCrurOmcIbk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were celebrating my friend his birthday. We were 6 people. We had so much fun, we got the food at the same time no issues. Scotty was our server. Let’s put it this way, he knows his job very well. Let us feel super comfortable and made sure that we’re happy with everything at all time. Food was good. The wings with the chilli oil and the blue cheese omg.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIggME2dZvlWZ9ueSj2a71MgvQVwhXFJbwXzln&fid=0x0:0x58172c4aab381a8c"],"When":"2024-12-13"},{"Name":"Star Forbes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVX3bxa6epj-Pmj6Ysk7djR6GPyFN2Nb3oWlupv9ZY8ucFacX7F=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this Keg it's casual dining 3 steaks are always done right, and food tastes amazing. I had half Lob and steak it was very good meal. Great waiter named Declan, who helped us celebrate our  22nd anniversary dinner! Thanks for a memorable night, Keg!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPImFZO5frUVCDMLYyHWb04fRXCWc_vDNHAY5YM&fid=0x0:0x58172c4aab381a8c"],"When":"2024-9-5"},{"Name":"Olivia Leaf","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVzloLoDK6qGN7OOG3lV2DyC7b9nIFZQdd3rh1F80nxbwNaod8v=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a wonderful night! Zoe was an attentive and accommodating server, and both her and the kitchen were very mindful of my partners shellfish allergy. They also managed to get me the rarest piece of prime rib possible, which was fabulous! We appreciated it, and will be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0XPURyEP4MDPMGUIx0ZikzWqejuc_bua0wUFi&fid=0x0:0x58172c4aab381a8c"],"When":"2024-8-29"},{"Name":"S M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLaVQBXA2LqzncrzyqIA7NUO-NlvmCIPf8x9w2beJYJtlvwkA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an exceptional dining experience at The Keg, thanks to our waiter, Jarred. He was attentive, knowledgeable, and made excellent recommendations that elevated our meal. His friendly demeanor and prompt service ensured everything ran smoothly. Jarred truly went above and beyond, making us feel valued and well taken care of. I can't wait to return and hope to have him as our server again! Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Megan Fraser","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVuqaxfaCnCiXPjlH1wGlkoULMBFXQYi7bRU5qpZ_0Tn5TVHIi3aw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's been quite awhile since I've been to a Keg, and my first time at the Maple Ridge location. We were crazing a steak and wow they did not disappoint tonight! It melted in my mouth and was exactly what I was craving!! Loved the beets with green beans tonight as well, it's not often you get beets. Service was great and dinner was a beautiful night out!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rayant Yeo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUaSGd8rGguK-MzK7O72I-ocdHyBHvKJG59MOmI710XLPYz1DeB_w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I must compliment the restaurant manager for going the extra mile in making us feel comfortable while waiting for our table. We made reservations for 8 pax at 730pm. However, our table was taking a bit longer than usual. So, the restaurant manager offered us complimentary drinks and appetizers while waiting for our table.

Food at The Keg never disappoints; delicious & fresh; especially the lobster and salmon.

Thank you for your Great Service!! 👏🏼👏🏼","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN_djeCr3xBpMuJZMvMITSpE8XqVIlWMv4zn0iM&fid=0x0:0x58172c4aab381a8c"],"When":"2023-12-22"},{"Name":"Arthur Pangilinan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVGrMo8Q0uYkleyMEXyLc0uVJCPhvFTuVKvzIq5qSp-cV9pow=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a fantastic experience with Andrew at The Keg! He was attentive, funny, and kind, making us feel well taken care of. As long-time patrons of The Keg, this was our first time learning about the Keg Classic meal, which included everything we normally order separately. It truly blew our minds—we’ve been missing out on this better deal for years! Also made us feel comfortable bringing our newborn with us on our first ever date. We never felt out of place with the stroller and all! Thank you for being awesome, Andrew and team! We’ll definitely be back to this location.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Pho Song
address: 22334 Lougheed Hwy., Maple Ridge, BC V2X 2T4
descriptions: Unfussy storefront serving Vietnamese staples such as pho, rice & noodle dishes plus veggie options.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kim Rhindress","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGV1bXDBhXJzPDI9KSedz8MMWu5WbOPshbJnxk8ecoAvwrcRUU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A local gem!
Small and cosy spot with divine Pho!
We ordered the rare beef with brisket, no noodles but extra veggies and it was absolutely perfect! Lots of tender beef, fresh Thai basil and the broth was delish!!
The owner is so friendly and you can tell she puts LOVE into every dish. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9Rt-CHtSutsJN3oXG1vthiP_jA2MrajpiIr8R&fid=0x0:0x55b7c46565840c3c"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Jioh Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUKSWfpbNYcWQsWaiXfEMb52v-8T7Q_sZwrESiKgHFQas3hVA414Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We stopped by on our way into the city. The warm soup was much needed after a few nights of camping in the cold. Huge portions of food, the bun bo hue had soooo much meats but also variety of meats so it was very fun to eat. Everything was very good! Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPADTtkpSie1_AQsFEiCONH0NMXjhygogJv1pph&fid=0x0:0x55b7c46565840c3c"],"When":"2024-10-2"},{"Name":"Tyler Hazelman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaOeOfMrKb93Y_IutfdRfQ5RnvS47tYfW1M-2iSLOIvO-Sl_d1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Song is the epidemy of your local mom and pop shop. Staff is always quick and attentive; by your 2nd or 3rd visit they'll usually have ur order down by heart. Food is reasonably priced, Song makes quite possibly the best broth in the lower mainland, its my personal favorite anyway. I've been a repeat customer for years, Song really makes u feel like home. I Highly recommend this spot! Rain or shine Song will take care of you =)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNVfYB3FtJA6xutB0TT28UgND8WPkeYBdJjYpNX&fid=0x0:0x55b7c46565840c3c"],"When":"2024-8-9"},{"Name":"Patricia Yogi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjlKd9mThgf7cTYIXLMXbilhcd8ljSFZMn37lWe0i8h43OGeOavQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had lunch at Pho Song Restaurant recently, and it was an exceptional experience from start to finish. The food was not only well-served but the portions were incredibly generous! Each dish was bursting with flavor and made with fresh ingredients. However, the service was the friendliest I've ever encountered and very fast. The staff went above and beyond to ensure we felt welcome and taken care of throughout our meal. I highly recommend Pho Song Restaurant to anyone craving delicious food and exceptional service!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPk5Zq3xFT_PAHSymKc9pinl9STDVc9qFuCDSog&fid=0x0:0x55b7c46565840c3c"],"When":"2024-4-14"},{"Name":"Joanne Antoniak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTQwhPcO13h_HhVjJVUrwpHjU5MeesKhPrxV5pA1ymdZ1edFkY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great Little hole in the wall pho spot on lougheed highway.
Decor was ok, shop was clean, service was great; and the pho was amazing.
The salad wraps we ordered to go with ... were ok ...meh
Best pho I've had in ridge so far.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhWS4ifms9Wlo8KzFoxAnR7YYa8he9iWJbP38K&fid=0x0:0x55b7c46565840c3c"],"When":"2024-5-22"},{"Name":"Chris B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKEm2JgFRxD6_hP2n3YeBkcnvE01P3EXsVOtV_iNzZjYGK0ng=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The broth was excellent. Had a great meal at a decent price. The waitress was exceptional. We ordered a Pho that was a little spicier than anticipated and she without hesitation suggested that she could take half the broth out and add less spicy broth. The thing that really made it amazing is she suggested it and did it immediately with a no problem at all attitude. Thank you for the great service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Steven Olmstead","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWtGPLsUg7ybhRCsA9-VeVYuyaFqArSeyzqddnDm9gdPpsZ3M0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped in for lunch recently after a morning at Golden Ears Park.  Were quite hungry from walking so ordered salad roll in addition to lemongrass chicken pho and Bún Bò Huế.  We soon found out we ordered too much, as the soups were very good portions.  The salad roll was just okay, being rather dry.  The soups however, were excellent.  They came out fast, were piping hot and had a generous amount of meat and noodles.  he broth was delicious!  Will definitely return next time we're in Maple Ridge","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN03LG0PddWL1XrtkM7t1WUeLHzku9k0zMK2YiR&fid=0x0:0x55b7c46565840c3c"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"Judy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVNU7X0Zh-GjDXqejNfoqiI2QGASul0OZwrdH-FpCgF4pWayvIz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We like the mixed meat board. Its so good !
The staffs are friendly and price is reasonable👍❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPHlBydWrm8-OeIXOfkxV4CZxmqstQ1occGbtcN&fid=0x0:0x55b7c46565840c3c"],"When":"2024-7-19"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Brad Phillips","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQyFNsFglxRT3PC62NhebhL95uOjnpyv1STZkZSCcY47DFig=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely fantastic service and delicious food. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this unique little dinner to anyone. We have some friends coming from Australia next month, and can't wait to bring them here for an experience that will last in their memories for ever. Rachel was our server and she was so pleasant and helpful. She really made us feel special and appreciated. What a great addition to the experience, she was very professional, friendly and fun to interact with. We can't wait to go back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPcu50mtB-OjViO7YevVbLD2g9vK2QCDE4ZbEwK&fid=0x0:0x59ed2235bfec975b"],"When":"2024-12-22"},{"Name":"James McCann","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVeljiarzTiu1tTE6Pve6MGW2hSCoI2cGrsZixTLACpSmPcWmbb=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I saw this place on Google Maps, so I checked it out in person.

The atmosphere is fun and colourful. It's an idyllic 50s diner. The place was busy, food was portioned well for the price, and the coffee was flowing.

What really sets it apart is the friendly and happy staff. They'll make your experience worth the visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMIk5YXkjJoNnfq-0sx_mC6_ebbuxl7d81r8QXx&fid=0x0:0x59ed2235bfec975b"],"When":"2024-12-23"},{"Name":"James Inouye","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGMUsvXLijMfgZydLJhU2TpG1bqPFbrelq3iJSQAmmOzYoUfG8Bg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was one of the best breakfast places I have been to. I ordered the tater breaky bowl, and it was amazing. The staff is very friendly and provides excellent customer service.

The atmosphere feels like I've been drawn back in time to what a 50's diner would be.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPAqNU1AubdZV6RxSz15QkIHjBM7ndAEkC9Hqqe&fid=0x0:0x59ed2235bfec975b"],"When":"2024-11-23"},{"Name":"Evelyn Gendron","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBYk8tTyq0cqz3UH5nMUg42YuVptTXRc3KRfTeNu004nQIZSk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My husband and I came here for the first time after wanting to try it out for years - we were not disappointed!! Everything from the breakfast to the apples to the burgers and hot dogs were delicious - and the milkshakes are huge!

Our server was friendly and attentive, the place is adorable, the bathrooms were clean - we will definitely be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOEKCY4yPGXzWo8X6tiUjHK6T9kQVxEQFJyix5f&fid=0x0:0x59ed2235bfec975b"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"Amy Kirkpatrick","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI-tYXmnGFTf6vwO3AxZoGNgT23JsGhX_8wq-pgvkq3nfeb3A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Service was amazing!! Walked in and took our seat and we were immediately greeted and asked what we wanted to drink. Waitress was smiling,kind and very attentive. Great experience! Will be back","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwWs4v9CZA9qAJDXztthwtv47cysgkRmWgGsub&fid=0x0:0x59ed2235bfec975b"],"When":"2024-11-5"},{"Name":"Emily Froese","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWbwzJWFhSYv737GuczgFrZ6CSmT-VP8dLvk90Dr6uGqW4UpDOQSg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The two waitresses that were hustling their butts off really made a great impression. They were polite and courteous to the first come first serve tables, speedy with taking orders and getting everything to the table. Our food was perfectly cooked, and delicious. Sitting in to dine, there are lots of conversation starters all over the walls, memorabilia to look at. Overall a really nice experience, my boyfriend and I enjoyed our dine in with you. Thank you to all the staff.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCsSMYmywXJf2MNyZK8AdL9KWzVqN8NtMFqZ6i&fid=0x0:0x59ed2235bfec975b"],"When":"2024-6-16"},{"Name":"Erin Knipstrom","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJyyA0Cg0nJfazlD7BmLvY_VQDrKwWpSceaESwRQEYhRtSxoQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered a sandwich wrap with cheese and poutine on the side.  I have come here very often, I'm a regular.  It's usually delicious!  Tonight however,  the wrap was half the size it normally is and if you look at the pix, where is the cheese?  And one tiny piece of lettuce???  They put double the poutine to try to make up for it.
This place used to be awesome but the last few times I've been here...it's gone WAAAAAYYYY downhill 🤢
If I didn't say anything they would've charged me for the non-existant cheese and the whole wrap.
SERVICE IS GREAT THOUGH!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO73ctKdt-cPX_0hy_cIGNvkxS2-9T4jnK7QaOI&fid=0x0:0x59ed2235bfec975b"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"Wihse Stacey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLleemwAf-XK30uwy4fv5glDOpm4ky8um81Yx_HZwfIc6-vFA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"My burger was awesome.  Whiskey BBQ sauce!  Can't go wrong.  50's style diner truly fits.  I loved the decor.  I'm not a huge fan of 50's music, but they had some good chair dancing tunes going.  It was a last minute choice and it was a great choice. Very good prices too.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Silver House Restaurant
address: 22378 Dewdney Trunk Rd, Maple Ridge, BC V2X 3J2
descriptions: Unassuming eatery offering a familiar lineup of Chinese noodles, stir-fries & rice dishes.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"HT","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJND89l3Ycjb5kra1C82V9YCBn3eR1Qr3n8_M37JdXtGEBpcg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very delicious foods at Silver House. The owner Jenny is so kind to customers. Everyone feels at home and tastes homemade dishes. It’s one of the best Chinese cuisine in Maple Ridge!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Elaine Payne","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLi-cZ79vVwFEPuZ0jB7xl3YujoVxBK2BTnin4mf8s3bdVAog=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"After decades of ordering food, we finally give up. Over the last year or two, the food has become pretty devoid of flavour. The chow mein used to be so good, I could just eat it and be happy. Now, it is still in the fridge since we ordered takeout a few days ago. It will probably go in the compost. I think the breaded almond chicken and sweet and sour chicken balls are pretty good but the sweet and sour sauce used to be thick and it was very thin this last time.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Benjamin Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKBA5FB1OgRxlCyVinYuA7HZyCMqwaGLSrehr4Mn4kDvdqi1g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I relished the exquisite sweet and sour pork. It melted a variety of colourful flavours that exploded on my tastebuds, giving a great impression of sweetness and balance of sour. Impeccable!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jeannie Derton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZyxCXSgbV4TQc7z58ed2nkPmk33vV5j37P6kaGFdtYFoeqkI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Very unsanitary resturant . There where flies all around . Table not wiped down. The condiments where almost empty and not wiped off . Service was horrible . The wonton soup was not even edible . Broth was hot water.  Dissatisfied and disappointing.  I hadn't been in a couple years and has it ever gone downhill. It used to be good.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"megumi s","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUEDV-T-arppY7Ggy0cXgR13FfJZbF8Ty9M2t3rSR9PNBspi7Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice spot with fresh food that comes out quickly. Good option if you’re looking for a straightforward, tasty meal without a long wait.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ron Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4C9fuu3Pgu102q3bAxHKivkiOQqwqKjJditkVdy4zIZ628gCE7g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered takeout.

Ordered shrimp with cashews but it didn't come with any cashews just vegetables.

Got the hot and sour soup, we didn't like the huge chunks of tofu that was cut all unevenly.

Pan fried beef and noodles was great, wasn't too oily.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-_OKK6LaQdtXmw_28o-YmlaSszQD_0y4q1a5G&fid=0x0:0xa5345ef2d2e4be6f"],"When":"2022-11-6"},{"Name":"Niko Bellic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXwv_LQBDJWISpeRF602du0NEESI9E9uJ7oSXckjgAEnCHE6mw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lived in maple ridge for 20 years now, this is my go to Chinese food place. I have been everywhere, ocean village closed so this is my new spot. Me and my wife love the food here","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Angie Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI7BBJoUkE9g2G7lUv1UlHuRpg2b8AJ9VKryPW2FIFPgfkv6Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"good fresh food, lots of them, taste good-no salty. owners were friendly. best chinese food restaurant in maple ridge.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOo8tKnpe6pJyAb3_jjyCKuVp8AIfUvAf2ou7p1&fid=0x0:0xa5345ef2d2e4be6f"],"When":"2023-11-12"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Grace Baptiste","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYWSGyxL6xv7wCMnONngE95_lFn-QFdC26NOw2Rzl5vHdq9MLmkw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Alina Cafe is truly a gem. All of the food will delight your taste buds. I've had so much fun trying all of their different menu items. I, myself, am not a vegan but somehow found that their vegan meats I would prefer over actual meat elsewhere. The Vegan Ginger Chicken has my heart! (lol) I will keep coming back here for the great atmosphere, lovely staff \u0026 most importantly the extremely flavourful, fresh \u0026 healthy food! I love Alina's!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNaCqT2bixHW54sDwnDqzWgxq7j0WY_vdAjXsW5\u0026fid=0x0:0x304d765bd7ee491b"],"When":"2024-8-20"},{"Name":"Paulina K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKHESGuv2e44yh_7pNCkjXfHsSmzMLHqmPnws63OHRE0hDZGw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cute cafe and excellent drinks. Food wise the bowls are interesting - got the poke bowl with lemongrass chicken and it was stringy and didn’t taste like lemongrass. They also just drowned the bowl in the dressing - next time I’ll be sure to ask for dressing on the side. The poke bowl with salmon was a lot better but again way too much sauce for my liking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5YoJfd1tqSTUy18pa3WTROElOIO6zuXnS-sZ0\u0026fid=0x0:0x304d765bd7ee491b"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Elizabeth M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXuhhJ3L27gYQJMwvKARhYEqE4v9PowLqfpDtvNV5G-CUir9-oeQg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Finally visited Alina Cafe! After hearing all the positive reviews on Facebook my husband and I decided to have lunch there! These pictures don't do it justice. The food is amazing! Clean food and just good! The service was also amazing. We were greeted as soon as we walked in and I just loved the atmosphere! Cannot wait to go back and try more dishes. An absolute gem here in maple ridge ☺️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNYm2S9iHGc1ugp3DeKNpq9iw56me77xTKEoTL5\u0026fid=0x0:0x304d765bd7ee491b"],"When":"2024-5-21"},{"Name":"Suzanne Mizuguchi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI8b0Ockfgm8cZmPcyRnN5zpwKwmWy9CesunN2BLeMd0cWNNA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time visiting, but I will definitely be back! My partner and I split the lemongrass beef banh mi, which was such a refreshing sandwich, as well as the bbq pork banh mi, which was hearty and delicious. I also loved their Vietnamese iced coffee. The matcha latte was well made, but it does come unsweetened, which might not be for everyone.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNVbaDbslHEOiyDzcDVU6LnDUaBFh3xYep6HtZT\u0026fid=0x0:0x304d765bd7ee491b"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Amrita Nayak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJgJ3b8LMBlPc7G1Rv8sy6cyH33IeJwYGYkw6c-i8ocBKF5odAKg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The menu promises healthy and tasty food, and it delivers exactly that. I tried their lemongrass chicken banhmi, and it was a delightful blend of lightness and fullness, bursting with flavor in every bite. Plus, their packaging adds an extra touch of cuteness to the experience. If you're looking for a cozy spot with delicious food and a welcoming atmosphere, this cafe is a must-visit!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxlo1YdSFh6n_r_b4Nn0NHkFaiSLaE_aYUDMgx\u0026fid=0x0:0x304d765bd7ee491b"],"When":"2024-5-28"},{"Name":"rue deda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXibaxGcWhkUgVv8yAdsNj_gFfT8xdcP4x5agl54xhRKeqduIfe-A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved it. The server was so patient and hospitable,open to giving us recommendations,  the ambience is refreshing, just what you need to wind down, there's a little corner with books, coloring books and a fish tank, the kids love it too. Food was great, vegan options were a bonus, accommodated every one and affordable prices. Definitely coming back","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOa_Bu7Tmvxd9Mvxt5oMytzAxBlyXB9h66JshpV\u0026fid=0x0:0x304d765bd7ee491b"],"When":"2024-3-21"},{"Name":"Emanuel Alvez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLDqzPVRZ29DEvctA5XU2KzMKH2kzwG3aCUYnzHdsDlf93QYg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"great time here while charging the car. got the chicken bahn mi and viet iced coffee. delicious!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM-STGvIu2rbYKPM05lOEvFUqgB0gN4tx3_7o-r\u0026fid=0x0:0x304d765bd7ee491b"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"David Watson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIlLXWimZHgvvuzr5ZcDE94rTPwZPQ5wMHGDSK7k_gT43KEXw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolute gem of a restaurant. Had a pork banh mi sandwich and shrimp wonton soup. Fresh ingredients, made to order and wonderful owners. Best bahn mi annd wonton soup I have ever had! Must visit when in Maple Ridge (or anywhere in Vancouver!)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMf1czJxIG1wsS4UnFSO0zKsfJs0mNstetBrIKE\u0026fid=0x0:0x304d765bd7ee491b"],"When":"2024-5-14"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"ClayPhoenix4","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVelJECogE7AFzsG2ZmzVGlq92_4MqwMY_QK6n2nHeBRJeGCXg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"2 Peaks is a place that if you were driving on 228 between Louheed and Dewdney Trunk rd that if you blinked; you will drive right past it.
This place serves up protein smoothies, protein iced coffee,  energy refreshers, and of course protein waffles too.
I stopped in there on a Sunday morning and this tiny 7 seater place was super busy and makes stuff custom and fresh to order. It takes some time to get your drink or food, do don't be in a rush when you stop in.
They have plenty of choices and even have a festive Christmas items too. I tried the strawberry cheesecake waffle and a drink.  I will try this place again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZSDImt3xNICHu1ThyvV7_JuN1iXmDoQ-umLJF&fid=0x0:0x226e12fa572d776"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"Rajneet Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVuDeAhvKvr2CfZCfms0-FbTtJcx7KrL3q8k01yvvkJ8kbgOjg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I went at 2 peaks this was the amazing place for healthy and nutritious food
So hygiene and most importantly their taste of the things I tried was amazing  must try their waffles I am in love with them and shakes are so yummy and delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOPXcp8iN-7eSyjsaT6d_g1_XNfDaU93bTtHbmr&fid=0x0:0x226e12fa572d776"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Erin Belong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKUAZ1cw3oG6a19gSLsIUcNmMv23rMusq1hsAnvDHBk67o_2g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is one of our family’s favourite spots in maple ridge. Everything is delicious and healthy, allowing us to have a guilt free treat packed with protein. The owners are both wonderful and kind people who take the time to chat and get to know their customers. Highly recommend giving 2peaks a try!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZ4HsyGQdll_2UJ4Nh2zTNLeeG_eNv8LWaZ-V3&fid=0x0:0x226e12fa572d776"],"When":"2024-10-25"},{"Name":"Tara Phaneuf","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK_1ZNS1aZ82sIvocAL3LMm-3mbxcWf4QhpeHIiFTHNmzn89w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time in this morning and I will definitely back. So many things on the menu I want to try! Today I had the banana split protein shake. Delicious and satiating. The owner was so friendly and welcoming, and the waffles they were cooking up smelled amazing. Definitely want to try them as well as the protein coffees and refreshers (less than 1g of sugar! compared to 20+ grams in the ones from SB) So happy to have a place like this in Maple Ridge! 👏👏","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1fAuPLaMlINAe-eJnGKuaiaxLjaOdbT1_M-cx&fid=0x0:0x226e12fa572d776"],"When":"2024-6-1"},{"Name":"Christyna MacKinnon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVd03A-MQOjTk0kQYLO-W9Hh-dzCH4U9h6OLZm8TKedakM4y8HE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this place. Everything I've tried is delicious! The owners are so personable and the service is great. If you haven't stopped in do it. The chain smoothy stores can't touch this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMIYRcsjul9ixKRkc6j16r0Fc_6LeaxJdKngHgd&fid=0x0:0x226e12fa572d776"],"When":"2024-11-10"},{"Name":"Lesli Coard","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIy-4u9nD0A64pMYZBMcD133pj2F_uXl9NEzMAEZlJQ2el7Tw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Took my son today and we both had refreshers and brought home a protein shake for my older son and everything was delicious.  Excellent service and patient with us as we looked over all the yummy options.  We will definitely be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMMTYyAdoVwb0l2uf-KA5MHYUYmuk4-kIdn4xDx&fid=0x0:0x226e12fa572d776"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Emily Finlayson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUELUPtRPZVjdiQ3xgtuiiRwSD4w-vhaG4U1VxmaHI9qf18fMo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went to 2 Peaks for the first time today with my Fiancé and immediately when we walked in we were welcomed with such kindness!
I got the S’mores shake and my Fiancé got the Cookies and Cream shake and we LOVED them! Absolutely delicious.
We will definitely be back to try their protein waffles and their energy refreshers!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNaj8Rxll2FkjnOHg2gqt7rmJSX5mvtXY7dg5_b&fid=0x0:0x226e12fa572d776"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"kirandeep kahlon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzJl_fv3oj-ENurE7kXAPhr1fPN-hlvHQVGyNAR6xAXA-PMzQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you’re looking for a spot that offers nutritious snacks, 2 Peak has you covered! Their waffles are seriously the softest and fluffiest I’ve ever tasted, and their Signature Waffle is my absolute favourite it’s a must try!They also do amazing refreshers and shakes, all made fresh and packed with flavours. The vibe in the place is awesome super cozy and inviting. I definitely recommend checking it out if you’re in the mood for a treat that really hits the spot!!!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jennifer Daase","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLBwt1y__ieOQ6rtxWrbLx79gFmQDxZHTIlyMirneXVdm7BEw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This place is beautiful inside! A hidden gem, it wasn’t busy at all on a Friday evening which I was surprised. The food was delicious (Greek salad the best I’ve had) the Greek style ribs were tender (lacking salt, but once I added salt it was really yummy) over all I would recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhGgjYPib05tBlTwUJIY3txFEcyYAMcyS11TmP&fid=0x0:0xc7f0e74e24c00bc0"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Alvaro ADA","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWHfR0wv7SAbPUpdi8lH7IrK4oJU5U7YtQ6w224hdNUnfPXA7lg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We enjoyed the attention and the food. The waiter was very polite and try to make us feel at home. Food was serve shortly after ordering with a good portion presentation and warm. Taste: I can just say, my son and wife love it! That should say enough. When finish we were offer desert but food took its toll with us. Finally, I highly recommended for your lunch or dinner meals.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Iman Rahmaty","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ4fZOqYHX8glodHVRySbk9_tWVDRu59jLTmQrTwItu0Etgfw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My wife and I had an incredible experience at Socrates. The atmosphere was perfect—warm, inviting, and just the right mix of elegant and comfortable.

The food was fantastic, with fresh ingredients, rich flavors, and beautifully plated dishes. Every bite was memorable, and both of our meals were absolutely delicious.

The service was top-notch. Our server was friendly, attentive, and made great recommendations, adding a personal touch to the night.

Socrates is a true gem where everything comes together—amazing food, great service, and a cozy ambiance. We can’t wait to return! Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Victor Safonov","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVH7q93d1K9tn9Dnmg-HYEGcil6kwKd6Jh5GVCelXsB2yHcMtq3=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We had a family dinner at this restaurant. We ordered several different dishes. Overall, the food was delicious. The atmosphere is nice and not loud. Service is good. Unpleasant surprise at the end of the evening - they automatically add a 20% tip for a group of 6 or more. I have no problem with tipping, but in this case I feel like someone is just reaching into my wallet without asking. At the entrance to the restaurant we noticed a lot of people taking take out. We won't go there again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tristan Bosnjak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5dDkomF66OX55DVF0cecHSvIVXQw82_r6Nj7yxfmIxBJx-Vo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great service and a super friendly atmosphere. I had the Lamb shoulder and the taste took me back to my grandmother's house when I was young. Great meal and great restaurant. Highly recommend for Greek food.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Leah C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKSvkg4jot2o9e-I5XPpyMexBrtiq8sg9MIK4yISu3_L0cYww=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Server Julia was an absolute quality, professional server with an enchanting disposition

Owner was especially accommodating and displayed a professional disposition. This was my second visit and continue to be impressed with appetizer and dinner options","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jaeda Okell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWIW6EvO7vOUAEpF7_qb1mhH2RhcyN5niBvAHaJp-fAp3B6mY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Me and my boyfriend went out for my 23rd birthday and I had an amazing experience! Our waitress Yasmin was very good specially because it was her first day, and I had no complaints:)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNcv_FSz1mYv8BCJBk3JVxx_ZmUGCN-ew2s09vh&fid=0x0:0xc7f0e74e24c00bc0"],"When":"2024-4-30"},{"Name":"Street Hazard","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURFbIXZgFohAMrMR_ZDnInasbkLj2VtqII5gRfvJ8LxVhZgb_sCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The food wasn’t horrible but it’s definitely just an bad attempt at real Greek cuisine
Start off with the fact that the “Greek salad” was hardly edible due to the HUGE cuts of the tomato’s and cucumbers, then is topped with some “in house dressing” that goes horribly with it and isn’t even a attempt at Greek salad dressing which I find amusing
Secondly I’m not sure why they put raw onions with the calamari?? Never seen that before
Additionally the lamb rice and potatoes weren’t bad, potatoes reminded me of home and the lamb was well cooked and so was the rice
Lastly the service was not bad but I was the only person in the whole restaurant so can’t definitively say service was amazing and quite disappointed when I said happy Easter weekend to her and got a weird look and no response (Easter is tomorrow)
Wouldn’t recommend to someone looking for authentic Greek food","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNuXXvnRJHIazc5_yObsm_IcRiJFoMsoSaWosUQ&fid=0x0:0xc7f0e74e24c00bc0"],"When":"2024-5-5"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jeremy Brooks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9h-pOVPEAO5xTo8LGpQ0sa5A7PNB_Rp1SEXGX_qf0-nayw0WaDQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"It was my son's 10th birthday today - I called and made reservations for 530 for my family of 5

Food takes a long time to arrive - we complained about how slow it was and the waitress said "this is a 2 hour seating" and that's "how the kitchen works". I could understand if it was fine dining but let's be clear, this is store bought pasta with home made sauces.

My three boys liked the marinara sauce and the pasta was cooked nicely.

My wife had the "special" which was roasted chicken (two drum sticks and one thigh) for $29. No mention on the menu that it was only dark meat. She said it was ok and ate most of it but was also very hungry as we had been waiting nearly 1.5hrs for the food to come out.

The manager?owner?/chef? Went around to every table except ours to check in with customers. We heard him mention it was someone else's birthday and congratulated them - he made no mention to my son about it being his birthday even though it was specified in the reservation (whatever).

The worst part of the night was when I asked the manager?owner?/chef? About my carbonara sauce. The sauce was cooked improperly - carbonara is supposed to be silky smooth without any curdling of the eggs. My pasta basically had cream, oil and scrambled eggs on it. Apparently this is "how we do it there".  When I explained that this is not what I was expecting and that it wasn't properly made he became very standoffish and rude. I had to ask to have it removed from the bill - which he did but not without his nasty entitled attitude.

The atmosphere is nice, it was clean and cozy. There's not a lot of seating and I guess the only downsides are the very small washrooms (1 person per washroom) and the tables on the right side of the dining room are so close together that my 8 year old could barely fit between the chairs to get to the washroom.

We thought this would be a nice treat for my son's dinner as we are an Italian family but this was just a letdown on all accounts. Even with my main removed the bill was over $130 (for a glass of house wine, one app- the prawns were tasty, three plates of store bought pasta and my wife's "special").

Won't be back.

***Edit: we ordered two sides of garlic bread and they never brought it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPLi9b1a6K79_tuyWX1dKP-SCvx_AKUQTTU8jjk&fid=0x0:0xe2da073352bb98a3"],"When":"2024-10-25"},{"Name":"Monkey Couch","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKjBJae2rKS_uXWCMGu9-Vey95DYSzaWVHAACfGX9Lt21SDIw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went here the first time with my husband and my friend for her birthday. Food was great. Everyone loved their food. If I am going to go out and eat pasta I want it to either be cheap or amazing. This was amazing. My dish came with the most tender fall off the bone chicken I have ever had. My husband kept trying to steal more of my dish. Service was quick and friendly. For the quality and service the price is right. Highly recommended.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Carol Pow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLNTxZqPK4X8aOtVF2rc4ragFral1AR_tqdwpR5cJKJNofBJg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"We arrived at 5 when the restaurant opened.  We know from past visits they are busy.  We didn’t have a reservation.  They had to check to see if they could take us.  They said they could but we’d have to be done by 7.  Because someone else had reserved for then.  Just not a warm welcoming  feeling.  It was my mom’s birthday I said to the waitress/hostess.  She went oh Happy Birthday.  No special treatment at all.

The Cesar salad and house were good.  The food was subpar at best. Ordered the roasted chicken with Penne pasta.  Store bought pasta under cooked with no real sauce or flavour.  The chicken which I thought was in the pasta was roasted chicken on the side all brown meat thighs and drumstick.  No mention of this and I only like white meat.

Other people in our party ordered the combo.  Again no flavour for the sauce and chicken was dark and not very flavourful.

Overall total disappointment for a dinner out none less a birthday.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"danielle loranger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJnptNzs1wQbaw2FFsd1jy4E7t0vjMoJDS7syMM-SOyTKG9og=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is our favourite restaurant in ridge! It’s so cozy, the staff are so attentive, friendly and helpful and the food is delish. We love the Caesar salad and have never been dissapointed with a dish. Check for reservations on the weekends as it’s not a huge place. We love the house red wine and always leave full with some leftovers as well! Visiting for a birthday dinner tomorrow and already drooling thinking about it!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Reece Kopeschny","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULKOa8APzPB-oiZ47ByVkOUw3cvI4vI6xSWNOo647veRKgca1I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have heard great reviews about Il Corsaro for a while now and the reviews are correct. Started the meal with the prawn appetizer and the sauce on it was unbelievable, the main course was the house made lobster and crab ravioli which hit the spot and came with a salad and house dressing which was some of the best I have ever had. Ended the evening with house made Tiramisu which was just as perfect and even better than the rest of the meal.

If I could have given them 6 stars I would have, the server was able to answer all of the questions right away and was a perfect date night. I can’t wait to go back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNbcbjP5yJs5gkNEr4RnGtaFvirnwc__6NQ6nyd&fid=0x0:0xe2da073352bb98a3"],"When":"2023-3-28"},{"Name":"Brad Ricketts","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIjqJT0OuLQXt06Dc_FpXglVwWIq_Tlr0-bsBV-LmQdJK6w9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My wife and I happened on this restaurant while looking for a late dinner.  We arrived at around 830PM and the restaurant was not very busy, a group of 6, and two other couples.  We got seated right away, and the hostess returned shortly with glasses of  water
and some amazing warm buns with butter.  The server came to our table shortly afterward and took our beverage orders, and discussed the evening specials. She left us with the menus and returned a short time later with our drinks.  She took our appetizer order and our main dinner orders, and my wife and I enjoyed the warm buns. Relatively quickly, our Caesar salad arrived, and we began our meal.  The timing on our main courses was perfect, and we had a short break between the completion of our salad and our main courses. I decided on the Penne Amatricana, and my wife had linguini Bolognese and meatballs.  The meatballs were about the size of a tennis ball and they were delicious.  My penne dish was also delicious, and I ate the leftovers the following day for lunch.  I would highly recommend this restaurant to anyone who wants a great Italian meal. The service, course timing, and servers were excellent.  Our server was very friendly and explained the story of the restaurant, and I am not surprised it has been in business as long it has, serving great food in a great spot by great people.  5 stars from me.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Devan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX46jwTvLLxQHMqh-_Tq6ADgdla67lzdwdqPBC-oI4JI8tfgn0q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Make sure to get a reservation as its booked up plenty (for a good reason), I was lucky enough to get in as someone had cancelled. The pasta was absolutely amazing probably the best ive had and the atmosphere of the place was lovely too, will be back again for that 10/10 pasta","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nicole Laughlin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXq_l7wggmzJItBUT8JuYycSZA4ZE8w7Kup0NGmSBUCAXhkpsDr=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered 60 dollars worth of takeout and basically had to throw it all out. The cesar salad was brown, and had literally 2 croutons on it, NOTHING else almost no sauce either, worst I’ve ever had. They forgot our soup and the pasta was extremely disappointing and flavourless.  I never call to complain about anything but I just had to. When I called I was told ‘pasta is pasta’ whatever the hell that means. I make better pasta at home in ten minutes. I was really excited for this meal but will never go back, shocked at all the good reviews… listen to the bad ones!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMF0FNcyUma6ORPuN5g4Fgg9e1hCXAxp09CXh06&fid=0x0:0xe2da073352bb98a3"],"When":"2021-10-31"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"It’s an average tasting Chinese buffet. There is lots of variety but some items have been out for a while and the food is not frequently replenished. The sweet and sour pork is good and the buffet items were hit or miss. The ice cream selection for the buffet is good as it includes 6 flavors including mint chocolate chip, maple walnut, cappuccino flake, vanilla, strawberry, and chocolate. The fruits are watermelon and oranges. They have salad and the classic mall type Chinese food items in the buffet. Nothing was outstanding but everything was okay and edible. Price is alright for what you get. It is nostalgic for the good old days when Chinese buffets were more popular.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOY2Mni2uetbMXVWJyYkHULBorqr4PljxAa7Bpy&fid=0x0:0x85871f0dc12414ee"],"When":"2024-8-20"},{"Name":"Jaime Libby","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXWcuQUZBXxCRF5-27cV4MrzyteNpvh8tPhlqiQSMkU18wPjoAf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It’s got good food and the buffet is cheap I my opinion so good value for the food
The staff is great always there when you need .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOhcdP5sSsRObmRhinNy9EXtoqTzAJW7hr_VZbw&fid=0x0:0x85871f0dc12414ee"],"When":"2024-10-18"},{"Name":"Gen X Surrey Girl","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnz98iwXPE1DskfLpfNg-zDV5mDy1tGmvmbNcHWdRqf6q4OTmNvw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Pretty good food. Decent prices. We went there years ago when they had a buffet and it was awesome. Hopefully they bring it back after the pandemic.

I recently ordered for takeout. The food was pretty good and it was ready quickly. The service was great. Very friendly staff.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFX57uWEVcFNszUqhFCb0RSwwtESXbGsd4v3qs&fid=0x0:0x85871f0dc12414ee"],"When":"2021-4-20"},{"Name":"Brandon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKX2INuw6e1W9fZJk-3ekgKjhPJ3r-Ql-Hsdupxyf51M_1g5Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Today, December 24th we ordered our food and paid online. When we tried to pick up, they do not have our order and had to wait for another 30minutes. We always order food in this location but never again. NOT recommended to my friends and relatives.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kate Choi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIjE4MSAa0c4Uqc8iOt1LfqIkJDL1ULa2Z17gRh4YDWMExQ1A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I have tried both lunch and dinner
Everything is pretty much the same.
Differences listed here from what I remember:

Lunch - only wonton soup, black bean green beans with beef, fried wonton skin, sesame battered chicken drums.

Dinner - wonton and hot and sour soupn blean bean mussels, onion rings, battered shrimp

We came on a busy day for lunch and everything was fresh except for some reason the wonton soup was so bland. When we went for dinner on a sunday night and there were only 3 other tables and the food was stagnant for a while that it developed a film on top. The wonton soup this time was good. It would be great to know before hand whether it's busy or not haha.

Typical mediocre buffet food. Lunch price is pricier is $19.95 which is ok. Food is better than uncle willys.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIJmr1xZ2_u7yglKqhx4OFDDMnKMbg_QyZMMiq&fid=0x0:0x85871f0dc12414ee"],"When":"2023-6-8"},{"Name":"Frank Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqU7w4lL0DBsy1BjK_cj8vbNltIdZkHHYfmHo3u05AoSN2BGW5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"$20 is a reasonable price for a weekend lunch. Sichuan beef is really great and you have to try.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzfUfr-KkN2HIb2OC-euowUaQgKO-a-iaiKsSJ&fid=0x0:0x85871f0dc12414ee"],"When":"2024-5-4"},{"Name":"Татьяна Ковальская","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIXVxMFqXQF_UuwlQ8WsZcn2JYLhelxF3fDPghxx-eUGYGE9w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Extremely tasty food. I am happy that my friends brought me here!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMWNRBMd6-ZQ6mAx8AiyCDrboeSNMqjW7DNEeOs&fid=0x0:0x85871f0dc12414ee"],"When":"2024-7-21"},{"Name":"Simon Park","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKARXZijowQGioSxiOMCg-EzyxEm1UrGAfGF9hiOguYSh8sPA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The staff are nice and friendly. I can't say the same for the food served unfortunately, though. The wonton soup wasn't hot (warm) enough and most of the menus weren't refilled in a timely manner. Well, the old saying is right again : "You get what you pay for".","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4MDIdHPbR-EY0Duc7cwWZeug0Kei9rBmCp3dR&fid=0x0:0x85871f0dc12414ee"],"When":"2023-11-28"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Blampin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUe_Zl-7bsR_k4aPN0CDrFm3JxQQaY2wgkXgNPVdZQs9NDoFTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very friendly service and relaxing atmosphere.

The food was really good and came quite quickly.

I had the seafood hot n sour pho , some hot tea and the kids had spring rolls.  Mom had Grilled Lemkngrass Pork and Chicken.

Everything was cooked well only disappointment is the use of FARM raised Prawns. Ocean fished is the only way. These simply are not prawns. They don't taste like anything and they're very bad for you.

I was pleased with an option for tip and no obligation by pre set percentages as some places often have.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNbmGsIeZZnWUSS68rtd3UMGmqvRdpK3Usa8FQS&fid=0x0:0xd56e87c96f1ffa56"],"When":"2024-12-23"},{"Name":"Jack Pajak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7kRSq5QM1wGXm36_dbE9YR6CpcUs9VUAhu1SxvpJkrQ-nGO0N=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Another great Maple Ridge Vietnamese restaurant, Hot Pho has a fantastic menu with great prices and friendly staff. We really enjoyed the spring and salad rolls, their pho was great too. I had a large bowl of pho but noticed that there wasn't as much meat and noodles as I would normally expect, but I still left full so...overall I would try Hot Pho again. The location is really convenient and parling is great, worth a stop!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOEotbdkSC2bNOyThaoaNjW7laFBde3unfFMUwS&fid=0x0:0xd56e87c96f1ffa56"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"Rolando_ Rose","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIQBfjayv2V3eqQ6nmwU1uOEqgsWCG5VdwRxO3uXCF1EsXQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Located at the court house square, this restaurant is an easy walking distance to downtown core of Maple Ridge. There’s also an ample parking just within the vicinity. I ordered pho with beef brisket and it didn’t disappoint. The broth is delicious, not overly salty. At the table you will find a set of condiments that includes chilli oil, hoisin sauce and soy sauce. Served with a few slices of jalapeño, Thai basil, lime and bean sprouts. While I enjoyed my dining experience, the restaurant needs to declutter some empty boxes that are visible while customers are dining.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPF7pRJozgIOlk8zwh8W7fCkbxhCMfvlpV2r-s&fid=0x0:0xd56e87c96f1ffa56"],"When":"2024-10-23"},{"Name":"Daniel Jung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFE7g6vnjf23CW6mDeh4anchF8fxBs6O5Nsx0bvhepuO3MVzWa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"It was okay. Flavors were decent but not as good as other places I have tried.. They didn't have sriracha. Spring rolls were tasty. May be back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPLl_Gj107UAie902demJ4y35_HlqUojavRSrZ1&fid=0x0:0xd56e87c96f1ffa56"],"When":"2023-9-20"},{"Name":"Amy Rempel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4WQ_mGYG_pYFntbKu-x9F6ks5omdb55yt_SM5kIbSmUYap9w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The food is delicious. But, you barely get anything for what you pay for. Attached is a picture of a dish I paid $17 for. There was barely any chicken.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxWcswLeeoxmu9QXvW2gxiqWh4UjZVpFVfnoyV&fid=0x0:0xd56e87c96f1ffa56"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"Diba Syed","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUjqdNBmu9lw_riSjJrn9EutvY83fGG0w7vJQpFN6QCCqzTaPc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is top class restaurant in terms of food, atmosphere and service. The food is rocking for us. Hai the sole working waiter was pretty amicable and prompt.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOFTuqVDRJF8wkAKcHKN5ScLc-jPh2l0Z4NAHNI&fid=0x0:0xd56e87c96f1ffa56"],"When":"2024-5-16"},{"Name":"Stacy Archer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIj81BAT_6zpnhNQrv8O1NkGTpHWT1YRP8ZyOv9AiYf4mPW2apt=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We have been ordering from this restaurant over the past few years, Dine in and takeout, and have really enjoyed it. Food tastes great and friendly staff. However, over the past year every time we have ordered take out, the pho noodles have been broken scraps. This is the 3rd time in a row that we have ordered pho soup for take out and the noodles are all broken and small, you cannot even pick up with chop sticks. See my picture for details. Very disappointed to see this is how they are treating take out  customers, when clearly it is intentional. For the time being we will be going elsewhere with hopes that with this review, they will stop doing that to customers. Be warned, if you order pho for take out, you won’t get noodles, just broken scraps.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7g0A22dgW0_BQnGncYvSAWYeH3ZphvoX7-Arb&fid=0x0:0xd56e87c96f1ffa56"],"When":"2024-2-29"},{"Name":"Jonathan Hung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXcyx4J66dX-2K0eJPsLn9dFQ4eU3qrPUFN-1LCa-9QqLBvskz2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Opened November 2016 where Sarges Restaurant use to be. The breaded squid was very tender, not oily, and not overcooked... Very tasty! The spring roll was just the same. The Beef Pho Soup had really good flavor there was no grease floating on the top, and the beef was super tender. The rice plates both were very delicious, and the meat was again super tender and very tasty.
UPDATE (Feb 2017): By far the best Pho joint in Maple Ridge. Tried the Egg Noodles with Wonton and Veggies, and it was delicious! Also had the breaded fried squid again, and again tasty!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNn7_U8Q9a8l6SlqdNTpFgh0xfjXZ9sbCyoFU8Y&fid=0x0:0xd56e87c96f1ffa56"],"When":"2016-12-1"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Nidhi Kukreti","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkwLGU0qL5R4gpFxJSktJd2bFgwdSs8uzUdgRJFVvHPQaNnjI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Went for dinner, it was good 👍. Food was decent i like onion naan(must try). Chole bature were also good in taste. Service is little bit slow. Overall my experience was good.
If you’re looking buffet for a lunch in good price then do visit. Parking is available and free.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOdhJaDq--0Ap2MoURqhN_MUbNlhlOtOT7FGqal&fid=0x0:0x1e49bab05c66116c"],"When":"2024-7-15"},{"Name":"Boomer Melba","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLpQCzaaqJHvJb1W9difmwMVVfm_-vvbvXCCr9-sUgk4-fMLw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always the best. We drive by dozens of Indian restaurants to get to this gem.
They have now added a mango cheesecake for dessert that was the bomb!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgEqodMqRMKqHn_6MedZOpEedkAW6PzYdl1EaI&fid=0x0:0x1e49bab05c66116c"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"Angadpal Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW1E381c52z9XIVulx92KauqWKJLwuMBE0Z7OrBhAurLG5IAkAInw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I recently visited JMK Mahal Restaurant for their lunch buffet, and it was an okay experience. The buffet offered a decent number of dishes, but the quality was hit-or-miss. For appetizers, there were only two options - tandoori chicken and samosa. Unfortunately, the tandoori chicken was dry and not impressive.

The main course had two chicken items, and the butter chicken was the highlight - it was flavorful and enjoyable. The vegetable mix was just average, and the rice was good. However, I was disappointed that they ran out of basic salad items like onions and cucumbers by 1:30 PM, and they didn't replenish them even after we asked. This was a letdown, especially since the buffet was supposed to be available until 3 PM.

Overall, it was an okay experience, and the price of $15 per person was reasonable. However, I hope they improve their buffet offerings and replenish items more regularly to enhance the dining experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN94vgQ14iXtz_OpUP7y9Iab_xIy9VY2sf7fXRv&fid=0x0:0x1e49bab05c66116c"],"When":"2024-5-14"},{"Name":"Mitch C.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUigQKnsqnd6-ECKxiWLF3yOJGPZULiTcrsHXswZ-6rjxY7_wxITQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Happy to see this place spring back after a fire during covid if I recall correctly... Went for the Dinner Buffet. They have a lunch buffet every day I think. The dinner buffet is Friday through Sunday. Tasty food, seemed like good quality ingredients. With a nice variety of dishes. There was a lot of available seating and the place wasn't busy (2 other tables in use), which is why the service was kinda shockingly bad (there was a high staff to guest ratio). I think it might have been just bad luck, or maybe just the person responsible doesn't understand buffet service expectations. In my opinion, even at a buffet service is important. Plus it's an opportunity for the staff to earn tips to share with the kitchen etc. It would take much effort to really elevate the experience. Clearing the plates, bringing more water, asking if I wanted anything else to drink... I just didn't feel the care you want to feel eating out somewhere. Hope the owner / manager sees. Will come back sometime and try again to see if it's a consistent issue.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQDdTzB_27kVawKu9G0jAbi1h_m0luszfJe5YW&fid=0x0:0x1e49bab05c66116c"],"When":"2023-8-14"},{"Name":"Frances Torres","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWW5Hv49QyUd0tzfirSnNxCfr7BBsJHZ8ToeL86V4tPrquxKFaGXQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered delivery from here for the first time today. I called just to check on the order. The employee who answered the call was very kind and gave me an ETA for the delivery.

My order arrived perfectly. The delivery employee was nice and friendly. Food is extremely delicious and flavourful. The dishes were not cold and the naan and rice not stale.

Fantastic food and awesome service. Highly recommend.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Yasmine Esmail","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWEZXBMNTPF4jvg42VCs7awd7M64MsfZxN-AdLy-sBCNVAIaJYSAg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food is amazing. We had lamb kabob, Amritsari kulcha and butter chicken.  It was amazing. The set ice was great too. Very friendly and very welcoming  we will surely go back there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPbwCHNs5zajDHigc6JF02w_-XsAjqzeF0b0kV3&fid=0x0:0x1e49bab05c66116c"],"When":"2024-3-29"},{"Name":"Souparno Bandyopadhyay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUuCmVH2mv_B0Bnwyt-4L46dIFgiFVTDV9cKvZ2hdJ2RLLkzO9WWw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Buffet is well priced.

Lot of their menu item’s closely resemble how they’re served in India. Which is good for those seeking authentic taste.

Choley bhature and samosas are my go to.

Tandoori chicken could be better but not bad.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Harsimran Singh Arora","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUeV5nBddl87-hPty9lULHuNsEV2sCet-xl41J3Ed5ab4jE70h2xA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great restaurant! The service was excellent, and the staff was super friendly. The food was tasty, and the people were really nice.  You can tell this place is run by genuinely good people who care about their customers. Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Xavier Snow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUPCQwCJb2ZmOWDXqksCsd-vZs9ykcxfKjETkI90DQafTXUU5xa=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My wife and I stopped in to The Nut Coffee Shop today for a salted caramel latte and a caramel macchiato. The service was excellent and the store was very clean and modern inside. About 100 meters away from the bus loop located in downtown Maple Ridge this will for sure be a spot I visit more often!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMxCvx0-MoYtdhZ-Saalr2OtpuBQafAEKAWSHJ1&fid=0x0:0xd5efd2907473ae44"],"When":"2024-12-1"},{"Name":"Sarah El Daouk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLUxg5vWixImGb2nplfdl2YjWzrkNtc_tICsVZNrFG30XyDuWsF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"My favorite café! I visit almost weekly. I love supporting our local businesses. They have fantastic coffee (especially the nut latte) and the cozy atmosphere. The only reason for my 4-star rating is the seating – while the chairs are okay, they're often full, and the benches could really use some cushions, as they are extremely uncomfortable. I also wish they would bring back more savory options, like the cheddar scones they used to carry, as all of their current offerings are on the sweeter side. Hopefully, they’ll consider these suggestions!
❤️","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Viona Halim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5PMLEtvgkAwv2IjmL8XXm0-Ly_XpBo5Kd0Hv2pxoQ26_Hfy4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice and quaint little coffee shop in the heart of downtown Maple Ridge. Nice that we finally get some local shops here that look very cozy and welcoming.
My husband and I came here to get some lattes to go, but the space looks quite nice and cozy if you wanna stick around for a bit with your laptop.

We ordered our lattes with regular milk, but I heard what's exceptional here are the plant-based milk lattes. Nonetheless, our lattes were made to perfection. They certainly froth the milk just to the right temperature for the silkiest and sweetest consistency. Wait times are also very reasonable.

What we find this place is lacking is more options for baked goods. They have the usual suspect like scones and cookies. Then they have some bowls, wraps, yogurt, etc. In their cold display. But overall, the bite options are somewhat limited. I think they're definitely coffee-focused and there's nothing wrong with that.

They also carry other local, small-biz merch in their store. All and all, we'll definitely come back to try their other coffee options.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYQ_F3Ob_Ypf3328lHSh6Kvjso-KRJawfGB7fZ&fid=0x0:0xd5efd2907473ae44"],"When":"2022-10-1"},{"Name":"Ewa Kreczman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK-qfsXu0WfHNDeytPhJ-h9WzO_CO49eT61A3uvpEL1bK9JnA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"My friend and I were looking for place to sit, have coffee and chat. Then she remember somebody mentioned to her this place. We decided to give it a try and this turned to be a mistake. We ordered coffees and bought some treats. We sat down waiting for a coffee. When coffees were ready only then we were informed that they are closing in 15 minutes as they have shorter opening hours today, something she never mentioned when we were putting order in. If we knew that we would just found different place. When we said that this should be mentioned when we were putting order, girl's working there attitude was far from proper customer service. Her suggestion was that we could go to courtyard to have our coffee. "Great suggestion"  while it was raining and quite cold.  We are not going back there ever again with this kind of customer service. On the other note cookies we ordered weren't quality which would make us want to go back there as well.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Prima Primavera","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVgviOjcAerRoNVlGDMxdWH5dK-NAzgYaRM-V8_yzCd5gUIyVaI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Clean and spacious coffee shop, baristas often smiling, and always very polite. Good coffee, urban atmosphere with easy accessibility.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMH-EV-is8uUR-gvtVmzze_8WZID7nlL5hKYUoO&fid=0x0:0xd5efd2907473ae44"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"S P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL3H1hwIfN6Bp7TC6p9xHt7oE4AtZuMSz6HUmbD4gLsn19Lvw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What was ordered:⁣⁣

• Oat latte
• To live for everyday cookie ⁣⁣
• Bonus Bakery red velvet cookie ⁣⁣
⁣⁣
Cute little coffee shop in Maple Ridge. Loved the variety of vegan options made by local businesses. Kinda went nuts with the cookies LOL. ⁣","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJscSOneiiaMiQs8l_B6C-LVE2jHvj57iUsCkY&fid=0x0:0xd5efd2907473ae44"],"When":"2023-11-19"},{"Name":"Mahshid Rezaee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9GxeUaX5WBNrmfk93lsqQgSl4Mb_xDNMvNqwfGesMvRfVpU-o=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"NOT RECOMMENDED AT ALL!

I’m really sorry to say that my visit to The Nut in Maple Ridge was far from pleasant. Unfortunately, it was THE WORST customer service I have experienced in Canada!

The staff member who took my order was notably unhelpful and rude. I had some questions about their treats, as I was considering ordering for myself and two guests. However, when I noticed that the items didn’t seem fresh, I decided to just order coffee. This seemed to upset the staff member, who responded by handing me the card payment machine in a very abrupt and rude manner.

To make matters worse, my previous experience with their meals was also disappointing. The quality just wasn’t up to standard. Given these issues, I can’t recommend The Nut based on my experiences. There are way better options in the area! super dissapointed!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jamak Golshani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWUj2LK0XJaxGCkMdV1Y3vwaPy3axo29-O-pu7Kb7eqy9PgvRrN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Awesome, cozy, family owned, and delightful spot. If you enjoy little local coffee shops over the chains this is one of these rare spots in Maple Ridge.

The owners are friendly and welcoming. Probably the only spot you can get JJ Beans 🙂

Locally crafted products are displayed and sold.
The coffee was delicious and the environment was just right!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOaOR7D4qMTK9fs_atEdI0cUKh1q8tHuSnGxQfo&fid=0x0:0xd5efd2907473ae44"],"When":"2022-4-23"}]
