user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Darwin Park","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK1UxlK71amHzSqVtmuvfs54lrHIu7UkWz9IU5iiiRd02fyIQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently ate at Aburiya Sushi and was thoroughly impressed. The sushi was top-notch, with fresh ingredients and stunning presentation that made each bite a pleasure. The servers were genuinely kind and attentive, making sure everything was perfect. For anyone who loves great sushi and excellent service, I highly recommend","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMi5J6LuXcQdxMbM2Cp5mj7MH33wJdr5b9MyDSM&fid=0x0:0xfdaa879f30d92cd7"],"When":"2024-7-5"},{"Name":"Jean McKenzie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJUUdP1snOnrs7wRiIl27lKLdraZjJNDGwzkOEs1YtFryoBLQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"WE ORDERD TO TAKE OUT : This was a tray of mixed sushi for 5 persons for a snack lunch we also had the mild chicken the chicken pieces had great flavor. We all loved the different types of Sushi the food has great flavor and I'm very fussy and enjoyed all they recommended to me.We Have leftovers enough for dinner.  No cooking dinner tonight just sit back and enjoy the rest of the sushi and a cold drink with my husband. What else can you ask for. Will be back to order hear again. 5 🌟","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzVohm4TAI9KyJCXlw0h5byMTABqJyRFx5QBCO&fid=0x0:0xfdaa879f30d92cd7"],"When":"2024-10-3"},{"Name":"Dev Deteriorate","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW174d3q1C68k3CIpTb3Y2mjhbzxdBX3351-dOCoOvMShWcsYWq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Aburiya has slowly started to become my favourite sushi place in Maple Ridge. It’s by far the best dine-in experience you can ask for. They prioritize traditional fresh cuts of sashimi, but also have more western influenced rolls that don’t try too hard in being different, and still make for a brilliant combination without being a mess. The service is exceptional, the staff is always glad that you came in, and the beer is always cold. I love everything about Aburiya, keep killing it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPCLJY8I8usefzMefCkaiR_-2NUnROii8puK2yA&fid=0x0:0xfdaa879f30d92cd7"],"When":"2024-6-9"},{"Name":"Sebastian Zheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVvy3vVKZiNft2EMJPTiCp9AzRX5VJxYl6uHdjWMWnjhIxyYyk0Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I really liked their Alaska roll and Salmon Oshi, very delicious. Wait time and staff were all very nice, 10/10 would recommend if you’re nearby!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-yRKEGOE9OTlYkHs4ryAnRqxlkkBnZkF3Ux_B&fid=0x0:0xfdaa879f30d92cd7"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"rachelle tran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIBqgGs-K-4RJOYCJL65aKY4RuM1NOf7tIEBY4EYG_koqy3Aw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We ordered the dynamite roll, spicy salmon rolls and salmon sashimi. All were delicious, the dynamite roll is massive. Good pricing, I know some places will make their spicy salmon rolls with sriracha and mayo, their spicy salmon rolls are only sriracha. Overall still very good!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOaQIwMVO9CaFs50bSgEZdMLtt7kb17YDrHpRsO&fid=0x0:0xfdaa879f30d92cd7"],"When":"2024-7-13"},{"Name":"Meghan Klassen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKD-XbXwb6aAq-xlNjuC8BO0xaag0Zq5PBhSx8MCP7PI-YuvQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow! Such great sushi, fresh, huge rolls. Friendly staff, very attentive.  I love sushi and this is my new go to. Partner had teriyaki and it was also very good!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-TLCCTLHrlmNf4RNbcz7KX8c05bg2xxZz19YL&fid=0x0:0xfdaa879f30d92cd7"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"Holly Jung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVDTyWnxQ8Ar4m7jgQ2lfL4Nc5PFxWi6Nat4UGeJTAo1rnuiGLK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"**Updated**
I just love this local gem more and more with each visit. Thank you for creating a keto-sushi menu (garden five roll). My lovely co-worker really enjoys Sushi but couldn't dine out at sushi restaurants because of her dietary restriction. She fell in love with this roll when she found out. It was so rewarding to see her so happy.💕💕
Owners work really really hard to provide better service, even extending the hours open. Thank you! 🙏🙏
I loved it when I visited last time, but even with Uber Eats delivery, they never disappoint me 🤩. Their actual pricing as dine-in is really affordable. Food quality is great. One of my favorite place to order! They are also called "aburiya" for a reason! Aburi rolls are so good that I had to eat a piece before the photo... They also do a lot of specials for online orders via delivery app. Thank you for my complimentary nigiri! 😍😍😍😍😍🙏","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPj0Zl0qhARvGJtCZWt2dBRtSJl_ujSZLlJVBpO&fid=0x0:0xfdaa879f30d92cd7"],"When":"2024-5-23"},{"Name":"Langley Sangster","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJM_iIneFg07sCUzNu27uhHtMjGnfviZvRo_Z5s9xJh5mr7Tw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Today my buddy recommends to try Aburiya since they have new ownership they are much better than before. Wow! It tastes even better than any other sushi place in maple ridge and the portion was very satisfied. I definitely become a fan of Aburiya from now on. You can never be sure until you try it though! :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPExJLywYWbe3dcPPYbxBCdZvhaPsKRr2FoFDVs&fid=0x0:0xfdaa879f30d92cd7"],"When":"2023-10-15"}]

title: The Great Mongolian BBQ
address: V2X 2V5 British Columbia, Maple Ridge, Lougheed Hwy., The Great Mongolian BBQ
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Alcohol","enabled":true},{"name":"Beer","enabled":true},{"name":"Healthy options","enabled":true},{"name":"Vegan options","enabled":true},{"name":"Vegetarian options","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Lunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Dinner","enabled":true},{"name":"Seating","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true}]},{"id":"crowd","name":"Crowd","options":[{"name":"Groups","enabled":true}]},{"id":"planning","name":"Planning","options":[{"name":"Accepts reservations","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]},{"id":"children","name":"Children","options":[{"name":"Good for kids","enabled":true},{"name":"High chairs","enabled":true},{"name":"Kids' menu","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true},{"name":"Parking","enabled":false}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Terrance Ballinger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfXPM0VnVW25XGLTurN53qTTrBcGu0EFRlRUVkF2_Fa_j4hjxG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Certainly! Here’s a five-star review for Mongolian Grill:

---

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

I recently dined at Mongolian Grill and had a wonderful experience. The staff were incredibly friendly, and the service was top-notch.

The food was delicious, with a fantastic variety of flavors that left my taste buds delighted. Although the restaurant is quite cozy and a bit on the small side, which made it feel a little cramped, the overall quality of the meal and the warm hospitality more than made up for it.

Highly recommend for a flavorful dining experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2mMubkSKrNR2fD4DRvRK_3dWMMstC84-YOzj-&fid=0x0:0x7608d6d146192205"],"When":"2024-6-8"},{"Name":"Srikantha Kalaghatta","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX7kV3vSmU11E2VJr6yMSYBtHLByJ47CPuwfOKoc_5xVBiEfsZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"This place felt like a food maze with too many rules to navigate. Time determines food prices – after 3 PM, bowls cost a buck more. Sharing? Nope. And if your bowl hits 700 grams, cue extra charges! It's like a hunger puzzle!

Both veg and non-veg bowls cost the same until 700 grams. In what world is that fair? Also, how do you know the weight without a scale? I played it safe, staying probably under 400 grams. Other spots weigh your meal, fair and square. Here? It’s a guessing game: lose out on food or pay extra, no middle ground.

The food setup's odd too. Sauce at the start? We pour sauce on food, not dunk food in! At 19 CAD (with tax) for a bowl, the price felt steep for what we got. Plus, two bland spring rolls tagged along, probably apologizing for existing. Soggy and off, a first in my Asian eats.

Kudos to the front desk girl, trying despite the chaos. But with food and setup off-kilter, staff magic can only do so much. Have other customers of this place been to legit Mongolian spots? Because once they do, they won't return here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN98XPVrDauZs2Eb8_PhhTXnBDfkcXFO2PdflHT&fid=0x0:0x7608d6d146192205"],"When":"2023-12-29"},{"Name":"Naser","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0-YQ8zU5RxMjX7Szhrzpzf3k8mT3TPmCIoVpC7Yu8SS5YsZfI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice experience for our family. Specially kids liked it to choose the spice and ingredients by themselves and then they BBQ it in front of them .
Food and service were good and the staff are so nice and friendly.
It's Chinese food but prepared by Mongolian Style BBQ.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPh0iaY_NAe0T5SIYyo67RH9QhofrlHOYTk6cwb&fid=0x0:0x7608d6d146192205"],"When":"2024-4-8"},{"Name":"Robert Ash","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLJQAeP8ruG-UCqNM_45mQCHPv-HxgUjGGoOGCaA0SeoNx2rg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best places to eat in Maple Ridge. Everyone knows how expensive everything is nowadays, but the food you get for the price is unmatched. 20 dollars at McDonald's or Burger King and you're probably still hungry. 20 bucks here and you're eating good and you'll be stuffed. Please bring one to Mission.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"ClayPhoenix4","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVelJECogE7AFzsG2ZmzVGlq92_4MqwMY_QK6n2nHeBRJeGCXg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"There is no need to sweat it out when you are filling up your bowl to be cooked (like some other Mongolie grill) restaurants and watch what the scale says and then find out how much you are getting charged when they cook it for you.
Just simply fill up a desired portion and pay the set price....
There is a max amount you can fill the bowl so no need to stomp down the bowl, so keep it reasonable. The plate comes with a scoop of rice and 2 small spring rolls.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Marion Kryger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIRJCI44a0FudyaE5-DQb5xvo62PPzbT_PEXoI4RjcsAVnykA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered the Wong tong miso soup it was so good nice and light on the stomach and very flavourful perfect for a nice cold day to warm you up so glad I decided to go  definitely can’t wait to go again !!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Richard Robson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBpP_J13Sb1Q0viZ5CNU61C6icASh3TXtZU86rpp6mmT1VYcGT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The wife and I went here for lunch on my birthday. The food in the picture is from the small bowl. We could have crammed more food into the bowl before we had them cook it! But it was soo much food for a great price! All the ingredients were super fresh and delicious. The staff were awesome. We will be going back soon and will probably become regulars at this location!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPhijGTgM_1tSKaalC4Y1pG1PnqyGFdX8QtFJz&fid=0x0:0x7608d6d146192205"],"When":"2020-9-6"},{"Name":"Roezell Riggs","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4WjKBpexg6A7saNdE6W7ow6w_FZutLr4uG3a_MxnBEUNimQk3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It was my first time coming here  and Mongolian grill restaurants are my favourite type of restaurants, so I was coming in with a bit of high standards.
The service was great for Tuesday night, a few people working and they were very helpful in explaining the process.. In this restaurant,  they have different bowl sizes with set prices to them, as oppose to some places that strictly go by weight.
Their sauce selection was decent, but they didn't have honey garlic which is my favourite option. I'm just happy they didn't have pre-made sauces like the Mongolian grill in Whistler!
They also didn't have salmon, so I ended up having a  big bowl of vegetables and noodles. I was recently informed they have white fist as an option though.
I enjoyed the food very much, their veggie selection was a wider spread than I'm used to seeing which was great for me.
Another thing that was different and I wasn't expecting, was their rice portion was small, like a spoonful. I enjoy rice over noodles  I didn't want the noodles but when they mentioned that the rice doesn't come in a large bowl  and just on the side, I added noodles. I enjoyed the change, it was a good experience and I'll go back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqvLCrXJxMX5BLAdArSO7hFm9rXgYPb6Y0F8uH&fid=0x0:0x7608d6d146192205"],"When":"2023-9-12"}]

descriptions: Colorful dining nook featuring classic Thai dishes such as curry, noodles & stir-fries.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Riley Takeo Hooge","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLgIva6PMRpqUulaj2E9b567gf1t64PfCIHKigFv65LY803xA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Smile Thai is one of the best Thai restaurants in the Lower Mainland, let alone the Ridge-Meadows area. I have been coming here since they first opened, and it has been a pleasurable and diverse addition to the community.

Do yourself a favor - instead of grabbing takeout at one of the many non-authentic Chinese restaurants in Maple Ridge, try an actual authentic Thai alternative. The flavours are exotic and complex, and the staff are very friendly!

They no longer do dine-in, but don't let that shy you away. Some of the best foods are takeout only, and this is absolutely no exception!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"marlon mcclain","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLTqWT-EhH3S15LYcpz3NgsdaQaRy5PMHt06Mn-Np63xQQ7lg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Worst Thai food I have ever had. Red Currey had no flavour no fresh bamboo shoots or  fresh thai basil,  super runny water down with coconut rice seemed it was day old and dry  crunchy absolutly no coconut taste, TomYum soup again no flavour, Padthai was best of the bad even my 15 year old son thought it was not spicy and tasteless. Also cant dine in May 2024 because of covid? What? Arent we past that?","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtwqHpaCdgt9tRJrSuDhH7FIgUAgSZKnsnkgIh&fid=0x0:0xbfb891f71a2789dd"],"When":"2024-5-28"},{"Name":"Jessica Clark-Roesch","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUHUJ1USG6gqe3ILZYlPE5sEULzxPYzVCYQUpc3cXGQ3FO1vdwV=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hands down best Thai food and customer service in Maple Ridge and surrounding areas. Never disappointed with the quality or price and the customer service, a family ran business goes a long way! The facility is always so clean and welcoming. Highly recommend supporting this business.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Hanna Waite","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX4w9rddcQ9lpExu1dNfEghJjG9ydsVVggFFRamVAbNCDWVaWj7=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Food is good, service is friendly, and the restaurant seems clean.

I would advise caution if eating gluten free- I mentioned twice when ordering that I need my order GF, and confirmed that it was GF when I picked it up, but there was a spring roll in the container with my salad, so I couldn’t eat it. I ate the Pad Thai as it was in a different container, but the spring roll being included made me question if the Pad Thai had actually been made GF.

Wouldn’t hurt to ask when someone orders GF if they want the spring roll, because more than likely the answer would be no 🤷🏻‍♀️","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mrityunjay Kumar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK02yKU4inEgudvhGGlKrBrAKZRxhuwnfeJyD_JeTGVlWa7qQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Worst thai food ever. I didn’t expected like this. They have thai chef even though it’s not good. I don’t say make exactly like authentic thai food but it’s not even near that taste. Red curry was just watery red spicy broth and spiced with only chilli powder they didn’t use thai red chilli. Thai food is all about 4 kind of flavor that is spicy, sour, sweet, and salt. The one I had was not thai food no taste just bland. I don’t know what it was. Next time I will try different that restaurant. 0/5. Plus no dining only take away.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jesse Day","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJdALS6-K1AhdfLOcF6-O11KPUw7FdAEcnuKZueiEPEdvDPh3k=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best Thai I've had outside of Thailand. I'm gonna remember this green curry for a long time. Sad I don't live in Maple Ridge or else I'd be here weekly.

Staff was super friendly. I called for takeout about 8 minutes before close and they still happily took my order. Glad I found this place. Will be back whenever I'm in Maple Ridge.

I don't normally write reviews but this place was too good not to praise.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOybU2c8qbDwc_UJMXwMiMKJYMnUuurzpi9y-wR&fid=0x0:0xbfb891f71a2789dd"],"When":"2023-11-24"},{"Name":"Indianna Moon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW8OPCNbUxooZdcKgFJhZk7FGEHUiGCQmqp2MgQIwJtRY_kgZEthQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered take out from this restaurant today for the first time, and I must say I am pretty disappointed in what I received. The "salad" in the box is merely some brown iceberg lettuce with no dressing and one sliver of a shredded carrot. In the photo attached  the reddish colour of the lettuce is not the curry, it  is in fact the rotting of the lettuce itself. The curry I ordered is way too sweet, has mooshy and spongy tofu in it, and maybe 4 small chunks of bell pepper. I spent an extra dollar for coconut rice and my Curry is sweeter and tastes more like coconut than the rice... I don't know what the heck is going on, but I've had Thai red curry about 30 times and it has never been this bad. Im writing this review in hopes that the owner sees this and looks into the quality of their take out orders, as I will not return to this place or recommend it to anyone.
It is not a fun experience ordering food on my break to take it back to work and have to throw out half of my meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOWzhNNyEplyqnHzH_bmgM3SsnspIujIUlCrxiY&fid=0x0:0xbfb891f71a2789dd"],"When":"2017-8-8"},{"Name":"Duke Pufus","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWukW7L6iD7Fsj98lKPEw1hzjJ0B-rpWvm75WLGKOM6jjGxeeRp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Okay here it is, we ordered take out for 4, staff were awesome, food tastes good, portion size is small for the price.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMC3RCWVzmvKkYroY0GruV8SIkPe_AMSoXKuEah&fid=0x0:0xbfb891f71a2789dd"],"When":"2022-8-25"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kyle Desjarlais","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWrRBEamWMJl4icWTFU6lImngzC0ND5A_dzd32uf-Z4ExMBsyw-Kg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved it.
Great little venue for a rock and roll show.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN52iJybZ0WOKKgPUTxe-NlnWv04h642tmgEh8s&fid=0x0:0xbeca13f54c7e87b5"],"When":"2023-12-9"},{"Name":"Vic Toimilín","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW3Ty6DjwjhaO5dXEdLNOuVQdgdVLhQDwniOrbQOXpgnJvMedgm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Honestly, when we got there I had some pretty low expectations. What the Wolf Bar doesn't have in decor, it has in character.  It's an odd location packed with friendly regulars, good staff and reasonably priced drinks. We went for a live music night and were greeted like we'd been there a thousand times before. Thanks for a surprisingly great night!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Heather Hay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKD_wf1myF3XsrbsB9mu3M5IehDTDkEvm3YGLT7IflzFDjTSA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Staff are so friendly and attentive. The sound is amazing, and they always have live shows. The regulars at this bar are welcoming and  super friendly. I’ve had nothing but great experiences at this bar!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"James Franklin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXrkOA4GxCZc0L86eXKi7u9FVaWOD4JKqW4OIdmaLDILprmdiY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fun spot for karaoke and cheap drinks!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Street Hazard","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURFbIXZgFohAMrMR_ZDnInasbkLj2VtqII5gRfvJ8LxVhZgb_sCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Good place if you want to get sucker punched
Wouldn’t even recommend my enemies to go to this place","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Travis Green","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8GGup0lXWiKJ2t1gBgDvuAB2MBeXWaHIHgaYbW5n-R6cN_pM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Played two shows there now. One with Wicked World, and one with Cheap Purple. The staff is great, the sound guy is totally pro, and the audience is among the very best.
The Wolf Bar Absolutely Rocks!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brent Krivoshein","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX63Os5RfQMOT3380U5Eo0RcdaWTDNjr5eoNm0_lh_j5wa0dVmHdQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Never had food but the Bartender lady was great. Seen our friends band play, Mr Breeze. Great night and great venue.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cindy Nelson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUC5O_prCaskVo9Wq-xaCGdA_srcq_LTsdxTRxTGEg7oY29z52h=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sunday night jams with Kelly and all of his wonderful Jammers, starts at 8 Pm Sunday night,, be there to join us, the place is like Cheers!! Just nice people joining in conversation, and dancing and singing and playing, and the bartenders rock with a smile to greet you❤️I'm sold!!! Pool table to show off your styles!! See you next Sunday,,, thank you Maple Ridge peeps, luv Cindy😃","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Jacks Accounts","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWbbzdbnNQlDVeVjPmw8NRRxTkl3k-YtyXt2U-bQlZr9yChPb2j=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love sashimi and i ordered from them for take out, good size portion of tuna and salmon..highly recommended😉","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOwb9X5g94W3CVa0rG0Xc3NqPm8gCFTJCyeaG8e\u0026fid=0x0:0xe4e948ab312ca912"],"When":"2024-7-18"},{"Name":"Amanda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLGuNKweWtvNfj34gdG2OsNrjHhDpVOYNe2fsC4XZGfQWp4Aq8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I don’t usually leave reviews but this place was just so good. I’m from Edmonton on a vacation and the portion was huge, it came with a miso soup and it was only 12.50. Delicious too and service was fast. So confused at all the bad reviews.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"jmb","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKr_j3GS1hD7B5mJzX6OHcfbSbsNIp4dG8x-muIBeXLjOKMA0s=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Undercooked chicken teriyaki and has smell probably old. Sashimi stinks and also not fresh and tiny slices. California roll is tiny, the prawn tempura is tiny and has smell likely old as well. For this price and bad food, go elsewhere.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ron Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4C9fuu3Pgu102q3bAxHKivkiOQqwqKjJditkVdy4zIZ628gCE7g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"great place to eat, quality is decent, got my order wrong though, ordered Toro sashimi but got Toro nigiri.  the soft shell crab tasted a bit off but just one piece, their rolls are great, prices are average as well.  the menu they have online is old, the prices in their current in store menu are higher.  they close at 9:30pm but they wont take orders after 8:45pm so plan accordingly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9UhmTdH7Fwwl__xjOJj8AKyE_-Tm6oicFzilx\u0026fid=0x0:0xe4e948ab312ca912"],"When":"2019-6-5"},{"Name":"Jamie H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLFiQk19-kbOquGEGRTQWnj2JCg_f1bV2j1F4yPwBHVlyVpLxot=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Be aware of this place. Lots of other sushi places you can go to in maple ridge. They use expired ingredients and their sushi smells off from time to time. Don’t go here","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"dilyn stretch","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKxaB3835Ysy7jUvALMuePLwoVW5g38uCzSuBco4gXAkFLXFg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"i order sushiro very frequently and have always had the best service and best food. My favourite place to eat! Staff are so friendly and welcoming:)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jonathan Hung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXcyx4J66dX-2K0eJPsLn9dFQ4eU3qrPUFN-1LCa-9QqLBvskz2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We had a Fire Cracker Roll, Nakasaki Spicy Ramen, and Sushi To Box. The Sushi Ro Box was very good for what you get. For the tempura included in the box you got 4 shrimp and 1 yam, which I find very generous having four shrimp. The Fire Cracker Roll was delicious with good flavor. The ramen was okay, just noodles in spicy soup and was hoping for some kind of protein other than an egg drop.\n\nOverall it was well priced and decent sushi but nothing Wow'd us that we ate there so far.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNVmiuepjVssBeyklvgxavV22Dervs9cAIAvQQN\u0026fid=0x0:0xe4e948ab312ca912"],"When":"2016-11-10"},{"Name":"Alexa Blouin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDw57hgtPB0lGwZCH-Ubgklok7_HjV9d1e1xryqQmEJc-yxbk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The value for the food is really good. I got a huge bowl of ramen for $10 and some gyozas that were really good. Our server was sweet and attentive. The food came out really fast. It was a bit hot in the restaurant because it was so hot out but not too uncomfortable. Overall really good affordable food.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Swimming Lion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIoNuKoBPU8hDsJrOBlEDRPQawlWHi3C9rUvrLYtz7paaZM0w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Small but decent  Indian restaurant, servers are very attentive and polite.
Tandoori chicken a bit salty but the cashew chicken was super tasty! Tender and juicy!
Naan was a bit oily can see the oil on them  but taste was good
The place not new but it’s clean and well kept
Free parking in front of the restaurant
We went on a Saturday evening it wasn’t busy","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOngNpakrpCU9lE8Jnhi169dYin4_pfyngASOhX&fid=0x0:0xaa8e4af36f7afe06"],"When":"2024-7-11"},{"Name":"Naser","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0-YQ8zU5RxMjX7Szhrzpzf3k8mT3TPmCIoVpC7Yu8SS5YsZfI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We tried here on weekend.
I liked their Zaika grill.
I asked for medium spicy but still a little too much for me, but my daughter liked it. So it depends  😊

I also liked their garlic and potato Naan but had better ones at other Indian restaurants.
In general l liked it but cant give a five star comparing other Indian restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkICAFxvo2a3UdGR_gujmjVKYeLqDdkZF2xbdK&fid=0x0:0xaa8e4af36f7afe06"],"When":"2023-4-3"},{"Name":"D L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKhLImqrHTCGIXoFB4QEyr6EtuDMQdMBNlk7VTCBFhqqz4PtQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Tried this place the other day.  Decent food even though portions are a tad small.   The place needs a reno or something though.   Half seemed closed off and not ready for business,  and they had to turn on lights when we came in.   Not really any decor either.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"JR","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVKZKvgEPjAseb-WsTOz6PNSLNr0d7N3-5NKC3mCdy_klfyim5=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Go to Maple Leaf for the same tasting food but better value by 100x. Dined in with a big group as a work party last week and thought it was great. My takeout order tonight was a scam. Thanks for a few crumbles of meat in my butter chicken and 2 prawns in my vindaloo. My friends and I are so full! And their ‘3 pieces’ per order of naan is 3/4 of one at most other places around here.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ron Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4C9fuu3Pgu102q3bAxHKivkiOQqwqKjJditkVdy4zIZ628gCE7g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"the naan bread here is phenomenal, it is very light and crispy.  there coconut fish curry is awesome too.  overall quality of food here is excellent, better than most places around town.  service was attentive staff was great.  cleaneness of the restaurant is top notch too.  water jugs were covered, everything was clean, water was cold which most places dont provide.  also there chicken wings are so crispy, must try!!

only request I would like to make is to add butter chicken to your lunch buffet lineup, also to turn on the tray warmers to keep the food hot.

will definitely come back and try other stuff and if you can let me know that you added butter chicken to your lunch buffet, I will come back and try it right away.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPkhSukGH0rjwOnmw1HPBDei-8ZKsWF7e5e-jVY&fid=0x0:0xaa8e4af36f7afe06"],"When":"2019-10-23"},{"Name":"Vasisht Raghavendra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJJdqlfXhrv4xWlObHOUik-BEmjW2vxVvFad9PSosG433WUa8GN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Only customers at the restaurant. The restaurant seemed dark and has no windows but the good food made up for this.

Easter Day dinner:
Chicken Tandoori 🍗
Garlic Naan 🫓
Paneer Methi Malai 😋
Saffron Rice 🍚
Lassi 🥛

The food was delicious and sufficient.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7nkpTrUyj4v2mbx-wMcipy5vqxf-X0REGSVnU&fid=0x0:0xaa8e4af36f7afe06"],"When":"2023-4-12"},{"Name":"Sazzad Hossain","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK5JzPg_HbQTCfL-RL2N4qcAmAyjkRuMRE7Ps-o51NovewMwA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ordered Lamb Biriyani, Lamb Rogan Josh and Fish Pakura. All the items were really tasty. Highly recommended for the people looking for Halal options in Maple Ridge area in BC. Only Lamb is the halal meat they offer.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPcV2XFN_Qkdu5sMV55TqaHPwSScMUF-7SNCM-n&fid=0x0:0xaa8e4af36f7afe06"],"When":"2022-6-18"},{"Name":"S Hakimi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV_mvQPAHA_s1zbUyQEvtTu2ZAXWBRTh_r11OfqKURKSyvFvSVu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Order three vegetables Pakoras for an Iftari event, it was so embarrassing they were all bitter and burned. The day after I went in person at first the front desk agreed to give three meals proper Pakoras. I asked I got that for an event I don’t need that much Pakora she was rude and said can only give me one meal of Pakora I refused and told her I am going to write an review she was it’s ok do whatever you want to!

Zero honesty in business, attitude, and food quality is really bad I wouldn’t bother going again. And not suggesting to anyone.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNvlzWx-40c8XkJGPrISyBXGfmaDIciv39qcVa5&fid=0x0:0xaa8e4af36f7afe06"],"When":"2023-4-11"}]

descriptions: Easygoing joint serving all the Japanese classics, from sushi & sashimi to teriyaki & bento.

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Claudia Amaya","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX12djr0_Y8bEf6N8cNb1tqOObfsJozSff3Ep2mfyThDWLwyBLw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best sushi in the lower mainland. Highly recommended. Staff are always great and friendly. Christine and Jennifer are amazing. The quality of the food is superb, you won’t be disappointed!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPrMwuXW9f_fW0XktUobGyP6rp8F5mikhlcIEdo\u0026fid=0x0:0xd638f7427ec7a285"],"When":"2024-10-25"},{"Name":"Yvonne W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUnlT5aFvoCFVCaIdG7Esr5bPrredov3mfrrZ5ZyWoi0nZ0gQcj0g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is my favorite comfy meal all the time from Shinobi.  For 16 dollars-ish, you can get a variety of food in big portion. I cannot think of any other place in the Lower Mainland that can beat this price! Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIIQjHvd5KxQADpRvTyAeJizonVNTVP0tGcvBo\u0026fid=0x0:0xd638f7427ec7a285"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"Tammie Barker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIXxI2bXd-3sND1oFIskvMVhbpiWnyCfjF3YU_4kqx8norU2g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered a teriyaki chicken lunch box to go. The portions were good and the food was delicious!  I will definitely be ordering from Shinobi Downtown again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPyUO7bctF6H7ZruH5S-6COzmV-tYesIMADp00g\u0026fid=0x0:0xd638f7427ec7a285"],"When":"2024-10-18"},{"Name":"Jessica Clark-Roesch","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDV5_0TU2jFjH8aZU9TGAOogV1cB5enHy4mAkM9us0VcJlObKj=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I come here a few times a week because of Christine , Jennifer and the quality of the food!!!! I cannot say enough good things about their customer service and how well these ladies take care of me as a customer ! This place is superior to the rest of the Sushi businesses in town and surrounding areas! Not only do you get treated with the best customer service but the price of the food is incredible and actual food is amazing, always fresh, delicious and looks very appealing. I am never disappointed and refuse to go anywhere else. Even if I have to drive from home in Abby to grab some lunch or dinner! Its worth every penny and mile!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bill Wilson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrLDUKCB9KhwKlqIkCcXUiASMuWECjsxURVB66vsZhnoGGXEJCJQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"First trip in since the fire. Much the same as it was, but all booths now. No padded seating so not too comfortable. Music too quiet to blend in with the noise and conversations so not helpful in creating an atmosphere. Was hoping they would have added cushions. Take out is better organization and u have seating to wait for order, no more going to the back and lingering. Food still good! 😊 Recommend👍","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Fiorella Vallejo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW1SnfWM9cmXxEh39oA3RY-NSjUql11rlkIUXcbtqnf0ItMOAys=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My family’s favourite restaurant in downtown Maple Ridge! The food is delicious, we always get the caterpillar roll, maple ridge rolls, and chicken teriyaki a la carte. Christine and all the servers are very attentive and lovely!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMrW1IRrxRL9lGqDvY6T8p-DuyH_8CNET0s5wQE\u0026fid=0x0:0xd638f7427ec7a285"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"Marcos Garcia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrIx99K0w17o1_jz1_EhQur2HjhBKK7Idj_Dw1mjT3aruNUbguXA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food and atmosphere. I was happy to finally be in a Japanese restaurant with Japanese music instead of american pop.\nEverything was amazing, but I really wish they stopped using plastic cups. I know this is very common amongst oriental restaurants, but it has to stop. It makes me think less of the food been served, although food quality is impeccable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNKFL_BsgxaR9ddA8Q-1A-_EGID8RLZWZCQtxn3\u0026fid=0x0:0xd638f7427ec7a285"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"angelique switzer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPKWLQEEaqOlrXt9kl-Pif0-MHsDLg7BtCU_bRXCTCmazrOpJw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been coming to this location for 10 years. It's the best sushi outside of Vancouver!!! Quality fish and very fresh","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNgykLzn8WO__BMwhny0yMcytV4K7YGx9cz_v5J\u0026fid=0x0:0xd638f7427ec7a285"],"When":"2024-11-4"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Tyler Mcdonald","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLDyXiT_Zvl0Oxe-jS7KuCSrfeNZyYTwLFMfWHpajzgmef2nA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"my chicken sandwich was raw, it was also a pretty thin patty. also compared to other fast food it took a really long time to get my food; this was my first and last time dining here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM-u0NyJU73r3uALXJdk_YadatuJ-7D10Eiu9en&fid=0x0:0xc2c38f8b525f398c"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"Ley Anne gonzales","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVGdf7E96fuZkSJQP1KznUaKO4_hvMb2VQMM0Up7KjejwN9tbKY0g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I thought the management should know... i hope they can read this. First i love the idea of one dollar wings this is the only place my family can buy it from
Sorry but I left the restaurant sad lost my appetite, good i bought fries to eat.
My spicy chicken was raw like pink meat? I compared it to the regular one i ordered i was confused. I don't know if their yellow light or what i don't know I had to look to the outside light and yeap its pink raw Chicken. We love spicy but never seen spicy ones that pink. I got replacement but it is still pink. I was worried my child is eating raw too. I heard the crew call for spicy chicken so i thought they had bunch of spicy chicken order. Hope they check  how they cook maybe they cook too much in one batch to make it looks cooks but still pink in the inside. I got. I got new and yes still hot but its still pink. So sad my favorite chicken is like that 😔 .  i used to work at restaurants but never have I ordered or got raw chicken. Please check the quality. Thanks
Thank you for the lady crew who replaced my Chicken but please check with kitchen. Thank you.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Darin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXLaHGI3oYmAo2BDSwe3R6hi9l2mLBnerv2dA89VquAGyGJqQLWIA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Just ate for the first time at Churches Chicken on 240th and Dewdney Truck Road in Maple Ridge.

Front staff were just ok, no smiles and seemed like they'd rather be somewhere else.
No music, dirty tables that you could tell had been cleared by the customers but never wiped.
Bathroom also dirty with a layer of dust.

Most shockingly the young fella cooking wasn't wearing a hair net, had pretty long bangs and in fact kept brushing his long bangs whilst handling food.

I hope the owner sees this and takes immediate steps before Health Canada gets involved.

No excuse

Chicken was quite Good, super hot and fresh.

Pity no one cares

D. Williamson","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Eric Cheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWOyg3d6oaJTu5sdvuUVJNteYVGj_1LBSkeQ_4988ARhRbaxE43Ew=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is ticking! But stellar customer service and fantastic food as advertised. I came in with a coupon order that they weren't doing. But the staff alerted me that they would still try to fulfill it, but would be delayed. The food was amazing! Everyone loved it. Super hot, super fresh, super crunchy. Nothing sits on the stand for very long. Staff were super friendly and knowledgeable and great with customers. Kudos to the Friday night crew on the long weekend for a fantastic job. Thanks for making my family night a blast!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMVUA_xx3LScRfS6gc8TGgH5FpEQzqn_ucEBrg3&fid=0x0:0xc2c38f8b525f398c"],"When":"2022-7-30"},{"Name":"Zachary Fowler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXx5Qx9-CdiURNbNqlXMHoMdayeUaXhcA2dxUwsJ-cqE4vB1VM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Staff seems to care.  Either your order will be cold, the wrong items, or not even the advertised item. Had a chicken sandwich that was just a bunch of dark meat someone smashed together hoping nobody would notice. Not an improvement of last time when the food was served cold. Save your money and eat elsewhere","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Adam Carich","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0azVMhRvFNcNxf8zv4UZjhJtDNUZEYm4keHKEhFQPW2uPwkWE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is great I love the classic chicken sandwich. Definitely one of the better places in Maple Ridge for food. The staff are nice the only issue I've had was they sometimes take a long time to answer the phone. I work nearby so it's inconvenient if I have to wait for half my break. But other than that I have never had an issue.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"OblivAeon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBhAx1DfP-o36Si0salWH0937bvwUUbpkb4-TMxPX_ZBg-3BZ4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"i was a religious visitor of churches as they were my go to local. my favorite item was the mexicana burger but one day they started using patties about 1/4 the size. i pointed this out to the staff thinking it was an oversight but they informed me that this was the new standard from corporate. it was the smallest patty you've ever seen.
on another occasion my wife odered coleslaw and they gave us potato salad. after notifying them of the mistake, the employee denied that we were holding potato salad and then informed us that they do not serve potato salad. after some back and forth, the story changed to they do have potato salad but it was expired so they are sending it back to the warehouse.
needless to say i no longer visit","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"ZJ SZ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocImelomVOqjph0wobI2yfq3okXOzO5WwuIBvLNLk5J4dBA_vg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Arrived home at around 10pm last night to find someone’s huge order mistakenly delivered to my doorstep, no names or addresses to be found so I kept it. 10/10 free food would eat again. If this was meant for you I hope you got comped a new order.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNV2wsbgcWkEWFc3WVsNG8gRkyoA1Kdtab2PX48&fid=0x0:0xc2c38f8b525f398c"],"When":"2023-8-19"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Stevie Rett","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ2nKpDs7PgS5EG7UW_ZqKWJzKAdwmF5eC7QtCaqUktoeRQYdU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I love triple Os but this location is ridiculous. I don’t know who’s responsible, the people doing the training or the employees who obviously don’t care. They can’t follow a simple instruction like “no pickles” (every time it’s an issue) but honestly the worst part is they forgot the bacon on my BACON cheese burger, on two separate occasions! It’s in the name for god sakes🙄","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kartik Salhan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJww-FQG7Bsz95pY7jcu0tOgmQd9iK30eo88vuBfQermY9Sd_e=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I used to order blueberry milkshake  regularly and the same girl used to serve me. Today i bought the blueberry milkshake and she give it to me without whipped topping and when i asked her there no whip topping she put it on later . I find out they need to make new whipped topping that why she lied to me that customer need to ask for whipped topping . You guys cab simply tell customers that you need time to make whipped topping. why you guys lie to customers.Moreover there was a guy who also like commenting on the situation going on there when i was ordering and asking about my order.Totally bad atmosphere and environment. I will not visit this store again. This happen on 7 july in evening.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ryan Rostek","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVQe40q7Wur_usX04S6pQo3DreBq84ohETVy1iJzLxXgMgV5g4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I used to really enjoy Triple-O's but the last 3 visits have left me consistently unimpressed. $50+ for soggy/mealy fries, squished bun, meat almost not cooked enough, no napkins, only ketchup packets... Milkshake was good so props on that (extra star).  But no response at the till to make it right. Not sure if it's worth trying again. Staff was friendly, but seemed like they couldn't help (above their pay grade)?","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jennifer Geddes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXIz1j9l35iGYA-X1VDy-lA_E-guSZ_nayTsKYX4PRtkwcT2pVT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It's my favourite fast food place, but is also the most expensive one in town. Milkshakes are now $8. The food here is definitely worth it though as finances permit. I pay for it by asking my family and friends for White Spot gift cards for my birthday and Christmas, and because my birthday is in June, I'm restocked every 6 months on the regular. 😁","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ajit Maski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXauawzCJKc5VNC4Q6leqYR31T4qploKeu9pbZ7l6UmQQITkisR4w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you're on the hunt for some of the juiciest burgers and crispiest fries in town, look no further than Triple O's! This spot lives up to its reputation with a menu packed with delicious options that cater to all tastes. From the moment you bite into one of their signature burgers, it's clear that quality is king. The patties are always cooked to perfection—juicy and flavorful, paired with fresh, crisp lettuce, ripe tomatoes, and their iconic Triple \"O\" sauce which is absolutely to die for.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rick Cameron","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLQ8Zk9P-xwSsMN8m4oOVRyZZwIvLqEoHFj3QkUJap545wTEg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Fries undercooked. Most seating is taken by lottery players. Nowhere to sit \u0026 eat.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Basil Thomas Thubel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUjzZ7ZduGkrtTbUmxawUvIGvEWBIQaiKC-yREvVfpe-K2mSg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I have reached triple o at 10.00 pm on November1 where closing time say 11pm, and staff say it closed, Next time try to update time.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"DM Fraser","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK-wG-ASFdHmC1HDLf8aM2Tzzq6Co6WuDqHW-pcAvPzmjgs9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It is a normal Triple O location. Excellent food. Burgers equal to the best anywhere. Especially the Monty Mushroom Burger. I used to live in LA and ate at In-N-Out many times. Triple O is better.\nNot the fastest drive through service but still acceptable.  I have been to slower Triple-O locations.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kaylyn G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWrj08DEN2faDsAoqK5q03bYZ863KHvOntAZi-91fYE9J8e94E=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Each and every visit I’ve had at Vanilla Bean has been delicious. From the lattes to the cupcakes and seasonal delights Vanilla Bean crafts the most tasty morsels. Looking forward to ordering a birthday cake in the near future!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNaByI1M3OK5V6D0VPe-fQWgW9oLYebr8ghaSAh&fid=0x0:0xa07ef7e7a06fb4fd"],"When":"2024-11-5"},{"Name":"Melanie Sia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_uRz_gX9bXrus0cIflXojI71ZjvU7thmxsdkuuOTqIHZ0OZbb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Tried their holiday tea service and the quality doesn't seem to reflect the price point of $50.00/pp. I'll break this down into what wasn't great, and how it could potentially improve as I do want to see this small business succeed.

FOOD
The sandwiches that used sliced bread were a little dry. Fillings were okay, and you get a solid variety of five savoury items on your three-tiered platter. The weakest item was the stuffing bite--I'm pretty sure this was made with Stove Top stuffing (which is fine, it's a neat concept) but it was super dry. This needs something, like gravy or cranberry preserves, or a different binding agent to hold in more moisture (like a combination of egg and a fat, like butter).

Your second tier are the scones. No complaints here--they were fine but I'd recommend upgrading the whipped cream to a Devonshire or clotted cream. You get two of the same scone but I think you could switch out one plain scone for a variation, such as a flavoured scone.

The top tier was the dessert tier and there was a significant difference in quality between some of the desserts. The strongest was the macaron--definitely professionally made and packed with flavour, and the technical execution of it was perfect. The weakest dessert was the gingerbread cookie--very lacking in flavour and very dry, and a missed opportunity to elevate the visual appeal by using frosting or nonpareils to decorate it. The cupcake was also a bit disappointing--I expected a Swiss or Italian buttercream as the icing was fairly heavy (like an American buttercream).

The tea itself was perfect--loose leaf tea brewed in a pot. Big plus here; the quality itself for the cream Earl Grey was very good.

AMBIENCE
This cafe is located in a mall with lots of free (!!) parking, but there's heavy emphasis on visuals and making things look good. It's appealing to walk into but the benches inside aren't comfortable.

SERVICE
It was okay--pretty average for North America.

One thing to note was that when I made the initial booking, I did reach out about dietary restrictions--and the owner responded directly, which was quite nice. They can make reasonable accommodations for special dietary needs, which is nice.

SUMMARY
At $50.00/pp, my initial expectation was that this was competing against other team rooms at a similar price point such as The Secret Garden in Kerrisdale, or Tsujiri in Richmond. It's not going to match those at the current food quality level, but I think that it can be improved on. Alternatively, you can offer a more reasonable price for the tea service itself (and taking that this is located in Maple Ridge) would be in the $35-40 range but no more than that, especially if you don't have immediate plans to change the recipes of your present food items.

However I do strongly recommend that food quality is improved upon as it seems that several shortcuts have been taken--dining out is expensive, and I think most people (especially Millennial customers who are starting to move eastward) expect the quality to be better than what they could potentially make at home. I think I would give this place another try if the food quality improves significantly to match the current price point.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPsHzc-QdzqiGyey1qDr2V-1M5vY1eFTjzLWwSj&fid=0x0:0xa07ef7e7a06fb4fd"],"When":"2024-12-21"},{"Name":"Ashley Crawford","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJlusnkEzMHg99tCMVWcCqAWCXuoG9kym1NcYh5okU4omhY4g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best bakery in town hands down! Super fun and creative pastries that taste even better than they look! If you haven’t been to the Vanilla Bean I highly recommend!!! The carrot cake Muffin is my current fav 🤤","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJ7S0V1XLTaI4EsNSC3LRUsfkGq9jvMjC_-Rom&fid=0x0:0xa07ef7e7a06fb4fd"],"When":"2024-11-1"},{"Name":"Sue H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXv8fMVwoiTdgNQMqHEeej_SpzAtIEi6_D271bwpksyMa2WV5np=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My friend and I had a great time here. This cute and cozy place brightens up the Haney mall. I hope we have more places like this around downtown Maple Ridge. The red velvet and carrot cupcakes tasted scrumptious and also healthy. Coffee was not hot enough for me so I will specifically request to make it warmer next time. All the staff were kind, friendly and courteous to make our stay more pleasant and comfortable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMRKDxjukjxtGE7IfKruf0ZTSrYvc839QMGHxyL&fid=0x0:0xa07ef7e7a06fb4fd"],"When":"2024-3-26"},{"Name":"Hailey Hansen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKH_GNyhBcpy4zrDahm5JuKQ4fxPjTc48CbCtC9W0v6GY7qXw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I cannot praise this place enough. The MOST delicious and beautiful cupcakes I’ve ever had in my life. The chocolate and carrot cake ones…. Just wow. Support this small business, she has some serious talent!!!! Can’t wait to try everything on the menu!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3BJS0KP4Mufc41IzzLc70CCI9P3nV2uAMgkUM&fid=0x0:0xa07ef7e7a06fb4fd"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"Jasmine K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJx2srZuvOQM3CjjzbG7AmqD5Fm141znk0_tlUteybvSPquQQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We hired Vanilla Bean Bake Shop for our wedding on August 15, 2024 and Taylor was such a pleasure to work with! She was responsive, organized, and I just knew that I could trust her to make the perfect cake and cupcakes for my wedding day! My husband and I are huge Vancouver Canucks fans and Taylor blew us away with what she created for us.
So many of our guests couldn't stop talking about how delicious the cupcakes were, I wish I could of had one but I can confirm that the cake was delicious!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP7_rylf9Ru758O85VKKaZ2IIEiOC_9Z_8v1LlE&fid=0x0:0xa07ef7e7a06fb4fd"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"Jessica Marte","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVdRoVuW9I1JeIPg6X0RUOd-ztFRldBphjPMqcRs6Fs1HqrufHj=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We went for high tea and everything was divine and delicious. We didn’t realized when we booked that they had changed the menu to be Valentine’s Day themed—it was a happy surprise and each one of us got a rose to take home.

Everything was flavourful yet well-balanced. And THE SCONES were amazing. Scones have a new (and extremely high) standard in my book. I may never be able to enjoy a scone from anywhere else again.

The teas were all so lovely, and exciting—I wanted to try all of them! Our hostess suggested we order one different tea each as each person gets their own mini tea pot and then we could all try each other’s tea. It was a perfect idea!

The atmosphere is great because you can be/dress as fancy or as casual as you want but still feel elegant and totally welcome.

100% will be going again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9Ss_kGAgBmn4-KAk5X8d3XaGVo0UyLDCPSBV8&fid=0x0:0xa07ef7e7a06fb4fd"],"When":"2024-2-12"},{"Name":"Vanessa Murray","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ3xDCn1DzJDuM_FHj6G9uj1eyT8S9rXqaWxFGOBdk9mwgq-A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Vanilla Bean Bakeshop handled the desserts for our wedding and they did a great job! Our consultation was excellent and we were provided with several options and flavour combinations to choose from, as well as different price points. We chose to have a small cake for our head table, in addition to cupcakes and macarons for our guests. They were always quick to follow up on any questions we had, and they did a great job on the design we wanted for our cake. We wouldn't hesitate to recommend them to anyone for any baking needs!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4BFOPZt1XPbstYdBfNInhgtViwmRmEVkbuHlw&fid=0x0:0xa07ef7e7a06fb4fd"],"When":"2024-5-11"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Don Harvey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKYW5Dd5AR1w--5zb27oXskPwnPBYzWCeiaPibSnl0gkK80dg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We pre-ordered and prepayed for the Italian meatballs. $42. I went at the designated pick up time. They were to be a big part of our family gathering. I was told to come back in 30 minutes. Got them. They were cold and weighted about half a pound. Go to ikea....","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMaeNDiitiIH4-39CM1aL_KGtNO4e_SaNsvsh99\u0026fid=0x0:0xcaddb40bcc70519d"],"When":"2024-12-21"},{"Name":"Tracy L Last","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ38Cu0Ieij8mOpHtzR8lkJfIZMeXwsqQPTIoyMuZiP-SX_Gg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"All cut up and half eaten. It’s that good. Had to stop and give a five star review. Super delicious and reasonably priced. Just take home and heat which was so simple. Old school style bakery with store and freezer section. Cake display like none other. Cherry cheesecake was amazing for dessert. Hubby and I are both in agreement: ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOjkGx-w9gyDp_NrwegU4xSRpz8GmdhK2d28_2e\u0026fid=0x0:0xcaddb40bcc70519d"],"When":"2024-4-7"},{"Name":"Fairuza Punjani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKE0Tj4kpb-Ilgad96L5WsELwxo8ZDYLPrs44CMe5qBhIfcAQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cream horn cake was super delicious! Must definitely try if you haven't already! Layers of custard and cream with pastry and cream horns on top. AMAZING!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOuYe2FtwpNX98pwcW6pxqmGKfEOduoPVxJ4PWb\u0026fid=0x0:0xcaddb40bcc70519d"],"When":"2024-6-6"},{"Name":"Ben Rogers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVtnzRv60cviP_9OuJIIU1qkuhSbqn-p2y4KUjHqNkJZr9VFSQD8Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been on a quest to recreate the AMAZING Florence (Italy) sandwich that I got when traveling (name of restaurant - All’Antico Vinaio). I've visited many Italian shops in Vancouver to try to make the sandwich I've loved. This was the CLOSEST to the sandwich I've gotten so far! Absolutely amazing. I ordered the \"Forget About It\" sandwich, which was a delicious combination! The bread was outstanding, the house sauce was brilliant! Also really enjoyed the pickled peppers. Not only that, but the espresso was the HANDS DOWN BEST ESPRESSO I've had in North America. It was full-bodied and chocolatey, but still tasted so good! Highly recommended going here. You can't go wrong! Also, great shop with lots of baked goods, fresh and delicious options!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5Q0CBAEC80iyEqNqop_vscNfHSsbCi4UKZGV3\u0026fid=0x0:0xcaddb40bcc70519d"],"When":"2021-6-6"},{"Name":"jenny","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMDNH73B45edbJ-7F4SvngcK2zjK2JiHx8MJO6rHWM7lSkol_x=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best bakery in town. Their fresh hot sandwiches are amazing (pesto sandwich pictured with extra pesto) and their desserts are decadent. Not to mention the selection of meats, cheeses, pantry goods and take home ready to eat meals 💗","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0IcfA6Cy6jUElsFXuv3nEtcMItxL_FiVyHGrx\u0026fid=0x0:0xcaddb40bcc70519d"],"When":"2022-11-1"},{"Name":"kristalynnmcc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQeIDPi2Hja0NIoIW4zWtFLrr1wDCr58rxxOUlonTAf_SIxg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hands down the best sandwich I have ever had! I tried Capri out last week and have ordered it three more times since I think it might actually become an issue. I get the forgetaboutit sandwich with prosciutto, spicy salami, provolone arugula. It is so good, made on the freshest, crispy on the outside soft on the inside ciabatta. Their pastries are also delicious and fresh.  Highly recommend 👌","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPXQyVB9DZVwa8KhOkUwRmKSp2KKY3v_FR3NmM-\u0026fid=0x0:0xcaddb40bcc70519d"],"When":"2023-6-13"},{"Name":"Jared Reid","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX9XqxQyuS22MBgqSaeJ0OxhavdghyqCoZY6yUveGC32EMsSkiI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I can't find a better sandwich in Maple Ridge or the surrounding towns. So delicious and well made. Lots of great pastries and coffees as well... Not just an Italian grocery store.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Stephanie Henderson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIvd6TE41ofXSIQsVETEKQwe90URxDLRLP3ccyJkWtaimnS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute little Italian bistro, bakery and grocery store!\nThe sandwiches are absolutely amazing, we ordered the chicken pesto and the forget about it.\nLove that we can get speciality items close to home for a good price! Love the FRESH HOMEMADE PASTA, cakes \u0026 absolutely love all the baked goods! YUM!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_TKS8d2tVc0TSH6D8UYKSPMvkIwn2UgO2lOo\u0026fid=0x0:0xcaddb40bcc70519d"],"When":"2021-3-13"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Maddie Cruz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLYQL8qAGmTqshoOvCaBdSsq6642zngm2cAUSDTjLzVVtrLpg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This family owned business offered a variety of delicious foods to choose from. Each one were super tasty and I love that they can customize too based to your preference or remove ingredients that will cause allergies. There are many vegan/vegetarian options. The servers and the owner were very attentive to our needs and came to often us ask if we need anything else.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNLndGC3GHhppjePZ5bsHgfypqV-1J8mP1GoutX&fid=0x0:0x5d2de521def31059"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Mitsuba","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPTokkJ7B-7PXzC1asSVZYKNDX01MAmrvmPdKoBlxIra8E3U0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I came here for lunch with my friend. And ordered the butter chicken lunch special.

I usually do not eat such cuisines. However the food was made with heart and very authentic. It had flavors I did not taste before. And I enjoyed it greatly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOP6ye1gyjFbkwpJjBB2DQcuAO5R61wbXZB-wqy&fid=0x0:0x5d2de521def31059"],"When":"2024-8-31"},{"Name":"Tracy L Last","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ38Cu0Ieij8mOpHtzR8lkJfIZMeXwsqQPTIoyMuZiP-SX_Gg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"GM is always great food! For my birthday my husband said order from anywhere so I chose this. I also spoiled us with getting double of what we usually do. Taking time to read all the descriptions. Everything we ordered was absolute deliciousness.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNip6Et0N9sBmAHpgoL1Xz0LAcFQU2wII7JNtcm&fid=0x0:0x5d2de521def31059"],"When":"2024-5-15"},{"Name":"Ryan Blight","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbpH73lI2xtK9WJxadw5s8Ist4ItI3NEBYZImc9aopB1Hhs9lf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"First time at GM. We ordered a veg platter and a meat platter, and finished off with a slice of salted caramel cheesecake. Food was delicious, but lacking one star due to ordering a 5/10 spice level and the food was definitely lacking spice.
Overall good experience and friendly service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMOxldDBLIOnjCpUtt4AhbxsCu_TWic2FxZ8d4E&fid=0x0:0x5d2de521def31059"],"When":"2024-2-16"},{"Name":"Annie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJAG4UtHNdn-C74S5I053c9lMdRMdh_AH35u090AgjHoFmF2GSW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am not the biggest cheesecake lover but kept hearing great reviews about the cheesecake at GM so I finally went to try. The cheesecake was absolutely delicious. The texture and flavours were perfect. 1 slice is $10 and a whole cheesecake is $65. The lovely and friendly owner said that with 24-48 hrs notice they can fill your custom flavor order. We will definitely be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3JUPV3ePj8FKBEXmBUjWRO3l_-1iS54YfLSrF&fid=0x0:0x5d2de521def31059"],"When":"2023-5-26"},{"Name":"Laura Elizabeth","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYZmTmHFFXOkGtfdW2Ry40xOSRalp27hpu_nLOavLst35yPmg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Today was my husband’s birthday and by the time dinner rolled around I was too tired to cook (throwing 3 parties in a month is fun but exhausting) so I decided to order out. My daughter has severe allergies and so I called GM and asked about some dairy AND coconut free dishes. With a solid option in hand I looked on the DoorDash menu and couldn’t find it. So I chose something that sounded allergen free and left a note. When my food arrived everything was  there but they had also included a free dairy/coconut free dish for my daughter that was unexpected, delicious and the random act of kindness my heart needed. Thanks GM for going out of your way to bless our family and gift my daughter with food options - it can be hard as a 7 year old to constantly hear “sorry, you can’t have that.”

Not pictured is the garlic naan bread - so delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfzohkWzevQtdqmGpaHJk-7AY0p5daZkiSshoR&fid=0x0:0x5d2de521def31059"],"When":"2024-6-9"},{"Name":"Phil Rumming","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJI8F-4PSRI8O1IIK_Whhw86Nv8AmAOyTVmk8Hdizbg38WBDQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent food and service. I had Butter Chicken (a large serving, enough for 2 at least) along with naan bread and basmati rice: all were very good with an Indian Kingfisher beer. This was followed by an slice (huge!) of delicious eggnog cheese cake and an 'Indian' coffee. They have a large variety of cheese cake flavors to choose from.   Looking forward to future visits.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mike F","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXniLjCJHKt8Gj17xGqax1pu33ZsNusLLpEEFXEep3h7_9bcNk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I already know this will go against the grain since this place has always been very good and very popular as well as very expensive. Recently we ordered take out from there, typically butter chicken, naan bread and rice. We also ordered one samosa of each flavour. I’m not sure what happened to our food but it was the worse, least tasting butter chicken I had ever had, actually despicable. You spend a fortune on a meal thinking you’re paying a little more but never expecting to get the tasteless slop we ended up with, never again. On the other hand, the samosas were on point!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Alex","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVxP-ADvohB6hXpEbci04qD4fdlJ8qjEvYJvIIZqjiOIuWU9BVM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve never had Korean fried chicken before and I kept hearing that this was the place to go. Words can’t describe how impressed I was but I’ll give it a shot.

The restaurant was clean and spacious and very well organized. There was only one person working (I’m assuming the owner) and he was very friendly and attentive. He also brought us a couple of glasses of water even though we did not ask for any which was very nice.

We decided to try 2 half orders of boneless chicken. One of their signature seasoned chicken and the other was the garlic pepper chicken. At $16.50 for a half order I have to say that they were massive portions! The chicken was boneless thigh meat in an insanely crunchy breading and tossed in these delicious, sweet and spicy sticky sauces. We managed to eat half of both and packed up the rest.

The chicken was hot, juicy, and stayed crunchy even after sitting in the sauce for a bit. This place is seriously amazing and I would recommend this to anyone. Can’t wait to come back and try their different flavours! I read in some reviews that the cream and onion flavour is good so will most likely try that one!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_-4XpVXwS4tuiPw6wDS5_y5bBOxBRywq3CB-z&fid=0x0:0x5a3b1015c27fd198"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Jessameen Dela Peña","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX9mRpmL8-ZJUG7UPFcnsjzRdxjABif-MswbO1rxgJyyWfns8Jd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"If you're a fan of Korean fried chicken, this place is a must-visit! I opted for the cream onion flavor, and it was absolutely delicious. Just a tip: if you're short on time, it's best to order ahead. Despite calling in advance, we still had to wait an additional 15 minutes upon arrival.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDLVd5vGEFwAwdybRijl7rs9DyaZuw9XPlJ74R&fid=0x0:0x5a3b1015c27fd198"],"When":"2024-6-13"},{"Name":"Joshua (ThickBurger_Bites)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbIhhMlbxk7OIMpcaP-aSx2m75kt8-mqmXoXAJQ5K99gnxiff1zg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Delicious fried chicken. Slightly pricy but worth a visit.

Service is good, staff come round filling water/tea every so often without having to call them over.

We had the soy chicken, spicy and original chicken and they were all delicious. A perfectly battered and crunchy fried chicken.

I’d highly recommend coming with friends to share different platter flavours.

Parking is a slight pain given how limited street parking is in this busy downtown maple ridge area.

Great place. Highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXdqRqFugRFsjSIar-OrOFg9YSYS3BANxLtdar&fid=0x0:0x5a3b1015c27fd198"],"When":"2021-12-26"},{"Name":"MB","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIefn3FTp9aV_tkLEMerRsiSn9abrY5dqOppBPJehNZyaGMiA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered the garlic and spicy pepper and the Honey chicken. They were both amazing! Great portions, we will definitely be back and highly recommend them if you’re wanting Korean fried chicken.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvBzA7dB5WU4vdi-h7GyCGuFA1fhuSxSZTNOfu&fid=0x0:0x5a3b1015c27fd198"],"When":"2024-2-7"},{"Name":"What did Dada buy Today!","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU7GTyMhR08A6awgaZC75A11vjN-sR6OzhegVertGwB80jthNLK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was delicious 😋  excessive wait time however he was working alone so that's understandable. He did open 10 minutes early for us which was extremely kind. I will be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPdSi3lCKQgXgN3RIgT3BeDbZtbh41YkuS-2QJN&fid=0x0:0x5a3b1015c27fd198"],"When":"2024-4-19"},{"Name":"Mahsa Abtahi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVzZdwC4FLiBEJuimDmJEsrIg9RPx_6E61CBkExvji0Lr8i8fNl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great fried chicken! Perfectly crispy and not greasy at all. We got the half order of original boneless chicken and the portion was big and good for two people.
The best fried chicken I've had in a very long time.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Duke Pufus","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWukW7L6iD7Fsj98lKPEw1hzjJ0B-rpWvm75WLGKOM6jjGxeeRp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered pick up, half boneless soy, half boneless honey with an order of fries. No complaints at all, excellent.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfmuSnNKgRyuaboSV8knt3Kvt-4gSwI6r6C-QZ&fid=0x0:0x5a3b1015c27fd198"],"When":"2024-8-17"},{"Name":"Em Sm","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVlvVFz7AHLmpCOuf_XMefZGhUTofAT-w3GkZDB3K6y9G__d1JL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is one of the best Korean Fried Chicken in the area. We've eaten in and done take out a few times, after all there is nothing like grabbing it to go and then going to a local brewery. Our go to's are the spicy mayo chicken, honey chicken, and garlic & pepper. Service is always friendly and the only thing I wish is that there was a parking lot instead of just street parking as it fills up quick.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO4wOA9AZsNdcaAHlSUDtDacmbGg3YwKHaGGfPc&fid=0x0:0x5a3b1015c27fd198"],"When":"2023-8-5"}]
