user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Alex","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVxP-ADvohB6hXpEbci04qD4fdlJ8qjEvYJvIIZqjiOIuWU9BVM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just wow! I consider myself a pizza connoisseur so here are my thoughts.

At $24.99, this is their large House Special. 7 toppings plus I added an additional 2 at $3 a piece. This is their normal cheese portion, I did not add extra. For what you get I consider this to be very good bang for your buck, especially these days.

Toppings are high quality and plentiful. Rather than the round, sausage like bacon pebbles most pizza places use, they actually use real crumbled bacon which I don’t see a lot of unless I’m at a higher end pizza place. The crust is perfectly crispy on the bottom/edges and light and airy on the inside. They even boast that they have “the best crust ever”

What’s more important to note is that after eating half a large pizza, it actually sat very light. I actually felt GOOD after eating this and not gassy or bloated/ heartburn etc (anyone pushing 40 knows what I’m talking about I’m sure😂)

Store was clean. Service was great. 9/10","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPsYdQZyDB_Ci7xCXRluB9LZj_Bvi2HOY06MKg0&fid=0x0:0xd880286c53ef560d"],"When":"2024-6-9"},{"Name":"Sarah Sun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIS4kxxg3eoIDesJDI4dnOObZnXngPnZams8NTEkCB6TuqoGQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best pizza ever!
Once I’ve visited my friends house we always order from show me the pizza and this place have the best pizza!!!!! The owener and servers were always kind and friendly. Their topings are plenty and dough is not that thin or thick! Just perfect amount! I saw how they make the pizza while i was waiting mine, they put plenty of cheese on the top literary they make mountain!! I would recommend this place! Who ever didnt try yet please please try it! We won’t be regret!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPdmc-vdE6XXpSQYNzJSwbn8HjW-njE07ggA2qt&fid=0x0:0xd880286c53ef560d"],"When":"2024-3-17"},{"Name":"Ben Pistilli","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJPgHCE2Bl9HeHSr_hupnNI74mFb3_8U5Z4eflgiV5v1aOQ3w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I ordered from show me the pizza all the time. I have never had a bad experience since tonight. My med pizza crust was very thin, and that's never happened before. I called and spoke, which I think was the owner, who explained that the crust was very thin. With no real interest in my concerns, I just scrubbed me off and said they haven't changed. I told him that every time I ordered, which  is once every two weeks on a Friday, the pizza crust had never been this thin. I'm not impressed with  the customer service..","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Danielle Clutchey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIRCh0NOmnAADlI4nVZhaF3rW6eFVnKJ1w8_H_BB3BEZDSf7g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We just tried this place for the first time after hearing great things. Ordered 3 pizzas and an order of bread sticks. Got home and the bread sticks are basically black and hard as a rock. Absolutely disgusting. I called and the manager laughed at me saying "you're calling to complain about break sticks?"

We just spent over $70 of our hard earned money here and that is the service we receive. After asking what could be done to rectify this I was told "we can maybe send you an etransfer". I'm at a loss for words, what a disappointment.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Stephanie Henderson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIvd6TE41ofXSIQsVETEKQwe90URxDLRLP3ccyJkWtaimnS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We found our new favourite pizza joint!
First time ordering and we will definitely be back.
The pizza is so good, hot & fresh. Amazing crust, good quality ingredients. The staff are very friendly, and the location is clean. We also love that each pizza has a dip of your choice included.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOvPLj8LQB2lC07SuS7fIEbUpRhOnGVw8R813o&fid=0x0:0xd880286c53ef560d"],"When":"2024-2-24"},{"Name":"Luca Pollzien","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQPGy8BO9cFSB3hMmrdn2FkKoLhKbttXWhtQdoPTRULPmg2eA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best pizzeria in maple ridge. Amazing crust, they are generous on their toppings. There chicken taco is my favourite and it’s delicious.  The only thing is they are a little pricey but compared to like dominoes they are similar in price.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tracey Mumford","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMfVTlpNfz1D4YJyisCZf5-uh-f1hK902N886lBFgkQbhqGuMO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great Pizza! Highly recommend.we used to always get Panago but just for the dips. So now we buy a few jars and order from Show Me the Pizza!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Roman Krzaczek Quadra Island Cortes Island and Campbell River Realtor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUcVEVXBFySu8YcMgVSOhN0lchLPLRTEHigvCzWxArNZf_NUJSS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"These guys saved a life tonight! I was hangry and they came just in time. Another minute late and I’d be dead. Took them about an hour and 20 minutes from the time of order but I understand that it’s Friday and they’re busy, I won’t be an as***le and complain about this because the final product was excellent. I ordered 2 small- bbq chicken and veggie. They were both great. I’d prefer more bbq sauce but it worked well. Excellent friendly service and I didn’t die :)  I will order again sometime.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcX2ncPekJuUjchw9E82h16g3bMMMWVb3Pavx6&fid=0x0:0xd880286c53ef560d"],"When":"2018-11-10"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Rose Brooks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLEZN6Jp2sdXZuycOhlLCrFmULMG7W4UHOyCzCH_Jn46bjpOw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Can’t believe we hadn’t tried this great little small business before now. The menu is exactly the right size for each item to get the attention it deserves, and focuses on traditional diner dishes like breakfast and burgers. The tomato basil soup is great, and even better paired with the incredible Parmesan crusted 4 cheese grilled cheese!
Omelettes are perfectly cooked, with hash browns fancied up with onion and peppers. Love the sourdough bread! Our server Miranda was an absolute delight.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPU3vLEt9JIL-tDiSvPp9gu2RBgDKizcXTTd4gh&fid=0x0:0x32c5fde9dcd4fc1d"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"Hemant Kumar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVCmWxkyjYv7PKwZ6ybYox_-smlfUHZeT12o3_8VllBRzoBeRg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Recently visited Ricky’s Country Restaurant and had a pleasant experience overall. The service was fantastic—our server was attentive, friendly, and made sure we had everything we needed. The atmosphere was also a highlight, offering a cozy and welcoming environment that made for an enjoyable dining experience.

However, I must mention that the food was a bit of a letdown. I ordered the chicken sandwich, and few other things but unfortunately, the sandwich was quite bland and lacking in flavor. Despite this, other aspects of the meal were satisfactory.

In summary, Ricky’s is a great spot for a relaxed meal with excellent service and a lovely atmosphere. While the chicken sandwich didn’t impress, I’m looking forward to trying other items on the menu on my next visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNdSvNGylvLjLgi7wZWmxXE4ushe68gLepIMM4&fid=0x0:0x32c5fde9dcd4fc1d"],"When":"2024-7-11"},{"Name":"James Mendonca","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKDOYVs1G-8iT9QF6Fj3_nUauDo1DS6zISrEp3lZ9wij4inDQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The Ricky's Country Restaurant in Maple Ridge was pretty good. I only had the Cheese Lovers Omelette with cubed hash browns and sourdough toast. The omelette was good, although the cheese could have been melted more. The hashbrowns and toast was decent. The service was top-notch, since the waitress was very cordial and came to my table frequently. I will come back to this location the next time I am in Maple Ridge.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNrlk4Ajxg-nLrNXIWmwD8woD7BDhl2SdUYQdzn&fid=0x0:0x32c5fde9dcd4fc1d"],"When":"2024-10-8"},{"Name":"Maryam BG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYOocnrrI0wz1xy1UzzrfX002uyW86PfiNNhxdXyfBusTbUhlS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing customer service, our server was very attentive to our table and the food was out in 10 minutes! We ordered the big breakfast with the veggie chicken omlete. I replaced the toast for buttermilk pancakes and I am so glad I did because the pancakes are amazing!

Addition: we visited this restaurant again today and I would like to aknowledge Shannon as an excellent server, she was very attentive and exceptionally nice! Love the energy she brings","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCP9iVEGlJY3qhwpDF7uAMI8NTIuTJzt0tCoKi&fid=0x0:0x32c5fde9dcd4fc1d"],"When":"2024-3-26"},{"Name":"Uros Nikolic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqZKUGj61BfmTYu8vecdYC7cNoaJsQnfWJB3zipm50mUOPG3Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was delicious 👌🏼
I highly recommend this restaurant when you’re in Maple Ridge","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMAR4gV8BbiJlMbacua5ZLyt_brb717LA5m_x_Q&fid=0x0:0x32c5fde9dcd4fc1d"],"When":"2024-11-28"},{"Name":"Chelsea Vancouver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHVWaXfVBGL-NRGFFbHN7eiAD3hCGrOaEohFBcpGwJyjbv0CUl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Food was ok. Few vegetarian and vegan options. I got the avocado toast without egg and it was a little sad TBH. The meat dishes others at my table ordered looked much better though. Friendly service. Gendered bathrooms.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNk-cri_Nphzuqrcwp0wxB7za5YCqw5Vc7bWFY&fid=0x0:0x32c5fde9dcd4fc1d"],"When":"2024-4-27"},{"Name":"Jamie Marchand","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXLHCICIGmDe3ikuqwvvxfxv0KoSickBkjAxg4OpQHFM_hqiTE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I would say the service was even a 6 star experience. The food here never disappoints and they always have something new and fun to try. Ricky’s always has well trained staff that communicate well with customers, smiling and patient yet efficient! We always leave full and happy. The kids love the treasure chest too, great idea! The bench seat we were at needed a little love, but we were still comfortable. Thanks for the service and good food!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Blake Andrews","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLr6CliOagk-ptarMCoZSHXojGr-ApVBclb60FlmLRpUMAGdw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a lovely Sunday meal. The food was fantastic. The desert was an extravaganza, a delicious deep dish Apple Crumble. Our server Cheska was excellent and wished us a happy Sunday.
We will definitely be back every weekend!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Hamid Salim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKI3TG9oSjOLechuar9EkdFNIAYsOe-RKsY9UYMVUD2QQtKMg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My wife and I love Thai foods but is hard to find a good one. We discovered this restaurant by accident and are so glad we did dine there. It was an hour before closing on Sunday evening. The lady who served us could not be more helpful. The quality of food was excellent, ingredients were screaming freshness. Contrary to most south Asian foods that come very sweet or oily, couple of dishes we had were just right on both. We definitely will go again. The portions were large, the best option is to go with few family members or friends and get different dishes to share.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDDAqHd6PEdf1IxqNLj95dUMVHdum-IDrrt3aP&fid=0x0:0x8ec85bbf77885a95"],"When":"2023-7-29"},{"Name":"Swimming Lion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIoNuKoBPU8hDsJrOBlEDRPQawlWHi3C9rUvrLYtz7paaZM0w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Price was ok
Atmosphere was good and nice setting
Good services too

Food is average ….it’s so difficult to find good Thai food in Greater Vancouver area😞

- The curry was too watery and meat were cut too big
- The Pineapple fried rice was mostly plain rice with tomato sauce; didn’t really see much pineapple nor meat
- Skewers were good and interesting how they serve sticky rice with skewers
- Most of the dishes serve with a bowl of rice
- Taste overall was ok but the way the food was chopped in bigger chunk not delicate as expected","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM3ETZLMaeUoUPqW_YrVYHAScUus2S2D48rgIIH&fid=0x0:0x8ec85bbf77885a95"],"When":"2023-5-22"},{"Name":"Jamak Golshani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWUj2LK0XJaxGCkMdV1Y3vwaPy3axo29-O-pu7Kb7eqy9PgvRrN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We have been to the Langley location and the food was amazing so we decide to try this location. We were not disappointed. I personally like the atmosphere here better than Langley.

The service is topnotch and the food is very tasty. The only caution I have is it could get pricy. Three course meal for four will cost you around $200.

Lastly, get a reservation to be on the safe side. It gets packed pretty quick around dinner time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNeEnFBHRuCn4CmfTZBtnCs_xifAmpzSOjsqq17&fid=0x0:0x8ec85bbf77885a95"],"When":"2022-11-13"},{"Name":"Simon Park","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKARXZijowQGioSxiOMCg-EzyxEm1UrGAfGF9hiOguYSh8sPA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I'll be honest : the staff are nice, but the food is nothing fancy. It can be a bit crowded and noisy, but overall, the atmosphere is okay. Recommended if you're looking for a nearby Thai restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMnkyNPnq0O3qvk_sAJ33P6HSWWB7uSABjjGRTS&fid=0x0:0x8ec85bbf77885a95"],"When":"2024-5-26"},{"Name":"Pramod Neel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXw41ptGAFzVooQILRjvGPIfC76VhEZGfXXgi0sQ9YlceSXmckPQQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Second time around and they didn't disappoint in terms of the food or the service. The appetizing starters (chicken satay, veg n chicken spring rolls) set the ball rolling and whet our appetites for the main course to follow. The mains were pineapple fried rice with yellow curry, pad Thai, Thai chicken fried rice. All the dishes were one better than the other. The spice levels were accurate. The entire family gorged down the food, which left no space for any dessert (a promise to myself for next time 😉). Will recommend this place to anyone who would like to taste some delectable Thai cuisine. Kudos to the chef 👏.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPm076KnKc1LXEYq-rBglmNyeMpiKg75uMnWIZT&fid=0x0:0x8ec85bbf77885a95"],"When":"2022-5-15"},{"Name":"Nat A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnjKr4KNFAObzj2bIvH9BRInxwKsSvEg1PM25bKfvhxtWZTWHoog=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Edit/Update: I recently came here and had there Khao Soi soup. It was rich in flavor and I loved the crunchy noodles on top. Large portion size compared to other local Thai restaurants. Loved their spicy calamari with the green sauce dip. Delicious! Good service again too.

Great Pad Thai lunch special for $15! I ordered the Pad Thai with shrimp. The portion size of the noodles was big compared to other Thai restaurants. The flavour of the noodles was good. It came only with 3 pieces of shrimp but the shrimp was a good size, fresh and cooked well. It was served with a small bowl of soup and salad on the main plate. For $15 it was a really good deal. I had only eaten here once before and did not like the sweet and sour seafood dish. This time around was much better. Servers were friendly. They have nice decor as well. I'd definitely come back to try their other lunch specials.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMK59KB_qry66bGbsBTvvhsqYzW1DyXMI7GuqeD&fid=0x0:0x8ec85bbf77885a95"],"When":"2022-10-13"},{"Name":"Eston Stone","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZf50HNdIFLNy3MPJ7T0z_SKBvprsk5TrIt59f6By2jLBx8sq5rg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really great Thai food and drinks! The restaurant's atmosphere is nice and all the staff were very friendly. The food is a little pricey but the portion size is large, I definitely recommend sharing a couple dishes. The service was great even on a packed Friday night our food showed up in 15 minutes!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgdldUNaXuuWrqnnYdQGKILmS4cUpDiO-ShwOv&fid=0x0:0x8ec85bbf77885a95"],"When":"2023-5-22"},{"Name":"Shaz Currie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ0UI1cdx8QlB8EQtgs3_0gzmuw9WKyTApAk7qnPExS0XdLhw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I just wanted to share the recent experience that our family had at this location of Ban Chok Dee. We just celebrated a milestone birthday that went off without a hitch. Lynn the restaurant manager went well above and beyond to make the evening and dining experience FANTASTIC. Not only did she make special accommodations for our family that were quite difficult to work with she also made sure that the entire experience from arranging the evening, presenting sample menus that would please the family was ready the day of. Lynn is a gem and so are her staff that she has handpicked! The food was fantastic and everyone was impressed by the quality and selection. We are a pretty particular bunch when it comes to our meals and not one complaint was had. I would not hesitate to recommend Ban Chok Dee in Maple Ridge to anyone who is looking to book a venue for a special event. The only reason I gave 4 stars for the atmosphere was that it was actually quite hot in the restaurant and the AC wasn't operating in the dining area. Other than that we had no complaints! Lynn now has life long customers from my entire family all because of how she took care of us. Thank you Lynn!!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Annie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJAG4UtHNdn-C74S5I053c9lMdRMdh_AH35u090AgjHoFmF2GSW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It was our first time ordering from here through Uber eats as we have been craving Chinese food.
Portions were decent, packaging was great as everything was neatly assembled and there’s also a 2-for-1 for their spring rolls and dumplings.
The food was delivered quickly and still hot.
Overall everything tasted good and we will have to try the popular entrees for next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0KDOw1bazjMeIHW9bYLWcAk6oBkGSyT-iDRLe&fid=0x0:0x55b3ae1f8ffb622f"],"When":"2023-8-13"},{"Name":"Dave backeland","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcv64Vs5yBlfxYxoVSibb1CSK_GewvZ_CHwRAGyPnm_H2NUHk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"140 dollar order no cookies and 4 soy sauce. Chow mien all stuck together and dry. Almond chicken blond but over cooked. Chop suey all broccoli no othe veg really very little chicken and beef in each. Ginger beef a bit tough but very tasty. Not worth the money. Very disappointed. First time ordering.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOLqvh1y65HgADrC7fj8FbDDoU5QTvpDanEIDc&fid=0x0:0x55b3ae1f8ffb622f"],"When":"2023-12-22"},{"Name":"Daniel Jung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFE7g6vnjf23CW6mDeh4anchF8fxBs6O5Nsx0bvhepuO3MVzWa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious meals! Really enjoyed the flavors of each dish and they had decent sized portions. The flavors are in my opinion "Canadianized." Which I am happy with.
Definitely will be back","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOSVNWTBKlk64tJzYYpa0Pk9DkB4-cIE2xXXw-F&fid=0x0:0x55b3ae1f8ffb622f"],"When":"2023-10-11"},{"Name":"Manesh Shafiei","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVE7oGsfssj_uLcNg0FiHdMtfhxS54WeE6dbk048uYFpL0C-jZW=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered beef chow fun and shrimp chow mien.

First impression when opening the bag, 2 soya sauce packets for 2 tubs of food. No fortune cookies.

The shrimp chow mien had nice flavour and a bit oily.
The beef chow fun was bland, full of oil and soggy noodles.

Very disappointed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOwZWBKrxRmHXNZHVr-zQfZRm4N18XdLSix4dpB&fid=0x0:0x55b3ae1f8ffb622f"],"When":"2024-3-24"},{"Name":"Aaron Scott","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXn-lvwTGMhUxCV421M_xqu_u5MrGrT6chcjNAjFFyrJKuOzGho5Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The BEST Chinese food in Maple Ridge/Pitt Meadows - Woking Dragon Maple Ridge.

Three things make them stand out: Awesome, fresh, and quality menu items that are made to order. A really cool decor and atmosphere for singles, families, or groups. And, they thing that really puts them above the rest, the people that work there from the servers to the kitchen staff to the owners, are absolutely stellar. The staff are really our kind of people. They’re always willing to connect and make the experience friendly and welcoming. Go there for dinner, you won’t be disappointed!

EDIT - DECEMBER 2023: a few friends and I eat at Woking Dragon Chop Suey House in Maple Ridge once a week. We’ve been doing it just about every week for the last 18 to 24 months.  It’s our place - we even have our regular table.

Tonight was no different. We came in and sat. The server team brought us drinks without asking because they know what we order. They don’t usually even take food orders now because we order the same things each week.

But what WAS different tonight… is that when it came time to bring us the bill… they comped our entire table. They said “Merry Christmas” and comped us more than $80 in food to say thank you for our loyalty.

This was amazing. The profit margins are worse in restaurants than almost any other business. So for them to comp us all to say thank you, we recognize just how big a deal this was.

Thanks Woking dragon and staff. You folks are amazing. We very much appreciate you.

https://fb.watch/7d4hEohP_4/","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-wn50iD6CU3_LGK68I0ozEewHbdMjFaQn1B0n&fid=0x0:0x55b3ae1f8ffb622f"],"When":"2022-4-11"},{"Name":"John Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVX_G2KhQ4UDvw4Nu1dqA3AsXfC53tIj_AZn0iIn-6oDOg1Yst1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The waiters are young people, the environment is spacious, bright, clean, and the background music is dynamic.  This is really good place!
Hot tea is authentic Chinese flavor. Noodles are not way I familiar with，but it is ok.
I took a look at some pictures posted by other people,it seems to be more delicious.
I will come back to try again!

The following is a review after a week.
I change the rating from 4 to 5. This time my family order 5 dishes, each one is authentic Chinese taste.

Finally there is an authentic Chinese restaurant in Maple Ridge!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPp-Ow7MOso06iXQ_X9iKQ98uokidx8nryL8JKJ&fid=0x0:0x55b3ae1f8ffb622f"],"When":"2019-11-30"},{"Name":"Robb Farion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7HA8fb1QGGEpC6CRgNHKUnOhvL1F-nQKaUcRfo6kSW4m_5dM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Another fantastic meal at Woking Dragon in Maple Ridge. Everything was delicious and fresh and service was friendly. We had Beef Sirloin Stir Fry in Black Pepper Sauce, Honey Garlic Pork Ribs, Sweet & Sour Chicken Balls, and House Special Lo Mein w Roasted  Almonds added. The key to having a good meal here is knowing what to order as some items are a little bland tasting - as some reviews will tell you. The black pepper sauce is really tasty and you should try anything w that! Although we did not order any this time, their spicy salted prawns are also really good. In my opinion this restaurant does all things deep fried very well. Some restaurants have doughy chicken balls but not here. My only complaint would be the portion sizes are smaller than average here but the good quality makes up for that if you order the right items.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJenNuRneIFVu8nyN4I_HGfjK-OcgrLjy4NqZB&fid=0x0:0x55b3ae1f8ffb622f"],"When":"2019-8-24"},{"Name":"Gen X Surrey Girl","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnz98iwXPE1DskfLpfNg-zDV5mDy1tGmvmbNcHWdRqf6q4OTmNvw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"It wasn't horrible but it wasn't great either. I've been hearing so many raves about this place I had to check it out. I did not enjoy it but I went back a couple months later to give it a second chance. I thought they might have been having an off day since everyone else seems to like it. The second time it was just as bad.

(Feb 2019) My first visit I ordered chow mein, chop suey, almond chicken, sweet and sour pork for take out. The food had zero flavor. It's like they didn't use any sauce, salt, msg, soy sauce or anything at all. The noodles were cooked perfectly. But it was like they cooked them and then did absolutely nothing to them. No sauce, no spice, no flavor. Completely naked bland noodles. So the texture was great. Same with the chop suey. The veggies were fresh and cooked perfectly. They were nice and crispy. But it tasted like boiled broccoli, cauliflower, celery and mini corn. No sauce, no salt, nothing at all added. I've had worse. Some restaurants make their noodles and veggies all soggy and mushy so I appreciate the crispness. But is it common for restaurants to add nothing to these things? Or maybe they did and I just couldn't taste it at all. It just tasted like water. The almond chicken was flavorless. It literally tasted like flour and water. Again no salt or msg or whatever it is that Chinese restaurants usually add to give it that zing of flavor. The quality of meat in the sweet and sour pork was good. Cooked very well again but no flavor again. Is this an msg free restaurant, did they run out of salt, did they forget to add sauce? I've not a fan of salt, I never add it to my food and I often find Chinese food to be heavy on the salty flavor. But I found this food inedible without drowning it in soy sauce which I don't usually do with takeout.

(May 2019) Decided the give this another try, maybe they were having a bad day. Ordered the same thing for takeout plus Char Siu and ginger beef. The veggies and noodles had a bit a flavor this time but nothing special. So that's an improvement there. But the almond chicken was so undercooked. It was soggy and completely white. I'm used to almond chicken being slightly browned (almond colour). I had to pull out my deep fryer to brown and crisp the chicken for my family. The ginger beef was pretty good. I've give it 7/10. The Char Siu sounded amazing on the menu "slowly oven roasted to perfection" but tasted like a chewy, tough pork chop. We ordered enough for 4 people. Usually all the food is gone with Chinese but most of it was left over. No one in the family was really into it.

So overall good quality meat and veggies but poorly executed. You don't get very much for the price and it seems a little high priced. The staff was nice both times I went in for pick up. Very young though and inexperienced. Several of the girls looked about 15 years old. I think it's great that they are offering students in the community their first jobs. Would I recommend this place? I don't know. I know I'm never going there again because I was not impressed. But the rest of the Chinese restaurants in Maple ridge and Mission are awful with soggy mushy food and gnarly meat. So by default it makes this place "the best Chinese in town". I guess I'd say give it a try and decide for yourself. I'll leave you with this, at least it's not horrible....","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNeFbAAvRIofLTWXtjgDu2doO0v-0Zf3nJALha1&fid=0x0:0x55b3ae1f8ffb622f"],"When":"2021-4-1"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Immanuel M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURCHQQ_gUlRsGGjwdJWcNj1pi4KH38rEIuyGH3UdE60vvwMfQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super fun little spot! The staff have all been wonderful; Cheryl and Hope we're both especially welcoming and friendly! The cheese curds are some of the best I've tasted, and the blue cheese is another favorite. No espresso machine, but their brewed coffee is organic, yummy, and strong. I haven't tried any food items yet, but look forward to trying some. I definitely plan to come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZnaMC0ZywNNT3rEDdOVP85f_ueShYvz4cHQ0Y&fid=0x0:0xd09b5fa165be38ec"],"When":"2024-11-21"},{"Name":"Adrian Llarena","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUVG3JOq_zN5omz6WVpSl2jOLFJkdyW3bZz2QwSKdsEtf40_4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is amazing. Our party was late by 15mins for breakfast due to our boss always being tardy. They accommodated us regardless. Cheryl was absolutely amazing. Great service. A wonderful smile. And the food was literally perfect. Hats off to the chef and staff. This will be a regular meeting place for us. Come check em out!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0EoJmcFkGBIU8dNtqPvpZyjb3ov8DgzLtFIgC&fid=0x0:0xd09b5fa165be38ec"],"When":"2024-11-2"},{"Name":"jamessteven09","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJpC4QgB17zkebZofmO2AmX6tp05bwcm9qy1K-SHeWP-tsY_A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic local business with great staff and  (most importantly given the type of shop) quality  cheese!

Additionally, it is a great place to stop for lunch. Both the grilled cheese and mac n' cheese are superb. Those items alone are worth the trip.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlEIXrsG3G0_4ashWR-5q1Ui4mhTxyesS6ufI5&fid=0x0:0xd09b5fa165be38ec"],"When":"2024-12-18"},{"Name":"David Plante","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVGsTLFMJwWvURaOhOujpVBVd78mnonGYrHYewBNRhCqTBJDZMS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is a secret gem.
Everything was top notch.
That breakfast poutine was best we’ve have outside of Quebec. And probably the best one yet period! Try it!!

Service was impeccable 😁

Will be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMb6TsNeRQ-FvK2eqm0hmYbx5ZwYX8I3HIkPw4&fid=0x0:0xd09b5fa165be38ec"],"When":"2024-11-28"},{"Name":"LITTLE BLUE","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVoJ58VXCcy5VDIR8ri4W8n9OQFb1a99Hx_R29KIDC-FH1nS2nOxg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A wonderfully relaxing healing restaurant!
I had the Canadian specialty poutine and cheese-flavored egg quiche.
There is also a cute miscellaneous goods store attached to the restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMEYWF6vc2UFC71zVdgAXsPbx6OCjV0mnkIlCHU&fid=0x0:0xd09b5fa165be38ec"],"When":"2024-10-9"},{"Name":"Misaki S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjyt_oYyUqtrdwnuinykeMh-EqFySwbtCNJyjvywQIqJYE0FT6=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"We stopped by here on the way to get our campsite. It’s really nice and cozy space that you can explore. They have cute little knickknacks and coffee shop with ice cream ( with daily free products). I got a basler (emmental style cheese) from the cheese counter but unfortunately I couldn’t enjoy it since it got a moles on the side and it spreads quickly. By the time I opened it, the taste was not as I tasted at the counter. Just disappointed..","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMoRiOr00SskBpTDen3Piq_eeZtXA-ODY3ToUyr&fid=0x0:0xd09b5fa165be38ec"],"When":"2024-8-20"},{"Name":"Jen A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKOPdeZbBqQo1MQl8lI4RfI8LqHfGL3kG7gGJM4HhWcKgTJSg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Once you try their cheese there really is no going back. Their chili Gouda is divine!!! We always grab a bag of their tomato soup to save for a rainy day. Absolutely delicious!

I have been in a handful of times at this point and the customer service is next level. Everyone that works there is so knowledgeable and helpful. Thank you SO much, it doesn't go unnoticed!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPh2AFW6Yq-ok-o5dem-svrun1avy7uv4mcFuGU&fid=0x0:0xd09b5fa165be38ec"],"When":"2024-8-2"},{"Name":"May Zhagro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9KviWdU_UGm6yjKPv-6aFaljm1EC_ecrxYhnt_LO3duiyBNho=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The bistro was unfortunately closed when we went even though the store closes at 6 pm on Sunday so we never got to try the poutine that we were looking forward to. Nevertheless, we bought some locally produced products such as pickles and jam and also got one of the stinging nettle Gouda cheese produced by the cheesecrafters. Excited to try the goodies! The store was well organized with a lot of local options as well as a sales section up front. Plenty of parking available.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOSwgHfnmmYgBfutyOaTDG0HBEBGoopwJ9FpnD1&fid=0x0:0xd09b5fa165be38ec"],"When":"2024-6-10"}]

title: Big Red's Poutine
address: 22715 Dewdney Trunk Rd, Maple Ridge, BC V2X 3K3
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Lunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Dinner","enabled":true},{"name":"Catering","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true}]},{"id":"children","name":"Children","options":[{"name":"Good for kids","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Romulus Lubbong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWl63ax3o3o4tRI1t8NUxKzpyp1s6eSGkV0Q-QKsUCogPksxGiz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We tried Big Red's at the Abbotsford Airshow. Loved their Beef Chicken Poutine. In fairness, I like the texture, crisp not soggy.

HOWEVER, the sauce quantity was not enough to cover the entire box of fries, didn't reach the middle and bottom. Could you please be generous with the gravy from now on?
I would definitely try again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"chantal mishler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX_a-ta-zwFaboUjK8xHMFTs-VRx5Cbdvf7S8BMeebygb0WSCA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Recently tried them at the PNE fair. It was beyond disappointing. I don't know how one can manage ruining such an easy dish, but it was honestly the worst poutine I've had. The fries were undercooked, crunchy (but not in the way you'd hope), and cold middles. The gravy was SO sad. It was the bland-est gravy I've ever had. There was no flavour. The cheese curds were good, they obviously were store bought. I am NOT one to normally complain, but if the lineup wasn't so long I 100% would have returned it. For $13+ I would have expected something atleast edible. I tossed it out after 3 bites, my friends who tried it also urged me to return it.
Wouldn't return again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Skreech xx","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXc4x6b1aP-dudAsR9a3FuhUpNF7pj7sloojuiK3LAan2FdAzY8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Got the classic poutine the other day at the luminary festival in North Delta from this truck and I was very disappointed. Gravy tasted old and It was very small for what it cost. The classic poutine was $13 and all I have to say was it was super small. Such a rip off. You could get TWO big and very filling poutines at costco for the price of what big reds costed. I 100% wouldn't recommend getting it ever again. Waste of money and time.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jennifer M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUV69jahocJXJ5Qpy7louD-ELbmPOE6eYM1Nj6s_NTGEI-5bRlF=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Got the chicken strip poutine. The chicken strips were horrible quality and tasted bad. The gravy had 0 flavor and was not hot enough. The fries were bomb tho! EDIT- I see some are saying the chicken strip poutine is 12$?! we paid 17$!!!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jeff Curnew","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJKOGpLkRh8MeITTuZ5zi75R5eK5M8fJ43s3uhiIPsXQPeX0Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Unfortunately, the new recipe for the gravy is not good.  We used to travel far and wide to get Big Reds,
Now the portion was half the size and the gravy was weak and no longer authentic poutine gravy. Such a shame.  We won't return.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Aaron","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUHacRgtrfS5scu3MsrBBl1IethxtxLJfCNuTudFilbMAs0Lw6P=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I ordered the chicken strips poutine. It came with only a few pieces of chicken. The cheese curds were cold and unmelted. Only decent part was the fries that were hot and crispy. I would not recommend this place. Overpriced and terrible quality.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Emily Kasal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZ7x5LYWndAM_AD9nf6k2i-FeY_3xsTMgvio9skajGHNrhi8vV=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Had their poutine at the PNE and can’t say I’ve ever been more disappointed in a poutine… it was cold and the cheese curds were just not it. Also pepper in the gravy? Really?? Yikes.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"ArwadM","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJgsgXFbTGDtqQIP5j1Cq6f4xf3uHjdhCwRRHQHYFzk7Z5xag=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved the chicken stripes I ordered at the PNE my friend ordered the classic poutine and he also enjoyed it. I'll definitely come back for more!","Images":null,"When":""}]

descriptions: Down-to-earth watering hole featuring cocktails, brews & pub grub, plus sports TVs & a pool table.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Annie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJAG4UtHNdn-C74S5I053c9lMdRMdh_AH35u090AgjHoFmF2GSW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our first time at Blacksheep and it happened to be prime rib night (also Father’s Day)
It was busy but we got a table right away - service was good and atmosphere was easy and casual. We will definitely be back.

Back again! Our server was awesome and the food was great! Lots of leftovers.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPX3WBmq-fMVKz1JNKEt-RuLQzO9MVYYIqLj6fs&fid=0x0:0xbcea51144945bbe5"],"When":"2024-6-17"},{"Name":"Nathan Woods","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYlKwIGO9PHjqLgc7mRGN7qYIzJ_Yb1JOij4343pL12ye4fG4D-w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Top rate neighborhood pub!

It's a little out of the way, but it has to be one of Maple Ridges best neighborhood pubs.

It's clean, well decorated, and full of friendly staff.

Today I had the wor wonton soup and a sushi cone... I wish I had ordered two sushi cones.

The soup was well worth it, full of vegetables, lots of barbecue pork, and lots of wonton!

I will definitely be back at this pub!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMbVhIBTwoP2X4cqq05P6LAIhFbSeUuQtjXfPc6&fid=0x0:0xbcea51144945bbe5"],"When":"2024-8-1"},{"Name":"Queenie Chao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXZJZmSpZQRAFF9t6SoJ29KP7hdKen-l5gR8pgpgRf7-1s6aED9=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super friendly and helpful staff, quick service, great food (chicken parm burger), and really nicely decorated interior. Feels like an upscale pub that's had a lot of thought put into it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjV4Y_KFES66PVYVhFEqn-a3nnx0J9vDuqHi-i&fid=0x0:0xbcea51144945bbe5"],"When":"2024-10-14"},{"Name":"Matt L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJuCHpIiV01U1r9hpBBKPXgcZIpixEgrpu-SnC2oP9naymDyg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"An amazing pub, lots of parking they have an overflow lot as it can be quite busy at peak times. The food is wonderful! The burgers are top notch! I also recommend the clubhouse sandwich it is also very good! Have been here many times and have never left dissapointed! The portions are a very good size and the prices are very reasonable! They also have a very good assortment and selection of fine beers and ale's on tap fresh! This Pub is worth a drive to check out great food great service and a fun atmosphere! Highly recommend the Black Sheep Pub check them out! You will leave there full and happy!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vasisht Raghavendra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJJdqlfXhrv4xWlObHOUik-BEmjW2vxVvFad9PSosG433WUa8GN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The waitress who took our order had an attitude and the food was decent. But the one who gave the cheque spoke well and had a smile.

We started with chips and artichoke dip, Lettuce wraps and Chicken wings. The wings came with a small cup with lime and a liquid. The cup was actually to wipe off from eating the wings but we mistook it to be a sauce 😂. The wings are not great and we had some leftovers. For the main course we had Seafood Penne pasta. It was good and very filling.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOfGgVeI50HCsIw10pcAnkH2MqN_-AGqeEp_RG9&fid=0x0:0xbcea51144945bbe5"],"When":"2023-4-13"},{"Name":"Gordon Laity","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLvF4xpjTU7yoScEp9NrBctW8Wlp9ID7aWP2ruaE7h7n3FP7A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Generous portions of consistantly delicious food. Comfortable seating, Guiness and others on tap, great service,  large menu, and modern decor all contribute to make this pub a great place. The schnitzel burger, unchanged and perfectly balanced for over 3 decades, has been a great personal menu favorite.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vlad Burca","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVACp8enmVuWvVrrtMIUrDg4vz6_iQ55iNBMqK6w5GqgcTHIITQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice restaurant with a pub / diner atmosphere. Food was good value. Got the clam chowder which surprised us initially for having a slightly more colorful look than the typical clam chowder you would find elsewhere - this is due to the fact that it has a bit more vegetables (carrots) most likely. It was delicious, regardless!

The chicken bacon wrap was a good choice too, being very light and tasteful. Fries were a nice addition.

Staff was super friendly and pleasant! Totally recommend this place for a brunch or evening food and drinks!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipObDNCjQdNKnlVCrSNUxRyoPk5WTtyA217Iraer&fid=0x0:0xbcea51144945bbe5"],"When":"2023-9-24"},{"Name":"Brittney Yoo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKYmjiLDNAQSWLBLMlhCVbZAtgPXq1rS2Tob6gPAhqChDnUpMg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Definitely a no nonsense pub, great menu and large portions and even better prices. Great for sport events since there’s tvs at any point of view. Also has an amazing neighbourhood feel, the servers are so great and the Caesar was delicious (coined “best caesar in the world”, which is quite the self proclamation). Definitely will return to try more items! The beef ribs were fall off the bone sweet bbq saucy goodness 🤤","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtSyTW1U05SDzFDByvctkri4cLXO5CUilT85vC&fid=0x0:0xbcea51144945bbe5"],"When":"2022-8-2"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"ty Lyn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVRTHSmVN8R72q5Mxg79-j-gxHLJ7fJNNyroCHg6w-bvnCtF-c=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"As soon as we walked in a group of 5 employees stood at the front talking and staring at us without saying a word to us for 5 minutes. Should of left then i would of save $90.
Waitress extremely rude to my daughter. Also never once asked how the food was or if she could get us anything. We didn’t eat like 70% of our food. Had to ask for take out containers 3 times to pack it up. She was visibly not happy. Definitely didnt tip her she was terrible. She physically checked the receipt infront of us and audibly huffed and stomped off.
Chips were dripping in grease and queso was awful
I asked for things to be added to my wrap never got it.
If staff is going to be that awful. Then the food should be better.
I was born in ridge and have been coming to this restaurant for 30 years. I wont be wasting my money here again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5i-NA0CvGQARZ_sxRGWoyIt2a5bdPyXX3Yq9D&fid=0x0:0xfb7e4361565a0eee"],"When":"2024-11-5"},{"Name":"Les Girard","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLF1Jw9Nt7u03nI9o0npxuji4tcLHuyXTrSjUoz8igbFBTaeg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time ever going to a Red Robin restaurant and we were absolutely amazed with the exceptional service, along with the delicious food. Definitely will be making this place a must stop for every road trip to the mainland!!!!

Thanks to the amazing staff as well!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGDqZ7KBFSsSlwNGPGNwlkQSbzGpVe8gbICGa5&fid=0x0:0xfb7e4361565a0eee"],"When":"2024-12-18"},{"Name":"sylvia lever","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKdGDLpAOLpyMt8Fw6SYaISTyJfst7V9WIrBp0VCqFEBK5x=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We recently had a wonderful dinner as a family of six at the Red Robin in British Columbia. From the moment we walked in, our server Julie made us feel welcome with her friendly smile. She was genuinely excited to help us navigate the menu and shared her personal favorites, which made it easy to decide. The food came out quickly, and she made sure our drinks were always topped up. Her timing was perfect—she checked in just enough to make sure we had everything we needed without interrupting our meal. What really made the evening special was her sense of humor. She joked about the cookies being broccoli to avoid our kids picking up on it. It lightened the mood and made our dining experience feel more like a fun night out than just a meal. we couldn’t help but appreciate how her attentiveness added to our enjoyment. We left feeling satisfied and happy, already discussing our next visit. If you’re looking for a family-friendly spot in MR, Red Robin is definitely worth it, especially with a server who knows how to make your night special as Julie did. We’ll be back soon!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alexander Gaudet","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUsPbOTZua3qeIUnA5P6gmOuUKLsS2Q41okf6i3GpDVs6P20jdc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Got there right as the dinner rush was starting to celebrate my daughter’s 8th birthday & the four of us were seated right away. Our waitress checked on us frequently despite it being super busy and we had great service. Only complaint I have is the extreme noise in the restaurant (definitely one of the loudest I’ve been to in a while).","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jaime Parsons","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-7jYUFhaI9gC2bxTYMasGdv8PoNEupjGysYQz0djr9MVfHNL2vQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Renee was our server and the service was absolutely fantastic. She was friendly and attentive and anticipated all our needs. Great experience. The service is always good at this Res Robin but this was probably the best service I've had anywhere.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Christina Evdokimff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJWSfXISbsm8KkoBRSiYXA8NUoWulpdtMSb0-lzOKvBkwEHSA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Ordered from SKIP.  Entree size Mac and cheese came as side portion (literally half a cup, I measured).  Garlic bread was totally burnt and not edible.  Missed sending an extra sauce.  We have gone to Red Robin for years but this last year really noticed poor service and food quality!  Do better","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Annie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJAG4UtHNdn-C74S5I053c9lMdRMdh_AH35u090AgjHoFmF2GSW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"You can’t go wrong at Red Robin! There’s something for everyone on the menu and bottomless fries and fountain drinks, yes please!

We came to dinner (on a school night!) and had the most amazing server - JULIE you are are a gift and so wonderful to us from start to finish! She took the time to chat and share the features, dessert options and genuinely loves what she does!  Give this woman a raise! Thank you for a great night and ask for Julie!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8eDuZl2nB8ycK7g0AutmifnYHCtUSNYLkPR2x&fid=0x0:0xfb7e4361565a0eee"],"When":"2024-2-16"},{"Name":"Daniel Jung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFE7g6vnjf23CW6mDeh4anchF8fxBs6O5Nsx0bvhepuO3MVzWa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Update: Highly recommended the Montreal Brisket Burger.. Only here for a limited time. It's one of the best burgers I've tasted. Service was a lot faster this time!

Old post: Burger tasted good, but service was slow. Our server was really nice and did her best. It was surprisingly a very busy Wednesday night. They closed off a section we wanted to sit in. It's definitely a family vibe here","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOL_fvWGhZNP6iqfAYQFujER7dei5qS8irW3xMJ&fid=0x0:0xfb7e4361565a0eee"],"When":"2023-9-27"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Aleksander Amer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGOAz6hZJ2NwhTQXXReoo8ipuBBnVUyRU2feoLZjGgiTMM8r_W=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Finally made it in to try the birria tacos with consommé and get some groceries that are hard to find. I thought the tacos were phenomenal and great horchata. I stocked up my freezer with burritos, taquitos and tamales as they are a great price. The staff working there were very friendly and am looking forward to returning. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwe1Fr_OLt2VEO6BS0f3KOD3vNBWJGw3abWuCO&fid=0x0:0x93b04e724289e006"],"When":"2024-9-24"},{"Name":"Genn Richards","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIv-Bp7UhIKlk7R_WNzPvF8-SHy2B8dPh4abiUjm-9Owih0FQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was fabulous, as always.  Owners, cooks are very friendly and helpful.  We chose to eat in, with most people doing take out.  Minimalist authentic decor.  Lots of mexican snacks, drinks, sauces, etc and freshly made  products in fridges available to take home.  Took care of my cravings for authentic Mexican dinner.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP1SP6dpU36GJk7ppv0R2MiskX9XXUE6geJFc6n&fid=0x0:0x93b04e724289e006"],"When":"2024-8-30"},{"Name":"K Hoyano","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXE8E8JBlvzbXyn0xcaOPW-rY1kqCJ3dded_UE8jcEmnvzWlr8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We needed lunch for an 18 person event and another local taco place was not returning calls.  Reached out to Lupitas the afternoon before the event and they came through despite having other large orders at the same time.  The lunch was a hit with all attendees.  Great food, great service, good price.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Reece Kopeschny","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULKOa8APzPB-oiZ47ByVkOUw3cvI4vI6xSWNOo647veRKgca1I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time going to Lupitas and wow I’m impressed,   Lots of grocery items from Mexico including different dried chili peppers, chips, hot sauces and the restaurant. I didn’t know what to choose so I picked one of each of the different street tacos and wow. All of them had so much flavour and fresh. I’m disappointed I didn’t find out about this place until now but I’m so happy I did. I will be back for sure!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPdStzv93Z_XzXq5emaUmrZOCA6j0xw-P05Wc4&fid=0x0:0x93b04e724289e006"],"When":"2024-6-2"},{"Name":"Dawn Mist","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVyR-na2sQcGqnSW-JxTn27RMX1oocQ3hojpV86Eb8qwbPHRL0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Birria & Pollo tacos were mediocre/OK. Very stripped down presentation and flavours.  They forgot my salsa with my order and never brought out water I asked for and I asked twice. Place was not busy. Had to ask the next table (and only other customer there) if I could grab a piece of paper towel off their roll.
Easy parking though....that deserves a star.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMeJWG6bFx8JI4EFfgyBMjQcRHIQETh0LpWUx6q&fid=0x0:0x93b04e724289e006"],"When":"2024-6-2"},{"Name":"Viona Halim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5PMLEtvgkAwv2IjmL8XXm0-Ly_XpBo5Kd0Hv2pxoQ26_Hfy4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This Mexican eatery/store is a real gem in Maple Ridge. There's certainly a shortage of good food places in the neighborhood but Lupita is special. We like the homecook vibes and super friendly service.

You can come here to have some real good Mexican food and load up on ingredients for your next taco party or whatnot. Get some snacks and drinks while you're there as well. Prices are reasonable and portion is good! We had quick supper there at around 5pm on Saturday and there's barely anybody there. It felt like we had a private dining at a quaint Mexican house. Will definitely come back and try their other menu","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNYjkwkoWFMZ_hyu0onW6jcfMpPLh15xuilj7a_&fid=0x0:0x93b04e724289e006"],"When":"2022-9-29"},{"Name":"Monkey Couch","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKjBJae2rKS_uXWCMGu9-Vey95DYSzaWVHAACfGX9Lt21SDIw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My husband and I ate here once before deciding to get catering from them for an event. Their food was delicious and moist. We had the chicken and the rajas( very tasty vegetarian ) . During the order placement the staff was helpful, and guided us through what we needed. For pick up they were very friendly, on time, and even helped load the vehicle. I will highly recommend this establishment if one is considering them for any catered event where one wants more of an authentic Mexican cuisine.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Levi Spencer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU95CQfsNB1hgrisMVHOi2FZwWI4Q3hGwtRXXEjl3ktEj-FXKKr=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"By far one of the best places for food in maple ridge. I’ve been coming here regularly for a good while and have never once been disappointed by the food. Whether it’s chips n salsa, tacos or burritos it’s always hot fresh and delicious. On top of that the portions are big and the prices are good and you can tell that the staff genuinely care about the food they make and service they provide. If your looking for somewhere good to eat in ridge that won’t cost you an arm and a leg I’m begging you to try Lupitas","Images":null,"When":""}]

Nice little donair spot. Super friendly owner too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCzy2gdVWcSRiNc8JiUs6qn9JtPnfAu_rKelnx\u0026fid=0x0:0xd44927ceff1395af"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Miguel Augusto","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCWgqTRMpLX5iisHx7eFrVWsvRVmPBc6nX5Rst9FpLVpiT9uwd=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here today while visiting the area. I’m from Toronto so I’m a huge shawarma/Donnie fan, and this place had top notch food. The owner was super friendly too - I got the ‘super’ size donair and the size is extremely big. Would highly recommend, amazing prices as well (super size mixed chicken and lamb donair was $12.99).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM22k5jDsY5m6RxabB20heCh2q4v9A8a_Rs1VC-\u0026fid=0x0:0xd44927ceff1395af"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Ammaar Malik Awan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXWPvJ4-9e6vSq5FkEkPtt1WaLR8XEX3AL4DiLo4qqRApuu3nAP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was in Maple Ridge last night. Browsed some food places and ended up at Donair City. The couple managing it is welcoming and friendly. The food is absolutely amazing. Loved it. 😍  I would love to come back again. As a South Asian, i found the food less spicy, but it is still worth it. Portions were generous, and prices are low comparatively.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCdMEZcIrA3SB3tU_VHAfBE5ihgAjCn4ntdTNK\u0026fid=0x0:0xd44927ceff1395af"],"When":"2023-12-13"},{"Name":"Dominic Kohler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIr_Rds6INzk8uBD6vTiDGl0q4vd8v53cFPe8-iHXMsWrqpx1g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time trying donair city. Had to come in after reading reviews online. Had to try a platter as that seems like a popular item here. So I went with a lamb platter with everything. Comes with rice, meat, salad, pita, and sauce. Lots of food, and super fresh. Can't go wrong with the price either, with the lamb platter being $13.99. Really good bang for your buck. I'll definitely be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJVyymsNIeRsBxYr36s1MaKwwlBUyGxQPbin8u\u0026fid=0x0:0xd44927ceff1395af"],"When":"2024-4-24"},{"Name":"Emily hyde","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbC0C6FmgId4QLvUPSo-KulEwIlFzLpNM7n36eYxzLuoKvl2Y=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We just moved back into the neighbourhood and needed dinner while all of our dishes were packed. Oh my god this was delicious. The gentleman who made our food was super polite and made the food super quick.\nThey definitely don’t skimp on sauce which is what sold me. Our new favourite spot:)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Marjane A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWpfOS44plOriCjgJ2ip4IlQmMZEL6iAoJ5uDeWaFagUpQvwsRi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best donair I’ve had in a while! The garlic sauce is delicious and the meat is so flavourful! Can’t wait to go back","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Eston Stone","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZf50HNdIFLNy3MPJ7T0z_SKBvprsk5TrIt59f6By2jLBx8sq5rg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went in to place an order for take out, took less then 2 minutes to prepare our food and pay. Super fast and friendly service, the food was delicious my Girlfriend had the Donair salad and I had the Caesar Donair. Would definitely recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNvSh1X89w6rJJ4L9nsnbWOSiUGmoEgynbTYuZC\u0026fid=0x0:0xd44927ceff1395af"],"When":"2022-10-6"},{"Name":"Steph","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWo2ldc7gL5TcEsvyfo5gbnp9HL3LACmWOh6B2i7p_dD7uS7H8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went for lunch. Got the chicken platter. Huge portion. So yummy!!! Only managed to eat half!!! Service was super friendly and I got my food so quick!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM-FdIRBgmVBoi_1cyTipR3Zy02xnqao-ufTkQN\u0026fid=0x0:0xd44927ceff1395af"],"When":"2024-2-23"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kanako Sakurada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKYybgPjG_d3LYq66Ui47Ocd_2PMrfkKaju5V_L0IyVTR19lQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"With so many things to choose from, I wanted to try everything! Had blueberry croissant, hazelnut tart, smoked meat sandwich, and drinks. They were all good but my favorite was the tart. So buttery, fresh, and tasty.
Would love to come back and try more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPgOX0UW0ZhoqgYoqW_rmoJyqiRDNvFuE52njj3&fid=0x0:0xf6019e6a84f80e2d"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Danial Dehghan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXgDzaiKXT97_r82ZF9d2HsnV9L5L_dmiF-k12CY0fufyZgoVyUw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It's a nice bakery with plenty of options to choose from. I tried a pistachio raspberry croissant; that was absolutely delicious, and it has a new taste for me. Amazing cakes, bread, cookies, sandwiches, and coffee—everything you could want.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOSiYkJc2TAwNAWdMFYObTVlT0hU_BlOqkRXy5W&fid=0x0:0xf6019e6a84f80e2d"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"Camilia Rodriguez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWigkoqaNhHJinW1sDEWmiP5-QkCbLl16QFp5xZiy1DDMYI0dmUuQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I came here for coffee with a friend and ended up grabbing a bite to eat. I asked the girl at the counter what I should get and she told me the best sandwich was by far the Asiago on Focaccia and I think she was right. It was delicious and they were able to make it on Gluten Free Bread for me which I really appreciated. I also ordered a Decaf half sweet Lavender Latte and it was also delicious. The drinks are made and left at the counter for customers to pick-up while the food is brought to where you are seated. My friend and I enjoyed the ambiance of the cafe and visited for a couple hours. Thanks Gratia for the excellent service. ☺️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMOp4yTWzJUKQjVPSM4FiU0yQrySohtTMkFSFQB&fid=0x0:0xf6019e6a84f80e2d"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"Darina Mishkova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXgP7nSgMXisGjXETJm3txKovwig8H6PZWG5D0GvzeoGSpRJhMLnA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Almond Blueberry Chroasant, Matcha Oat Milk Latte, and Sourdough Bread. Simply delish! Great choice of sandwiches, too!
The patio looks at the parking lot behind the building,  but it's ok.
We'll be returning with my family. Thank you!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5m38wcS9-PZMRv0orA2IDsVSQopy2h0Tjb0jQ&fid=0x0:0xf6019e6a84f80e2d"],"When":"2024-8-7"},{"Name":"Suyun Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUq9V6Vha9sUNbwnt9Nj3a0dWvXMRpHq5bw4GJRrWW0eKZMhis=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pistachio croissant was GOAT it was the best breaky ever coffee and sandwich was also very tasty I will definitely comeback here to try again! you gotta try their croissant for real","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPngR1_stW-wAmRozOgbSjL5rPgu8r13_-5Jm8&fid=0x0:0xf6019e6a84f80e2d"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Immanuel M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURCHQQ_gUlRsGGjwdJWcNj1pi4KH38rEIuyGH3UdE60vvwMfQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is bumpin'! Great local coffee shop and bakery. Best lattés I've found in Maple Ridge so far. Their butter croissants are also delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNGkyrQvq61I6YkXakJnHCPGhoeAIlnLoHpkHPe&fid=0x0:0xf6019e6a84f80e2d"],"When":"2024-11-29"},{"Name":"Uros Nikolic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqZKUGj61BfmTYu8vecdYC7cNoaJsQnfWJB3zipm50mUOPG3Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This bakery has very nice interior with well organized area to sit. We order croissants and eggs Benedict with ham and bacon, and couple of lattes. Everything went smoothly with our order but my opinion is that nothing was fresh except coffee. With that price range in Maple Ridge we were very disappointed maybe it was a bad timing 11:00am so we will come back and give this place another chance…","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO6YB93RDxqIxqZR2p8LvSK3VZli0cOh308XWlI&fid=0x0:0xf6019e6a84f80e2d"],"When":"2024-6-11"},{"Name":"Maryam Zarepour","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWpohYhWUAD5fRpDq4z1eB6Ugo1jBae0XqxoKDPP1LxIq0195Kb=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place Never disappointed me. Great food and baked goodies. Awesome Atmosphere. Amazing customer service. Love this cafe. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9SSomHubizni4fOmwSQY0OnqFmlFjNbeWzdOd&fid=0x0:0xf6019e6a84f80e2d"],"When":"2024-5-24"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Chris Brooks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKHqHQ4ilLsckCY4ImY4rfLZWbdKgeiqeu0ZNVBWabRLdK1bA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food at great prices got a 4 piece chicken strip meal half with Cajun spice half plain. Food was excellent chicken was crispy fries were crispy just the way I like it and love that it comes in a pizza box.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKqzyUZarEbKHqrcG99o8Jb-s_5iOmQ07o7uWj&fid=0x0:0x8193e4ced7d8c13e"],"When":"2024-11-5"},{"Name":"Renee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJpRD48jMFb84ki9MrfhQthafUMC2ELOrSet5Ba8_5r6ht4UA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Always tasty and fresh—definitely worth the drive! I've yet to have a bad meal here, and the staff is always friendly. I highly recommend the Cajun-seasoned fries with gravy and chicken. My only complaint is the wait time, as we often find ourselves waiting even when arriving after the scheduled pick-up time.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gord Anderson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIahUjBdzeJ3fJdzeREqM4ief7x1VCycxO4Dba_r9rDwRFYdw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I went to Brownies today to pick up a Birthday lunch for my daughter and when I got there I was greeted by the nicest service worker I have ever met. She handled my order exactly the way I wanted and even brought it out to my truck where I was waiting. The food was hot and delicious. It made for a great birthday celebration Thanks Brownies","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alex","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVxP-ADvohB6hXpEbci04qD4fdlJ8qjEvYJvIIZqjiOIuWU9BVM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Probably the thinnest most disappointing chicken sandwich I’ve ever had and I’ve been to dozens of places across the lower mainland. Decided to try this place for the first time. The menu online looks great but the experience was not what I expected.

Let me just say that the service was great but that was the only thing that gives this review a 2nd star.

The Cajun chicken sandwich was a sloppy mess and the chicken breast was paper thin. It looks thick in the photo because they positioned the breast halfway outside the bun to expose the part of it that was curled up but it was maybe half an inch thick at most. The rest it was almost non existent.

The chicken tenders were literally nothing more than dry, rubbery frozen tenders. There are far better places to get high quality freshly prepared crispy chicken.

Oh, and after eating a sandwich and 2 tenders it left a gassy, heavy feeling in my stomach so now I’m laying on my bed on a Sunday afternoon with a bottle of peptol bismol next to me.

Will not be returning. I know food costs are up but I have no desire to waste my money on establishments that raise prices while opting for cheaper ingredients. Do one or the other…. do both and customers will not keep giving you their business.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMEwJFh1n2KmOXxOQkVES19TQFB4TDNNtJtHz6t&fid=0x0:0x8193e4ced7d8c13e"],"When":"2024-4-7"},{"Name":"John Wu (Bun)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfKCbONy8geXldXOzG-RUFdaf5DDFT9hZCtzgwdSb0ESQXNG4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I came from Richmond. An hour drive to here. I will rate this place base by distance.

Is it worth coming to try if you aren't local? Definitely is

I got the value pack chicken and fries with coleslaw salad, also Halibut with chips

In my opinion, the chickens are worth a try. I like them very much. Base on the sign, the chickens are locally source. The flavour is very home style. I got a mix of Original and Cajun. The original flavour has a salt and pepper taste. Not something from Churches. While the texture is firm, not overly cooked. Reminds me of free range chicken. The chicken pieces are smaller than Churches.

I'm not a big fan of any French fries nor I eat alot of fish and chips. So I can comment to much on this restaurant. Won't be too fair. But, I would probably skip the fries next time. But the Halibut is not bad. Firm texture, not over cooked.

Summary: Worth a try, but probably won't specially come here again for chicken from out of town unless I'm in town for a visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP0fz3IU--1aCQe5dTGakqTWHZunZzvKwPoZZzC&fid=0x0:0x8193e4ced7d8c13e"],"When":"2021-9-4"},{"Name":"Noel G.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzt56miafy6iOTVeM1GDzt7WeMhTEkWIDFideh9PNNM3c6ulXi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"There was a bit of a wait, but this is understandable for  rather sought after food. There are many options to choose from. Everything so far has appeared to be of proper quality to me. The service was great. They forgot to give me a medium fries. I called back and Romy gladly offered me a large fries for the inconvenience. Hands down the best tasting fried chicken around. Well, I'd give this a tie with Popeye's Chicken. I'm not sure if this Brownies is affiliated with the Brownies from 30 years ago. I would guess so. Anyhow, I recommend you give this place a try. I am glad I have this close to home.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjzYglCTTDSuoRzPhlTUDXr51EMw6ihOD3Htvx&fid=0x0:0x8193e4ced7d8c13e"],"When":"2022-2-2"},{"Name":"Kurt Jenkins","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqZe4Ivp3UJYu14Rq5PV3Oy-ao_j1eXrrSdu8w0JfZOz3PU7vaCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Still the best fried chicken I've had since I was a kid. Sadly, one of only two left.
Great chicken with good portions for your money.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPgXJCxrS_2ZsZgO0P8G0EoGLb9ZZpeh87YiBeB&fid=0x0:0x8193e4ced7d8c13e"],"When":"2024-4-11"},{"Name":"Mike Miller","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKS-ULoGM-hQ5FS0SCqc6zwNvMzL8Y7z0VdwqzjIu1CR58AtQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I have mixed feelings about this place. Food quantity is pretty reasonable value for the price. That being said, it’s a bit bland and they could do better with the poutine—cheese curds are pretty easy to get nowadays instead of shredded cheese.

Wait times are always surprisingly long…even when I come twenty minutes after the estimated time, I end up waiting five or ten minutes longer to get my food.

Service is okay. Not unfriendly but pretty unremarkable otherwise.","Images":null,"When":""}]

WORST EXPERIENCE

And they even delete my old review","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwkVjKKjDkROrYj4D2awpLixtAAkzIGg-uwZ-v&fid=0x0:0x9b91f9f9fa419a44"],"When":"2024-10-24"},{"Name":"Rithvik Mysore","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXZzYnVmaH1FcxWpow-sHCptHSJFLcOrMhJf5pjvcccezLCPUk4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always liked fresh slice pizza from the beginning and this store here has provided with the best service and served hot food. Employees are friendly and made sure that everything is fine. Highly recommend this fresh slice store for everyone around maple ridge to drop by.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sadia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYm1TG_m8ElzRcGt64XvFvn1oOmTKqNQYCgp1xPxw2EJYMYR4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"During my recent visit to Fresh Slice Pizza, I opted for the unlimited toppings option. However, I was concerned when I noticed that the staff member adding my toppings wasn't wearing gloves. Proper hygiene practices are essential in food handling, and it would be beneficial for the shop to ensure all staff members wear gloves while preparing food. It was very disappointing for me and I don’t recommend to go there at all.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7yiVdfEXFD9mOxSXU7-a5hDs1pQH-MS3VeGJs&fid=0x0:0x9b91f9f9fa419a44"],"When":"2024-5-14"},{"Name":"Lakshit Kataria","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZmYRuGL2oYEBPaZTokFt7w-VijvpWf3hnqdKzxVrxpDhWMYeG=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I'm absolutely blown away by this pizza shop! The crust is perfectly cooked, crispy, and flavorful, while the toppings are fresh, generous, and varied. The sauce is tangy and rich, just right! The service is top-notch - friendly, attentive, and fast delivery. The ambiance is cozy, clean, and welcoming, making it a great spot to grab a pie.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ayaan Mahooney","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKreFF4Jp08mEXiKKbtOTha208x7OGEkkoLS77PEoUZir_Uuw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Freshslice pizza is always a winner, but this location takes the crown! The staff here is incredibly friendly and welcoming. It's really inspiring to see a young couple owning and running this spot with such passion. Definitely worth a visit for both the delicious pizzas and the heartwarming atmosphere!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7P-df8bhSPOjoWMwQguOyPC8Pz2BAGWW8xPQ_&fid=0x0:0x9b91f9f9fa419a44"],"When":"2024-4-24"},{"Name":"Liam Bassetto","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI7Wc94he_Fv9ZV0PACxI2ew_06dTizhZ9qK0TIYRmxhUAHeeY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This was genuinely one of the worst pizzas I have ever eaten. It came unevenly cut (looked like a mix and match pizza) the consistency was wet, elasticy, and dry. It was so bad looking my friends laughed at me upon receiving my 2 pizzas. I cannot stress enough how gross this pizza was. Never again #shouldhaveordereddominos","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cassandra Guichon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVCOUAvQZPCHAI-HIXoAlC47g26IkXrrVcl70ck4AhzuhcsnnQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went in for lunch today for the first time. Pizza was pipping hot and delicious. The lady at the counter made sure to ring us up in the way that was the most cost effective. Three of us had lunch for just over twenty one dollars","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Binny Kadam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWeMsu4Su9m_rdLA8bDwvB9SA8-ioKmc5Rfra8vDFLkzUdWGdmtGg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered freshslice  pickup. When I picked it up I could tell it had been sitting for awhile because the box was not warm. Took it home and picked up a slice and it was like picking up a spaghetti noodle. All the toppings slid off. The pizza looked under cooked . Not visiting this location again 0/5 star","Images":null,"When":""}]
