user_reviews: [{"Name":"Maya Schouten","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUO9x8oFl1z-2ncMLmfWu71Y053fpa-t4BYxDTv_0_AzOsAsA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Mona Pizza in Maple Ridge is a standout. Their service is top-notch, the crust on their pizzas is crispy and bursting with flavor, and their prices are competitive. Plus, they offer a wide selection of sodas to complement your meal. It's a must-visit for pizza lovers in Maple Ridge. My favourite pizza in town.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPsTPpoeJwwjJy5GBR9WWMrnlmv5MJ48gaJt-s\u0026fid=0x0:0xf4884f71279ae235"],"When":"2024-5-30"},{"Name":"Sonia Sareen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLiDW-rt0-DUnaWiyEifM9hg1rz-r3JSXx6bsiUf6kZL83eNA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Recently, we got a chance to try this hidden gem of maple ridge. My friend was recommending big Brand name like Pizza Hut, domino, Panago but I don't know why I choose this store for our special dinner party. we placed a Quite big order. it was Game day n they were super Busy. We ordered a lots of different items almost all items.  At the time of picking up the order, we felt some thing extra which makes them different from other pizzas store. we noticed that they have a huge variety of pizzas, drinks \u0026  they told us that they are serving keto crust, gluten free crust, vegan cheese, plant based pepperoni etc. Amazing everything at one place. they  Gave us few  complimentary drinks. which was interesting, who don't like free Stuffs. Store was Super clean, staff was very helping but still we were not sure about the taste of food because it was our first order so we all were very excited. we came back to the hotel \u0026 we start to try every item \u0026 we were speechless, all items were made with fresh \u0026 proper balanced ingredients n sauce. Pizzas \u0026 chicken wings were Awesome. it was so delicious that after finish it my friend order some food again. everyone enjoyed a lot at that day. Everyone were appreciating  my suggestion \u0026 we are waiting that when we can go there for have this food again. Everyone should try this small n locally family owned business. Highly recommend.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"martin andersen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK5isR81obH5tVmlSlmgLEcHdDcK4UjDh0_nAgkfHIul6d-HA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I feel this owner goes way out of his way to please the customer. I haven’t been eating a lot of pizza lately, but decided today was the day, I ordered one large pizza, only like $23 worth. And selected to pick it up at 12:00-12:30 pm, not realizing they didn’t open until 3:00pm. When I arrived to pick up the order the sign said open, but I noticed the business hours were 3:00-11:00pm. When I walked in the owner said he saw the order and drove straight to the store to make the pizza. I felt super bad for unconvincing him on his time off, but was super happy to have the pizza. And the pizza was amazing, I will definitely be ordering again very soon.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Laura Edwardson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJX6nOwhdj3WIXQTRA7h6KjuT6TDLLu_XlCd0QcX5edLKznOw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I just ordered a baked lasagne from Mona’s and Wow! It’s my first time here and I have lived in Maple Ridge for 30 years… what I have been missing. The flavors ( especially the tomatoes that tasted off the vine ) and the good cheese ratio at a great price were all impressive ! Thank you, I’ll be back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Salij Shrestha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKjVCJE6xjPX3-rWN_UqcMn6I0MeVIv265rCmUawjOV-IJZDA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The dedication of this restaurant to serve customer is unmatched. Perfect taste combination and accurate delivery timing is what has made me regular customer of Mona Pizza. I prefer to call their cook pizza artist as they always amaze me with the freshness and flavours.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Juan Pulido","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLcXPRJOi53Zd0i5CXX5r2JtJPzQfXYXCZgjSW1_EUe5BIR5g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Mona Pizza has by far the best vegan pizza in Maple Ridge or maybe the whole GVRD. My son has dietary restrictions due to allergies and have tried many different restaurants and store bought pizzas and could not find one that he liked. He loves Mona Pizza and asks for it whenever its family Pizza Night. Please keep up the good work, we are customers for life.\n\nPS - we love that they have Jarritos too! :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nakia Maher","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVNHq13yHIHj7Vld6XI4uJaAXCOznlMvaF8kTpZD78kZ_-d4ERO=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Just ordered from here. Pizza was bla and barely any toppings. Got a 2 large pizzas  a meat lovers with jalapeño and I did a 50 50. Half taco half cheese burger.   All were lacking in the meat  especially the taco. Took off the  lettuce and tomato and there was barley any meat or cheese. Also had wings. They were ok. For over 80 dollars this was not worth it 😒   will  not be ordering from here again","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nishtha Arora","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJMmzHFddSpR6IkZJ7L7mtJ9zjaN8kJdGBphf-20HelYse2dw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hidden gem of maple ridge. Pizza , chicken wings all stuff was delicious, we tried keto pizza with plant based pepperoni \u0026 vegan cheese pizza. highly recommend. 10 out of 10 \u0026 they have a huge variety of specialty drinks. everyone must try.","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"정아현","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIYqa-48Dq6u23zPV1iv0XNcmFP6JtG6u_xnRhqCBMgeuIhBg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had Texas Smokehouse rap with chicken, it has really great taste and lots of vegetables and fiber like corns, rice, avocado, black beans. The size was bigger than I expected so I think It is worth to pay 13dollars for rap. (Somothii is also good!) Though I cannot speak English very well, they were so nice and they help me ordering the food. 5 stars for sure","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipME2Mpbnvck-rlbxuk9vAyicHh-HfNWlE5DXq07&fid=0x0:0x39acfd116e028355"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"Joanne Antoniak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTQwhPcO13h_HhVjJVUrwpHjU5MeesKhPrxV5pA1ymdZ1edFkY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Tried their 2 for $20 dinner plate special - it was delicious.  Ordered online (first time). Web ordering was very simple and order was ready when we arrived.

Return visit May 2023.  Ordering online is SO EASY - they have an amazing website.  Orders are completely customizable - and site is simple to navigate.  Choose a time for pick up and it's ready when you arrive!  Win Win","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0XaIHY36LIo3deo49TFOYhgoDtlW_ibWkjU6P&fid=0x0:0x39acfd116e028355"],"When":"2022-6-24"},{"Name":"parsia ilbeigi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIrauC9mIXpBB2Z4VuZVwA78eL8RJUbqOg2Y7QBn2dUsHwUUw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Unfortunately, this business is overcharging customers for certain items when ordered on delivery apps.

Their Texas SmokeHouse BBQ burrito, can be purchased in store for 13.99 Plus Tax, this includes the protein (steak) as well.

When you order this same burrito on door dash or Uber eats, the Texas smokehouse is listed for $15.99 and as you select it, you are prompted to add your protein as an additional add-on ($5.19 for steak) bringing the total to $21.18. This is not including delivery fee and door dash software fee or tips, those are ofcourse separate. This effectively increase the cost to consumer by 25% while this isn’t something suggested or sanctioned by the franchise head office.

I brought this discrepancy to the attention of store staff on two separate occasions though unfortunately I realized, this seems to be a “mistake” on purpose and they are unjustly over charging customers.

Hope they act with honesty and in good faith and rectify this mistake.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alex","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVxP-ADvohB6hXpEbci04qD4fdlJ8qjEvYJvIIZqjiOIuWU9BVM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The veggies were nice and fresh, but even after ordering double meat, it was hard to find any chicken in my wrap…also the chicken was just precooked white rubbery strips. Not great value for $18","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mohit Goel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL0hRDKwVpFO5gjJ4Qj5ihJHS-drEDJGcb8VC--UUyxGwD_3w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Today ,i visited the store and its my first time to visit freshi and i don’t know about anything and the employee her name is suman, she help me to choose the food and she suggest me the chipotle chedar bowl and she also suggest me to try smoothie i try strawberry one it was really tasty 😍😍","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Amrita Pritam Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWtUkd4Lc-f5qmM3jgAqo8SuCiW3kquBLO93VAicE8k1o8Vlkvv=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We just stopped by for quick lunch and the employee working there was super nice and helpful. We really liked the customer service she provided.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"vatsal Badshah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUFSKm7KezIXpgflXN8wXGBu11gD_leob38rBTQPu7D8yjlv3Z6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"5 stars for their customer service. I wasn't sure what to eat. One of the girl from staff suggested something. It really worked. I didn't bought a drink though due to high suger content but like their bowl. I know price could be a bit high but think about it before putting two day old food to your stomach and freshly chopped and made...","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlBjCycJXqnNvITYqv1_8aEm5h_AwFiGW8j9Fd&fid=0x0:0x39acfd116e028355"],"When":"2020-2-22"},{"Name":"Jonathan Hung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXcyx4J66dX-2K0eJPsLn9dFQ4eU3qrPUFN-1LCa-9QqLBvskz2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Had a Fiesta salad and Cobb salad, both were fresh and tasty but some pieces of lettuce were still long,whole, and uncut up.  For almost $10 you think these salads would be filling but they are hardly filling.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMHE2yayvMA_aFWQwf3Q5xalfVP8wzOJepTsyi2&fid=0x0:0x39acfd116e028355"],"When":"2017-10-16"}]

The BC roll was dry, the BBQ and smoked salmon were not fresh, and the BBQ salmon was more like canned salmon, the cucumber was soft, dark and not crisp, the lettuce was cut into huge chunks, like a salad, the overall appearance of the rolls was definitely not appetising. This will be the first and last time I use your services.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPbSbkN0I7EH8edJ_mQbBA2u8nD75c94-vUCN7J&fid=0x0:0x571c55c99147cad"],"When":"2024-11-10"},{"Name":"Olivia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI8FHEV2jJpqQKxRRah5S0AcrOdPUSs4gnI91GQDoM_Fo6y9w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place never disappoints. (salmon, bacon&maple syrup) They are really good at fried menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOuzVcsGya_mLh0gPSn5mfuwRET8qGXHCPBS2Hf&fid=0x0:0x571c55c99147cad"],"When":"2022-5-17"},{"Name":"Adam Flores","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWe4BRmj5KQqIAAUG5nAnmdw7_yQFCU9UsNd4ZM98dGlhGwNFOK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A great sushi restaurant! I bought a maple family party and an assembly line platter. A lot of food for a low cost. I also like the unique menu with funny sushi names like the barbie roll and sweating moose roll. I would suggest anyone to come here for good sushi on a budget.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN87Zany4bmidEpnQTvNK3CpUwyhsyTL1cF1sEX&fid=0x0:0x571c55c99147cad"],"When":"2023-1-15"},{"Name":"Cynthia P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXg93SXj5dd4sLMrVK8VK4t9n4YdsIr74HXqTAORL0LtXv2ihq7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This places defines the beauty of small businesses. This is a place that truly cares about the food they serve and the customers they serve the food to. I was so impressed of the livelihood that this place brings even before I walked in. You can tell the owners/operators are artsy, crafty, and have a genuine heart for the community.

Plus, this is one of the most vegetarian friendly sushi restaurants I have been to. Definetly the most veggie friendly in maple ridge. As for the food, creative and delicious! And they even have me miso soup and jellies as a free add on from ordering two rolls. Thank you maple sushi, truly!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJjso_yPj9tKM3WcUup-UXpVg_wkU4n7UCq7YB&fid=0x0:0x571c55c99147cad"],"When":"2020-10-10"}]

[{"Name":"victor taranu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL9-I1BRCI2zUhlWdK71N6QnQNCFLeycmH9auCsTSCkdl4xTQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time visiting Caspian Market, and it definitely won’t be the last! I was thoroughly impressed with the friendly staff, excellent service, and wide variety of pastries.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMosgWw1muknbUTPit0PkqdIMDIQmmI7KT3LBET&fid=0x0:0x90475e66604762ab"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"Farzad Kharrati","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqyYq3YnGLjHn-U6oSl2RmgGTbeOpeHnFQ0H0TaPLDiQSCLNMI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Caspian Market in Maple Ridge is a fantastic Iranian market with so much to offer! They have an incredible selection of authentic Iranian bakery items and pastries, along with an excellent Halal meat section and a top-notch butchery. The quality of their products is outstanding, and it’s clear they take pride in providing traditional, high-quality ingredients. The store is well-organized, and the staff is friendly and always ready to help with any questions. Highly recommend Caspian Market for anyone looking for authentic Iranian flavors and quality Halal meats in Maple Ridge!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shahrzad Akbari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8GbthkuszzKkedlWMTCOaI1jlQHuTMB8DJnVRMZfgxH0XqLu7=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I just wanted to thank you for the amazing pastries for our recent work event. Everything was perfectly on time, and the sweets were incredibly fresh and delicious! My colleagues were so impressed with both the taste and the presentation—they all asked me to send their thanks as well. Thank you!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Naser","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0-YQ8zU5RxMjX7Szhrzpzf3k8mT3TPmCIoVpC7Yu8SS5YsZfI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great selections of Iranian groceries. meat, sausages, hams,bakery , and lranian bread.

Definitely recommend this place!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9pNb5dDD2fhjsOMbb3D_rGNPaAJD7SCD3Ot05\u0026fid=0x0:0x8bf4529f0206c17a"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"Lloyd Smyth","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJO73zP8fsm01W-SAdN2zsTkTfpqxLYY4H2ASnShCMTC_XL9w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super fresh, large portion sizes, and well presented. Picked up about 10 different rolls - Caterpillar and Philadelphia Rolls were the standouts - plus prawn tempura, which was fried fresh when we picked it up. Platters were well presented and food was tasty and fresh. Will be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMhl0-wbJUbWaYt6wbxF3wQPQoqi7G4vQphAOf4\u0026fid=0x0:0x8bf4529f0206c17a"],"When":"2023-7-9"},{"Name":"trey cadwell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqIhI2ppmGALlBkP02vLh_vmipEAZxdmziaDnqsHzCbyayla3m=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Shinobi Restaurant Is a great place to get your food, The atmosphere is welcoming for the limited space they have, and the food is simply delicious. My meals are beautifully presented. The staff is friendly and really helpful with recommendations. They keep me coming back so often that they know my name!  If you’re in the mood for a place that truly showcases hard work and amazing flavors, Shinobi is definitely worth checking out! Hard working people.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sarah Chapin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXSKmyiBfSu7SFbuYZiy6cfd7E4Q0OM1PMOJfDQpNxZ5I7ZwQU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our family loves sushi and this is our go to. user_reviews: [{"Name":"D L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKhLImqrHTCGIXoFB4QEyr6EtuDMQdMBNlk7VTCBFhqqz4PtQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I took my kids here a few weeks back for the first time and got a pizza.  We were the only people in the place at the time.   The woman helping us was pleasant and was nice to my kids.   The pizza was very good and even my picky son loved it.   The only complaint I'd have is that despite being the only ones there,  it took a long time to get our food.   We'll still come back but it would help to be faster.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lynsey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIT6Gx6kp3DtwWJz6twbU2GeKKnWkOvwxBgiCmmyZEV5usC=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had my son’s 3rd birthday party here! The staff was friendly and helpful! They even accommodated a child that had a dairy \u0026 egg allergy with a special pizza! The play area was clean \u0026 we even got a fun Chase character included in the birthday package! The kids loved it! Will definitely have his birthday party here again next year \u0026 visit for dine in \u0026 play! Thank you!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOTb0c759RkHs1qFLVCHQshjDeI_58-7Wbhzs0\u0026fid=0x0:0x86b3c7c731b93f56"],"When":"2024-3-13"},{"Name":"Tim Gal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7mllXiK_Cw0FVQ-yFawrF8kQhE1T8pCfMvOGEm68OOnQGDG4y4A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best pizza in Maple Ridge! You pay a little more, but you get what you pay for. Loaded with toppings, lots of cheese, and the cheese is on top the way a pizza should be. Highly recommend!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgM_wMXqe5KQ3QYWzvm996kyQ4aROme-vmh4m1\u0026fid=0x0:0x86b3c7c731b93f56"],"When":"2024-5-19"},{"Name":"Laine D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLIMPisZvLKzaOf052zpgqGmEkj-3aomQuyDEvyGDCG2jEsnw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best take out Pizza and Baked Pasta I have had in many years.  This was my first time ordering from Jim's as my neighbor recommended them to me today.  The service was above par.  The food was cooked properly, hot and flavorful.  Pizza crust was delicious \u0026 fresh and supported an ample layer of toppings \u0026 cheese.  Real Pepperoni was spicy \u0026 higher standard.  The baked pasta was cooked like I would cook it at home and the meat sauce was seasoned with just enough heat on the tongue.  Everything was Excellent.  This is now my go to in Maple Ridge for Italian Take Out food.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"jackie spears","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQSpIRsoeLZKzPhRjMQrTuHhWXI2eeJUv_G6fSe8jGwzpSrvc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Jim's pizza is very very tasty. They didn't have Margarita pizza on the menu and the server who answered the phone had never had one so she is definitely going to try it after this review.  Besides the cheese both my mom and I agree this was a 4 out of 5 pizza and we would definitely reorder from Jim's again. Loved how the store put the fresh basil and Parm cheese in little containers so it wouldn't get wilted much appreciated 🙌\nThank you for letting me create my own pizza and I definitely recommend you add it to your menu 🍽️🥰💕 also make sure to get mozzarella cheese for this pizza and to have olive oil drizzled on-top for an added bonus 😃😋🤸","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8DGcCxw-ilPE-hbXd65t_ET9F2_1OxnOcyCq3\u0026fid=0x0:0x86b3c7c731b93f56"],"When":"2021-8-5"},{"Name":"Ginzo Milani (Monckey100)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZJAMXcJZ4Q-fVQ1hK4TmeQ5-UBO877OkkYfk78A4TFUsqJzc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The pizza is high quality, good drag and had stringiness to it. The cheese to tomato ratio is perfectly sitting at a 1.5:1 allowing the pizza to be gooey, Jim's has a wide variety of dips which just adds to the greatness. The cheese bread is appetizing and great, but I wish it was easier to share. The staff is very polite and really cares about the experience, waitress was friendly, this tops amongst the pizza places I've been to in Vancouver as within the top 10, it might even be top 3 but I would have to try their other pizzas. This is the small pizza and it comfortably feeds 2 people, when I return I'll probably get a larger pizza to take home and test the leftover capabilities. I'll edit this review when I do, for now if you want high end, this is definitely top tier in maple, Coquitlam, Poco and nearing cities given that there is few high quality pizza places. Jim's is unique in that it offers steak and salad as well, but that is a review for another day. Closing remarks is the appetizers for the price could be better shared, but the pizza is very competitively priced and the quality exceeds the price point, great value! Total score √ 95/100","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCO5iiv2MJytOqoOEdMfI2yyddfYUJaXApuDbM\u0026fid=0x0:0x86b3c7c731b93f56"],"When":"2021-7-13"},{"Name":"mallory haddon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJeq4qBPKlBGox9VAoFrGo0qJUo3kw75QQ9bcGFNPyoRriktA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"OMG!! Love this place. So happy with the new ownership. The quality is just excellent. Pizza is loaded with toppings. Had a family event and it was the perfect place. We had excellent service and the food was just perfect. What a great place to go with a large group or for date night. Jim's will be our go to place from now on. 100% recommend!! Best in Maple Ridge.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN31d92ZABKGlHqIwrO_92-1CTjNkhqhoBTNrlK\u0026fid=0x0:0x86b3c7c731b93f56"],"When":"2021-7-22"},{"Name":"Antonio Vidal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXh_xAWsf04qNgEzZEcU9YIpjJ4mya_-AYPRaWQ1_Pj-gNwn70DRg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Their chicken and fries are good. Pizza is decent. Service was a bit slow but otherwise ok.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNRxtR_CQitKNdPvgx7lBykd7t9agKrX9IPXp_H\u0026fid=0x0:0x86b3c7c731b93f56"],"When":"2022-5-3"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPi8sRijUsu9llNYT3I-sR3ScNW7ZyiXxstfCg5BogBKRJ4AVO=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"A big Mary Brown’s fan here, never ordered from this Mary Brown’s, and the food was very much below quality. The mashed potatoes were dry and looked like crumpled flour chunks, and there was no gravy in there at all. The chicken was alright, but i’m so ruined by their mashed potatoes performance tonight because their mashed potatoes are usually smooth, flavourful and the best.

First time ordering, would not order again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGOiOJ6Ge1fjgSAyw9aY9jrIc4jkJHBNAQMtEy&fid=0x0:0xec9dc2f92c70bd20"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Helen R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUCbxoYK7OzzvURDW5v9by_T_p7QjfLy2ItI2-8MkpGJbiZBjDp=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pleasant experience at this Mary Brown’s location, customer service was great! Our favs were the chicken pop-ins and the k-crunch burger. The chicken was juicy and fresh, cannot wait to come back and try the other items on the menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOs-hcAP6u5qqgRYcylV4Pfq1dQnKMmiMK6ump5&fid=0x0:0xec9dc2f92c70bd20"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"roger ren","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVbZmMngTgALDmAXLrB5Z4F38AmsLSpi0apJkfqMS3B8E2Fod5w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a great time dining at Mary Brown! The food was delicious and freshly prepared. I ordered the chicken sandwich and 2 pieces of chicken, and it was perfectly cooked with great flavor. The service was fast and friendly, which made the whole experience even better. The staff were attentive, and the restaurant was clean and well-maintained","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tracy G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKya3bJqbpfKv6rakAxCiPjR2WZ_OCBbXQAbcLl4HAoV30-Tw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Just picked up the 3 pc chicken tenders combo and a spicy mayo big Mary. They could’ve done much better on the batter as you can see. The big Mary has 2 pcs of tenders or something. No Louisiana sauce in the store. The girl was super nice but this place is typically lacking attention to food and presentation. It wasn’t busy either. Sad representation. And I love Me some mary browns. 🙁","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPW8u9RhV7UIlRwG9oStmIh7PnITlG9tnvT-cro&fid=0x0:0xec9dc2f92c70bd20"],"When":"2024-4-6"},{"Name":"Elizabeth M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXuhhJ3L27gYQJMwvKARhYEqE4v9PowLqfpDtvNV5G-CUir9-oeQg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I will start off by saying that the customer service we received was excellent. just pleasant. The quality of the food however was a whole other experience. My husband ordered a chicken breast on the side which was $4.00 i have attached a picture of what the "chicken breast" looked like. This was not a chicken breast. And to charge a customer $4.00 for that is a complete rip off. I specifically asked foe no pickles because i dislike pickles with a passion so i make sure that i let them know. As you can see in the receipt it says no pickles but my chicken sandwich had pickles. Plenty. The tator tots were cold. We were eating in the parking lot and they were cold yet we waited at least 15 min. To get out meal which is no problem if the quality of foof is good. This was such a disappointment and we will not be wasting our money here again oe the new one you are getting ready to open in pitt meadows. I hope whoever is reading this reviews takes this feedback serious because you are a brand new bussiness and having so much negative feedback is not good. Do better.
A year later let me add more. I emailed you guys and no one ever got back to me. My husband decided to give you guys a try again and this time it was even worst. You had 2 guys working there looking really dirty. His nails had dirt under them and he was all greasy. I really don't know how you guys stay in business. Literally ripping people off. You guys suck. Literally the worst place ever!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO6sdouKr5XlONx3ASdC2_vULA7pj7qvCRW2A1H&fid=0x0:0xec9dc2f92c70bd20"],"When":"2022-8-21"},{"Name":"Andy Whynot","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ6Wx1H81P4sGWekCIkluthtIbEKcAsj-XhC6tN8JY4pnUraQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Popped in tonight for a small snack and decided the wings looked a treat. After being greeted with a warm smile, I got into a short discussion about the different wing flavours on offer. The nice young lady said her favourite was definitely the new “Swicy” one - a cross between sweet and spicy. She was right; the wings with that sauce were delicious.

Great service, lovely, very clean restaurant and no annoying germ-ridden key attached to a shoe-horn needed to use their very clean washrooms.

Will go back for more for sure. Great place for a quick snack.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shinn Inagaki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIpF1gPQ6II9FjL7HoACMWpgmrVznxivHZdomkvTJ9wRIkWHw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good chicken 🍗  I had Korean burger and it was good but it tasted better without the pickles.🥒","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNXyQBa7fSzd3uK8fy7mplU9NzRm3Gap51cFOA&fid=0x0:0xec9dc2f92c70bd20"],"When":"2024-7-24"},{"Name":"June Palmer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocINNQVf0VMp_AM8GsS_vy48JkwARaLb0Qmlm21riwu4voOVJRU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"My friend and I thought we would try the $4.99 Monday Mary's chicken burger. First of all the tables were filthy, we had to ask someone to clean a table so we could sit down. The chicken burgers were horrible, soggy bun, hard chicken, my friend could not finish hers. The fries were
good but this is Mary Brown's CHICKEN!","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Aloha Life Co
address: 11952 224 St, Maple Ridge, BC V2X 6B3
about: [{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Coffee","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Leah Amenta","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbJaWvmcQw_EfaaoRdZC_fpBnVIV4vnJE06ww-9NAPcat813_d=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a wonderful time at the Aloha Cafe for my son’s 1st Birthday! Rima helped me book Elmo and order food prior to the event, and on the day of our server Michelle was super helpful and kind! Everyone had such a great experience and we were able to arrive early to decorate the space. Elmo was great with the kids and stayed for so long! Lots to do for all ages including ball pit, arcade games, play house etc… pizza was delicious too and loved that we could bring in our own food. The pricing is so reasonable on top of it, you can’t beat it! I will definitely be booking the Aloha Cafe again ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQnLJE4VPI2QAPkNFNXrmS2_Tenp1xukg8Aeog&fid=0x0:0x62f21fedf421055a"],"When":"2024-5-27"},{"Name":"Lauren Hunt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVMYl6Wv_F3ffdzwu4_MhX21hRFeWlQ31KIs0KW4zL9H5T8PvFT=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We hosted a 2nd bday party here and I cannot say enough good things!!! The facility was spotless and perfectly set up for kids to play and adults to sit and chat.  Kids ages 2-7 had an awesome time playing! The pizza was delicious! The staff were friendly and incredibly accommodating. Truly excellent experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMeUYAcfe6f2f5-iGvevP4ps2ZUzmabEJ6-Wg1e&fid=0x0:0x62f21fedf421055a"],"When":"2023-12-24"},{"Name":"Shantel H W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIVtiyOaVrK9B4JHg4ZlFLUWMwPzywgiPlcXIDDfeoSFgugEA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We hosted a first birthday party here. It was the perfect venue for it. The space is large, we were able to fit 40 guests comfortably. The staff were amazing, so accommodating and helpful. The pizzas and drinks provided in the party package were great. We would 100% book again and recommend to friends.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQL1omcSxKl9MqqLzKh-3hnKj1aGC5uIcHfW8J&fid=0x0:0x62f21fedf421055a"],"When":"2024-3-25"},{"Name":"Ian S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnIweQefHIKXB4TSy173mlt6k5no4mtO7wOwT2InfbgT7xO4Vm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing experience for my daughter’s first birthday party! The perfect place to keep kids ages 0-5 entertained! Even had Minnie Mouse character come visit the kids. Pizza is very underrated as well, almost all of my guests said they would come back for the pizza alone ! Highly recommend hosting a party here!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Aram Govahi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJIDqpLJV9KrWaKp1usrFyy1QqrQzLXAVVZP2JEq6s8ISZZ8Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We just had my son’s 4th bd party at Aloha Life and our experience was exceptional. Our server was an absolute pleasure to work with. I rarely leave any reviews but for this one I had to. The venue is fun for the kids and the atmosphere is warm and welcoming. Big windows which contributes to a very good lighting. I felt like I had full support hosting with our server navigating me throughout the party for the best planning while also having a baby in my hands.  It’s a shame that I don’t remember her name. Thank you so much for making our experience the best one.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jazzie Noori","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVTtIfQbrtximwkByQGrZoPvxe3vGcM9WRqzzrgm_c3Nfd4s892=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We hosted our sons birthday here & the staff was absolutely amazing & super helpful The space was super clean & big. recommend this place to everyone!!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Heather May","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIFvutmmlU_4LiMeMxFpRXAr3ZyIQJXIUB22xC3MHESP01Cug=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I hosted a baby shower here and would definitely recommend this location for any event you are planning.   So clean and spacious. The staff were kind and helpful.  Loved the lounge area perfect place to sit to open gifts.  Will be using this location again. Thank you.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Danielle Lloyd-jones","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL48yy4mh9w8t64wxHWp6iKZlsRg_oXAWxcBwon9zmLsd5v2A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Reading through these reviews I believe that some people definitely don’t realize that you are renting out a space NOT a person to take care of your children?

However, they do have an option to have someone entertain the kids at a very reasonable cost which Donna did for our sons 7th birthday. She made games specifically for his theme and when I tell you these kids had a good time, it’s no joke. They were drenched in sweat, smiles and shirtless by the end of it! - my son still talks about it!

We have now had 2 birthday parties with Aloha equally as amazing. We just had our daughters 2nd party yesterday and it was even better than imagined. 2.5 hrs of fun, tons of toys set up, the space to yourself and they clean up when you leave!  Our server was amazing and so attentive! Im not sure why people are unhappy? But take it from me, give it a try yourself!  They also have drop in during the week which my daughter loves!!   Thanks Aloha ❤️ we will be back soon!

P.S - just to touch on the “unsafe” comments - I mean when are kids ever safe? That’s kind of OUR job as a their parents but also the HOST of the party to be watching the kids and making sure things are going smooth, right?

Danielle","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Dean Neuls","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK-ldoYAiNK2Rfz3hA905AluS0ADPwlhBpDD0hnO95yIZN2WA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Was running late at work, so I ordered the kids pizza and decided to try Papa John's. We are at the point with the cost of food that if something is premium priced, the expectations are high. Mediocrity is not acceptable. This was exactly that - premium priced and mediocre at best. We ordered an extra large New York style with 5 toppings - almost $40. I love New York style crust - this was a poor example. And my expectation for a $40 pizza is there are ample toppings. This might have well been a cheese pizza. Wouldn't order from them again","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rushikesh Patel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLGkRb3xTfZr92OycG69qjiZXHP2B7-GrD2avKbcJ1a9F_oNg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best pizza ever, hands down! Best location to go whenever you want. I've been here three times, and each time I always get hot, fresh pizza. They offer the greatest prices for takeout—a large pizza costs $14.99. Best customer service ever. The staff is friendly and supportive.

Yehh Papa Johns 👍🏻","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPFKQcyo9WSKkGYZ96HN4FMAUCe3wl6_zWl_Ywh&fid=0x0:0x28c6894a5eafb5ce"],"When":"2023-12-13"},{"Name":"Babak A. Motamed","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXSLUBMACMFktAF7LCFKiJVAkXcrZua-PxFg_aIRmkJjZ524lw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Terrible customer service and super penny pinching topping portions all the time. Most recently, tao butter chicken pizzas purchased (pics below), both were almost entirely crust with no toppings. The staff member said I could have a credit for one but not both. Just called today to get that credit and the manager just argued with me. He was super unwilling and completely disinterested in making it right by replacing the pizza. It was all excuses about same-day complaints are only honored… he called the staff member who said he did not offer me a credit, a lie. Called me back refused to replace. Horrible customer management. Never going back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMhC4UqQFM1Jmi7BekQTOKd9HdNGkSTCKuKNOgL&fid=0x0:0x28c6894a5eafb5ce"],"When":"2023-7-8"},{"Name":"Atta ur Rehman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWfP-uHGuOjNlwega8Aa8Q6U79Y36rf7Yw4iv4u70HENp3xYQo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was 2nd time ordering from this place last night and had great experience, loved their pizza crust, it’s different then others plus got a good deal 🙌🏻on Pizza, B1G1 free🫡","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mohamed Atoui","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIuFhgWnSeCbBiuEef1iiehTcMnL9I8di85KUg_ai8AHRW9zw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Seriously the grossest, most unsafe place to eat. Worst of all, when I took the wings back to them, they provided the worst customer service and offered to put the food that they gave me back in the oven (1. It’s extremely unsanitary and against the health code, 2. It’s disgusting).
As for the Donair Pizza that I’ve ordered, it had pepperoni in it, which wasn’t mentioned in the description + I am allergic to. The lady told me to “just pick it off”…
Honestly, I ordered food over $100; and had 8 invitees at my place, however, I had to leave the gathering and my night ruined due to their extremely rude and bad customer service.

LONG STORY SHORT, AVOID!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9ASHVic6rkM9y6fF5YR_ZQQm0oK-R94Tj_7Az&fid=0x0:0x28c6894a5eafb5ce"],"When":"2021-12-1"},{"Name":"Maya Schouten","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUO9x8oFl1z-2ncMLmfWu71Y053fpa-t4BYxDTv_0_AzOsAsA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The staff here are always so friendly and upbeat. I’ve never had a bad pizza from this location. The franchise always has good deals.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Maxwell MacLean","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7KxOjTuwjbLSfVFWW6f48NPtMIUjijdXK9g2nEeNoBEXfZBxm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Paid $4 for extra pinapple (SEE PIC of what $4 looks like) they took the meat off the pineapple side, and theres like 1 nub of pinapple on each slice.

Called the restaurant before making this review, and guess what, your bad attitude has now caught you a 1*

I understand inflation blah blah blah, but you need to understand, if you're gonna charge double for everything,  then my expectations for quality have now doubled too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9tvtW94bCaB996qJBHeirJd6K4f2143ju2L07&fid=0x0:0x28c6894a5eafb5ce"],"When":"2023-12-7"},{"Name":"Devin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZXQ0j0-Oxo1lENe7epB3fe22RHqlVyqh8Qg3P2f8ataiCqdu6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Simply disappointed with the staffs attitude, super immature and rude. They messed up my wing order and gave me bbq wings instead of buffalo. After calling them they simply said they could not do anything about it. Whatever happened to the customer is always right in the food industry ? Both the pizza and bbq wings were disgusting and cold as well. Here are some pictures below. Will not be returning.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipML13f1eRu8pdirQ97IDmW5eFzbmex7L2XEVKX-&fid=0x0:0x28c6894a5eafb5ce"],"When":"2021-12-23"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Darlene Neilson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXaBBALmRIi6wnEY-u0hQrUjwKfBJSCTdpXEYcgQGS1CLI2ONTW=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My \"Go-To\" place whenever I'm in town. (live 500 kms away). This time I brought my son, promising the best Fish and Chips in town. I didn't break my promise. :-)  Thanks again. (The waitress (I have a feeling the owner) is always pleasant, friendly and efficient.)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Taz e Bear","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWUZQyNVNSfKOL9C89OWIJAxQIkFj-drpgJaXIBnJ3XH8o9jkaH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great little gem if you like Fish n Chips. All you can eat or order from the menu. Staff are very friendly and fairly fast. Seniors all you can eat special on Wed. Restaurant is wheel chair accessible and has lotts of parking.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dennis Gane","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWK2vTygrzeOffxfKsRU6ycdG1u0olNgxzT4KW4dGrgRw_eMLtMtA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had the halibut, my guest had the cod. Both were cooked perfectly. The chips were equally as good. Service was great. Our only complaint, we couldn't get a beer which we usually order when we get together.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlilbQ4F-Y-aud2Bps28avW0Pmpp5lhD4LPFc8\u0026fid=0x0:0x10cf6cad12a4e22f"],"When":"2022-6-1"},{"Name":"David Stad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW5l7mEZU8POrNzNAcIgD4chabfqKK0MZv5ZtoBMaF1HMlG51M=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I'm not a huge fan of seafood but the fish and chips here are absolutely delicious and the service was great. Will definitely return again and most certainly highly recommend this restaurant to anyone looking for a place to dine.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOa2CSw-MqfpmOTJFAEZjGrv9KbDbtTUyVwlmYE\u0026fid=0x0:0x10cf6cad12a4e22f"],"When":"2020-10-19"},{"Name":"Miki T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXBhewQkFjym4W5VgNZvZYdtFOxcMTcXNtIdoiSqPsZaNGQgntj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered Seafood Combo with Pollock  $22.99 and my husband order \"all you can eat with Cod\". user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mehran bakhtiari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX52_I8QBEvpbwP2DsvccLDQ1hUjTB0qEjwNL_660Q7Wjozcaqk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"At first glance, this is a quiet, clean and relatively new Mall.

But most of the shops are closed or empty and it gives you the feeling of a dead city. It's like you went to a city in the northern province.

The condition of the toilet was horrible, the photo explains the conditions and I don't need to write anything.

Maybe this shopping center needs a better management so that I can return to the top","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_64-omtlN-UryU35pSfQTO7RjSe7MdMy-qFCq&fid=0x0:0xf006d009f0be3def"],"When":"2024-10-25"},{"Name":"Paulina Pedrero Miranda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXoiOld2vaC2Dv18bWNi8EDRiykD7MSCRsU3RK7RESh6xQghXxb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Its a little but safe mall, they have few stores open, but the parking is free and the options for shopping are not the best but not bad, the biggest stores like wallmart, dollar tree and big box outlet are great!, the food court is really small and maybe 3-4 options open.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPtvtFGgTUKPDUjNNwFlowlit2NmHRxKlmP_n7k&fid=0x0:0xf006d009f0be3def"],"When":"2024-5-5"},{"Name":"C. Miller","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnMBFwwQ2fx40qiL1zlDKnr03quKV9JK6QXbiidN9A9HO1zudR=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Gone downhill, they're only about 50% capacity and no longer have a food court worth stoping at. (3 options) on top of it all they have now hired a parking company to ticket you while you shop for Christmas. If you thought the few store on the opposite side of the parking lot can use their parking, think again, they're ticketing those stoping at Dollarama. Specifically targeted. Such a shame when your malls empty. Way to ruin everyone's Christmas.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Honest Reviews","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVl_RJiLpjoSSHQNI1bFecOPyiwUj0XgiSIq7NgMQEkkHMUFr6J=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Parking lot attendants are ridiculous. It's not worth going here because they are actively trying to ticket you.
2 minutes late to leave the mall? You'll have a ticket.
3 minutes over the allowed parking time?
Ticket.
It's almost like the mall is dying and instead of focusing on things that would have brought more people in, management thought it would be a good idea to clamp down on parking, in a lot that always has ample parking.
Maybe they are trying to kill it on purpose?
Either way we don't go anymore so you've lost an entire family as customers.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"phung pham","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKPbfrHCpvzKVUr-D7nEtzNxkvlcXQr_EbAjiww4SBYRwVFAw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very convenient location. Inside there are many shops, food courts, Walmart which is open to 10pm. This is convenient because you can make purchases after 9pm.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8qFk2qPFTkfa7YpHtdScSC48Ny-4jSY0cdmt5&fid=0x0:0xf006d009f0be3def"],"When":"2023-11-6"},{"Name":"dorian o","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXdLPVWmyTwaA0YLngPeffO414l-TIwvANnpEfo-xWb-OznA9xo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I can't recommend going here anymore if you have to park. With the parking staff ticketing you if they don't see you go into the mall, and getting downright abusive if you catch them trying to ticket you when you finish shopping at the mall.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Irina Aleksandrova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9aRRCpMeYTHR0MPDNGup_WlpR9G0h5tyD40deoUEIAONeBI8t=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Love hanging out in malls. However, this local mall is missing good store - would be amazing to have such go-to clothing stores as h&m, etc. Also, an indoor playground may attract new customers and help to develop the mall.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Laurie Fancy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUTw_JC-AawakEwBpIWBxOJmcpvKi2yNKfkGrhr1MPy4I_4Avih=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved 😍 checking out the NEW MISSION THRIFT STORE & BIG BOX!!  Superb prices!!  My hubby got his green 💚 UnderArmour shirt for $12!!!  Regular price was over $50-60...  Excellent deals!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlrHj93Uplp3_EoGgb-8pvK9QI_bxarzw6CbK1&fid=0x0:0xf006d009f0be3def"],"When":"2024-7-26"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"RICHIE WATTERS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX9oUKKu2XIt4xqmsQmmESsLxpATEw-c2eS19mkwl2F5PyRd93q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Got the Mango Shrimp Burrito. It was made quick. The guy working was nice. The presentation of the food was great and so was the quality. I live in Langley and usually go to that one but I was in Maple Ridge today so I thought I would try this one. I can say they are consistent with everything here as to the Langley location.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOi5JcR056j4QAyZvj6LsT7oDacNTxsUxNLIV0l\u0026fid=0x0:0x2d429a45f280d6fd"],"When":"2024-10-18"},{"Name":"Furo Ciousd","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW851IfOkxNRj4Tu5eOG9ui3_h-u_5dQabvZTE_4ywXIlDaGsdO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We love coming here it's usually quiet so we can sit wherever we want, food is always fresh and delicious, a single taco is like $7 and will fill you up! My daughter loves coming here and alternates between beef tacos, smash burger, or whatever special item they might have on. We visit more than we should but for $20 ish we are full, perfect for a busy day or day when you just don't know what to cook. ❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPCMYcRrHagyTuAFP9e3grqu-GW2vt6dZkESpAJ\u0026fid=0x0:0x2d429a45f280d6fd"],"When":"2024-5-14"},{"Name":"Daniel Kerray","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWstKt7tG-yuAbgC104e3a8f47n1rOsfU9W5Mf4nMEDoXnlInPI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Food was horrible. Smash burger was greasy mess. Basically meat and cheese on a bun. The fish tacos were disgusting. Litterally. I was choking on the first one and had to look at the second one and yuck! A dry piece of thin to no fish and batter no joke. We will never return again. Unfortunate as it looked promising.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZruIyn9ynugE0yQYCMk1m09bJZJyttSaOi2P7\u0026fid=0x0:0x2d429a45f280d6fd"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"S D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKJYsqsfylRWb2qB-xJh6bN2jntU-d5BqDo5FMP29y23P0aTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very clean little restaurant serving healthy and taste food.\nService was good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9fPIa9W70-wr0scotTuMp-icB33vkLIjONolD\u0026fid=0x0:0x2d429a45f280d6fd"],"When":"2024-12-1"},{"Name":"Rachael Hutchinson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKwCPba-u_HHMp0P2cqkw2U-ua9GKUt_1tADntqwICPQSQB1Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Streats is on my way home from work and easily accessible for a cheeky taco when I don't want to cook. Made fresh right in front of you, and you can even donate money to pay for someone else's food that can't afford it. 5 stars hands down","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Darren","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIqAYnZfYr_yicNTI01xXcn_Bs1Oa1aJd1bfgOKz_PMCBrIyw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lots of parking, good food. Burritos were wrapped tight and filled with fresh, hot cooked meat. I haven't had a single grain of rice fall out even if I put it down. Nice interior with modern music playing. Lot of food options other than bowls/tacos/burritos.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jazz Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJBHCxCTHiXVuPqtl34JmCBZu35ruW51P7cZ-YeDxoJeaMJSA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I can definitely say that strEATS offers an exceptional dining experience, blending bold, global flavors with a modern twist. The menu is innovative, featuring everything from mouthwatering tacos to an exquisite poutine that’s simply unforgettable. The service is immaculate, and the atmosphere is both vibrant and welcoming. Every bite feels like a culinary journey, making this hidden gem a standout. Highly recommended!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"AF Marketing","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPdZHxbhbOeibJn9XiyQqrcfmXro1ul-Qsns_fIQGg9H8CXQQ8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"WOW this was literally the best burrito I have had this far, and for vegetarian options it was surprising! 10/10 recommend for any vegetarians","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOFkhVETs82myHiIQmN-WwdEdOc8UBCHwhCFqDB\u0026fid=0x0:0x2d429a45f280d6fd"],"When":"2024-9-19"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kanako Sakurada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKYybgPjG_d3LYq66Ui47Ocd_2PMrfkKaju5V_L0IyVTR19lQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beautiful setting surrounded with flower garden and vegetable field!
Such relaxed feeling sitting outside sipping wine while hearing birds chirping.

Their food was indeed fresh, unique, and delicious! We had eggplants that melted in our mouth, gnocchi with crispy edge, and soft and juicy beef we savoured every bite.

Wine list was excellent, well thought out to match and balance their veggie forward menu. Wish I had space for a cocktail as well.
Every host and server was friendly, capable, and thoughtful. Very highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPccUEEvPsviuccafuN4mmn8dI3nyjbsF_thq5F&fid=0x0:0xb1af0fd0c39a122b"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Amin Jamshidifar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmawAHejbM9RGl-zt4ktWscRtuT9Yw9dT5UQi6bJKKTxEWL7buJw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently had the pleasure of dining at this restaurant and opted for the chef’s tasting menu. Each dish was a delightful surprise, with unique flavors and beautiful presentations. The highlight of the evening was the salmon—it was perfectly cooked, tender, and full of flavor, easily one of the best I’ve had (I forgot to take a picture of 😬). The attention to detail in every course was impressive, with creative combinations that kept me excited for what was coming next. The ambiance was cozy yet elegant. fantastic dining experience for anyone looking to explore innovative cuisine.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPFyGUCZBa1dr2me5a4Zin_xcu_yFkBYS-Vyjjc&fid=0x0:0xb1af0fd0c39a122b"],"When":"2024-9-19"},{"Name":"Tara Walker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKW1kTu76JveMo2p9nMhdKdTyIKHMDbXw1p-Yhzvh6-6nrVrg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We held our monthly book club here and what a beautiful location. The gazebos were intimate and the staff was top notch. The food was fresh and we loved that everything was locally sourced. One of the best meals I have ever had. 100% recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjelCZui9OHyNtgz9Yxw75h_i3eoLMt1L9232Q&fid=0x0:0xb1af0fd0c39a122b"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"Kaelen Cohen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW8VdHhgP1zfVxibP0FccLaIbx4KR3eXZIw2AzC2DGjQqLruhjpQA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Unforgettable birthday dinner for my wife. Our reservation was for 5:15 and it was pouring rain, however we had the most incredible time and the weather only added to the experience. We were warm under the patio heaters and they also supplied blankets for my wife.

Exceptional service and a visit from the chef was a nice touch. Everyone is extremely knowledgeable about the menu and entire process that goes into the operation. The staff were extremely attentive and the service was the best we've had in a long time. Refreshing to see again!

We will be back again for more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNca0zlnR9j15lLpEw6_buAapyPm_bOJCNDAyVj&fid=0x0:0xb1af0fd0c39a122b"],"When":"2024-6-3"},{"Name":"Annie Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIQqFhnb0FQdPjEiZPluCq2gc2XCF6bB-kKmmbsV_FIqXwnrw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’m surprised at how under the radar Sunflower Cafe is because this was such an amazing experience! It was true farm to table fine dining. I was so impressed with the food quality and presentation, the top-notch service and the super cute atmosphere! I definitely plan on coming back and introducing new people to this gem.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqipyDS2iHK7tP7h-q_zpmXSmC9a51w8tu3UmE&fid=0x0:0xb1af0fd0c39a122b"],"When":"2024-7-21"},{"Name":"Carlo Elstak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURmCYKbAxd9AVUBSqowG0Mo3Qt9rlKxFPXWrnkLHqMytAynY2iXQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We went to the Sunflower Cafe based on a recommendation by a friend. We visited there last week and we were not disappointed. The setting is quite unique in a charming tent-like setting adjacent to the farm. Despite its simplicity, it is an inviting and warm environment. We opted for the tasting menu with the matching wine pairing.
After a refreshing Cucumber Amuse-bouche, we were presented with a delicious tomato salad, followed by a variety of wonderful wild mushrooms.
Our first main course was a Salmon Filet, served with a delightfully crisp skin while still maintaining a moist and perfectly cooked centre
The Beef Tenderloin that followed was cooked to perfection and melt-in-your-mouth tender.
After a Chocolate Amuse-bouche, we ended the meal with a choice of desserts.  It was impossible to pick a favourite out of the selection of Carrot Cake with Salted caramel gelato and carrot frosting, or the Sticky Toffee Pudding.
Our service was very good, the wine paring made sense, and the whole experience was very enjoyable.
A couple of improvements could be made by ensuring the hot items are served at a warmer temperature than they were. Also, servers should have an in-depth knowledge of the history and philosophy of the restaurant as one of the main reasons for the visit was to partake in a true Farm-to-Table experience.
Overall, we found this to be a wonderful find in the Lower Mainland and without a doubt will return.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMh7aZzSFKPf_9_PkEFs0EiV3cTCwqAjEpCxOym&fid=0x0:0xb1af0fd0c39a122b"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"Stephanie Henderson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIvd6TE41ofXSIQsVETEKQwe90URxDLRLP3ccyJkWtaimnS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This restaurant is truly a hidden gem. One of the best restaurants I’ve ever had the pleasure of dining at.

The food is Michelin star quality and each dish is meticulously executed to perfection. To say I was speechless is understatement.

Instead of farm to table, they bring the tables to the farm! Ingredients are grown on their farm or locally sourced. The menu changes depending on what’s in season.

We went for our anniversary on Sunday, even though it was raining the outside tent was warm and comfortable. The staff went above and beyond to make our anniversary an unforgettable experience.

Here are some photos from last night + the few other times we have been on sunny days. They have outdoor gazebos that are great for larger groups or date nights!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKHnuKc_b4jmDLL_-D75P3DQ_dcjt7ehdfmj0&fid=0x0:0xb1af0fd0c39a122b"],"When":"2024-3-11"},{"Name":"Yana","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIaUlCK73O3dM9H2k784cXLtXrMmH2WgZCF6Y5SaQw97wPHYQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had an amazing dinner today! That was a truly unique farm-to-table experience. The food was great, especially the desserts, which are absolutely unmatched and a real must try. On top of that, these guys provide exceptional service and have highly qualified kitchen staff. A huge thanks to the chef, the sous chef and the rest of the staff who made our visit so special.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOV-e8zawwPujY52k-yGLDTDn6d1HP1T780e9PX&fid=0x0:0xb1af0fd0c39a122b"],"When":"2024-6-14"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Y. Cherski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK-7SLlKKRW0Rqcp9wRXFlvt6gbh0rtI7PMIroLgxETtGiPwQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"For me, this wasn’t about the food – it was all about the experience! Got invited by friends to check out this quirky spot for all-you-can-eat Taco Tuesday, and I left with a pretty positive impression. Sure, the tacos are buffet-style, the simplest Tex-Mex you can imagine, but you can load up for just 11 bucks and change with no limit. Probably even better if you are having a few drinks too. But what really stood out to me was the saloon-style vibe and the farm surroundings, complete with scattered farm machinery and, the best part, horses! It’s simple, humble, and you won’t find many places like this around Metro Vancouver and close by. While the food might not blow your mind, at least in my experience, the atmosphere and the memories are totally worth the trip.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNg-SRzMYbykNFWD1NFF318L6Nb-fahQiO8vegw\u0026fid=0x0:0x1715fa59497ee645"],"When":"2024-9-13"},{"Name":"Mary Servant","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXHgLbeT0gou0iFPpk0IOFdoMBnJ7rC_3eS_v5DrAOPsTKPD22a=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I went down on Sunday for the first time for a meat draw that was a lot of fun. They had 4 draws, breakfast specia,l drink specials. It was a fun way to spend the afternoon. The place is quite rustic with a horse ranch out behind. You'll see some pictures of the horses. I liked the rustic feel. Really enjoyed my day.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBYTloUDO_3mMB6KSrPd3uXAmZiM3bf1TFn67C\u0026fid=0x0:0x1715fa59497ee645"],"When":"2024-2-19"},{"Name":"Jacquie Montgomery","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVakvhPhacxeS1WwgOroGpzbPBsfmFp83Y69hps_mEVBdCz0b2z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Attended a live music event. It was excellent with very friendly servers.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPSVo-QEX8FGmh7-d8ovHYch8CTvJk7DJqvKbSy\u0026fid=0x0:0x1715fa59497ee645"],"When":"2024-12-22"},{"Name":"John Pozer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXe0BvqmYZVSdl8vMzkjfI5nnnXlGPCIuhLYzs9LnFZvwXYyqQh7A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had lunch on the dog-friendly patio. Service was wonderful! Good pub-type food: fish \u0026 chips, chicken quesadilla. Limited beer selection. Not crowded at noon on Friday. The lovely server made our stop here a memorable one.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPhsay5SYwp30uFbPYnmAfTuXDlmxJJBDaftNO\u0026fid=0x0:0x1715fa59497ee645"],"When":"2023-10-14"},{"Name":"Chris L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIlo27yi0c3tMg1MEFW8gltVROJwlBrQGtk927fnMS7KkAAA0UJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time here with the famjam for the all you can eat taco buffet! You can't make food for this price at home. The food and the service was great. I can't get over the pricing of the food on the menu! I will defs have to come on a Wednesday for the burger and fries deal ($8.99). The price was right! I love how it's on a farm, love the vibe and best of all there where not too many other people (although I'm unsure why). We will be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpmKfrNrOh_MdTO8D2gO0TcoJI9_X7B6rt1luV\u0026fid=0x0:0x1715fa59497ee645"],"When":"2023-5-24"},{"Name":"Cassandra McDougal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJEBUUqL3tIKmBdP0uJmyV8mvHRYPUb5ko5tg4188n33eDiww=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Super overpriced for the quality and serving sizes. Only 1 server for a large place so she was struggling. The pound of wings for $17 didn’t look like a pound and were overcooked. Not to mention the additional $0.75 for each dip… $19/Lb for those wings + 2 dips squirted out of a bottle is offensive.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNkWZf4c2jQlsm2vYIe7nN6Q5vSX9x3rnLGrTv\u0026fid=0x0:0x1715fa59497ee645"],"When":"2024-3-29"},{"Name":"Laura R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGZhuVC2uAx0k5suRhJV1ugZ6Fs5IjHznwevseQ2nCnLEtoYg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The turkey melt was so good. everything we ordered was delicious and the staff were so kind and attentive. And it’s fun to watch the horses in action.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Christopher Hanna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXVOmlBlEhbzkV_jpUru9Vvzi9QoyuA3ekzi2Ai80O6XQWoEI8sQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We came in on Friday night, despite it being busy, the servers were on their game making the experience pleasant, food was good, would return.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Harsh Patel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJRO8oxwi598LgL5aKg92p5xEFcdOI0MFNKNtnARfpqYYV8Sw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We've been trying each pizza place in Maple Ridge, and so far this is the absolute best pizza. The crust was very light and fluffy, the cheese was abundant, and the ingredients and spices tasted FRESH! Tasted like homemade with love. Absolutely ordering from them again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Luke Dobischok","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTQGJ4aGaK08dikO9QRHd3tGhqhCmUD7hOrs5ravrgRItIdIr2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered 2 pizzas. First one was fine with decent toppings. Not sure how the other can constitute as a "Double Hawaiian" when there's hardly anything on the pizza. If I wanted a pizza with nothing on it I would have gone to dominoes. At least it wouldn't have been $20 each. Pizza is usually good but been going downhill in the last few months. Last time both were insanely greasy on the bottoms. The dough is always quite soft which is fine, but just inconsistent results.

Been there many times. Always some huge pallet of drinks in the way of the the counter. Not sure why that can never get taken care of as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPHkn7L0FGROHogr5yY4tj6_oQRHtgpxXe90nVE&fid=0x0:0xfce260b9d2a5bd2c"],"When":"2024-1-1"},{"Name":"Renaissance Man","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZfM5WhGe11WCHvIuQ-dZ-AXha1p0ur9fO16r84kZYH_g9HIpK=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious calzone and cheesy bread. Was driving through town. The guy slapped it together quick and I was on my way into gold Park. Excellent service highly recommend this pizza joint. 🍕","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMfjpqV1KcHN2l8Nqkb5ca5A-28wHoCc9zS8K-N&fid=0x0:0xfce260b9d2a5bd2c"],"When":"2024-5-16"},{"Name":"Mitch C.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUigQKnsqnd6-ECKxiWLF3yOJGPZULiTcrsHXswZ-6rjxY7_wxITQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Pizza looks ok, but tasted like cheap grocery store pizza from the 90's. It was supposed to be thin crispy crust. The thin crust was neither thin nor crispy, the toppings were bland. That's not a Greek salad. The meatballs were likely from a bag. Had heard good things, but maybe that's just the taste preferences of some people. To me it was not good at all. Nothing resembles the web site photos. Even the cheese on the pizza is low quality. Never again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCjjiqh4kpjPswqVLaUP2jaP0ZpGQiJOnuJHbM&fid=0x0:0xfce260b9d2a5bd2c"],"When":"2022-4-28"},{"Name":"Cliff Shannon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLA4XmMfj0rI2QROf2AYIw_S0YIghgQOvuBZ-5fdz2FZTKZ-g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Decent pizza but terrible service. Ordered a pizza on the phone. Picked it up. Took it home, tried it. Was completely wrong pizza. Called them back and they admitted to making the wrong pizza and asked us to drive back and pick up the correct pizza. Then charged us more money for the new pizza. Never again. Will stick to the bigger chains","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jigar Rathi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWc6ll8t6niWm5-ZQ5mU4DVVvTDih5HrLrDi1SoC1I_QAqZi2XD=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best pizza ever, hands down! Best location to go whenever you want. I've been here maney times, and each time I always get hot, fresh pizza. Best customer service ever. The staff is friendly and supportive.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nadia Deol","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwU63VhDSPAx_78e1BRgOPcnmW9mOG5u55pDBF9-hhIpzgSCi4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"This place lacks consistency.... depending on who is making the pizza.

I only order hot and spicy vegetarian.

If it's the older gentleman who is making my order or the young guy...I know it's going to be good.

However, like today, if it's young woman making.... guarantee that half the ingredients that are suppose to be on the pizza.... won't be. My pizza today was missing pineapple, parsley, ginger.

All the got was some cheesy dough.... definitely not the hot and spicy vegetarian.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Merle Chambers (Merle)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL432ogqcLKCtSomIeZiLDsoJEUiSMNym_sj-b2tdK79Hz_bJs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Ordered for the first time yesterday.  Asked for extra sauce and extra cheese.  Did not get them but was charged. There was such a small amount of sauce. Pizza was ok but won't be ordering from them again","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"keira r","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLJrKHZ2A5kiDlS4xDR-NV_HhOc8W11pUwvzgPGNuDoF9uE2Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"A guy at the restaurant, about 5’8, grey short hair, and short beard is EXTREMELY rude. My boyfriend and I went into the restaurant to see our other friends that were there. My boyfriend had broken his leg about two and a half months ago, causing him to still have a limp while walking. The “bouncer” told him he was not allowed in and said to him “you sure you want to come in buddy.” This was because of how he was walking, due to still having a limp, and after explaining the broken leg situation he continues to say “well that’s too bad.” Extremely rude, 0 customer service skills, overall a horrible human being.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Liam Bassetto","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI7Wc94he_Fv9ZV0PACxI2ew_06dTizhZ9qK0TIYRmxhUAHeeY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Place was very understaffed for how many people were there, my buddy who broke his leg a few months ago was denied entry because he was limping  (they said he was too drunk, he was our DD and didn’t have a single drop of alcohol) even after showing the bouncer at the door his scars from his surgery, all he got was a “thats not going to cut it buddy” and sent on his way. My other buddy and I didn’t even find out he wasn’t allowed in until an hour later because we were stuck in a 50 minute line for the bar to get a beer, all while drunk parents were cutting the line and harassing the bartenders until they caved and served them before the rest of us waiting patiently in line. Missed majority of the game we came to watch.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"P Yorkie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKXm8fzxlgv8V7tzyor1eAw3X_TYnp76PqzhYwDa2d-_ANa4w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Sat on the patio. Very dirty, leaves weeds. Dirty bench. Got it on my pants.
Wouldn't take much to make it better. Clean, maybe put out some flower plants?
Service was good, food was OK. Good price for a hamburger & fries.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Crash Ca","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKP-yIbUHbzqOyPnimZsGdHdI8HFw0BftxGUURkfEffnvjo5Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Overpriced for the quality. $11 for 5 small potato skins. Chicken in sandwiches and burgers were cold. The Ceasar dressing was of poor quality and had "blobs". Fries were over cooked.

Sever was rude. Yelled at customer. She even stated that she hates her job. Why work there then.

One of the worst places we’ve been to. Do NOT recommend this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMitWc-i16eNCTxvCu84D-bLzqvvwSlhFOoXaLf&fid=0x0:0x3fa692001c37a0a1"],"When":"2023-3-6"},{"Name":"Brant Andrews","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ8syFIoV5yLPh5G3s30c8WgmcBHZhv_w2vjaZWSEUawPUEfw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Worst burnt burger i ever ate in my life waitress Phenomenally rude
Yam fries completely burnt. Chicken club comes with the butt Of the breadin the center.
Took an hourcause I guess they had to heat up. The grill should have known when no one else was eating in the restaurant and it was empty.
But the waitress.  Was the worst part of the whole experiencebeyond rude","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jack Pajak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7kRSq5QM1wGXm36_dbE9YR6CpcUs9VUAhu1SxvpJkrQ-nGO0N=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is your typical hockey rink pub, big place with lots of room and nice views of the ice. I really did enjoy the atmosphere and our server did a great job. She had a wonderful attitude despite being really busy. Food selection isn't bad, but pretty basic pub fare. Quality was hit and miss with our group. Beer selection is mediocre, would be nice to see some craft beer. I won't be rushing back...but I also wouldn't object to coming here again (especially if I was at the arena for a game).","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"PJNL13","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLYPenjQYBi9sFajObxhGbZrQmEfqvSOaGuZPg6t3amiBJgGQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"This place used to be great, but recently: food has gone down in quality , service is meh and today we showed up at 17.30; it stated they were open. The board outside the restaurant even said open 1600 mon-thu.

Fully locked up, lights off.
Bring back the old management, Stacey rocked!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"H Sek","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKMZVBQClOO1wdbrsI_ks2Ywv7fIj5-Iry7hRMHVjHL3MNiuQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I like this place but I don’t understand why they are always closed during the day on the weekends.

We planned to have lunch there as a family while our kids played hockey. Only to find that they were closed for a private event. Then the next time we came today only to find that their hours have shifted from 12pm ( as shown on the Google hours ) to 2 PM opening on Saturday and Sunday.

At least change your hours of operation on your Google page so people don’t get their expectations set and then arrive at your door only to find that you guys are closed because you’ve written on a chalkboard that you change the hours or that you’ve written on a chalkboard that you have a private function . It doesn’t build a good relationship with the community with people who want to spend money and support local businesses.

If there are staffing issues or other issues, why not just have one person working at the bar and do a limited menu with walk up service?French fries and a pre made sandwichs and beer is for parents who had to get up and bring their kids to hockey.

Maybe create a buffet style brunch menu with and advertise to all of the household’s in east Maple Ridge looking for a closer restaurant/pub option?

Reducing hours is the first move towards a decline in the overall business. Instead of reducing hours for costs savings - adjust the operations to be lean and mean and try to increase traffic into the restaurant.

I will support every small business owner or business owner of Maple Ridge and Pitt Meadows 110% of the time as long as they are making the effort to create something exciting for all of us like me who are willing to support.

If the situation changes I will change this review","Images":null,"When":""}]
