user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sophia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVlDgwsQnDqW--x2_xKhw-r8XwhpM_FFOR4V3mvKWmVJGfia1uy=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Darwin was serving amazing service and amazing food!!! Portion were really big, will be back with my family!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOPw0ryrYeuwJo5v9ANAULbBj1gwxjnwwvG8oKd&fid=0x0:0x8da2ae946ca6723b"],"When":"2024-11-27"},{"Name":"Cameron Juzda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKHrTM5wyhtWpJlJXAgb9bG29O7TW7YIhFj4FhBU9FD7NSyHg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We have ordered from kitchen on the ridge in the past  , and the food was good, but last night the food was awful the chicken was chewy tasteless, the beef chop suoy had lots of beef but the beef was like chewing on a wet sock, I phoned today to let them know how poor quality the food was and asked if they refund our money as most of it's in fridge and will not be eaten , but they would not stand behind there products and refused to give us our money back, that's why I had no choice but to write this review.

Wokin Dragon makes much better quality food.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"jennifer D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXalWNYD9s8b4gtqh6W0m_J1OpchW3ccyzTF6c0AT5YaH5c6u0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We order take out from them at least once every couple weeks and are never disappointed. We both order combination plates and have it delivered by them because were less than 4km from them delivery is free and food is delicious","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNs084CT-mVY-QaxF-6NlEqGC4UQyWdjCErpDWd&fid=0x0:0x8da2ae946ca6723b"],"When":"2024-4-26"},{"Name":"Aleksander Amer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGOAz6hZJ2NwhTQXXReoo8ipuBBnVUyRU2feoLZjGgiTMM8r_W=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Finally found the best Chinese in the Maple Ridge. I was a walk in and ordered a combo for 1 bbq pork fried rice, ginger beef, and sweet n sour pork from David. I had a special request and he nailed the entire order. All the meat is tender, ginger beef was crunchy and not chewy, fried rice was perfect. Sweet n sour pork was good size bites and not all breading. Lastly the egg rolls were also perfect. I absolutely will be returning and highly recommend👍

***UPDATE***DO NOT PARK IN THE LOT OR YOU WILL GET A $126 TICKET BY DIAMOND PARKING SERVICES HIDDEN LOW ON YOUR WINDSHIELD OUT OF SIGHT***","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOl6SWT2PyyAb9IOf-JuQ8_27sGSMM3clk3j2fl&fid=0x0:0x8da2ae946ca6723b"],"When":"2023-8-15"},{"Name":"Alexia Sarvan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVc6JDa1yYfq0nUgWFW8ECuapxVZ66hckQHzZsZmHnjPE9Lhhnx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My Husband and I were craving chow mein over the weekend but didn’t feel like driving to pick up at our usual place (that doesn’t deliver to our location) so we decided to order delivery directly from Kitchen on the Ridge. We ordered on Saturday night at around 5:30pm and it was delivered right on time (within an hour). We ordered chicken chow mein, beef & black bean sauce crispy chow mein and almond chicken. It was all very delicious and fresh. Portions were huge so we had tons of leftovers which was great. We will definitely order from Kitchen on the Ridge again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN3nhAJrBFqNb0GuQgVRj9TiqJ_B9gN4IODhwew&fid=0x0:0x8da2ae946ca6723b"],"When":"2023-2-6"},{"Name":"David Dyck","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI5xjijpXaZs2STs6BFRe-cNEGv-QQjprJx3-f3GHeEQh2Z4g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We ordered veggie chow mein, beef and broccoli and sweet and sour pork.  The chow mein had no flavor whatsoever, the beef and broccoli was absolutely disgusting and tasted more like fish than beef. The sweet and sour pork was edible, I’d give it maybe a 5/10.

Overall, would definitely not recommend.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alex Deagle","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK4172m11rBMIloP_3iH8GRIdcve4rXahqQ4ex_Npkmxc6mnQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best Chinese in maple ridge! Super friendly family run business. My 97 year old mom is from Hong Kong and loves this place. Thank you for your great food and service!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Evan Meloche","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI2cfpbCLahRZZfYL915tBomhuHC8EgGDfGSULODUyhGvNO9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The only positive aspect was that the food tasted decent and the doordash service/driver was excellent.

Our biggest problem was that multiple different food items were stored in the same container, not just as a way to save containers, but to hide the portion size. We had to call our doordash driver to make sure he delivered all the food because we thought we were missing half of it.

Everything we ordered was under portioned and left us still hungry afterwards. Compared to the portion size, the prices are nearly double what I would be willing to pay again.

Putting different food items in the same container is also a problem for cross-contamination. You never know if someone has a life threatening allergy (or even religious values about certain foods) and mixing food unnecessarily drastically increases the risk of contamination.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Uros Nikolic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqZKUGj61BfmTYu8vecdYC7cNoaJsQnfWJB3zipm50mUOPG3Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This White spot in Maple Ridge is unique with always kind personnel and variety of food on the menu. My recommendation is Chicken avocado salad bowl and Cheesesteak hash if you’re for a good breakfast, you won’t wait too long for your order…Plenty of parking for free.
I highly suggest to visit this restaurant if you’re in this area 👍🏼","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNqwBtI2flDzyGbVFKZIl2kh2cBZsnHvUcgkOlu&fid=0x0:0x5c9943f7f5e22255"],"When":"2024-6-11"},{"Name":"MR. BLU","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXPUh0nslIiomcV7dF888M_L7EBu10sgWhAfVxb7vZ5kD10DiTjtw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We  went for dinner and Will was our server.
He was excellent and checked to see if we needed anything else
Will should get a Best server's award of the decade.
It must be the manager 's training.The host was also polite and friendly.
I met Inder(manager )when he came to our table to see if everything was alright.We live far from this restaurant but we'll try and go there most often
Thanks you all for an excellent time we had","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Russell Aldred","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWK19oSkZniRSkHkw5tMRhN0x1QJArNYrZRbDx014cxbvoi1aQBJw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ben the morning sever has been at this location on the weekends for many years. I have coffee and breakfast there on a regular basis on Saturdays and Sundays with the fellas and Ben has always been a staple of the establishment.
He is the epitome of great service. Always polite friendly and accurate. He never lets the coffee cup run dry.
Food selection at White Spot is not very extensive. In my opinion breakfast is the best thing they have to offer dinner and lunch menu is mediocre at best.. The best thing I can say about the food is that after a long time of discontinuance of shredded hashbrowns they finally brought them back sometime ago.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chris R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLG_ySxFukKH4AlD3VR3nfBjosMVYPyBSViwi_z0TVAUxE73g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Great food but I think they need to teach their cooks about lettuce wraps…. It was pretty hard to “wrap” with the tiny pieces of lettuce they provided, lol.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOhge8ImGKT-p_dwa1PxLcUpWprLz5UrMfGi02p&fid=0x0:0x5c9943f7f5e22255"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"Vivian Sim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKxpdjWyeYzSg9LB62xxTN_EXQwUag1qqV3Y96vQ__G_8SIdg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were having supper at White Spot on Lougheed in Maple Ridge last week.
The server was efficient and helpful. I had the chicken and broccoli casserole, it was delicious. Hot and savory.. yummy. My grandkids had the pirate pack meals and enjoyed their dinners immensely. My dad had the Chicken Alfredo Fettuccine, and not a speck of food was left on his plate. So, needless to say, we will be back for more delicious meals. Thanks, White Spot on Lougheed. A great time was had by all.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Adam Farrell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMHrsBOCfw2yTxdERqQKMJ2ji-mtRUDAFRu6AyxgyffHuakcfm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The staff at this location has always been very friendly. The food has been good and fresh. The environment and bathrooms are always clean. We had excellent service from Ola. Thank you for a great experience.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJNPXd0TQp1SGZuIbkzjBifXecErH9hmC9UxwybkomlWgiq8g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great food & I always love to go there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7JkxIm6nG2wP50BjmTVEE_z7qVUCHF6S6bXex&fid=0x0:0x5c9943f7f5e22255"],"When":"2024-7-30"},{"Name":"Daniel Jung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFE7g6vnjf23CW6mDeh4anchF8fxBs6O5Nsx0bvhepuO3MVzWa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Another successful Whitespot! Great tasting breakfast with good service. Lots of seating and parking spots!
Coming from the West, the restaurant was hard to spot, so Google ahead!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMPHgQC-2QU5Hw66V0RV4qNFzKoY0sVp7MkCA9v&fid=0x0:0x5c9943f7f5e22255"],"When":"2023-8-2"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Tara Elizabeth","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWafp5-DbmdXd42lrIMIaPpUa4TG8IACFTFef3W9rqO44JjPcQgRg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I enjoyed my chicken caprese and my friend her steak salad. What we weren't thrilled with was the service. The place was quite empty yet we were told our party of 10 was too big for the specials. They finally relented, and only one of us ordered it. The waiter was slow to check in for drinks. I easily would have had at least another, but he was missing and by the time he came back I was over wanting one. It also took way too long to get the bill and then wait for the bill to be fixed. I liked my meal and it was clean and in a nice location but I felt there was nothing special about the evening. I'm not sure I'd go back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP1A-gl_I8GkfC5NRTv5O5QgKiYMrN43U-HUACY&fid=0x0:0x9b0f34c76b4c5a9a"],"When":"2024-8-31"},{"Name":"Jim McAdie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-13-EGR_Lu7cU4Hn29WE_0T0MjDbq8biaK-w2BWXLRJzw-ft1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The tables are spaced very nicely and the noise level in the dining room is very pleasant. The staff was attentive and the food was outstanding. We are new to Maple Ridge and it is our first time going to The Loft but it won't be our last. Dylan was our waiter and he gave us White Glove treatment. All in all it was a wonderful experience","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Colin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTlcHOnN1Y_P8i7yAuyqaF0Qvno8USrEfh9as8qA5pMJpj_n-z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We went for the Thanksgiving three course. Service was excellent. The live music was fine from where we were seated but quite loud at the staircase up to the restaurant.

My companion enjoyed her salad starter. My butternut squash soup was tasty but closer to a puree in texture and it would have benefitted from a little stock or cream.

The turkey dinner was very good. The turkey was moist, the mashed potatoes were smooth and the gravy added a lot of flavor. I would have preferred more veggies and less potatoes, but the proportions were pretty standard for most restaurants.

The pumpkin pie was smooth and tasty, if a little cinnamon forward. It was a bit surprising but I liked it.

This was our first visit to The Loft and we will definitely be going back to try brunch and prime rib night.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Antonio Vidal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXh_xAWsf04qNgEzZEcU9YIpjJ4mya_-AYPRaWQ1_Pj-gNwn70DRg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Was disappointed. I understand that it was new year's eve but they should've planned better considering the price of the "experience" they were offering. The French 75 drink wasn't very well made - Prosecco mixed with gin and citrus are just not a good combination. Plus it wasn't served cold. The kushi oysters were weirdly served with carrot and turnip/radish slices. The carpaccio, while good, had too little beef and was overwhelmed by the salad. The Cesar salad was good.  The soup was good too and so was the surf and turf. The beef medallion was perfectly cooked but the scallops were too salty. They forgot to serve the palate cleanser between the starters and entrees. The creme brulee was much too thick and sweet as if made with condensed milk.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPn00zQfvMrVj1waX5Hlm7uAJNaNkUloexMaFcx&fid=0x0:0x9b0f34c76b4c5a9a"],"When":"2024-1-1"},{"Name":"Ghazal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWUxPjakfUDfUlOphLX0NHrhY3j03bOfl1WB2qtK88VIEBoxSUc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Beautiful space. The food tasted good and they had good options for the wine flight. The bread was complementary which added to the dining experience.
We went on a Sunday evening and the place was really quiet. It’s good if you’d just like to relax and enjoy your food but I prefer a busier place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9T4DQuAsHB1pIcQsCTWs5OCBxIw7OEA9bCPcd&fid=0x0:0x9b0f34c76b4c5a9a"],"When":"2023-2-13"},{"Name":"danielle loranger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJnptNzs1wQbaw2FFsd1jy4E7t0vjMoJDS7syMM-SOyTKG9og=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a great view from the restaurant and beautiful at sunset. We stopped in after hitting the driving range up one night and enjoyed some cocktails which were great and I’d go back for the Caesar salad alone! We both really enjoyed our meals and can’t wait to try them out again hopefully for their prime rib night!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sheida Ji","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXfmsaPSmIspnVYmHG0D2yN09pwU4n-gVoapn6SGWlQigfUs2rQGQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’m mad at myself for not coming here sooner !
It was AMAZING !
All the dishes we got were very tasty and the waitress ( grace ) was very friendly and nice","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJ7vARWmUF7N8JkUc08bnHi7-UOAq6Jngjah-m&fid=0x0:0x9b0f34c76b4c5a9a"],"When":"2023-9-1"},{"Name":"Tanya Grubic REALTOR","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnpefUHC_L67dV5Iazonxfl2ZjNS2LupqOELwQK_dGIraI59FLjg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This restaurant is a true gem, offering a dining experience that combines top-notch cuisine with a beautiful setting. Whether you’re coming off the green or simply looking for a great meal, this establishment promises to deliver on all fronts. Highly recommended for its excellent food, superb service, and delightful atmosphere.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sydney Doucette","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVdUZIJT4JRDl1o0l6MQBPnumPIkN3Dfsmrob9XSLV_dhidQyk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve never written a Google review in my entire life, but this pizza place was so good that I had to write one. The workers were very helpful and very nice. The prices were so good that I went 3 times in one day! My favourite item there is the Bronx bread deluxe. All in all, a very underrated pizza place.

If I could rate 10 starts I would.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZq4v9oU2UT450TpRRwXPb4Czj-9ZNUBbMvpse&fid=0x0:0x9a3de7542d4571ba"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Jennifer MacLeod","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUadxIWYt0q6QEIVv32j21XPBQqLCZCzg2bPSR_6PhDEjmDiFc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My boys are in love with Albion Pizzeria and my husband and I love it too. It’s one place we can all agree on! Our favourite pizza is the custom 3 topping pizza with cheddar cheese, sausage crumbles and pepperoni - it’s amazing! And the deluxe Bronx bread is also amazing. The new owners are so kind and always chat with us and our boys while we pickup. I can’t thank them enough for selling top notch pizza and making my boys smile too! Thanks Albion Pizzaria!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPnFn43VbuztR3Byh5KEb7m5_fbqY1FGHOb9BMh&fid=0x0:0x9a3de7542d4571ba"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Nick","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV8i6aZWX5wFrYB9tM2WdmFdLgNXisODy2uyMR7VD7WXU3hwANM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Super friendly staff and tasty pizza. Great way to recharge after mountain biking in the area!

Pictured: a small Rustic Italian pizza for $16.99","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPYA_A9Gtf3KM9WAoa5GhsDqYMJc1ha7wqJhA3P&fid=0x0:0x9a3de7542d4571ba"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Blanca Dominguez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXozJyQEsVNp6ciGkUY6Sa-1YO272YN4VblUKVzCFOM8bSL-1c6Aw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I’m not picky at all but this was quite the shock! The quality and taste are night and day from what it used to be earlier this year. We ordered a pepperoni pizza this evening and I literally thought it was just a cheese pizza cuz I did not see any pepperoni. My husband said there were a couple on his. The pizza was SO flat, crust was flat. It’s too bad cuz this used to be our favourite place as it’s walking distance. So disappointed. I’ve seen the owners comment they are using the same recipe but if this was so, I wouldn’t have run to the reviews to see if owners had changed after we opened the box.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rochelle Soriano","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXWGxDqO26_it_aLWhqYDbBce7Hdq3JHVPDqMz-d6ad5S6xcvdQWQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is my 3rd time having a pizza in Albion and i keep on coming back. Firstly, this is a small pizzeria in a small town and i am always a fan of locally made pizzas that makes it special and unique. Second, the place is really clean. Thirdly,  I always love double pepperoni or hawaian pizza. Fourth, it is best if you eat it fresh from the oven because of the quality of their cheese and the dough. (I worked in a chain pizza restaurant so i can tell the difference.) Lastly, the customer service especially the young girl in the store today is outstanding. Kudos!

and of course always ask for the "today's deal" to have a really good price! ☺️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQlK6FjYAIm_SNZbPTHHTkF4fJNq1YB_ck3sg_&fid=0x0:0x9a3de7542d4571ba"],"When":"2024-1-5"},{"Name":"ulearn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVVqdbbGKqtOlB_UPwPQj-3KwX4ez-IUE9Zs16_kfn3C4jmbXC5ag=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Residing in Burnaby and making regular trips to Maple Ridge for chiropractic appointments, I've consistently driven past this pizzeria. Looking back, I regret not stopping in sooner, as the pizza here is undeniably delicious. While it falls on the pricier side, the exceptional quality of the food more than justifies the cost.

I visited on a Wednesday as a walk-in, and the owner, who was alone, was managing a constant flow of walk-ins and pickups. Despite the hustle, he immediately acknowledged my arrival, inquired about my order, and, to my surprise, had already started preparing my pizza while simultaneously working on another customer's order. A true multitasker! It was evident that he's a big NY Yankee fan, judging by the sizable logo proudly displayed on the wall.

Being a vegetarian, I did notice that the menu options were somewhat limited. It would be fantastic if they could consider incorporating vegetarian alternatives like a Cheeseburger, Buffalo Chicken, or Pesto Chicken without the meat and chicken but substituting it. Additionally, introducing options with 'Beyond Meat' could cater to those seeking healthier choices.

To top it off, Albion Pizzeria even offered ice cream. When I inquired about the small and large scoops, the owner mentioned that their large scoop is an equivalent to three scoops, unlike the standard two you'd find in many other ice cream parlours. I know my kids would be thrilled about  that!

Let's get back to the pizzas....Despite the somewhat restricted vegetarian choices (4 pizzas), the exceptional taste of the pizza makes me eager to return without a doubt! I was so captivated by the pizza that I couldn't resist grabbing a slice before taking a photo of the entire pizza—that's how impressive it was!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOTHkJyQzSrcufpfApTy-cNnPtbLxXcSggUseKj&fid=0x0:0x9a3de7542d4571ba"],"When":"2023-12-9"},{"Name":"Joanne Walker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLJ-skD3gNOCBq_Kpl45bWQPCFqoryaLNUEMcjTKCZ8ip4W0Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great customer service. Ordered a couple of pizzas via door dash tonight, one was missing the extra topping I ordered. Phoned the store and they sent out a replacement pizza immediately at no cost. Very great service!!! Will definitely order again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Crystal V","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJy_8JzOAdXYM50ytFR2HidA0G9Xsyge4e68t8ePZBmeAOiPA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great customer service and great pizza. Definitely one of our household favourites.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPSASCZZDDa31zysyOQOmpJ70W0weq0MSDGBRFE&fid=0x0:0x9a3de7542d4571ba"],"When":"2024-12-1"}]

The food quality is excellent, and I’ve never had any issues with them.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Robert Degagne","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJgwVAN1padX0QyMb1eSTz7I_WTIGqYJog86Xs5HrHN8b_EGA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Picked up pizza and brought it home missing toppings on it. Won’t be going back. Should have zero stars option","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNoY8XPh8hSf9ndUwCtG60ZAMync-6idJKbocm7\u0026fid=0x0:0x90b3096405bfa4e3"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"Rylee k","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUAVNM9RwnLpIo6axspFmI4EvGLucLufb2zfcJPbPjH5KMVkdrr=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"If i could give no stars i would. This place is awful, three out of three of my boxes were wrong, four missing items and nobody answers the phone, the workers i spoke to over the phone in the first place were very disrespectful and would not admit they were wrong. they agreed to send me new pizzas with the proper toppings and my missing items, told me it was on the way and an hour later im still waiting and being ignored. keep in mind i live about a ten minute drive from this place.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rebecca Rilka","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ4NZIcT1AyHqFxvo7RzG56h46WDLRonBwl1W3DUb-2a5GdrQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Placed order online ( thought was for delivery) ...was not ..... called ,  beeped then disconnected...called the pizza hut ordering line to \"modify my order\" she couldn't  change it to delivery  or cancel order . Put me through to the store ..this time it rang......for 5 min ...no one answered......  can't pick up the order , no one is able to drive ....\nAn hour after pick up time the called  Me back .... ugh","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Connie F","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIYfBwFkmtrK5k__Y26vI-chqGthxaE__oGnoKfEYHeP69akg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The absolute worst ordering experience going!! Have tried multiple times to place an order on their app. It always works out in the end but never without a LOT of frustration! I don’t know why I keep returning. There just aren’t a lot of options in Maple Ridge when I’m off work in the evenings. Pizza is always different too. Sometimes it’s good and other times it’s exceptionally greasy. Service is usually very meh. They hardly say two words to you.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"ali habibi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX59RABIBKFanDkwR8FZEq5AG_C-NNyz7r7ekd-da5nYraQITEJ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"From left to right: cheese pizza is completely burned. The great beyond - look at the topping, hot peppers were missing completely. The last one is Italian classic and there are some cuts without any Italian sausage.\nPlease do not spend your money here in this difficult economic situation.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPOdmNdoO6Lz_b72bvUqU1CKPe6NlAPg5u7cgQx\u0026fid=0x0:0x90b3096405bfa4e3"],"When":"2022-2-9"},{"Name":"Poker Stars","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIcASJa9gySAXH3Fcte5gNU_UGmzdweDFyKsv2bajB43XO2qCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This photo about sums up the service here. Manager on shift outside yelling on the phone for 25 minutes. Worst manager in the history. Horrible cleanliness. 0 star if possible. Disgusting!!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSySeFjELFSn7OLYAkOT1EEiZ-irHg3OHImzpc\u0026fid=0x0:0x90b3096405bfa4e3"],"When":"2023-7-14"},{"Name":"Keith C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0gD6bVYsS2Ce_9bqn-sr4U-f1tA605SCtmzNcU_IUENW7t8ln=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Do I seriously have to pay extra to get some cheese on my pizza. user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ooo Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLha3s3xmeSY7rh2o_ERnihgq71l9OBGLIEI9z2gSU0QPbN-l8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Each food was really delicious.

Among them, the most important rice and fish in roll and nigiri were the best.

It's a real restaurant I found when it's hard to eat out these days.

I definitely plan to come back.

It was a very enjoyable meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXd2iFnu6ty5TLDzbf4or8n8q6LHsAkQw6nqg3&fid=0x0:0x2a459f62632ef5e7"],"When":"2024-11-28"},{"Name":"최정웅","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIX_iNn8K8HEJRBCEDUMCkRKS2noDhIAd-7g-c6AmPzY_4zmA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a great experience at Sushi Bucks. Ever since new ownership, food tastes better, dining atmosphere is great, but most importantly servers and chefs are friendly. Thank you we will be back soon!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkNn1p8xP073uF_Qmon30rcd5swkEMaCR-yL0L&fid=0x0:0x2a459f62632ef5e7"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"Joseph Choi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWhoASkbG_EuL_1wpqgjKFTzBy-MumIDaWq8CCrbVHl5FHjmFw16Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Highly recommend Sushi Bucks, was referred by people and it did not disappoint, from the miso, to the main dishes (see pictures). Two thumbs up 👍👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQXAP4Er5uDldKc53gYKQv41Qn4c5DG_vkqI3k&fid=0x0:0x2a459f62632ef5e7"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"lazy Dog","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKUo-NwuyuqQn3bmOH6pgHqWT-pBeq03slmxP8k5cQ9dteGWw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I so wanted to find a new sushi place that is closer. Our go to is by the brick in Pitt Meadows. I ordered the spicy Chirashi Don for $28.95. It said 12 pieces Chefs choice. The 12 pieces were the size of my big thumb nail. She upsold me from the regular saying this one is better value. Hidden under some shredded veggies was  cut up Atlantic salmon, sockeye salmon, seared tuna, tuna and tamago. It was the equivalent of  5 pieces of nigiri ….. if that.  I should have just ordered 5 pieces of nigiri for $15. Sigh.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFjf_h-OBsrlZP8Nr8WFFvJWuTXfYo1BukLZx1&fid=0x0:0x2a459f62632ef5e7"],"When":"2024-9-12"},{"Name":"Olivia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXnwt0q_oxcVcqgNWdK4QtYYhOt-CzVkkpdEeWmIp1WMa1Blulz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited this sushi restaurant, and the refreshed, beautiful interior created such a welcoming atmosphere. The sushi and rolls tasted incredibly fresh, as if the ingredients were handpicked that morning! The ramen was truly a standout – absolutely delicious and full of flavor. Plus, the staff here were incredibly friendly and made the experience even better with their warm hospitality. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMIm9gCMBr7ceLwyi20XCRoV-FxB91zY5XfDXc&fid=0x0:0x2a459f62632ef5e7"],"When":"2024-2-12"},{"Name":"Jack Pajak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7kRSq5QM1wGXm36_dbE9YR6CpcUs9VUAhu1SxvpJkrQ-nGO0N=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a great Friday dinner here after a long week at work. I have to say that Sushi Bucks has some of the best food in the area, and are certainly one of the better places for Japanese in Maple Ridge. We will be back to try more of their menu. I would definitely recommend trying them too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMsjNmeZWtueL7FrfTpSe48NCJO4eWm6Qs3vjlF&fid=0x0:0x2a459f62632ef5e7"],"When":"2024-6-2"},{"Name":"Dana Noh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKlmQqx5HOfp8yIOHKO7DhS9P98X-FnubtAW7-CCM9T2dJdLw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've ever been to It was the best sushi  restaurant. The sushi was also very thick and sliced into big pieces. Frying is crispy. If you drink a glass of traditional Japanese liquor sake, you won't be envious of the king table.

The staff who worked there were very kind. I didn't know much about sushi, but the detailed explanation and recommendation were great. I highly recommend it.🤗","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQtA-_jgZxAPQUNbj8Oy6d3XgSBjcpld16eUtH&fid=0x0:0x2a459f62632ef5e7"],"When":"2023-12-27"},{"Name":"Sohyun Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIk7ULRpBuhPRFTzaMiczS8d8l1xxv5ViLPyLHyq94dqxJbVA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My family and I had a dinner here yesterday and we must say everything was so so delicious!!! Very fresh & tasty and great portions. The owner & servers were very kind & attentive. We also loved cozy & inviting vibe of this restaurant as well :) We are so glad to have found this new gem.

We will surely be a regular here for a nice sushi 🍣 for a lunch special deal and for a weekend gathering with friends & family!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOmYtAymotVrNtc9m8Gd9vTox13hd6vWqwTHeGa&fid=0x0:0x2a459f62632ef5e7"],"When":"2023-2-21"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jennifer Sangster","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXIfdzp9IdkraoBQNr97IQxScFa7P63sND2CvAvJQI8JdfvomYaiA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I can’t believe this place has so few reviews! Here’s the scoop- excellent breakfast and lunch items, good quality, and well priced. No goopy Sunnyside eggs, bacon is crispy not oily, BLTs perfect, coffee plentiful and great service.

Why is there wonton soup available as a side with lunch? Because it’s delicious! If I’m there for breakfast I even get a large to go, for later.

Expect a line after 1030 but it moves pretty quick. Walk in, write your own name, number in party, and number down. They’ll call you when it’s your turn!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brutetank","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWR-PoBoWcE2RapQgz1wy_BbsQwpHedIsDF5Un0rfpUmtEEPJ8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I always buy breakfast items(personal choice) and everything I have had is absolutely amazing and the staff are very friendly and accommodating!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Marcus & Grace Nasr - Nicholls","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKbArYH4b2tR-fLHNz2bioduwKM1vBRs-J4lWLZ5eq3TvW44A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Evan Phillips","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_l8z0YXVzpUQWufpTNKgvLiaMCj_0Uf4jGhlaar2Z0ldio0R_=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"","Images":null,"When":""}]

She was very pleased with the pizza!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7JzGaggQsEqifLX5MHwdHheB1BppfxfJjaJM\u0026fid=0x0:0xaef7c1624a054a62"],"When":"2024-2-27"},{"Name":"Rajdeep Kaur Pandher","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLnCk-zr1kkP8eglCd5WGJtG2sxGygAeNIZlv-FiwmnfmnAJw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a pizza from this place just 20 minutes ago, it was so delicious and the staff is so welcoming. There were two guys I don’t remember the names but I know you can find out who were they but just amazing. Thanks 💜, that’s all we have left out of a large veggie pizza 🤣","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMWLsivfhVQylpj89oP3-XDcYPHufI2ucZ0L1Bw\u0026fid=0x0:0xaef7c1624a054a62"],"When":"2023-10-11"},{"Name":"David Bellusci","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBRiLcQOVSFVjcbCCw2BUdFIV_MtDPCjt3LzWzQuHbZPLRXvlt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I always order pickup. Service is fast. Excellent choices of pizza. Fave is 6-cheese.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Amanda Jayne","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVd0QvoKLrgZZYDs1tkHfo_4P0pSkcfiQvk_OiASFGinehLie2t=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amanda's handsome and intelligent sons giving this review.\nWe ordered  pizza using our mom's card. She was working a double shift (almost typed a different word, forgot the 'f'). Really didn't want to answer the door so really glad for the contactless delivery. Food was delivered really fast and it felt like it just came out of the oven. It tasted really good. Hope mom works another double shift so we can order more Domino's Pizza. It is really easy to order and the food tastes really good.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Evan Chiu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUx3eyqBrpbhncJPjjIUKijhdol2TtVdinnG8_YCfhvhUVRdIa8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love the east maple ridge location! Great staff always kind. I’d consider myself a regular.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Daniel Vasquez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfH4IGtDH-RZPfkWL0P5tVuSs9PJ8oLSHVNJs_o3NyG6_oaSvUng=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place blew my expectations out of the water. This was truly a culinary experience from start to finish. The food quality and flavour were unbelievable, something I wasn't expecting. I would highly recommend this place for a romantic date, business meeting or if you just want to have a fantastic meal. Chef Gordon keeps the menu small and fresh, based on what he's buying - for example he will buy half a cow, do his own cuts and pre the menu based on this.

The service was also great, it is a family run business and would highly recommend you visit. The prices seem high at first, but once you have the first bite you can see why. This ranks as a tie for the best meal ever for me, tied with another restaurant in Vancouver that costs twice as much.

I am not exaggerating by saying that this restaurant should be considered for the Michelin Guide. it is simply that good!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCBvDzLMY9xCd2xMKgD_Nvd0wHtM5v8ajL9VjK&fid=0x0:0x25c2f0bdeacf27e"],"When":"2023-8-11"},{"Name":"kari k","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKVvcUii6EUlxfY9JlhQ_ZfOv49WO9fppCar9xI2DZ5eIyb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place honestly blew me away. The atmosphere is so nice and quaint, the staff were lovely and the food, oh my God. Incredible. It is on the pricier side but honestly 1000% worth it. Treat yourself and come here for a beautiful experience. Even tried things both my friends had and it was all delicious","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQUcjMey3Cgo-T05w6RD7RUWsE5E-3GeQvF2k&fid=0x0:0x25c2f0bdeacf27e"],"When":"2024-2-18"},{"Name":"Jozi Child","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVFGifWG8BdvF18VaKbFjDKs7F8rZetFQSzDeQ-MEH000zpoiCNUQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Meant for the true foodies who appreciate food made with true thought and precision.

Found from google reviews and so happy I did. Easily found right across from the fire house. Amazing service, absolutely delicious food made with care and attention. Not your typical menu where you can count on it being the same each place. For the real deal foodies. Lovely relaxing atmosphere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO12zpwhA1zxw-L0eD0zfXjQG5hgNge3E2_CUA5&fid=0x0:0x25c2f0bdeacf27e"],"When":"2024-3-9"},{"Name":"Bill Wilson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrLDUKCB9KhwKlqIkCcXUiASMuWECjsxURVB66vsZhnoGGXEJCJQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We've dining here many times and the food is aleays amazing. Service is top notch too. When you want a tablecloth, nice cutley and a fine evening out you cannot go wrong going there. To start we had cod paddies and beef cappaico, so delious. Then for mains I had the cod and it was perfectly prepared and so tasty. My wife enjoy a pork chop, but it was so tender you didn't need a knife, just marvelous. My daughter enjoyed the roast chicken with a cheese risotto. Spectacular 😍. Dessert was a wonderful "apple" made of chocolate and I don't know what, but it was so good. 100% recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9Fumu0awyzzZSqGZJ-252GXiYdlzGJdG_3nik&fid=0x0:0x25c2f0bdeacf27e"],"When":"2024-3-3"},{"Name":"Susan Rochefort","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL8rVH08cPR6VwUL0HKwjObsOf9gnrVDYn2ehalr65L6-oUpQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food and the service was phenomenal. We had made a reservation and once seated the waiter noticed I was having an issue and offered to move us without me even asking. We were looking for fine dining food with a little more casual atmosphere and this place nailed it with the food, service and ambiance.  My husband ordered the steak (medium) and it literally melted in your mouth. The seasoning they used was outstanding as it added flavor without taking away the taste of the meat. I had the chicken which was perfectly cooked. From the great service to the amazing food, this is a hidden gem and we will return!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMKhO2JG-Ub35HwlsCuGd4CPsXJOY3scTW-S0Yn&fid=0x0:0x25c2f0bdeacf27e"],"When":"2018-5-7"},{"Name":"Tabitha B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUeJCnFjpiqVd5yKgo41hAPVbZX9OKQejn0mrUyiMQ2BxxSg5CJrw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I called to request a donation for a local family who had suffered a tragic loss, hoping for a small gift certificate (between $25-$50) to help raise funds. When I asked if the person I spoke with had five minutes to discuss the request, his response was "for what?" in a rather aggravated tone.

After explaining the reason for my call, I received very emotionless responses. He mentioned the struggles of the restaurant industry post-COVID and how he was barely able to pay his own mortgage. When I clarified that the gift certificate would likely drive business (as the recipient would need to spend beyond the gift's value), his response was, "I get what you're saying, but $25 isn't going to do anything. It's at least $100 per person, but I'll think about it."

Given the lack of empathy and unwillingness to engage positively, I decided not to move forward with the request and ultimately withdrew it. I’m disappointed by the response and would hesitate to support this business moving forward.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cory Wiebe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-koG_9qZqepUMUiLDirk4JwjzAM3O7NdZujZl2CgAT98K4Cp9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I only thought to take photos half way through our meal...

My wife and I went here for our anniversary. It was a wonderful experience.
I've always seen this place, but never knew it was a restaurant, and had no idea it was the level of restaurant that it is.
First off, the staff were so friendly. It felt more like friendly conversation than a business transaction, plus they were so interesting! I just wanted them to join us for food and chats.
The food was amazing. We had the French onion soup followed by the ravioli and ragu over gnocchi. For me, the basil tomato sauce was the star of the show. Soooo good.
We finished up with a sticky toffee bread pudding on vanilla ice cream.
I'm always most impressed by good soups and good desserts. Both cases were brilliant.

My only sadness was learning that Chef simply didn't have time to do cooking classes. Oh well. I'll just have to go back.

Side note: I loved the dishes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9WrA1mYy_iI4nPFRaw_BtAJcGuR2Jl24UOc28&fid=0x0:0x25c2f0bdeacf27e"],"When":"2022-5-10"},{"Name":"John Wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVX_G2KhQ4UDvw4Nu1dqA3AsXfC53tIj_AZn0iIn-6oDOg1Yst1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Just the right serving size and very exquisite. The food looked so delicious that we forgot to take pictures before we ate.The waiters are very nice and helpful too. However, the food is very expensive.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9kctvZ_EfqMKNvER5ZqK9A_9mo7ipN99phLMY&fid=0x0:0x25c2f0bdeacf27e"],"When":"2022-5-22"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jennifer Mitton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJM_YjoYpYPoIcKZ6_ffcMam4Ms77vkPWmucFh_D0MWF9mBQVI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a great Mexican restaurant in the heart of Maple Ridge. The decor ambience and service were impeccable.
We went for lunch and were able to order from both the regular and breakfast menus.
The burritos are massive and delicious-they’d feed two easily.  That’s about $10 pp.
the queso fundio was also delicious.
I must of all loved the cod taco and all their salsas.
The cream filled churros were amazing.
We would definitely go back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOEeRl1WT5_oZ6kGh7nIklPQNumXdf4FN-XrHk_&fid=0x0:0x7a7137450555de4c"],"When":"2024-11-10"},{"Name":"Jeff Gingera","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVCiu-_EfINdBQYrLJJwQUa1eIZY2kaULP-QhWpjOxgSdQ9bLqLSw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Now one of my favorite lower mainland restaurants, Taco Fan features real Mexican style tacos.  The dine in has  a relaxed vibe.  Our Server, Maria, was warm & welcoming.  Tacos were Amazing.  Prices were mid scale so not a cheap place but still within budget. It's of free parking nearby.  Wheelchair accessible.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNIa8R1DPqlsyCm-ERBq7a0QlhRPYDr-Jw-axDF&fid=0x0:0x7a7137450555de4c"],"When":"2024-6-19"},{"Name":"Jerry Hernandez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWEKGC56Tc2lvn_hRjLXaCqV_ioShP4dyLQiP8SFMNMx9uDY8xd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best Mexican food we have had in a minute. It's in truth a 4 star for food. But they have spicy options which add a star.  Service is excellent and friendly.  The place is extra clean.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOziwIgNhlNhrscZZbTu9I3EKo21XBNLoxeU8eI&fid=0x0:0x7a7137450555de4c"],"When":"2024-8-22"},{"Name":"Rishi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWg4QBb_dVBzhxJg5dwslBxdqBD4Sl1A3KUCEuzcw0nka54ehe6=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Extremely delicious food, got the birria tacos and the filled churros. Our server was exceptional, very welcoming and very kind. Would highly recommend to anyone in OR out the area","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOjUhVL8-wFNCXfiysHAAFzoT47Q7X5ClLjGPNN&fid=0x0:0x7a7137450555de4c"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"Victoria Dengler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXtlodz71lhsrz54ARL9WDlSgf7K6XUugwUjfk9RlusM9gjP_w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beautiful lil Mexican restaurant! So neat, tidy, and homey feeling. Staff were friendly, welcoming, and had great service.

The food was AMAZING. It was the perfect amount to make me feel full and tasted so good. I enjoyed every bit of it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6wkJaznldvraTySmdIjzmMPbgHlu0Xd4OxncH&fid=0x0:0x7a7137450555de4c"],"When":"2024-7-21"},{"Name":"Vanessa Forouzan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW1_cocFm7SjkDDohlmX_tdPTKxFzhHUmYQsRX-gBS4JxUCl0nwTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I highly recommend this restaurant if you're in the Maple Ridge area. The service was exceptional, with friendly and attentive staff who made me feel welcomed from the moment I walked in.

The food at this place was absolutely delicious. I decided to try two different dishes, one with chicken and another with pulled pork. Both dishes were cooked to perfection, with the meat being well-seasoned and not overcooked. The chicken was juicy and tender, while the pulled pork was incredibly flavorful and melt-in-your-mouth tender.

The overall quality of the food was outstanding, and I was impressed by the attention to detail in every dish. The flavors were well-balanced, and the portion sizes were generous.

The ambiance of the restaurant was also very pleasant, with a cozy and inviting atmosphere. The staff's knowledge and passion for the food they served added to the overall dining experience.

In conclusion, I had a fantastic experience at this restaurant. The service, food, and ambiance were all top-notch. I will definitely be returning and recommending this place to friends and family.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPgqvni58QwCY2a9R-zTxmUEDyxHP3v1vuuN08K&fid=0x0:0x7a7137450555de4c"],"When":"2024-1-1"},{"Name":"Mike Barnes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL14AG5EcRj7fYcbE3xgYZDczsiBpGFEadXnk3mSfrCpag2mw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely fantastic true authentic Mexican with great service and relaxed atmosphere
I especially loved the kambucha and hatacha cinnamon drink pairing these two drinks with the incheladas was perfect
The only thing I will say is just little more salt that being said will definitely be coming back for that fantastic experience 🤩😘🤗😝","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkzCMlp4eO10P-_lcbV8liUHI8wvOlsFgEw_Ce&fid=0x0:0x7a7137450555de4c"],"When":"2024-7-13"},{"Name":"Wendy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6_SZiQStioXmbvv0S9IZORHUi5VoQzv6sQG-peGyskdFz7PuZuA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The ultimate Mexican culinary experience outside of Mexico 🇲🇽❤️ Top-notch food and exceptional service at unbeatable prices 😋 Cute and very clean restaurant 👌 Absolutely a hidden gem 💎 My husband and I loved it! Definitely one of our new favorite places 😍 We shared a tortilla soup, chicken enchiladas, and a fabulous carne con chile, a baked dish with beans, chile, chorizo and cheese served with tortillas. Soooo delicious 👏","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOMuPnwbd_uxolxYVgIiPfMzbG2I-BS_stc5Jfk&fid=0x0:0x7a7137450555de4c"],"When":"2024-3-18"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Meghan Wilson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKuN2091M3PHiXBZZK2j6OwUAW7w9V1jpRVrE9H5Y0rQ7RDrA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Was told I can’t get my sandwich because it was an hour before closing then watched the staff answer the phone in the same gloves they answered the phone in and made a chicken salad when I said I am vegetarian. Beyond disappointed.

When I told staff she did this she said “huh” want it or not ?","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Priya Badhan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUWrpdymoiG3drKefuP1fHuEVUxK_kqe7u0-JFka_xzidrhRw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Just ordered my Santa Fe Salad from them. And couldn’t really taste anything else except lettuce. Paid $12 just to eat Lettuce not worth at all. Staff wasn’t very accommodating or friendly no greetings no smile on their face. Looks like they have been forced to work there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNF3Un32WM30uhzYCYq05McMFVNxw1YupiPeytb&fid=0x0:0x82afba27444754db"],"When":"2023-8-24"},{"Name":"Zeevy Jimenez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJeVIBfbtP6oYQmWJyFgTiDdISEA4yjzvnzN_fgN_UiKSbx0W1=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Every time I visit, the atmosphere here is filled with warmth and friendliness. The staff goes out of their way to make me feel special, and the speed at which they prepare my food is impressive. It's not just about the quick service, though – the food consistently hits the spot with its delicious flavors. This delightful combination of friendly faces, speedy service, and mouthwatering meals turns each visit into a delightful experience that I eagerly look forward to every time I visit.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nat A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnjKr4KNFAObzj2bIvH9BRInxwKsSvEg1PM25bKfvhxtWZTWHoog=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I come here often for lunch for their Cranberry Pesto Chicken Sandwich on sourdough bread. It's so good and even better with their side of housemade ranch dressing! 🤤 I haven't experienced any bad customer service here. Staff are friendly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOnh0RpVFiudnvQ41wLNK-pPR9PhKuGjVlRwuBG&fid=0x0:0x82afba27444754db"],"When":"2022-8-28"},{"Name":"Joshua Boonstra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKexLwOewLLv2smIlc1UOjiRSXbUcIeZJpeo5K1-29txdUbMQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Easily the best experience I’ve ever had ordering food and never wrote a review really but I felt I had too after today, the staff were suuuuper friendly and helpful as I have never been to a chopped leaf before. Very accommodating and I felt very taken care of, the service was very 500/5 and the atmosphere was very welcoming. to anyone on the fence about coming to this location I highly recommend you do… you won’t regret it","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Joseph Lopez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWtSTYiZq8sXRIg3y_SANpXr7I2Vr5frKUdU0ff6HebRfIPeezJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very good! Flavors are actually bold, so keep that in mind if you don't normally like spicy food.  If you're craving a salad and are tired of bland food, this is the place to go.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPOy8Ucs8Tf7L9k-lh_wzWicgJxKkZ-akfjgfRh&fid=0x0:0x82afba27444754db"],"When":"2018-8-23"},{"Name":"Katrina H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX3DY-iPyg4ZaAxHH4bZxfnPwriuRSKUXq0qKjcA6Ro1jVWY69c=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Was greeted by one of the owners when I entered, and noted that he introduced himself to each of the guests and stopped for a chat. Lovely customer service. This shop is brand new and still working out the kinks (so be patient) but the food is outstanding and worth it. I found out later that you can order online for pickup in store, too! Looking good Chopped Leaf Maple Ridge!! Thanks for a great lunch :D (I had bowl 3 (greek) and the mango iced tea - yumm! The food didn't last for the photo so you get to see the recyclable packaging I brought it home in! )","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN73gN7J4grtkCseCd2qA5ajqCzjdQHBnfRNYtJ&fid=0x0:0x82afba27444754db"],"When":"2018-3-30"},{"Name":"charanjeet singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLsAfih1E0KLXFtn223q7Tb3cuWu0AEtQUZN_g3KrbY8miyIg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"It is definitely the worst, smelly, disgusting chopped leaf i ever had. Front counter teenager girl doesn’t know how to treat client. They were all rude and laughing. She put tons hot sauce and dont want to remake it and want to charge for it. Even the manager didn’t care and she said go for the review, she don’t care.
My recommendation, try somewhere else.
Chopped leaf is good but not this store","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Brittany","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJs_km6RslliP6cTTiQcv7eI3BYv9_LkkJf-8xS0POhDRp70O4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came to this part of city by fluke, and tried this place without looking at reviews during a power outage! And boy! I am glad the day brought us to this gem 💎.  Ordered 2 large bowls of pho… very generous in overall size, including amount of noodles and meat! The soup was proper rich and real broth and just so delicious. So good we had to pack the last bit home, didn’t want to waste a single drop!
We also ordered the wings and chicken fried spring rolls (awesome they had non-pork option!). Wings were more so on the plain side but came with a dipping sauce and the chicken spring rolls were wonderful… tasted almost like the traditional ones, just with chicken!
Will be coming back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNbIdOdS-NTfeTCpJ1WuFDeTYskcVTpu-Uyn-89&fid=0x0:0xa9da2966b717cf3c"],"When":"2024-12-17"},{"Name":"M Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIsGv955Ri875E7vGmsYaHqa37baEVpl4eh0b_zeRaT_a88ew=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Edited to add photos. Note the photo is of a half order of spring roll—our first time we got the full and it was huge! Also it is a family owned business and the owner works so hard to serve everyone. Huge kudos

First time dining here tonight, and we will be back! We showed up at 8pm, and were surprised no other diners wanted hot soup on a hot day lol. We got the owner’s attention, and he promptly served us. We had the spring rolls, house special pho, and bun bo hue. The servings were huge! The food was perfectly cooked, and tasty. No msg thirst after. Highly recommend this place. Very affordable too at around $45 with tax and tip.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNK8ahYJ7qm-WpHuqxi04-8R5DASA38emLnepV9&fid=0x0:0xa9da2966b717cf3c"],"When":"2024-7-6"},{"Name":"Joanne Antoniak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTQwhPcO13h_HhVjJVUrwpHjU5MeesKhPrxV5pA1ymdZ1edFkY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time visit today.
Ordered 2 pho and salad roll and spring roll.  Food was awesome.
Service was fantastic and decor wasn't bad.  Bowls were full of goodness and not loaded with just broth.  We will definitely go back

Return visit sept 2024.  Still good 😋","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPM-_ptKvmUxYbFqEEW2y_a1Igqh30HpMtpjDka&fid=0x0:0xa9da2966b717cf3c"],"When":"2024-6-28"},{"Name":"Lu Luna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUcA7O0ZqYEsTqIe6QegqGUkLuq5mtLY_tuXczfLzKLPx0-XgVc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The first time I dined at this restaurant was in 2014, and the flavor of their dishes has stayed with me ever since. Whenever I lived in Maple Ridge, I would always make it a point to visit. It has been such a long time, but today I decided to revisit the restaurant and indulge in their No.40 chicken fried vegetables rice once again. To my delight, it was still as delicious as I remembered, and the owner was just as kind and friendly as before. He even recognized us and greeted us warmly. I felt deeply moved by this experience, as food has a way of evoking memories and reflecting upon the passage of time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPEjeC_ndUXzrVDBxgumIMLdJsUlpuNd3rWnrcK&fid=0x0:0xa9da2966b717cf3c"],"When":"2023-6-11"},{"Name":"Graham M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWvXIcy2m-zrzQEvJPym8fBbkJUAJI8a_9vJ1dkEsVKsIxPb-U=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is some of the richest pho broth I've ever had. I have never been this full from a bowl of pho. Very nice, clean taste.

The brisket is legit, thick chunks of tender beef. Very good.

Please note this pho is lightly salted. I actually had to add salt. I've never needed to with pho before, but this seems like another advantage about the soup here.

The pork spring rolls are beautiful.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Wendy Wall","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKO-pUKK3oknGa9yeAnQSN3wiqb2kAy9hEtIRRgjz_61bzgEA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Smelled good when I walked in restaurant. Always a good indicator for me. First time here with friends. Really really good pho. I just had the veggie pho with chicken soup base with  rice noodles. Ate all the veggies but couldn't finish all the noodles. So filling and huge helping. Great Vietnamese coffee and best tasting spring rolls I've ever had. Will definitely be returning and bringing friends. Unassuming little place in the corner of a small retail area. Well worth a try.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jack Pajak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7kRSq5QM1wGXm36_dbE9YR6CpcUs9VUAhu1SxvpJkrQ-nGO0N=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went for dinner with the family. I had a pork banh mi and a small pho (rare beef and beef balls). Wife and kids shared some appies and the pork on rice. My banh mi was very tasty, crunchy but soft bun with delicious tender pork and fresh veggies. The pho was the best I've ever tasted. The broth was spectacularly flavorful and the meats were equally as tasty. My wife and kids really enjoyed their meals as well, particularly the salar rolls. The owner is also a very friendly and nice man who is very attentive of his customers. We will definitely be back, the wife and kids are already planning on what to order next!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-OY7S5N02plFO00qWtWF1P6Lf9B7sed5TiucA&fid=0x0:0xa9da2966b717cf3c"],"When":"2022-4-23"},{"Name":"Chunfang Huang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJmjTHBdo-AGkcGIh-YmihUY3OM9lB-8c7khtHpqH863RpDqA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"delicious food. Especially bun bo hu beef noodle soup. The size is so big even you ordered small size. The owner is very nice and gentle.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Jessameen Dela Peña","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX9mRpmL8-ZJUG7UPFcnsjzRdxjABif-MswbO1rxgJyyWfns8Jd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As a regular at Gina’s, I can confidently say this place is an absolute gem! I’ve tried a lot from their menu and keep coming back for more. Their soups are a must-try, with the tomato soup being my personal favorite. The bagel and avocado mushroom toast are absolutely to die for! And don’t forget their amazing coffee and non-coffee beverages—I’m especially fond of the London Fog. Gina is also so lovely and sweet, always making the experience even better. Highly recommend this spot!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPHeGjRr0wZO6ZlYLuoPwOyMVxYMBxBpNgpZzjq\u0026fid=0x0:0xa2b2bb06a47c4196"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Erik Johannes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9YvUSvEflSB1OUsnEkF1--2VNVQAwN83iuea0c4TKk35oCGUFvA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My first time here. My sandwich was the freshest best sandwich I can remember having. It really stands out in my 60 years of eating sandwiches. The bun (potato bread I think) was soft and warm. The lettuce, tomato and white onions were so crispy. The beef was just as I expected: Tasty and not salty. PLUS, there was this amazing creamy sauce. I don't know what it was, but it was so good. I only wish I lived closer.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_xmNSe5MvFlkacTCYhfzFZXIO7xaL3EsXjTMC\u0026fid=0x0:0xa2b2bb06a47c4196"],"When":"2024-8-29"},{"Name":"Young Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXLz6w_qmP_Vj31jk4TOmvVks_U7DY981QebFyfvd_px-TbAuRq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Well. Simply best sandwich shop ever!! Nice and cozy place with warm welcoming staff. Very tasty Bulgogi and Avocado sandwiches with full of flavors, which are reasonable prices and pretty good amount for lunch in size. I made a huge mistake having a sandwich without soup, though. My wife loved her latte for the richness and balanced flavor. I highly recommend this place to everyone!!!!!! We will definitely come again. Thanks, Gina.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMS72Qubl36nUTXlBUZddVV-MOkrVLo4X31cnBz\u0026fid=0x0:0xa2b2bb06a47c4196"],"When":"2023-12-30"},{"Name":"Ari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVZFr2lOsm-1DRRKbAML3xGYmN4IFUhEIuuxxMwCh-Sc_HMlQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They're always great, every time we come. Good restaurant quality food, but cafe prices. I'd even go further and say that their freshly prepared and delicious food is often cheaper than cafes in the area selling pre-made sandwiches and wraps. Most recently they even gave us some scones for free, since they were closing. The scones were so good too! Can't recommend this place enough.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dao Ngo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX3v-p35wkPrDkevQaamgSNHH5mEY_Vuah0632-d0TpYfBuKuq1=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Bulgogi sandwich is amazing, coffee is nice, service 10/10. I’ll definitely back for Bulgogi 😋","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPbdoexz-mQq1U-sNTlOl4-HEkgp6ODrkPQs9_5\u0026fid=0x0:0xa2b2bb06a47c4196"],"When":"2024-12-11"},{"Name":"Odin Anon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUsyL6mT6HCrD7EIy4nusC9mjJxj3gweid05WxJkFEx6qcl6Hw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Gina is lovely and welcoming and the service is just as good. My wife and I eat here all the time and from what I've seen,  Gina treats regulars like family, new customers like friends and the other staff are always great too. The food is so good! We love the sandwiches and mainly come in for those. Would definitely recommend for someone looking for a different and very tasty sandwich.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMBOjR_tINs5FV_-gC-rfKjAIra5J2w_xNjIYBc\u0026fid=0x0:0xa2b2bb06a47c4196"],"When":"2023-3-6"},{"Name":"Kyung Min Jun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocICJPWkvGNW95CONrcBFlukgFGohm6Cqht1Shik-y2L6YK-EQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a hidden gem! Great sandwiches! Tried grilled cheese with bacon and ham \u0026 egg sandwich on croissant. Delicious food and very friendly staff! Will definitely come back soon. I highly recommend this place for a quick bite.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO2rMt2HBoM8Ox_in2vVDJic1gvsQ0r5idiSlMt\u0026fid=0x0:0xa2b2bb06a47c4196"],"When":"2023-6-17"},{"Name":"Scynthia Ross","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYVpEm1Ljjv5i-XHrHtOaETpUpk8rldkdx8wcwoJUSTXULH4q5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I should not be saying this...BUT they have The world's best almond croissant!! Shhhhh don't tell anyone but you must get there before noon to capture one of these rare breed of croissants. You can taste the real butter. I would have taken a picture but I ate it. One of the regulars said all of the food is great.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNIt0nWFsYLO_XIpV6vcUL09NR4lg0lpYG7UkxS\u0026fid=0x0:0xa2b2bb06a47c4196"],"When":"2024-3-13"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Annie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJAG4UtHNdn-C74S5I053c9lMdRMdh_AH35u090AgjHoFmF2GSW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"After seeing many reviews and recommendations we tried Express and it reminds me of the old school pizza places growing up! We just tried the deluxe and it was delicious! I will definitely be back to try the lasagne next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZeTiLoR6Fgdc-gUpiQl4qIACG64PcZTuYeVUf&fid=0x0:0x8204f7cccce8a22b"],"When":"2024-7-1"},{"Name":"anita hassanpour","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLOeMiKLhzX52qh87A2h5ShytJH1OmkgsCuavK1XwKpWwNn5Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Everything Pizza is really so good. It tastes delicious. I am very sensitive on the quality of the food. My stomach is so sensitive. The quality was so good. However I ate around 12:30am but I had an easy sleep. I will order again for sure. Thank you","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ali Ghafari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJWI7w32uxbFfW36RLKQwg99Y9q-F6L_xIGiD7hys4ubwaUKg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered Everything pizza with extra cheese. It was very delicious and crispy. The man who received the order from me was so kind and polite. I will order from here again and again. Thank you so much.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jennifer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJHyr5XswhomwEeSPgcixWtNP_jQuENMy7cA0kLdmVsbBpp_Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I am a patient at Ridge Meadows hospital and ordered pizza Sunday night.
It was delicious 😋
Lots of quality toppings and open late (1pm) on  Sunday.
It's a little more expensive then my usual Place but 4× as good.
Lucky me my usual place was closed so I took a chance on Express Pizza and  now it is my new usual place 😄

Cheers

JENNIFER","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"carolina stanley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVRlo6vJJAIkTKFTwvzYTqo2Y2-jKku4pelnRDDaiLXdo-5pZa2HQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Not impressed. Dough definitely a frozen pie. They definitely don’t skimp on toppings. But overall 2/10 for flavor and crust. Picked up half the pizza was cold even though it was fresh from the oven.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jasmin Revington","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIoX1nheSfeBcSuHelrvwcyXwbrhBFZx6oiZSO9N4Jk6U48og=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been ordering from Express here and there for the last 8 years and they are definitely one of the best late night restaurants in Maple Ridge, especially for late night entree delivery. If you are in the Maple Ridge area looking for a late night meal, I definitely recommend.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"CGee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUTwyfCBG4qDP07jeFhodk0mIaCkCeK805l5aKFBuQroqYlTHA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good pizza !  crispy semi thick crust , not deep dish nor thin. Reminds me of a pizza from a Greek restaurant.  Not floppy or burnt . Good sauce , cheese and toppings seem fresh. Not greasy .  No heartburn.   Pizzas had a hint of wood smoke flavor which everyone enjoyed. Hard to say if it was the type of cheese or toppings or oven but it was good.   Prices are decent and fast delivery.  This chef knows how to make a pizza. Definitely our new pizza joint!  Thanks !","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gunner One","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbTVpAVDlpmz9BiKU9L6eY73BIH8A4-Ej984S5gdVY6vaEyiJSew=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We tried Express last night for first time.  Tasted awesome, lots of mozzarella,  nice thick toppings and the crust was enjoyable. Definitely our next go to..","Images":null,"When":""}]

My new favourite sandwich! Good portion size for the price especially in this economy. I got #29 and for a veggie option it was just PERFECT. I will be going back! 🥪😋

also parking was not as bad as people say. It’s a smaller lot for sure and they only have two designated spots, but you could definitely park across the street or next door and just walk over.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Micheal Quesnel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWaMKCCRb6st1FXez-nzL1294f027FjL2-ACnbGF4Q-NSreVo4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I hope you brought your appetite because the sandwiches sizes and flavors pack a punch! Staff was welcoming, friendly, and helpful with the menu and ingredients. Gave great recommendations.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jeff Grimkowski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIPgPGBYZZc5HzizweI73snfhOql0F3cSkMD29JK-r-yK03KQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"my wife and I went here for the first time today and we were very impressed. I got the #12 and my wife got the #18. #12 is the classic corned beef & swiss on marble rye. the #18 is the turkey with habanero jack and Sriracha mayo. both sandwiches were very delicious and the price was decent. the staff were very friendly and courteous. the restaurant was very clean also. parking can be tricky on site however there is ample parking around the area at all times.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Erika W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzROUPg4VNdad6PwNI4DQrInHi6r0d2rXlIj03xTI2nk3y8YRK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Sandwich was quite good...a little small for the price (maybe 6" long @ $15).
