user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Michelle Wood","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJocMZyiQsTomlB5wIT8XWBYE0ZxEkl_aCennxKWYM5ZP7ang=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Ordered for Halloween. This is my third order from here. The others have all been quite good but tonight the large pepperoni was very overcooked and kind of like cardboard. This was the handcrafted. The pan veggie was good. But the handcrafted pepperoni was not!  Too bad because we were so looking forward to it.
Staff was friendly.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shannon Roodenrys","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI3lOg16w73yu3uuprunG3AOjKfP4_dQUxykD_4suJ_XZmnyw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Sat Oct 5th (I think)
Walked in to order take out. Was told about a 15 minute wait. Went in again to pick up after 15 minutes and then had to re order and wait some more due to a technology glitch. System down! Young lady was very pleasant. When I finally got food, it was good n hot","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Warren King","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUhEYUtjiaHqTPCDxqH6xHBeSpgYOQ6lTsEzWD4fFDTnz_NKAMZ3w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered for the second time in a while (their new crust was good last time so tried again).  Pizza got delivered and was terrible, the peperoni was have just bread, no toppings!  Called for 30 mins before someone finally answered, they finally agreed to deliver a replacement.  The guy just dropped it off at the door an we didn't know it was there.  Last time ordering here, don't do it!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Carl - Pinnacle","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJX-l3Zg4ENLvaQ2BkXSSePno8LlJ2gNfHqPUFB4ZEpqTOi6A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Everytime an online order is placed, the ordering system either fails or you spend 30+ mins trying to get transferred to the store, they never answer the phone at the store and always divert to the main call centre. Constantly things are forgotten from orders and rarely show up correct. Hands down the worst Pizza Hut location in all of BC and that’s saying something.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Manthan kaushal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVreUKKbyBuL1rDd3rHCEU5fDRo7eKuUo_XTKDp9VeX_MheiuuA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"To this particular pizza hut's management. Ordered a pizza today at 9 and got a confirmation that it will be delivered in 30, cool!. Called your customer service rep after an hour+ wait and even they got embarrassed coz they were unable to connect me to your store to ask what's goin on?. Went to your store and it was closed before your actual closing time. Took the mentioned pic at 10:30 PM. Check your staff. Worst experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNXoJS3Qu3dyN7d2SP5sWMZh9vD0cX_oFDrNBrW&fid=0x0:0xa37b1ccd45646da5"],"When":"2021-8-17"},{"Name":"Mario Figueroa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJgyVpZ-MEyPnVPYI2HzYRQ9qtKaunlIOUGDz3B-UIJlQfPgg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I'm surprised pizza hut hasn't disappeared yet all of their bigger eat in restaurants are gone though cuz business isn't that good anymore. Chicken seasar medium pizza is $28 after taxes are you kidding me??? They use cheap ingredients nowadays they forget the competition out there is plenty and abundant pizza hut is a rip off I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS GREEDY PIZZA PLACE stay away there's way better deals out there my family and I are done with pizza hut they're out to gauge the customer every time you walk in their pizzas have increased in price they're roothless do they think people get wage raises every month????","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jaspreet Sidhu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKMn9Y7OgyTHCI0dvowhzMfvajkjJ5D-MZ1SWwg-z4_cxSqrQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Worst customer service ever they never pick the phone we tried 4-5 times sitting in the front of their store they was busy with gossiping each other nobody pick up the ph the guy name emiuel was very rude","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Aaron Scott","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXn-lvwTGMhUxCV421M_xqu_u5MrGrT6chcjNAjFFyrJKuOzGho5Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"There is one delivery guy here that does a great job. But the rest of them are incredibly inept.

One guy who has been to my building MULTIPLE times still can’t operate the buzzer. Another can’t seem to figure out how to open the door when the thing buzzes. They barely speak, and have no customer service skills.

Today the guy brings me pizza and his debit machine battery is so low that the machine won’t process the payment. So he leaves and days he’ll be right back to collect payment. He has to go get a new machine. Two hours later I had to call the store to find out what’s happening. I can’t wait all night for a guy who can’t figure out how to do the basics of delivering pizza to decide to come back to get the money.

The person who answers the phone hands it to the delivery guy who gets on the phone AND DOESN’T TALK. After about 30 seconds he says, “I’m the delivery guy”. I asked him when he was coming back because I can’t sit here and wait all night, and he said “oh, I’ll come right now.” HE WASN’T EVEN PLANNING ON COMING AT THAT TIME! He totally did not care how long I was waiting for him. Like a complete narcissist, he just figured he’d show up sometime before midnight when he felt like it?!!!! I mean seriously. I told him if he wasn’t here in 30 min he could forget about it because I won’t be home.

So now he says he’s on his way.

I then talked to the manager. I told him what happened and he couldn’t even manage a simple conversation. He barely said a word and had no idea what to do or what to say. And that’s when I realized this Pizza Hut is staffed by the people who can’t hold a job anywhere else and that no one from management down cares about anything at all. They’re just insipid space fillers… if I owned this Pizza Hut I would close it down because clearly the owner also doesn’t care about his business.

One competent delivery guy. I order from here once a week and the only thing that’s more frustrating than their garbage service is the fact I have kept doing business with them for the past year+.

No more. That’s the last time.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"May Zhagro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9KviWdU_UGm6yjKPv-6aFaljm1EC_ecrxYhnt_LO3duiyBNho=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Interior was clean and a lot of options from beef burgers to chicken burgers, shakes, fries, chicken tenders, and breakfast options. Able to customize on what you want added to the burgers. The burger itself was mediocre and was quite expensive for the portion that was given. $4 extra to make it a combo. Took a while to get our order of two burgers, but lots of seating to wait at. Plenty of parking as it’s located within a plaza. No dine-in customers in there during Sunday afternoon.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJM9GNUwI0ru9tKcbV8xDYlbCz4S4aIqcbrnrv&fid=0x0:0x10126d01160ec565"],"When":"2024-6-10"},{"Name":"Payam Alavizadeh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ_ZA_YHXhgNzKTpReaxZ12Y4AWYNOtDK5ZEhHo77Gk1YUw500=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a fantastic dining experience at Fatburger! Our order included the unlimited BBQ burger with mushroom and guacamole topping and the chicken spicy burger. To start, the unlimited BBQ burger was an absolute delight. Its flavors were incredibly delicious, and the combination of mushrooms and guacamole took it to the next level. The taste was simply outstanding.

But the goodness didn't stop there. The chicken spicy burger, which came with Curly fries, was also a winner. The spiciness added a kick of flavor that I thoroughly enjoyed. The fries were crispy and perfectly seasoned, making it a delightful pairing with the burger.

What truly impressed me was the cleanliness and comfort of the dining area. It's always a pleasure to enjoy a meal in a clean and cozy environment, and Fatburger nailed it.

So, my visit to Fatburger was a culinary delight. The deliciousness of their burgers, the quality of their sides, and the inviting atmosphere make it a must-visit spot. Thank you, Fatburger, for a memorable dining experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-YLNstikJR2IRr8K1vdRkYZhv6X2jQkYgd7SK&fid=0x0:0x10126d01160ec565"],"When":"2023-9-10"},{"Name":"Clare Hamilton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjmHXghyensIvYE3dOOg7pRiT5iEI2rLXHqY3Gcojd0PnnqUY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love the staff at this location always cheerful and great you with a smile. The food is made fresh and is hot good serving sizes and choices that suit everyone in our family!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Julio Olmos Lima","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJJKQzzzyVzTetdPGAt4DxjDLUImVYVrWCOIEJ0E8uPrDYP3g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was fresh and delicious. Commendable customer service was given by the staff. Must visit the place, perfect for family dinner.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Payam Amiri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJnoZzz1N_QX18pt4DdBS3NmrIlTmrurlte7uFBeXVhTkdkXg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I recently visited this restaurant while traveling to Vancouver with my colleagues, and unfortunately, our experience was disappointing. The staff’s behavior, particularly the lady at the cash register, was not welcoming or professional at all. We expected better service, especially considering the restaurant's reputation. I hope the management addresses this issue to ensure a better experience for future customers.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"شقایق کهورزاده","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJWtWJFSRRqEzEpVa7vXF80kGxbdNCVo_XDUwe2zSFTYVSLDw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I recently dined at Fatburger, and I have to say it was a disappointing experience. The staff’s attitude was shockingly rude. From the moment I approached the counter, I was met with unprofessionalism and a complete lack of courtesy. They seemed uninterested in helping customers, and their tone was abrupt and unfriendly. It felt like they were doing me a favor by taking my order.

Moreover, the hygiene standards at this location were below par. The dining area was far from clean, with crumbs and spills left unattended on the tables and floors. The sight of it was off-putting, to say the least. The restroom facilities were also poorly maintained, which only added to my concerns about the overall cleanliness of the restaurant.

Good customer service and cleanliness are fundamental to any dining experience, and unfortunately, this Fatburger location fell short on both. I hope the management takes steps to address these issues to ensure a better experience for future customers","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Johnny","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVvkqlZ5wz-o7qQiMAPvxq4Uq26umX4_opBke6CDrVfkbGhCeuLaA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was my first time at Fat Burger, and I have to say it was a good first experience. The burger I got was so delicious with all the added ingredients. The onion rings were crispy, flavorful, and delicious. They were so good that you don't even need ketchup to dip them in. I would definitely recommend this place and am definitely going back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Joanne Antoniak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTQwhPcO13h_HhVjJVUrwpHjU5MeesKhPrxV5pA1ymdZ1edFkY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Their breakfast can't be beat!!  Full breakfast at a great price ... Served til 4pm","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZCf9UmTW1prGjDIrKkFAi96lI-ly9VLwxPqxH&fid=0x0:0x10126d01160ec565"],"When":"2022-8-11"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Annie C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUiQJYF4_BS-QCtzODpwt_N5rIUplgHFCiJnOSYNTLBW_fQWDG4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pardeep working close tonight was AMAZING.
He got the long line dealt with QUICKLY and made sure to get all the details right for everyone's order ahead of us.
All I had to say was that I wanted the jerk chicken bowl (he even let me know what came in it!), and he took care of the rest! I didn't have to list off everything I wanted in it, and he omitted the cheese per my request.
Food was phenomenal. Best bowl I've ever had.
Absolutely amazing service from him.
Would absolutely come back in a heartbeat due to his service!
⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ 5 stars to him alone!
Give that man a raise!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Joanne Antoniak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTQwhPcO13h_HhVjJVUrwpHjU5MeesKhPrxV5pA1ymdZ1edFkY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"First time at this particular subway lougheed highway (203rd).
Eat in area is tiny (maybe 6 tables).
Shop was busy.  Plenty of staff kept the line moving.  Food was good.
Ingredients are fresh and you add what yoy like.
Lobby Area was clean and tidy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5Tq-aP6HlzCZEJHzHwiBPXrMv2J12YZYTO8eH&fid=0x0:0x532a8cf0e2066c35"],"When":"2023-5-26"},{"Name":"Sahil Jhamb","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXi61en5o7COh8vP6mtco_YkqCLtcfHpnNfb3x0ncWhE5kxcBzRUw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Online ordering was not working due to some tech issue at location, location denied to use app coupon as they facing some issue, and ask to go to another location ? Is there no way to entertain manually ? Surprised! Then the member said ok I will do this time for you, is it a favor you are offering to customer when there is tech issue ? Will not be going back to location, no rewards to my account as there system failure.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dave backeland","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcv64Vs5yBlfxYxoVSibb1CSK_GewvZ_CHwRAGyPnm_H2NUHk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"My daughter and her co worker both nurses at the local hospital ate here today during their dinner break. My daughters co workers had a steak sub. They had already eaten then noticed the maggots on the wrapper of the steak sub. Do not eat here I will contact the appropriate agency to deal with this. Should be closed pending an Investigation. They quickly left leaving the maggot covered wrapper.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Veerpal Kaur Sran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIBNQKpadS6X7lyFj0bmmYePq51U1wBDv_gQk6Qr4JvEOqVDw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I am really disappointed by the service and food. I went there at 9.30pm may be and the girl who was making the sub was really rude she don't even ask for the patty that which patty do you want. It was really a bad experience for me.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Roman Rapoport","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXZ1RhWJk7FNleGt5iAf_4WNTf0NEMtRINKw-n19Y7BK3Oh9vvq=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Puneet & Prabhjot were amazing, super friendly and kind. Kind of people that make you want to come back and order again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"aarav saraon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUNpGMrFAcOG9hVTK0Vb9-EE6Ym1HHLGJafzt9fTiy4MdH_P_qS=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A good sandwich shop. Recommend if hungry or want something else. And it is simple and very customizable, you can easily order by asking "Can I get a footlong (what sandwich you want)." Than add your toppings. The cookies are great too, they just taste so good.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ynday","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXpxBZuYdrIP3-2FyehoRc3qi4pGPkMQfcVRc4KIHLqx54GJocY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The cashier charged me for 3.29$ for the fountain water. I never asked for “carbonated”fountain water. I just told her I will just have to water from the fountain. And she told me they charge it for 3.29$

If I didnt call someone I know from Subway, she will not refund me

Also, we are 4 people inside and they were in the back by the computer talking so loud with their language from back home.

Very UNPROFESSIONAL","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"rashad preet","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI7l1E9Yl-cEPNvtQlKi4BreGC2j7rGjpmIdtPwIF2S7ekAMw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":""Sunfire Pizzeria is a fantastic spot for anyone craving delicious pizza and a great atmosphere! The cozy, modern interior, with its warm lighting and unique decor featuring wooden pizza paddles, creates a welcoming and stylish vibe. The pizzas are truly top-notch, featuring perfectly baked crusts and generous, flavorful toppings. Whether you're a fan of BBQ, pepperoni, or something unique, there’s something to satisfy every craving.

What makes it even better is that they serve IP beers and pitchers, offering the perfect pairing for their incredible pizzas. The staff is always friendly, attentive, and quick to make sure your experience is seamless. Whether you're stopping by for a casual hangout, a quick lunch, or a laid-back evening with friends, Sunfire Pizzeria is the place to be. Highly recommend giving it a try—you’ll keep coming back for more!"","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOCzGbc3-cgOYzD83_1egxMVueMK1fp6gBqUC3z&fid=0x0:0x390308853b054c33"],"When":"2024-11-14"},{"Name":"funinbc01","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVNuK8goS9LTbcAK-83ltMtkrpeV3KdlWUEm7KeXqEETYn9CeI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The ablute worst pizza I have ever eaten! It had almost no toppings and it tasted like they dumped a bucket of salt on it.  The 2nd mushroom pizza tasted like mush and the mushrooms came from a can.  Both completely inedible!!!

Don't waste your money here!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5W58fZPw5f7p6Z4YWPdLBRNYyBmM4c4vlbqYR&fid=0x0:0x390308853b054c33"],"When":"2024-12-13"},{"Name":"Gina B.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVQsMUERPU0hTyNVPqhudoNLd-ClRWG04t4yqojcmOEd_1g0AY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great pizza!! Owner recommended garlic ranch, we hesitated for the price and said no thank you. When he brought the pizza out he gave us garlic ranch for free plus extra plates/napkins!

We ate the pizza too fast it was too good - I forget the names but we ordered Pesto small (10inch) and a prosciutto (14inch).

Great owners, good business, decent prices for the quality of food. Definitely can share 10inch with 2 people, wish we got a bigger size it was so good.

Limited outdoor seating, we sat out with our dog and it was good ambiance.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0FrF7-M5uag2Fw2CbnptTGBkzi40vhYIQnPKo&fid=0x0:0x390308853b054c33"],"When":"2024-7-27"},{"Name":"Cody Peck","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQnV1Dua9DvHsJzCMrJ9QgvreUgkimwa0lDknvM-dDXYnloD55=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I live in Commercial Drive and have tried all the pizza places there and most of them don't compare to this. I had the bbq chicken pizza and it was absolutely amazing. Another customer complimented me on my choice.

They're licensed to boot! Come grab an ipa! They have 3 to choose from.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZLsFinPCYKiUPWS7RDG8jvVi7VYWuwkOHpJp7&fid=0x0:0x390308853b054c33"],"When":"2024-11-23"},{"Name":"sukhu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIaaZRnHRUGcCNfNLmw2antO_-C1uW8KfBOiIwkeOgZcVsc-A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Sunfire pizza was a delicious surprise! The crust was perfectly crispy, while the Garlic ranch  sauce was so good. Pizza was topped with fresh mozzarella, roasted red peppers, and jalapeños, every bite had a great mix of heat and freshness. It arrived hot, and the portion was satisfying! Best pizza  in maple ridge","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9LceXBOh7qnfnTbCkTml-Hg6VpujZIspmEsle&fid=0x0:0x390308853b054c33"],"When":"2024-9-19"},{"Name":"Shawn Yang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLBtmJkH_7NwsaHdVxpMp8J8SdREbfUwW9YdCV0UXHcSRrfKw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing experience, staff was so so nice and was provided sauces for us on the house. Staff striked up conversation with us and made us feel very welcomed. Pizza was amazing as well! Prices were great.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPBcwSVxVmLOzAyatez1yrs84I3WarkoirD-8L7&fid=0x0:0x390308853b054c33"],"When":"2024-12-1"},{"Name":"Dev Deteriorate","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW174d3q1C68k3CIpTb3Y2mjhbzxdBX3351-dOCoOvMShWcsYWq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sunfire Pizzeria holds a standard of excellence that is executed through simplicity, fresh ingredients, and love of the pizza game.

You get the classics here. Prosciutto, real pepperoni, basil, and the structural integrity of the pizza is to die for, a crispy thin slice that you can give the traditional fold to.

There’s really something for everyone here, lots of traditional meats to explore and refreshing vegetarian options.

I also have to give highest praise to their garlic dip. I’m from Windsor which is not only known for their pizza but the garlic dip that comes with it and this is the closest i’ve found to something as good, if not on par. If you’re ordering from Sunfire I promise you, order some extra cups of it!

I have nothing but love for this place and their employees, I work delivery gigs on the side and they’re always so happy to see their customers when I come in to grab an order.

If you haven’t given them a shot yet, this is your sign.

Sunfire forever ❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlqu8_HX-PMKLd4_kXpZR-sXVaSF1K4M1ZE2DC&fid=0x0:0x390308853b054c33"],"When":"2024-8-12"},{"Name":"Ignacio Villalba","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU27mCvoX7yWI8W90PNknNcH_GKVViWKlcqOsZqJuCx7EqEabQUww=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My wife and I visited the place yesterday after ordering online two times previously. We love the pizzas there. The homemade thin crust and the ingredients they use are simply delicious and hard to beat. The service is top notch as well. The manager even gave us some house sauce to try with our pizza for free. I am recommending this place all the time to friends. 5 stars.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Jack Pajak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7kRSq5QM1wGXm36_dbE9YR6CpcUs9VUAhu1SxvpJkrQ-nGO0N=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great experience today at barBURRITO, I highly recommend their bowl and burritos...they have fresh and super tasty ingredients along with delicious sauces! Their hot sauce is actually pretty hot and tasty. Super impressed, I would highly recommend trying them out. The guy and girl who helped us were great! Fantastic experience here today. I will be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO6pcY5JJvzODrkIlWj93TPXMTieoiNgnkskpZB\u0026fid=0x0:0xe24101308286bb0a"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"Brandon Nagy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLmewvNITyBoUM2dD0Qut9kgic6K7dG9RD2cTVx8Cx-to4wTA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"You guys gotta try the big box. It’s really awesome. This is the best place in town to get food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8wXS-BwoBSSjhhsYvnBsyhJ7lTCmA5kyAD3uj\u0026fid=0x0:0xe24101308286bb0a"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"Brandon Nagy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU5geYbrbW68XZnK-xVVCQbMsaaLeInjrHXcusvGMOmVsZcXLQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The staff at Bar Burrito are incredibly friendly. They always remember me and my daughter, and when I come alone, they always ask about her. You can tell they genuinely care about their customers and the food they prepare. The Big Box is a fantastic deal for the price and the amount of food you get. There's another similar place in Maple Ridge, but their ingredients aren't as fresh as Bar Burrito's. One time, I got my wife's favorite order from the other place, and she told me to only go to Bar Burrito from now on because it tastes so much better. :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dorie Wright","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXvbBfcr1ja33PSZrTCogLeor_FQoVsy7UHGlN1MZRV4Qq3DJft=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am a regular customer often twice a week.There has never been a time that I didn’t receive a fresh and well prepared meal! Super friendly staff who provide top notch service .\nI look forward to each visit!\nGreat food, Great Service, Great Staff!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jacob","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXg7AibH86n_F_5aofCCOOZiENczznZy0D7fR1rEOXKg-uV3o1DpQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best burrito place in ridge by far, even with the other competition in town they still just had a massive line up and great customer service. I don't know what they get paid, but they need a raise! Especially the dream team of 3 that I always see when I come in, they never disappoint! Highly recommend trying this place out! The tangy crunchy chicken is best!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPipAMwAWWPmap4MhPxK7YCspS9ayJoIAbtjmAr\u0026fid=0x0:0xe24101308286bb0a"],"When":"2023-7-29"},{"Name":"KHUSHDEEP Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL65otn6Hh2STgpFvi-nbcOYN5lyUS_uJUqURiVxjCwMK-39Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Order through uber eats. Paid for extra protein and guacamole.. not satisfactory portion. Very less for $22 spicy chicken bowl.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPl2RSDfR449MkEvs9KRKGNssMQV1hngvTNnB0J\u0026fid=0x0:0xe24101308286bb0a"],"When":"2024-9-5"},{"Name":"chelsea","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXBW5O9lMc_HmqgLyx7-NdIptvgcckH_YAo9brPdDlQYP1nb37t=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"If you want inconsistent portions and cold food this is definitely the place for you. I don’t know what happened, if the management has changed but this place sucks. The staff always seem pissed off and look like they don’t want to be there, and after tonight, I can say they are either untrained or just plain lazy. This isn’t the first time this has happened at this location. I haven’t said anything because I wanted to give the benefit of the doubt as every business deserves. When people are paying almost $20 per meal, why is management not watching over their employees to make sure they are doing their job correctly? Waste of money and there’s nothing worse than still being hungry because they served a children’s sized portion. Unbelievable","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Andrea McLeod","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXX1KU2-w993x76nK8jdS5Av8FKAge-5HRInaCTfdldPkQWaHPk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food! Super fresh and really friendly staff. I will definitely be coming back on my next visit to the area.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mumtaz June","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIJ57yuZsE_ZTkcmBSuSsnrCUFQFFqIO1h71zfMaPC0pedJxc4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a fantastic experience at Desi Village! The biryani was absolutely flavorful, with the perfect balance of spices, and the chilli chicken was a standout—succulent, spicy, and incredibly tasty. The restaurant also has a warm and inviting ambiance, with tasteful decor that complements the delicious food. It’s a great place to enjoy authentic Indian cuisine in a relaxed setting. Highly recommend and will definitely be coming back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO6XdGqgBOUTwZS_nyT60fYqy2x300WU1JO-gh7&fid=0x0:0x196e9603bd1d89db"],"When":"2024-12-3"},{"Name":"Prabhjot Pallan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKgO21cjeV01RW1fYtVVl6PtIv5eeCe5VS5GzlzoGXz_pXnTQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had an amazing experience at Desi Village Restaurant. Food and customer service was outstanding. An attractive ambiance is very welcoming. My kids loved their Shahi paneer, garlic naan and desserts. Highly recommended!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3aWzdxmd3Y5aXwOQpSHQq46J5gD8DFKo0OKmY&fid=0x0:0x196e9603bd1d89db"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"H M E","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX_onQ_VWTg3rT--s4p5BWrgkdHsv4YFtp2G5IvwsR019b0iUL7ZA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic. I found all the Indian restaurants in Maple Ridge so far to be quite bland (in terms of flavors, not just spice level) OR really inconsistent. The flavors of the food here absolutely blew me away. Can't say enough good things about it. I hope this restaurant stays!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM3KZli8btK833TtkTWUawdGbGxiWYzaATbxEPz&fid=0x0:0x196e9603bd1d89db"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"Lovelreet Saroya","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUvOGb2IfCFbypZsuOw-IjYYD3blCxyEfzhhvvKF0CGDaT7vTw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This restaurant has a high-end, clean appearance, and the ambiance inside is very pleasant. The food was quite good, allowing me to experience a taste of indian cuisine. this place felt safe and clean. While the staff were friendly,. Overall, a good dining experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMRz1dgufk1-EgU7uN8o-EnxilF0mDl-2eOWHE&fid=0x0:0x196e9603bd1d89db"],"When":"2024-12-23"},{"Name":"Daniel Momich","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVMLmjbBzipiWC9y5kDPd5UcqBNmqkZL6tcv-IJKvt7gyj3UtM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow! This place exceeded my, admittedly high, expectations on everything! Even the doggy bag containers. Absolutely the best onion bhaji I've ever had and the lunch special (pictured) is fantastic. Wish this was closer to me so I could eat here frequently","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOSl3I4ij-VLSDZ4MKJLVkvbLVt2c46K-W0fMYK&fid=0x0:0x196e9603bd1d89db"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"kim steve","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVY0aDu0XYBkItQHLfUVtDyOF6M60HTL1zv2rPb7HeY4cWcnBitsA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Service was friendly and attentive, making for a truly enjoyable experience. Whether you're a fan of traditional Indian dishes or exploring new flavors, desi village is a must-visit. Highly recommend!

We order from desi village for company catering all time and it is always fresh and warm-  arrived on time +packaging is awesome. Food is warm for hours!

Call desi village for your next company catering. You won't be disappointed","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOA5wvlXEzVrdlb_SPpPXqlNM9BiJLrCYaK4a35&fid=0x0:0x196e9603bd1d89db"],"When":"2024-11-26"},{"Name":"Harsimrandeep Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJGFt-x6HLFjHpb_Q3PLYde7ugytZerHeSXMefsrXsO0NCc9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We went for dine in first time and we had a really good experience over there . Ambience is so good and food was delicious. The manager and owner were so welcoming. They really put lot of efforts to ensure we are enjoying our food . Manager Jasmeen is polite and she make sure food is being served hot and asked us if we are having good experience. Must recommend to someone who wants to taste Indian food with good ambience in maple ridge.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Simmi Khanna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGpUak9WlX6-Up2MwVKzB2TnrCjSwj55Jg-LZgTqdZv_Bb4sKK4g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you’re in the mood for an exceptional dining experience featuring authentic East Indian cuisine, I highly recommend visiting Desi Village,  Recently, I had the pleasure of attending a Christmas party there, and it was an amazing experience. The ambiance was warm and inviting.The service was truly remarkable.
Every dish we tried was a testament to the chef's skill and dedication to authentic flavours. From the aerobatic biryani  to the flavourful curries, each bite was a celebration of spices that danced on the palate. The appetizers were equally delectable, perfectly complementing the main entrees.
Overall, my experience at DV was nothing short of fantastic. I left feeling satisfied and eager to return. This restaurant offers not just a meal but an unforgettable experience.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Alix brown","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJV_BkP57011TQMTEtyGEJS8ghCbag5zwaUeS54byF4fYXZ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So totally thrilled to be at my first vegan meetup here! We’ve been coming here for years and your vegan menu is unbelievable. Tons of options and super delicious. The service is fantastic and I love the super cozy decor. Thanks for an amazing night!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPxjUuoyIsEARKRj5wmM3AV7jbViSDrtpxTy58&fid=0x0:0xafa5e197af61323e"],"When":"2024-6-21"},{"Name":"Julia Vu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJFe6ysL8ycb11c9nahzMs1cSOfcFxV8wKNRtXE_nQbazDU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"OBSESSED with the vegan arancini with rose sauce (aka rice balls on their menu). It's a big portion and deliciously filling. I am intrigued by how chewy and crispy their batter is and the rose sauce is liquid gold. Thank you so much for offering a huge vegan menu, at reasonable prices, great portions, and, most importantly, real TASTY food. ❤️

Please keep in mind that the wait times for orders tend to be longer than usual, but it's definitely worth the wait! Though you don't have to wait too long just to eat - everyone gets a complimentary focaccia bread with balsamic olive oil upon arrival - such a thoughtful touch!

Nicely renovated. Feels cozy and intimate. Recommend as a cute hangout or date night spot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMnOeiViBP6UwxhFQoQczZcPFmfkCRL-hD02Eo&fid=0x0:0xafa5e197af61323e"],"When":"2024-1-27"},{"Name":"Ryan Bates","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIvbi-lOAKVp_EI635G5lV9rkUZeqJmkIg2yjkrD54pM5BPfA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Party of 2, we walked in, after a few seconds, the employee with bright dyed hair told us to sit anywhere, but every correctly sized table was covered in dirty dishes, so we sat at a large table. then were told to sit at a small one (understandable if on its own). We then sat at a small dirty table, that was sprayed while we sat there and not wiped down fully. We were then asked if we are vegan or not, we said vegetarian, and the employee flatly asked us again if we are vegan or not. We said no, vegetarian. We were given meat menus, then waited a while and heard this employee lightly argue and correct a customer on the phone, then did the same to the couple that walked in after us. Thankfully those customers corrected her arrogance to ensure they get the right food with their dietary restrictions. We then asked for the vegan menu and got a snappy “oh you want vegan now?” Then received a very dirty vegan menu.

I work customer service, so normally I don’t really mind if someone is having an off day. But this was far past that. First time I’ve ever walked out of a restaurant. uncomfortable unwelcoming, unclean place.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jayne Wright","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUms7PcN3Vy1M-xxhw_bkbo3QTmP5q-g8ISEeKG_LRu_HHeOy0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely atmosphere. Paliottis vegan menu is really extensive with lots of choices! I had the crispy rice balls (similar to arancini) and Cajun vegan chicken penne. So delicious, I look forward to going back and trying the fettuccini cashew Alfredo!
I’m visiting town and they let my party stay and chat for a long time, they were very accommodating and great drinks menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM3ogMnJEuPE0xdowksSNGWfHNZ78NcmFA2ptkH&fid=0x0:0xafa5e197af61323e"],"When":"2024-2-22"},{"Name":"T Dang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMSEwMA3m2f2pUNvDSD01evNvY5ImU08gKtdPmCpcdgJy2LmVY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Service was impeccable. Very cute little restaurant with lots and lots of options including vegan options. I also love restaurants with a kids menu. That’s a plus. Only reason they didn’t get a full 5 for me was the spaghetti noodles were a little over done. I prefer al dente but the sauce and bread was really good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNKWDW06SyebUNwpuPwO119ro5p_lgjPBGnj3a&fid=0x0:0xafa5e197af61323e"],"When":"2024-4-13"},{"Name":"Babeth","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWf4WovMQFERSvhxzEoCuuSb4_AjZcTnpLowA2HY_C3jDQ0LV66=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We were totally disappointed when we ate here. We waited almost an hour— if not for the free bread—we would have been so hungry and have left the place. It wasn’t even full (3 other tables), but we had to wait a long time; only one waitress who was doing everything from reservation, seating, serving, etc. She tried her best though. Flies were everywhere, food was not great as expected with all the “good” reviews. Too pricey for the order, steak was medium rare but it was too chewy. Mashed potatoes too salty. Waitress said they’re closing in a few weeks. Even so, they should have at least ended well as read on reviews.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Thomas Lovey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ_sxu-gJcM6Bn62duXbg1cuPha8c77oPsgPbYDcIR07FvhTw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"tried this place tonight and It was an amazing experience start to finish. the customer service was incredible, and we shared some great conversation with our server. the pre meal bread was soft, christ p on the outside and had a nice garlicy flavour, the portions were enormous and filling, the carbonara was some of the best i've ever had with a perfect smooth texture with well blended flavours, and the vegan cheesecake was incredibly creamy and the coconut flavor was suble and not overwhelming at all like it often is in other places. the only complaint I have was that i'm not a fan of the gluten free crust texture, but the flavour was still quite good. the experience was amazing and I will be reccomending this place to anyone with ears 5/5 stars well earned!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkquxSw3IiHVUwDqxtYBBEx9hepLAU2EJ7scp5&fid=0x0:0xafa5e197af61323e"],"When":"2023-2-12"},{"Name":"Espartaco Gonzalez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQvqC7CHvoOBhM7UyOXHX4wB1JILNV3X-lgettj-tkSlS61g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"10/10 for vegans!!
We ordered the vegan pizza rolls, the vegan chicken marinara and the vegan spaghettini carbonara, thinking we were going to get Vancouver sized portions...

We were such fools! The food portions are huge and absolutely delicious.

The amount of vegan options is staggering, there are more options here than in any other vegan restaurant in Vancouver!

From the complimentary bread to the wait staff this place is definitely worth the drive if you are from out of town!

Edit: the vegan chocolate caramel pecan cheesecake is breathtaking ❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNuDH6sKqx8mmaiMkBlEuMWvXeUbXN-hAvMYzLF&fid=0x0:0xafa5e197af61323e"],"When":"2023-12-28"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Rolando_ Rose","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIQBfjayv2V3eqQ6nmwU1uOEqgsWCG5VdwRxO3uXCF1EsXQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Just average donair. The ambiance of the restaurant looks too tired and needs some love. While the tomatoes, onions, cucumbers and iceberg lettuce are fresh and crunchy, there’s not enough flavour in chicken donair, garlic sauce is not garlicky at all. Good location in Maple Ridge, easy to find and easily accessible from Lougheed Highway, Dewdney Trunk Road, and 207 Street. But what I am looking for a great Shawarma is the ones that you can find in the streets of Dubai, Doha, Riyadh, Jeddah, Abu Dhabi and other Middle Eastern towns and cities.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNIQPd4E_o7w_BbGyfqPk915vsWz1S8eH70Rz8&fid=0x0:0x5e8488cbaa6706fa"],"When":"2024-12-20"},{"Name":"Paxton Skrukwa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLIn2o1TGm6qhK760ufU-Ks7kFr_uE1jgLQEnBiAZxtwNR7zw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Donair was hot and fresh , I've never experienced so much flavour. I ordered a super Hawaiian beef. Sure it  isn't the largest donair available in town but the flavour is off the charts. The fresh hot meat was absolutely insane . Great job ! this may be a monthly occurrence since I'm out of town . Its that good . Tell him Cactus Jack sent you !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPHgQao0OeuiW5zKxrRPHm3XHJacxPgUExW92cC&fid=0x0:0x5e8488cbaa6706fa"],"When":"2024-8-30"},{"Name":"Aaron Z","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVRwH-T4meTA46mZWwBX8SW-8HRP3aTbI4qdWLp7QDk8OwKOg_kvA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic establishment. He has been there for years. Always consistently great. Dog friendly too. Asked if I could get some chicken for my dog and he gave me a small amount no charge. I was so impressed.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Joni Outlaw","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJiwQJqCgKmRrr3onNf_Keaeft5OYCtq8cmojr1vFYhvg8Hig=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Poutine donaire  will change your life! I love coming here for food. The falafels are superb! The food is amazing.... the fries and falafels are made to order they are so hot and fresh. NEVERMIND the prices . It's a steal. I don't even live in maple ridge but make the commute often to eat here. They have delicious beef and chicken as well I just prefer the falafels myself.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPNZLZeJxYHUamHEcsS-3f7nYAZ-IBAabR5u-lj&fid=0x0:0x5e8488cbaa6706fa"],"When":"2024-4-24"},{"Name":"Amy Lapka","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKz5WqBgZ-zOQMq0YADkQNpSRdLNSESLBD_mbCIt7uT_WLpFQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We love Donair Top! They offer generous toppings, good flavours, and lots of options. Any time we’re there, we’re never the only regulars in there. My pictures are of tonight’s chicken salads!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8B_uAMdw62GFbfxByZe4axPxMpxFrsk0biYgv&fid=0x0:0x5e8488cbaa6706fa"],"When":"2020-3-5"},{"Name":"Kim Lovino","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVgFvPz1MLcDh2p7hkNMTeAwE3jmU0_hDAwvlUIGOia6_lY6RBkFQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"HAVE YOU TRIED A DONAIRxPOUTINE YET? For less than $10 you can!

We tried this small Donair shop at Maple Ridge and it's 🔥! Hands down one of the best Donair places we've been to in a while! 👌 With the price, you also get a drink 👀

We ordered:
-Super Donair Poutine ($8.50)
-Chicken Platter ($10.00 w/ pop pop)
-Hawaiian Lamb Donair ($8.50 w/ pop)

Check the place out when you're HANGRY and you're near the area!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNA5DZTlvcsL8Y5pWGihmlRWo07dKeuy26Dd1Pv&fid=0x0:0x5e8488cbaa6706fa"],"When":"2020-2-10"},{"Name":"Farzad Yarahmadi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWVL1ZNumRCDrzHwZgrUFz5SXcIggox3bY1UrnohOO-CZKUBM3msA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I recently purchased a chicken donair from Donair Tope, and I am extremely disappointed with the quality. The donair had a terrible smell, making it inedible. I couldn't even take a single bite before having to throw it away in the garbage. This experience was very frustrating, and I don't recommend to any one.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Elizabeth Bruneau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVEfdwdzg7a-t-FvED_e_ICeY6c2F9wWHziEFSCxCklwPPHJYvB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They're one of my favorite donut places and I kid you not I have tried everywhere. Nowhere is as good as this place and if anybody says different then they are absolutely out of their freaking minds. Every time I have to order a donor protein from somewhere else it's always missing one thing whether it's the gravy the cheese or the taziki. I'm not sure why every other donor place doesn't just make their donairs exactly like this place.

The only downside of this place is they do not have any delivery services they need to get on skip or Uber or something. I would literally become a delivery person just for this place.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Sushi Guru

Family of four, with varying tastes and preferences. They had something delicious for everyone, when the food came out we were impressed with the beautiful presentation, delicious flavors and generous portions. Highly recommend the Udon, spider man roll!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMabFP_S0CAPT8HSbgneeQAMVFQ_Tu-oDxRIgd3\u0026fid=0x0:0x279591a5cfb86af5"],"When":"2024-12-24"},{"Name":"Shawn Meston","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIHd8fSRbNfKu9FZDcrQgWAawRD_WoXsmZutr4I6wI2CpSPXA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love this place - been coming here since they opened several years ago. Great food, excellent service, and never disappoints. 10/10 would recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-ybxJp8W6LlkEFHN9O38vmrgxu0kv17Lk8jZH\u0026fid=0x0:0x279591a5cfb86af5"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"alexromy87","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLIrmfhc78CcrtDl__RvprpSOtWBhkzT4Z6LgfFYpUFXX1P6g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I was really disappointed with my order. The California rolls had a strong fishy smell, almost like they hadn't been kept fresh, and the Ichinbani roll wasn't much better. I could barely eat any of it, which felt like a waste of money. I ended up throwing away more than half of my order and was still left hungry.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmo4-YG-WImnLHeZsq2_FYaxwDbVJTI7GeHrzx\u0026fid=0x0:0x279591a5cfb86af5"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Amanda Emans","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_H0hPKbsovOju9gbzunj8zTDD_-dllNqGzJbd4zZrSj5_N0I=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Incredible experience. The food was the freshest sushi I’ve had. The staff was energetic and accommodating. Tamago and rice are perfectly cooked. Lots of options for non-sushi eaters. Service is prompt and friendly. Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kaylyn B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwPU12AV-KSZwNgSb60vqMh3_m__Bt1zo5htnMtTgVO85s_aufqA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best sushi in Vancouver! user_reviews: [{"Name":"Amy Carss","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIPJDjoTXoll6RCmiT9GuEDsVSPBkykC45F5bU4JnKztdDiUQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We order from pizza factory for our kids birthdays and whenever we don't feel like cooking on a Friday night. We have never been disappointed. We order online and it arrives hot and fresh in under an hour. The deliver driver is very friendly, the pizza is always correct, hot and fresh. This place has reasonably priced pizza that's not dry but not too greasy.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"33 Vastu Construction","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUDayAQrmFfgLjGRQR-u0oMBRQ60h8gW7epO2iRebeWezZKBF4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Its been so many year's since this family has been operating the maple ridge location. Same taste and passion since the beginning of the days ! Hats off to the entire team for keeping up with the consistency and the amazing service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM19VhtvmErGJGSmIE0fiDT_JLK3VSJLPEyVXRV\u0026fid=0x0:0xfaae31e0e192a4c9"],"When":"2024-6-23"},{"Name":"John Wylie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxiLO8pNw0MKyOXVcjXud9cqdMnsvOkp8gFBJ0P0kvbguNlJHK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"OK we gave our address of our apartment building which does exist our buzzer number and our suit number. They call us back and said this isn’t a game you’ve given us the wrong pay address or like no we’re at 22170 Do Trunk Rd. it is a real address. The driver can’t find it and calls us a liar. This is unacceptable if your drivers can’t use GPS or have no idea where they’re going, they should be fired. I pissed at the way we were treated. My daughter is a professional working person and I’m a retired BC ferry engineer. this is nowhere to treat customers we will never call it place again. Also at least 20 of my friends that abused that place previous have stopped using it due to the terrible service that we’ve had and they’ve had shut the place down if you can’t do your job properly.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Narotam Sharma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI2F59Cf_5Ax94-RaQpJXt6NfCXlfpswnygxAcGOzAbBArd8Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"There pizza flavours are so good we ordered the half shahi panner and tandoori paneer pizza it was all delecious but the tandoori side was now my. Favourite list","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"komalpreet khaira","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJuxqdDl8ZXrxQoQG0S6Pkj0xgPA-kXU-LqcErVaPtz96iHUg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The lady at the front desk took my order on the phone and ended the call quickly without asking what I’d like on the pizza. When I went to pick up my order, the same lady gave me one pizza and when I said I ordered two she said “just wait there” and pointed. I waited 15 minutes and she served someone else instead of prioritizing me who messed up my order. When I got the pizza she didn’t even apologize or atleast say thank you. I came home to discover that she put pineapple on my pizza when I specifically said no pineapple. She did not give a damn about making things right and I’m beyond frustrated with the way she handled things. I mean seriously she couldn’t get a simple order right. She has no common sense and does not respect her customers. I’m never going here again, a place with such bad customer service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Wayne Aasen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK3y0RjEFDsZ1YvxPl9Z961th1gC4o8pWlsaG3svPlyXVYehg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pizza has always been excellent. Normal delivery has always been stated to be 45 min but has never been more than half an hour. Drivers are courteous.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Priscila Sousa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWM_cAexa_NVrTLPFALhtv6Nwik-picYB88hEt93f9FY-l2GRjo4A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Just ordered a Canadian pizza. It came with a spice pepperoni. When I called to complain he told me they don't have hot pepperoni on the house. When it clearly has one pizza called HOT and SPICE with the first ingredient being listed as HOT PEPPERONI. After the manager said he doesn't have hot pepperoni, he said bye and hang up on me. Great customer service, now we have a whole pizza that the kids won't eat it. 🙄","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCp1q2NdJ8iI456TiQ6ZZjo6S4pdmC-BLJW0On\u0026fid=0x0:0xfaae31e0e192a4c9"],"When":"2023-10-30"},{"Name":"Shekiba K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVQzpiX6TbA7IYWgsDwXqZTl1JfdgbRJQgeAV_bnXNyRy-g6yp78Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This place is horrible I ordered 2 large pizza because they had special which was 2 topic 27.99 when ii go pay they charge $48 without asking me put extra toppling that I don't want like seriously that how you rip the customer will never go again","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jasmine Melody","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKRrMElQt8WAWo6pWhY1tZKC-yHf20yC8YlhfVVmawZnrYs4A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was kindly greeted by Sahej who was always smiling and so patient while I ordered chicken donairs for my whole family! She didn’t hesitate to individually mark an Initial on each package and the restaurant manager Jot was so kind and friendly as well! Thank you ladies for starting off my weekend with good vibes!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Steve Biggerstaff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUq_mufPMIRsmmqWZxxUqPKwd0TodFRMPu7VbQZd-m5juPlYole=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My first visit today, the service was friendly and fast. The lamb donair was exceptional and good value for money. I will return when in the area and recommend this restaurant to others.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Reza Irani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKIPin_cpy6cUIJ0TocdQ2e6OWsKTrKlZ9YU-SVwrXWh-NO7g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"ordered my food from Uber eats. I specifically asked For no hot sauce since I am allergic to it and what did they do, they put extra hot sauce on my food. I spent almost $30 on one special platter and my order was wrong. When I called the store. This lady answered and could not help me due to language barriers.  she took my name and number for the manager to call me back and I never received a call back. Poor customer service I will never order from them ever again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Robert Ash","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLJQAeP8ruG-UCqNM_45mQCHPv-HxgUjGGoOGCaA0SeoNx2rg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went there today and Jot made me the best Donair I've ever had. I actually called back after I ate it and let her know how amazing it is. Whenever I'm in Maple Ridge and need a Donair place, I go here.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"A O","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIwav9sAXFjgnZp6KKPcoaDkxz7ZcOVGrkRKamKWmLv7pAw0w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Came here for the first time yesterday. The usual place that I go to was closed for the day. The donair was okay, but both of the young girls who were working at the restaurant were very rude. For this reason, I will not be returning a second time. Looks like others have had the same experience..maybe the owner should address this for the reputation of his business. Looks like he or she does not care based on his responses to his customer reviews..","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sam Goh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKE5mTKD61HIgHQk8dxPyuoRqeGbk2g-M7HwnIwadO5n9CEZ1k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good place for donair.  You need to try their platters.  Food is fresh, quality and quantity is good. Been coming for a number of years now (they use to be called donair castle).

Owner and workers are friendly. Jot is fast, efficient and friendly and she hasn’t made a mistake with any of my previous orders.

Highly recommend you try them out - probably one of the better donair place in Maple Ridge.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jason Huang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-mJA4fyZ_3MNatclJ-3uNmYODULkaJfrThlkTgEfiNJUyANk4Mg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"it is the first time to try Donair, we like it very much, there are three size available: regular, super and jumbo, we choose the beef jumbo with Hawaii and Lebanese topping. the jumbo is too big portion for my daughter, we would love to try regular next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-hqjAuaosQV8jjtIZTN3Jf9oeCiuGU--udhHh&fid=0x0:0xaade80110af25d40"],"When":"2023-6-25"},{"Name":"April Cheung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUCtEzbwF3JkeTBYJ485ARVNQXH72e_APgJQ_L7f8lCdRzxuTLimA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"It was a terrible experience for me! I ordered this rice for my six years old kid on Friday. He found one metal wire in the rice. Luckily, he saw that before he ate. I couldn't image if my son eat this sharped object into his mouth. This was not acceptable!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQAdLdTVNhBNGgZ4COL5gtZ5nkPSNqrkAeawXx&fid=0x0:0xaade80110af25d40"],"When":"2021-3-28"}]

[{"Name":"Christina S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUdydYglvNyOpnSWRlj0BJK2ybimMfTHSRhBJJTYlKFntnMOLg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The BEST Donair in town.
Yummy food, Generous portions and Friendly staff. My kids love them and can have this everyday.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8e0yI0sFJrQbOdwmaXaejLy9fk38FiA56hzIA&fid=0x0:0xfb33fdae02e5bf7a"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Riley Dew","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVn12scCRP84PcL2aXqjrQ-Gzhn4dmEG55boPfaeZsLV-yvS6x6tA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great Place, I always get their chicken Donair and they're always so nice, fast, and talkative! Love em","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNr5y9hvR06U53SWTyXo4peRW5QDUg_gCTO3fOo&fid=0x0:0xfb33fdae02e5bf7a"],"When":"2024-10-19"},{"Name":"Mohammad_s Zare","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX0zvPgAwUepTiYIAUBS1yK_ACR_lBIpMWJx1RjPIgsoDnibPMz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We had a terrible experience at Donair Affair. We ordered chicken donairs, and they were absolutely awful. The chicken tasted off, and all five of us who ate them ended up feeling sick and even food poisoned. This was completely unacceptable. It’s clear that food safety and quality are not a priority here. Avoid this place at all costs if you value your health.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"K G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKLRJOKOgZDz1CBS_3JgMD2bbfgt9VUhdDiTO5bGhr1q48i_A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Have been here many times and it's been pretty good, but this time I did not have a great experience.   I was charge 3 dollars for cheese.  I wasn't even aware you couldn't get feta on your salad or donair without being charged for it.  The 2 ladies in the store were also quite rude and rushing us even though it was only 4pm and nobody else was in there.  Food this time also didn't taste that great.  Lots of fat on the chicken. They lost a customer today.   Will not be back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kevin Stumph","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXd238p66NEmxHSmbV2C7QO5xlHen-3NKfO9jCkC2Ap03tp8_Zn=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you have it in you to have an affair, have one with a Donair. Yes, I have a heart-on with Donair Affair. Sorry if this review is too saucy, but these donairs are as saucy as they come. Did you know their chicken is layers of succulent breast slowly spun on the pole of deliciousness?
How on earth do they get their pitas to open without tearing? That is a mystery to me. If you’re like me and always rip your pitas trying to make this at home, then just GIVE UP. Stop trying. You’re not as good as the wonderful people at Donair Affair so let them do it for you.
Everything is fresh. Everything is delicious. I won’t tell your other favourite restaurant that you are going behind their back to have a Donair. This restaurant is our little secret.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Fioretta Lombardi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJDoB6bEhvNTIsnm7a6W0FvuMLvK7eFobxwE84IvKKbIJlxlg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered their baklava 2 days prior to this review and it was amazing and only 2.99. I went back today and they had doubled the baklava in price and it had no filling in it barely any at all, It was mostly filo pastry and therefore very dry. Very disappointing I am  regretful I complimented them on how good it was. Not only was it more expensive but the quality went downhill. At least if your going to double the cost keep the quality as it was.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmRNeQ_IwvwI8mZMQXkglqd8swc7AfGlIb3by5&fid=0x0:0xfb33fdae02e5bf7a"],"When":"2024-2-17"},{"Name":"Mike Taggart","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXjR_uFVdpKrecFk9vVITA3kDNoDfjGKvrTP_tGpsyeFzFQiJR1qQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This fast food donor joint has amazing tastes. Lamb Donair was delicious especially with the hot sauce and peppers. The gentleman  behind the counter was extremely courteous.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Adam Flores","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWe4BRmj5KQqIAAUG5nAnmdw7_yQFCU9UsNd4ZM98dGlhGwNFOK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here with with friend to trend dinairs for the first time. The lady who worked here was really chill and she hooked us with the best Donairs! 10/10 Place!","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"David Beck","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLRFQbj-PpJ5ZtOdJqU6wJ-SnH_w5PR7OWDyeOF2bvVKzv5DQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Brisket was horrid. Extremely dry and tough. Pulled pork soaked right through the delivery container and paper bag winding up falling on my floor when handed off by delivery driver. To top it all off they never responded to the email complaint I sent detailing my disappointment.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jen Ritchie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBfsNNEbjF3YgBoIhF072KVGkgfnjiP7WcaQa235qoTpXL9VUf=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"😒👎absolute worst BBQ ever please call them for yourself to inquire about their barbeque and you will be informed  that all the meals are oven roasted!!!!! there is no barbeque smoker or grill on the premises
We Received our order the beans were cold there is no flavour to the brisket whatsoever as it is not barbecued or smoked whatsoever the pulled pork was terrible
When we contacted the restaurant and spoke with the kitchen manager that is when we were informed that there is no actual smoker or barbeque on the premises the meals are oven roasted and then reheated to order.

If you’re looking for a barbeque restaurant do not order here","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sansan Medina - Mazur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLz_MR51SpUesOlN3Y8J58ePVfDmh54ggKwXLy4pzQPl3j6Fw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Well we order a brisket and they are so perfect! user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Annie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJAG4UtHNdn-C74S5I053c9lMdRMdh_AH35u090AgjHoFmF2GSW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We came for Sunday brunch as it’s one of the only places that allows minors!
The breakfast special was $6! You can’t go wrong. The service was great and overall a great way to start our Sunday.

Back at the Townhall for the long weekend and a tip - don’t come at opening! It’s a bit chaotic getting everyone seated and naturally service was slower, people seated much later getting food and drinks before us 🤯
Not a deal breaker but now we know and we will be back … just not at 10am!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMw0OJNAXEZGwg3yhbufhC-2Nh0gbUOrz5_VSRD&fid=0x0:0x290c1aa19e892fad"],"When":"2024-10-29"},{"Name":"Max Luo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJOIlU5nJBhhMt4LhC3zOj5-erzOKLJv2GOSpcFK4XvUCtyZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Rating: ★★★☆
The special rate for brunch menu was very traditional and simple: sausages, bacon, eggs, toast, and coffee. However, the price was incredibly affordable. If you’re not picky about the variety, this place is a decent choice for something budget-friendly. That said, for such a simple breakfast, you could probably save more by just making it at home, especially if you’re not after the “dining-out” atmosphere.

As for Town Hall, their quality isn’t what it used to be. That said, their Thursday Karaoke Night and 50¢ Wings special are quite tempting. I might give it another shot—it’s hard to pass up deals like that. Overall, nothing too impressive, but the price and vibe are reasonable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMX1ObEQwhpfTOYg213TrKNo9zbVkalyl0OexsK&fid=0x0:0x290c1aa19e892fad"],"When":"2024-12-2"},{"Name":"Geraldine Sangalang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUcAsqfNVs6uRfmsJ5FtsU66GdsPGBE4zo_tn8DnG79e7VADqel9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Fantastic deal for brunch in a warm, welcoming space. There's plenty of room for groups, and there are a number of tables of you're hoping to catch up with a friend or host a business meeting.

When you arrive, head upstairs to the dining room. There's an elevator and washrooms available by the bar.

Reservations are a good idea, but not required. With our reservation for 2, we were seated by a cozy fire. Perfect start to brunch.

The house special for brunch is $5.99 for 2 free run eggs, 2 pieces of bacon or sausage, toast and Yukon gold home fries. Options for toast today were white, brown or sourdough.

The food was fresh, hot and not greasy. It was seasoned well, and I didn't feel exhausted or heavy after the meal.

We also ordered Caesars ($5) and there were Mimosas available ($4).

On another visit, we ordered the Stack-O-Donuts ($12) and they were delicious. Hot and tender mini donuts covered in cinnamon sugar. They're perfect for sharing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNtUGZz9klf5AP6Pb8Vfr9JbpPoBhrZ4CtIWwHF&fid=0x0:0x290c1aa19e892fad"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Lisa Simmons","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLUCbM7Sv-M1pAApVUnGKleUtAL_QtjEhlmjRjJZl7LJUXJqg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Was there on a Monday for the lunch time. Very quiet. Service was great. Nice varied menu. Good specials. Like the location because you can see the mountains from the windows. Great fireplace.

10 October 2024

Had the Chicken corn chowder and the crispy fried brussel sprouts. Hubby had the chicken wings. All great. The chowder does have some medium heat, just an FYI. Loved the sprouts.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwsp10gLTRz3ZCyazKQVsGCch_vr2YqlJpl3kL&fid=0x0:0x290c1aa19e892fad"],"When":"2024-10-11"},{"Name":"Sherri L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKtxbJ9ZXtI9Mw2OYEesfB51_kfb1UBrxuZDdU5-5GETSdjGw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The new Thursday wing night is really good. The wings are nice and crispy even with sauce on them. The strawberry smash drink was really good. The service was also excellent.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMSseXgXfvmnT42ylB7S0YaME7fPPDccER1pg4v&fid=0x0:0x290c1aa19e892fad"],"When":"2024-9-13"},{"Name":"Stuart Xue","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIMJR3m2m3b3A-TFm1gu2Ve7-gZIHc-nb8uoyhBCkgGuF6K=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Came here to check out the Monday appetizers special and did not disappointed.
Great foods for great values.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHQVdyeI9qjJ-qFDnrf-YpfTT3ZWVHo1dpDqw&fid=0x0:0x290c1aa19e892fad"],"When":"2024-8-13"},{"Name":"Rolando_ Rose","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIQBfjayv2V3eqQ6nmwU1uOEqgsWCG5VdwRxO3uXCF1EsXQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Not recommended. Food takes forever to be served. To wait for ages on a chicken tenders and tater tots order, is not worth the wait. Restaurant was not even busy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhNFyn-mIjXr-bPjXP_ZsHDKA89dQJ6iz9cMw&fid=0x0:0x290c1aa19e892fad"],"When":"2024-11-2"},{"Name":"Fredrick Zoller","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL01F2QlXvuCUnZwPCtofa0r29cQHvBmtrY6v5OjsG39ImLPw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Came in on a Saturday night, so it was quite busy. The staff were friendly but it took a while to get the food and drinks we ordered. The spicy Hawaiian pizza actually had a bit of spice to it, and the dough was really well cooked. Their Caesar drinks are very good, would definitely recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNxAoT7B9opfIQfCN1R2ouw6e3Bw8rSWrUm7C17&fid=0x0:0x290c1aa19e892fad"],"When":"2023-9-24"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Eunkyung Kwon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI8QbBfbB3hty99EF294UH5765EN21uQd87nV3J6NDBZA_Hmg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I visit this sushi restaurant often, and it’s always a great experience. The sushi is fresh, delicious, and beautifully presented. The staff are friendly, attentive, and always make me feel welcome.

If you’re looking for high-quality sushi at a reasonable price, I highly recommend this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNXurKrffUqVOG-xCGFNV1-iEQHmtuhG-zFucBI&fid=0x0:0xdd1fa9894629ade5"],"When":"2024-12-18"},{"Name":"Ian Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJPXqdCYowBQ_CfYk2HQttHh7IDBeUHX7Du1VtrT_RMZb6-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Some of my friends recommended this restaurant and it was so good today
Food is awesome and fresh also enough quantities.
Sushi is great and even ramen is good too
My recommendation menu is Deluxe combo
Servers are so kind
Price is reasonable
Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPfl1My_AqQ5NX-Na8t-pEeB7o4X82urvdjXJw&fid=0x0:0xdd1fa9894629ade5"],"When":"2024-11-2"},{"Name":"Rolando_ Rose","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIQBfjayv2V3eqQ6nmwU1uOEqgsWCG5VdwRxO3uXCF1EsXQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very satisfying bento box lunch! Staff are attentive even in a busy lunch. Green tea was served as soon I placed my order. Tea was nice and hot, served in a very cutesy tea cup with sushi and sashimi design. Followed by a nice, hot, not overly salty miso soup. After just a few minutes, bento box was served. Beef teriyaki is tender, not too sweet-not too salty, perfect for my taste buds! Prawn tempura was perfectly fried, airy but substantially appetizing, vegetable spring roll is crunchy and not greasy, vegetable tempura consists of yam, sweet potato and acorn squash are equally delicious, California roll is simply irresistible! Everything is 5 star except the salad, which has a lot of dressing. Overall, it was a good meal! Located at 207 Street, Maple Ridge BC, easy accessible from Lougheed Highway or Dewdney Trunk Road.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOwKyq6gqLdYZ5cp0mfJfw1N_OWPan3NEAySHM&fid=0x0:0xdd1fa9894629ade5"],"When":"2024-10-29"},{"Name":"Sky Jang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXsnlFBmRy7tyi6QC1WQMYS-_XgUyK7bm7m7BJrwzV_4Y89SkWE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Their lunch special is on another level. The portions are huge and offer a variety of selections. Needless to say, the taste is great.

However, the quality of service could be improved. They ran out of trays, so I had each dish served individually, which resulted in a pretty big gap in between. I received the karaage only after finishing all the other food. Additionally, a server forgot about our beer, so we had to wait for a while and ask another server for it again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOuWCPoI_R_1___NHTguJEGnU4YZtkX-f2MAnpW&fid=0x0:0xdd1fa9894629ade5"],"When":"2024-9-24"},{"Name":"JOY N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJLByk_DtKe11r1xKloMPLR9l4eCSw7rmxqnoF5M1-9uuakdg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We enjoyed the dinner in wonderful restaurant. My kids like Donkatsu and cali rolls, udong. The pork cutlet(donkatsu) was crispy on the outside and soft on the inside, and the meat was soft, so it was good for children to eat. Salmon poke was well seasoned and went well with vegetables. Salmon sushi is fresh and soft, delicious! Very kind staffs. Thanks! (Want to eat now!!)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQBpwlfu6tCzKPU7kQoQmdqbYWUkKJJntfQqSh&fid=0x0:0xdd1fa9894629ade5"],"When":"2024-10-29"},{"Name":"DIIMIDOSE Mineral","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVQNWs0yEkOwk1jNu86jwF6IfrjSnApXJ6_zs8EV5QwFxJIdOU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They have fast service, I visit probably once a week, they know there customers and always make me feel happy to come back. I love their Dynamite roll and tempura the best and have brought some of my family there too! I never really had sushi much before going here but it was such I nice place I wanted to keep coming back <3! Something I especially love is even though they get lots of take out orders their service for dine in never suffers, I can't say the same for a lot of places around here so its really nice to see!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Andre Hylton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX_PChy1Th0kOGUfQeikUPffIevYW6u7GEJEnZ-s8pmdSDTb2GM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I visited this sushi restaurant today, and while the food was quite enjoyable, I found the service could use improvement. The staff seemed a bit inattentive, especially when it came to checking in for drink refills or additional orders. It would be great if they were a bit more responsive to customer needs, especially for basics like water. Overall, the food was good, but a little more attentiveness from the staff would make the dining experience even better.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sherwin Quilay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU46rfoheSfvIQONToEKkejzhkSa1wImF0GNRLIYDvcMziumOlP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wonderful experience! Celebrated our fathers 75th birthday and they welcomed our party of 10.  We extended our stay for a total of 2 1/2 hours and they gladly welcomed us!  I got their salmon poke bowl and it is amazing!  Will definitely stop by when I'm in the are next!  Food prices are very competitive:)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPmt7MLI3z37d9uV-xFwLUiSYszkSZ7xszPREaZ&fid=0x0:0xdd1fa9894629ade5"],"When":"2023-11-16"}]
