user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Marisa K.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLi7SX2QVAXxFvj7573IifKFZ8CRitFIgTfzmHwC6PM_IedvQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I frequent Sushi Misoya quite a few times throughout the year and it’s always been really good! Their fish tastes fresh, never “fishy” like some other sushi restaurants in Maple Ridge.

I always do take-out so I cannot speak to what a dine-in experience is like (their dining area is limited), but their online ordering and pick-up service is smooth and seamless. The staff always greets me upon walking in and is kind and friendly during checkout.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNuLqfOYv8hDtWapXG1ygxmwF-u5aUdaW_YIdOs&fid=0x0:0xbcb7842ab47f5c2"],"When":"2024-6-24"},{"Name":"E Melo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVGgY2yvtEUZjjmIeI3CkEsrZ_2cfgxymAQyKJ9_Agamx8ifCVJ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is one of my favourite sushi restaurants in the entire Lower Mainland! They’re always friendly and their California Rolls taste more fresh than 99% of the Japanese restaurants out there. Every food I’ve ordered from there is great!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nena","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXail0hFaAr6UWwh19nZb5xdJGv0KAVLSD1VnM8OXnts_-tYe0Nrw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The service is quite prompt and friendly, space inside is kind of small around 6 tables but clean and cozy. We ordered miso soups and takoyaki which was very tasty and they even gave us a salad bowl on the house. The rolls were tasty, the scallops didn't taste the freshest but it was still good. I would recommend this place and come back myself.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNLjFkFaC5H75XtyvXaII_NDspTBAbczrTWSjmI&fid=0x0:0xbcb7842ab47f5c2"],"When":"2018-9-14"},{"Name":"Ingrid Kwok","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJpJ7BDSOGvowBGNTTCIxIzO8iKdPQulZrzi56sGNYHPbL7Hw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food is good there and the service is attentive. It’s a small place with 4 booths and 1 small table.

You got to choose what you want in your combo, for around CAD15. The portion is good enough for one person. Everything comes with miso soup and salad.

There is some parking space right outside.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9Lt-lvTfPY-99P8uH4yqTDsZFJDJuESUjUh33&fid=0x0:0xbcb7842ab47f5c2"],"When":"2020-1-5"},{"Name":"K G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWdwVGlhF7NS5T1ernsxiY-PjGbDSDg6Aw0Kx8ABcKDVRDfs2C0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Family owned restaurant, you can see and taste the perfection when they give you the food! I recommend this place for any sushi lovers that want high quality sushi for low price!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPFxsTBHwmmziGu71czYVYUNpi2QO6StdC3bCN5&fid=0x0:0xbcb7842ab47f5c2"],"When":"2019-11-2"},{"Name":"Michael Xie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUuofARxYvhwxxfylcnz8mBM0K5uLGN7Ke55RRoKhlEZOs358vlwA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"super average why is this 4.8 stars?! Super inflated reviews, not even the best in Maple Ridge. Meh portions, especially disappointing portions for the salmon sashimi don.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPfs8vrN0sBOwgn1kkF-gXwanJ97__TpInvVgTj&fid=0x0:0xbcb7842ab47f5c2"],"When":"2020-6-12"},{"Name":"jenny","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMDNH73B45edbJ-7F4SvngcK2zjK2JiHx8MJO6rHWM7lSkol_x=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was pleasantly surprised with this place! First time eating here, I got the chicken katsu don. Ingredients tasted fresh, it wasn’t greasy or heavy, very delicious! Will definitely be going back to try more things on their menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNaA9WIXHbqEAvgxkySZU9u_R-ka45gbpxdAPMQ&fid=0x0:0xbcb7842ab47f5c2"],"When":"2022-1-16"},{"Name":"singularity","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXHFnDOdkU9T5qm5o_YnaVlnciYMccPnEi9y4lS5alwLGo8pX4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I found Sushi Misoya on google, based on great reviews. I get really fast friendly service right away. After ordering, the food come really fast to. The food was much better than I thought, tasted amazing, was super fresh, looked like beautifuly prepared by a Real sushi master chef. We where truly impressed by the high quality food and service. I just found my favorite sushi restaurant. Highly recommended! Much thank you Sushi Misoya. Dōmo arigatō gozaimashita.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOnCnuPrEPDJFhs6-QXCKNyDhIdzmLXOlM9G70K&fid=0x0:0xbcb7842ab47f5c2"],"When":"2019-8-17"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Irene W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKCNKC6-jjJoPxNatJUru2tlElXnfQD1_aywIL530-kC1scdg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This location is consistently awful. Their large fries are usually half filled and now I see their sundaes are incredibly small also. Not even half filled. Not going to bother going to this location again, it doesn’t ever get better. I’ve added pics of the completely untouched food that I received. As you can see it’s quite sad looking and not even close to full. I'm done w this location finally.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9rQLUybazTI2xSb0oG7Mh6WMTFXPjFNNCqsTU\u0026fid=0x0:0xb20162b09b52d178"],"When":"2024-6-22"},{"Name":"Madison Williams","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLNUiyCRGEinWALiu0Xfw8f-UjG9Rn7Cdbz-D6GyAbvReQafA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"it’s been a good experience, i have seen this hard working girl, victoria, who doesn’t waste a moment of time providing her best service for customers and stays on top of the cleanliness in the atmosphere. best employee and always trying her hardest especially when it’s come down to her customers. along with the good managers in general, they’ve taught their employees well in treating their customers. she’s the perfect role model and their foods also pretty great!( i suggest their sweet chilli wraps)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jagroop Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLKkm_XoijE5OtCJ6r1mJLUnfV2Xc0ishnrSvRjNLrCBBFVHMk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"After multiple incidents, I am writing this review about the white teenage girl who works at this McDonald’s,  she is always really rude to me, She told me wait at the spot, after waiting for more than 20 minutes, I pulled back to the driveway. There was no car and my order was Already prepared, but she didn’t came out to give it to me on The spot she told me to wait. I’m not sure that this kind of customer service is the benchmark of McDonald’s.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Faith Black","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKujnglHdgeFgeZ3dmthQE3w2wiKB4D2aIZI3OmFE3-AksYnw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Did McDonald’s change their coffee?? The past many times I have been in a pinch and ordered coffee here I end up throwing it out after two sips… tastes like gross warm dirty dish water - so disappointed as used to be my favourite place to get drip. Is there anywhere in maple ridge to get good coffee anymore that doesn’t cost 10 dollars a cup??","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Eric L Gunderson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3dc7gypmCooeyC6vgeouB5-30dkcMC-u4kiWX9Kg6h7FrvbxmYA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"10 PM ...Washroom was locked but staff opened.. There was a single female server closing doors for the night. The Big Arch was very slippery...sliding out of bun... very, very messy. Needed much more than one napkin. First time trying this. Did not seem normal.\nMost disturbing was the necessary five trips to the biffy that followed. This was not due to previous afternoon food. I have considered reporting to Health Authority. I am a long-time fan of Big Macs. What went wrong? Yes, I kept the receipt.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mohamed Almohamed Alfaris","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJwRYa5Mrwnaitj8o8xBa3jX2f1O9Gxs1Q6YqTQdgqt_ecAxMb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Clean and light shopping floor.  Dinning area with tables, chairs, and benches provided.  Dinning floor is a bit dirty.  Employees are nice and friendly.  Serve speed is ok.  Order speed is normal.  Mobile order available at this location.  Credit cards accepted.  Located inside Walmart.  Free parking lot available.  Walmart public restrooms nearby..","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOs1CAyAdZ6WEDcyIFDQ0pxO_0-J4Y9p6laOY-Y\u0026fid=0x0:0xb20162b09b52d178"],"When":"2023-2-8"},{"Name":"Aleksander Amer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGOAz6hZJ2NwhTQXXReoo8ipuBBnVUyRU2feoLZjGgiTMM8r_W=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Well, I haven’t been to McDonalds in a while and last time noticed that the Big Mac is now a Small Mac. So I figured I would go for the quarter pounder dressed up like a Mac. The only thing pounding this burger was whoever made it. My buddy got a Sweet Chili McWrap and we thought they gave him a snack wrap. Years ago I used to get that wrap for my mom as it was massive and was two meals for her.\nAt the end of the day, the staff were normal for what you’d expect these days but not worth going to McDonald’s anymore. Too many other places that make the food even remotely like the picture they are trying to sell you on. I don’t recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJNpBL7zqhSpNfjjGeuG4edzXsLn-G-k1S78wT\u0026fid=0x0:0xb20162b09b52d178"],"When":"2024-1-29"},{"Name":"Conlon Hughes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxCoS0iXrYfq1Jf_I_GqDKtTmjuQeq4RHqQYZYkEg0URUhEXj2=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always get great service and food coming here. It's local to me, so I come by maybe once or twice a week. Victoria did a great job as usual, helping me get my order straight. Will come again.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Nicole Netik","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK3A-4p8_N-oUSsIfBHH-j4qnuWMdZ7W5Wic2AIeJhdFOboRw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My daughter and I went to Me n' Ed's last night on an impulse. We are always really careful about the restaurants we visit because she has celiac and unfortunately gets sick with the smallest amount of cross contamination.  It was super busy in there with a steady flow of customers but that didn't affect their customer service! Staff was kind and took their time to listen and was upfront with telling us about wait times (completely understandable with how many people were in there!)
The pizza was ready quicker then we anticipated, it was hot, delicious and loaded with toppings!! And the best part, safe from cross contamination for my daughter!
Thanks for a great experience, we will definitely be back 🍕","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOsjH-yuMueg5pU-k-PAHZgxSK9gmYy8iAM_QOl&fid=0x0:0xdbe181141989b9fa"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Afsana Tabibi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVzp6b-InW6PAK15vNh9v8ga8zbWmNjzR0Dlq305Lj5B3Ej-HpL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Thought we would try Me-n-Ed's for the first time tonight, and it was a major let-down. We ordered a large half pepperoni half cheese with garlic jalapeno aioli, sriracha ranch, and garlic parm cheesy bread sticks. The pizza crust was some weird philo-pastry/pita bread/uncooked dough mix. I don't get it. The bottom of the crust had separated from the rest of the pizza so, the bottom was well-done and the part that had separated was undercooked. The cheese was so thick and hardened by the time we got it home. I ate two slices because I was hungry (generally food tastes better when you're hungry but not this time) but I threw the rest out. I hate throwing out food and leaving bad reviews because I appreciate local businesses, but this pizza was poorly made. I wouldn't go back and I wouldn't recommend it to anyone who enjoys a slice of great tasting pizza.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOEidUFp4IIa5NpzQHTtjxbEkPHfpsPg4s35XnZ&fid=0x0:0xdbe181141989b9fa"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Crystal V","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJy_8JzOAdXYM50ytFR2HidA0G9Xsyge4e68t8ePZBmeAOiPA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best pizza in Ridge. Always loaded with toppings, always delicious. My whole family and extended family enjoys Me n’ Ed’s, it’s always the go to when they’re in town.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOAJyRLFQX3sla7T4BsmByln9cnJ9rMFCuEQk7u&fid=0x0:0xdbe181141989b9fa"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"H S Madan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUTu4oMkDk1Z3MjNV_7rONLy371tsTTJL-xX0jcQ-rhkA8blIkVlg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We had to give this place a try. The pizza was good but was it worth $70 for 2 pizzas. It was not that good. I feel if you are going to charge that high of a premium for a pizza it's gotta deliver to that value. And unfortunately it did not. There was nothing special worth going back for, and that's really not to say that the pizza was not good. But I feel it was just over priced for what you get. The sauce could have had a little more flavor or zest. And the crust was the same. I would not consider this place to be a premium pizza quality.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Matt Maguire","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJUjvEOVle_CBxHwXITIP_j1rPXSVCppH7zmN159uXpTYLu6g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered the Monday night special pepperoni pizza and the Godfather pizza because the delivery took a bit longer than expected they gave us our meal for free! No complaints from our end, they just realized and took care of it for us. What exceptional customer service! We will definitely be ordering from here again! Not to mention this pizza is fantastic! Thank you!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rafael Aguirre","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXE6LgR-ngDwq-zcl5ddKp8YqAVzKXAfrvyM0U1OJg8S8G4mI9J=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am Pizza lover, I tried good pizzas from Italy, France, Chile and Argentina but I tried only once a good pizza in Canada and today I tested the second best from Me n Eds. I was so surprised from the pizza base, it was delicious!. The only point to improve in my opinion is to stop using product from cans, like mushrooms and peppers.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Joanne Antoniak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTQwhPcO13h_HhVjJVUrwpHjU5MeesKhPrxV5pA1ymdZ1edFkY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Me & Ed's Maple Ridge 🍕🎉
First time at this location.
Same great Me & Ed's food.
If you like thin crust (crispy thin) you will love their pizza; if you are a think bready crust lover -- you probably will not.
The toppings are super fresh - and every pizza is loaded with toppings (right to the edge).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNilhuXZWkxXwmFkInpH9ZeOcFzyPGwvjI1eHyF&fid=0x0:0xdbe181141989b9fa"],"When":"2023-8-5"},{"Name":"Ellen Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgbvr2VXIxmQAp2oX9KxXclaEeljzeGNAPzr2u-tCnpyZ0sXzZ9A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place for a casual lunch. prompt & attentive service, clean and updated atmosphere. Food was very fresh, tasty and very budget friendly!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJ3o5FgRVt7hYQyf59brPus5yBTc4VJwjDf9Kn&fid=0x0:0xdbe181141989b9fa"],"When":"2024-12-9"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Colin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJvFgjJxxaJNXmYFM985fOV76JjLyWWI2SRC_1FM5CsDcPKHP-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Simply put, NOT ENOUGH MEAT on burritos.   The portion is RIDICULOUSLY less than other similar restaurants.  You can see one tiny bite of chicken here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPkpEyFVddmeFVY7C5LOIdDhu1xBf2XSyvPSvz_&fid=0x0:0xa88389ac5adc0719"],"When":"2024-7-29"},{"Name":"Selena Crossland","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWWLe1RgQsIrdrrFgWveqgVWMWYardQdE6s5tHcE0xt0ncrTVv1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We ordered using Door Dash App & picked up ourselves. On arrival no employee was out front and food was not ready when app said it would be, no other customers were there, so I waited for the man to prep it (not a problem-didn’t take long). The restaurant was an absolute mess- garbages were overflowing in customer area, kitchen prep area had trash overflowing onto floor and food everywhere like someone had a food fight—I really should have asked to cancel my order based on the clear lack of cleanliness but don’t think I can do that on DoorDash> if I was walking in, I would have just walked out. I thought maybe they just had a massive busy time possibly - benefit of the doubt right. The man making our burritos was very kind & helpful but there was a woman employee who seemed very angry. I wished them a good night when leaving.  The male employee did a great job making our Burritos, they tasted great. The owner needs to take this business seriously and hire more personnel to keep up on cleanliness & customer care because they have a great location & potential.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jennifer Boyarski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0aWoR9tP6UWC4FWVEUvojoQ0uotSMnW5x7c3_cjC3HNo3X4t6=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I've been here a couple times now, I've only tried the hard shell tacos which are good! It would be nice if they could spread out the toppings better so you can have them with each bite not just one bite! The staff are not friendly at all, they only talk to eachother in Punjab and dont make eye contact. When I pay I thank them and tell them to have a nice day and they dont say anything back at all. Definitely doesn't make me want to go back :/","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNbm--h8SossxA39tx2IzD3aWOpP4bkE0753Hed&fid=0x0:0xa88389ac5adc0719"],"When":"2024-3-10"},{"Name":"Lena s","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUfiKiTYLYNYzcv_KDpRiDWqOnkYUfmc9MTcnYc7To2ftTRyQ-c=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The food is really good but the workers have changed overtime. I come here rather often and now there's a team of a few brown girls who constantly chatter and laugh in front of me and other customers and constantly chatter between each other in their language which I find rather unprofessional honestly the bad service is what made me give up on that spot. It really makes you uncomfortable.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vas Bach","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL25ojHCD2l96tyD0UB3_FqaxkLEOIjDIOCQp9OpjjObikP7g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"As other customers have mentioned - good food and horrible service. I cannot stress this enough. The employees are rude and once I ordered cutlery and the other girl beside her repeated what I said , the word " cutlery " in a very, extremely mocking tone then both talked to each other in Punjab and giggled between themselves. Its like they don't even hide that they're talking about you. Don't go there you'll feel rather humiliated. 👎 It's not the first ,certainly not last time they do this I don't know if the owner actually cares about their customers but that ain't it.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sean Salo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWucIBVR4qGVxSLvhlsLk6M9Kbm_gqCpRxx9oyfTrg9rGX4EGa6=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was fine, nothing to write home about. Probably not as good as Mucho Burrito.

HOWEVER I am giving them 5 stars because of the exceptional service. I was very tired and gave them a stupid difficult order, then gave multiple conflicting instructions as they built my bowls. They were very pleasant and accommodating.

Kudos to the staff that worked on the evening of Sun Jan 29!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMp5BwnMnCWQNzyJaZfOzZMGUXmrMfTjmikRGw1&fid=0x0:0xa88389ac5adc0719"],"When":"2023-1-30"},{"Name":"Maya Bobaya","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVbJPYUQj7PFZTXR1S5D0G0Oad7ygp3dUbJE0LvmHlzmnUXUMi2Bg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Food here is pretty decent, but the service is horrendous. I come here every so often and everyone is just stupidly rude. I find they get irritated just by customers arriving and employees will talk over you and whisper like they are making fun of you. Then have the audacity to ask for a tip at the end. Not slaying guys, 0/10","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sebastian Coats","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU2Y9B1Az1yiix4vJNO9GRSVGod1oYZBVxRYMYexyw301qjJlZV=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The lady serving my friend and I was very rude, had a very dismissive and uninterested attitude. She was talking on the phone while serving us and when I asked her a question, she said what with a condescending look on her face. She put way too much of each topping to the point where we could barely taste the beef on our tacos. The whole time we were eating, we could hear her loudly talking on the phone and letting out these very loud laughs. Terrible experience overall and I’ll never be eating here again.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Anastasiia Synytsyna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6GtbpkVSB1_OMuB4-2rh_LBp8QzPz0RILW9O9HCPCLHjCfPy9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My husband and I visited Fort Langley for the first time and stopped by the Fort Pub \u0026 Grill. We ordered 2 pizzas - with smoked salmon and vegetarian. The pizzas were very tasty, especially the smoked salmon - I recommend you try it!\nThe establishment is atmospheric with pleasant service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2qnv3K1xT4bxEMd8-fktzz_JTnv-BNOXou-TK\u0026fid=0x0:0x18f5842cfa1ed07c"],"When":"2024-10-2"},{"Name":"Annie Isaak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVTCvx41kGYcH72iCQpkHbZFwDH754CPLMluwrDJaO3ZfWn5Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food here is incredible, I highly recommend the beef dip! The service was quick and food was fresh. The environment was cozy, warm and comfortable, however the people behind us were very hands on with each other and made us slightly uncomfortable . Jessie (our server) was so sweet, gave amazing food suggestions and an overall kind person. I will definitely be coming back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMOvNnv_XdRIGRoxSada8c0JPMKsR9NPtj28rmY\u0026fid=0x0:0x18f5842cfa1ed07c"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"Bradley Gionet","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJSEZxT9bss5Wm-8sYZqNZvpWBvD6hTQuaiH051enZwW5r2mA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I have been to The Fort many times and have often acclaimed them to have the best Fish and Chips. I went with a small group this time and I noticed portion sizes have decreased substantially. In the past I would have rated them 5 stars, but there does seem to be a decline. Still very good but noticeable portion and quality decrease.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZTQEJN1td2dfbq20dKc9ohpQ0VmhO3hQmOfO4\u0026fid=0x0:0x18f5842cfa1ed07c"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Свят Мысив","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX93F7wrB6Dc0ihsqMdg_UZCsT49nCSpKfsLxLjyzUVquEapYQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I didn't want to leave!  All liked it.  The atmosphere is conducive to communication and a pleasant pastime.  The food is high quality and tasty.  I ordered garlic-honey wings.  The sauce for them was incredible.  There was also potatoes with vegetables and sour cream.  And, of course, beer!  Thanks to this cafe for pleasant memories.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNahQ8q7n9ycIyzGDe7g3nr8sp6hWPaBt7dOfrU\u0026fid=0x0:0x18f5842cfa1ed07c"],"When":"2024-2-19"},{"Name":"ali sajedi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVLKDfhtR-9CZ5pVLQ2sTZpiSQQL70tfH6bxSnPvVKzYE-A44E-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Fort pub offers good North American food style , with their mac and cheese with sausage being a standout—absolutely delicious. It's great for a quick bite of comfort food, but don’t expect anything too fancy. It’s a solid spot for casual eats, but it doesn’t go beyond that.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNm_b7L5gYlasNB3UJPdHhP--vLu_BOMoTfsb3U\u0026fid=0x0:0x18f5842cfa1ed07c"],"When":"2024-9-3"},{"Name":"万竹","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXnsirj2w9NgKxB4GQZVGrpbGaK60xEpSi0cVmeVC0yEcSSkqbG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We had a good time, food was decent and excellent location.  Felt like our server was new to this line of work.  A little frazzled.  Recommend the ribs.  We also had nachos, beet salad, and scoobi doo pasta from kids menu and all was fine with the food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSHss7sgWEHO7TdmOzT-IBFOPQbMywsvsZBCSF\u0026fid=0x0:0x18f5842cfa1ed07c"],"When":"2024-6-9"},{"Name":"Max Nazarov","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwRa8FhHppjONdUgPtVwWMh2QpzyUgICsAYlWwaSFJS2zuOcEx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"the service is great, the place is old, vintage, not my style, you can place a bet on sports right there, and even spend cash in the ATM. The soup was simply amazing, which unfortunately can't be said about the fish and chips, in general - normal)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOreCjNrNwF3KxPukFlFh2mu35WxxFIkRY9Qfp0\u0026fid=0x0:0x18f5842cfa1ed07c"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Tiffany W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIAoZUL06J-3CXOdQXWsiCnWiCx3SWbhu_G20BV_0JJNTD8ddpD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food and atmosphere at the Fort Pub \u0026 Grill. We sat on the patio and enjoyed nachos to start, with a white sangria and belini. Highly recommend this place for all around good place to go!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPfrLJA5VN_rqK0XpT-YUgJSHgwsOAkpJ1qiZ3e\u0026fid=0x0:0x18f5842cfa1ed07c"],"When":"2024-6-7"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJT8D8mFQvROEj0zq1QLXlmxNM7oQFJW2hfYI3x8VdNePg90A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Want to talk about an experience? I'll give you an experience go in there asking about the buy one. Get one free. It's offered through the app so no there's nothing he could do. Just go through the app. The app was glitching was bugged had server issues. Well here's the real problem. Not only did two and a half weeks ago was I in there with my brown Friend, well guess what? When the exact same problem happened with him they just rang it through. They just gave him the buy one get one free. He didn't have to wait for that. He didn't have to do all this and that all he did was get the deal. Now they talked in their language. I don't know what it is. Maybe seek maybe Farsi I don't know what it is but what I do know is is that I get treated differently based off of the way I look. And that's the real issue here. That's why I'm a little upset. It's because I see the difference. I see the difference with my brown buddies there. You'll take care. No problem, no problem. And all of a sudden now it's just me. Oh no go through that. There's nothing I could do. What's up with that man? You just lost the customer for life. Anyone that I talk to I'm going to make sure they steer away from that garbage. That's not right man because if the tables were reversed I treat everyone no matter their nationality no matter their skin complexion the same. I don't just start talking a different language to all my other colleagues thought to speak the same language as me. I don't speak trash behind your back. I do it to your face. If there's a problem, I do it to your face. Thanks for showing me your true colors and thanks for letting me know which business is not to support","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"James Holloway","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJcYAkO6hN1i3bqN_P2yEwe35zCv24eKrwkBFzNwii1gn0BaQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"They discriminated against a blind woman. They denied her service because she had a service dog to help her know where she’s going. If they engage in this type of behaviour then who knows what else they’d do. It wouldn’t surprise me if they will serve you food that’s gone bad and give you food poisoning, given their code of ethics. If you have a service animal of any kind DO NOT GO HERE they WILL discriminate against you.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Arshdeep Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKbg7PCmYxcQ90AK96Vky0yu5JPI1yG4A34AiURnnf2HPQUDQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this place! They’re always timely, the staff are very sweet and kind especially jag and they do a great job accommodating to my gluten allergy. Definitely recommend!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kostya Zhang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVbTqRyXy31TRU2yVH_Kz_rlT5Zx-fWYyV00aKtxsZxV3flQ8g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Closes super late which was good when everything else was closed. You can dine in and there are plenty of space inside. The worker was slow though and took him a while to prepare the sandwich.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOke6O_HFA259Qb0-sm-y2QkhVhHwUm0U6HalYI\u0026fid=0x0:0xa68be32e6b818a86"],"When":"2023-8-10"},{"Name":"Soheila Grami","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKDmn5T-OTMz0OiJlCb1HH7RLEBVeHBhJnGsiQM_YLoo0HXvI6A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We got two  sandwiches, steak and cheese and rotisserie style chicken both were so delicious and fresh! I like subway but this store has the best customer service and the taste is the best. Jay and Sukhman make and pack our sandwiches amazingly! Thank you so much guys, we really enjoyed!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lord Data","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJGr2ENy5vtGWXfA_IZ71jCfO4wZYOHgMD3KHTSCyTL8q6hRQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Discriminated against a blind woman and shook his head when confronted. I hope he gets what he deserves.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nate","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4tty9rc7U6BwxqtLIewqbhAEAyOc-IXRzWBLVDNF4RdwrpZg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"For starters, the staff was very slow which is not necessarily horrible. Next i order a turkey sandwich in which they put ham, i ask them to replace the ham by turkey like i ordered. The lady proceeded to show me the difference between the turkey and the ham, showing me the turkey was on my right and the ham was on my left, which is the one i saw her take the meat from. When i pointed it out to her, she completely ignored it and asked very rudely what else i wanted, at which point i thought i might be wrong. That is until i get in my car and taste it to make sure. It is ham. I go back in to ask them to just replace the meat to which they showed me again side by side a piece of ham and a piece of turkey next to the meat in the sandwich; it confirmed that it was ham. Nevertheless they were still refusing to replace the meat and fix their mistake.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ryan Ogigon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVR_RfdnIHoXrx6h-AXd8DGvk3FeyppQh5vw7olHhVnKVbTkkYQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I eat at this Subway a few times a week so I figured I should leave a review. This location is pretty good. The staff have always been pretty happy and kind. And the food is always good. Nothing bad to say about this location. I guess the only bad thing I could say is that sometimes it can get extremely busy. And because of all the businesses around this location sometimes parking is almost non-existent, or the parking lot is crazy.","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Colton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBfLmjIHS2JcyxfSk4KJvyJztcX_GoDC87RimZ30EsZPeovi5g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Ordered two Backyard BBQ Burgers, both were made incorrectly missing standard items.

Buns were overcooked and quite hard, overall just pretty bad.

Photos looked great, food looked extremely opposite.

Maybe potential for the chicken to be alright on another day.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMPHw0waa9drFW5_ICy4Z-H7u0zJkzF5enA1oHo&fid=0x0:0x4a80ce605c8bfd04"],"When":"2024-6-20"},{"Name":"Shane Davidson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjfOe23w0jik-lBALaYSthGHVwG6dVJXu6Ilh0nUzHQpWQFx66=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Absolutely one of worst food orders I’ve ever gotten!
Chicken strips had sauce poured over them and showed up like mush.
Only got three not four stops on both orders.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jesse Uppenborn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKFks0324b7LzgOJ6phwHKVuYePwk0YiLsaCqJXk77q978a=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good food for pretty decent prices, incredible beer prices too","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"jim w","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJcT4IAD40mrlDjoDYwhBt03uR4XFfhPTP7ZDWEFrOoYiEhJA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been to this location many times. Customer Service is always great! Today I ordered ahead, shortly after I received a call explaining that they didn’t have my bread choice. I adjusted my order, when I picked it up they included two cookies, no charge!  Again awesome!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brandon Peterson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKlz-NI54BWhUKDTl9nQAhjpiprTS9jMykIIGyGpmuWKdmQdg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This is my third time placing a mobile order at this store. All three times my order was completely forgotten by staff and needed to be made while I waited. Today the food we got was my only 15 minutes later than the pick up time (because they forgot again), but it was wrong. The "toasted sandwich" was cold and the ingredients ordered were wrong on both of the sandwiches we ordered.

The most interaction I got while standing at the mobile pick up for 15 minutes was a quick "just one minute" before leaving to help another customer leaving me standing there for 10 more minutes waiting. They passed me the food without a word when it was finished.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gagan Mittal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVkdhYSL3Lr7hig8avN0piXj3nc6U57yIjBHs7pydWIroVIoiQ4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Never coming back. The lady treats their own community people like differently. Gave me half an egg on the sandwich. Didn't welcome us like she welcomed others. Also didn't put enough cheese like others. I was even scared to ask her to add any toppings as she would say thats all after just putting lettuce. And on the top charged me more than the listed prices. I am don't mind paying more but atleast treat everyone fair. Really felt insulted. I order a sandwich and charged me for a  6" inch instead. And also added a tip herself. What a rip off place. Wasn't read to provide a receipt. Had to ask her politely.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPeD_oXm_2w8bCUsKd723ryGVQ7wsvva1yGtXb-&fid=0x0:0xa50187d9772d2e0b"],"When":"2024-8-28"},{"Name":"Glenn Nichols","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKeqUSNHgx1xqgJZ9eczbcpKYLmcpGp9zghEQ1buEH2ud9m3Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I've eaten here before during the day and find that the tables are always uncleaned, but food is standard for Subway.  This time I ordered a churro as I was killing time during my son's practice nearby and was handed a dried up chewy tasteless pastry that I wouldn't give my dog.  Avoid the Churro!!!!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vell Ken","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIO45A52a6KZ6kwig3nDMEJFQ7AH9GZ_341OjnsNw6gYCN2Fg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"*DO NOT USE MOBILE ORDER HERE* - they refuse to monitor incoming mobile orders here. You will wait 20 minutes, and when you arrive they will make it in front of you (usually with an attitude, even if you are non-confrontational). They will rush and get the sandwiches wrong (only one of your sandwiches has onion? Surprise - now it's all three).

There's only like one chill dude at this location - everyone else is baseline rude af.

Tbh there are like 2 other Subways in downtown 'Ridge, and you might as well go to one of those instead.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shauntel Daniels","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK5nn5CY9TSjRJiFxT9zNalRW_437f1cRgmHN_MR75smORCxA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great customer service. And better small talk.  This guy deserves a raise.  The entire place was so clean. Plus also every ingredient available.  Most places late at night don’t offer every ingredient.  👍👍👍👍.  Prab’s served me. Thanks again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOU94xLyBw9Uo-9sdALWGBVkzlqaIj7egJmH4q0&fid=0x0:0xa50187d9772d2e0b"],"When":"2024-1-4"},{"Name":"G C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXlabZwq8bknaUqw3ALL0xeNH3_zdCY8RFLGTFkN0r3zGyb74VM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Don't know how to make sub properly. No passion or care at all while making it. Happened to me twice. Did it so fast even though no other customer was there. Just dumped the veggies, didn't even spread. Never going back","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUOiP9MQGSVzJFRp4mxSGdfYZStJItY8TQUDy9&fid=0x0:0xa50187d9772d2e0b"],"When":"2021-11-10"},{"Name":"Amanda forrest","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKm6Ky4FHJzP6KNxs_a6TIYprF2CfWGV6HChjwYsvX-V7_BAQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I went today and the service has changed.I always come here when Prab is here...he is awesome and the conversation is nice. this time there was a new guy. The service wasnt the same and my sandwich wasnt as it used to be.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Tom McDougall","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0J48kC1hZM1V1aRsvHOZVDophlDmEISwqhKMFe94oVeHk06c2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beatniks Bistro - Fort Langley

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

We had an early dinner at Beatniks Bistro with my parents, and it was a delightful experience. The ambiance was cozy yet modern, making it the perfect spot to relax and enjoy a meal in the heart of Fort Langley. We were seated promptly, and the staff were attentive and friendly throughout our visit.

The menu had a great selection of dishes, and there was something for everyone. We started with the crispy calamari, which was perfectly cooked and seasoned. For mains, we had a mix of dishes, including the short rib and the salmon, both of which were cooked to perfection and beautifully presented. The flavors were balanced, and the portion sizes were just right. My parents really enjoyed the experience as well, and it was a lovely way to spend time together.

What stood out was the quality of the food and the relaxed atmosphere. The outdoor seating area looked inviting too, but we opted to sit indoors given the cooler weather. Overall, Beatniks provided a wonderful dining experience, and we look forward to returning. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a delicious meal in a charming setting.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMIjf3DWc_qaY3F--653BEA8_r9sWDQKaMbjOSl&fid=0x0:0xfe43abe99f45cdb9"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"Kat Sykes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUccyfg8kVkNFxM3K2eZWJ1jcQT3OuohgE_37gTeq5lt55yLpw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute little bistro with a large outdoor space.  Service was good and the food was great.  Really good burger and yam fries.  The only bad thing for
me was the amount of salt on the fries.  I don't use that much salt and had to brush off a bunch to enjoy the fries.  Street parking is limited and there is a small lot in the back for about 8 cars.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjyj2vUaYdPOS6m0JaZiSkNQ7plcF3Qqq0F7_w&fid=0x0:0xfe43abe99f45cdb9"],"When":"2024-11-4"},{"Name":"Daniel Vasquez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfH4IGtDH-RZPfkWL0P5tVuSs9PJ8oLSHVNJs_o3NyG6_oaSvUng=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It all starts with the atmosphere and location, the patio is fantastic in the summer; any occasion and for any meal, just super! The service is so good, all the staff have a smile and are so genuine in the service they provide. Now, last but not least is the food, so yummy. All the meals we tried were delicious and just perfect. Can’t wait to go back. Highly recommend it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8GDPXlpZwQiZnq1SGfjwIEjBtrW-kbGozBVmR&fid=0x0:0xfe43abe99f45cdb9"],"When":"2024-8-2"},{"Name":"Philip Raymond Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5EIBAgpBLsauhPMdjXym7mJ4fA8mtryDtWQIJCZfJxYXxupU8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were assisted by Kelly and she was so full of positive energy. All the staff were helpful. Busy beautiful Sunday so lots of people. We had salads, burger, fries, and drinks. Everything was fresh and spot on. The salmon was quite overcooked so it was quite dry, flavourful though. Still good.

Will definitely come back. This place is a gem on Fort Langley!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZtCzzLZ1tYW1-f2P58jLaguOuDRZ540_swUAe&fid=0x0:0xfe43abe99f45cdb9"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"WanderingNomadJunky","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXLV5nGXazxvMsF1gu1JToxDjQdzN7lbcZ-wJLf6VmKi487Kmt5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We got here before the rush. 9am. Brunch was 😋 delicious. The staff was very friendly. The atmosphere is interesting. Wasn't as busy as the other places. Classic breakfast 🥞🍳. Really large patio area. Prices are reasonable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPO08gSEmRYxza57UdCM-KA2jR2fiafgD3G77h0&fid=0x0:0xfe43abe99f45cdb9"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"Oluwayomi Adebule","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXqcIg8ujO4XiC50cD8_FM6q8RuvnCHkeqVI4f08BodMBvibbJTQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I was a bit underwhelmed with the experience. I like my food more flavorful than they had to offer. The items showing on their Google reviews are no longer on the menu which increased my disappointment with this place. It was a busy summer evening so expect to wait at least 30 minutes before your table is ready. No reservation required, just leave a name at the front desk and you’ll be given an estimated time. Busy also means the service appears slower than normal .

Fare:
Coconut prawn
Crab cakes
Short rib braised beef on parsnip puree with rosemary jus
Halibut on wild mushroom risotto

Libations:
Beatniks Shirley Temple
Virgin mule

3.5/5","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOaLtkfToaxJBrzuLy5lFBgvieoGqDGJ1v4C_Bz&fid=0x0:0xfe43abe99f45cdb9"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"FAIS KHAN","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWlKzzS_N_VjrFHFaIWN-Z9G7c1k4XbX_BTvMFUNoBuJ0tzmcRC=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I have a memorable experience to share from last year at this restaurant, which led me to consider revisiting. As a local resident, I rarely explore Fort Langley, a heritage village that mainly attracts tourists. Our initial encounter with the first waitress was lovely; she was friendly, took our orders promptly, and served our drinks right away. Unfortunately, she did not inform us of her shift change. The second waitress who took over was regrettably rude and unprofessional. Despite her assurance to refill our water twice, she never returned with it. Although we ordered promptly, we waited 35 minutes without any food. When we finally flagged down the waitress, she explained that there had been a mix-up as she assumed we had finished our meal. When our food finally arrived, it was a mixed experience. My wife's gnocchi was good, but my fish and chips were disappointing; the fish was undercooked and frozen, making it impossible to cut. The manager, who was very positive and kind, offered to replace my meal for free. I declined, considering the subpar service we had encountered.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM6tkrcqkdnNfWUf01lAEQT9DVTO6JJ8PVX4kmB&fid=0x0:0xfe43abe99f45cdb9"],"When":"2024-7-31"},{"Name":"Spike Luk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVljR41LewaD1cz5kVqUD3bmc9ybJSH00GIF-DrHusS8cKNejJe=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It was a warm Saturday afternoon so we decided to get some shade under an umbrella at Beatniks Bistro.
We were greeted by a friendly hostess who was also responsible for clearing and cleaning the patio tables.  My wife and I were thinking since it was fairly busy the restaurant should have had someone host and someone else clean and set the tables.  Fortunately, the wait wasn’t too bad.

Once we were seated we ordered our drinks.  Somehow my wife was given a virgin Peaches cocktail instead of a regular Peaches cocktail.  I was wondering why my wife was not turning red.  Later the bill showed me a nonalcoholic drink was entered.  It tasted yummy though.
My IPA was cold and refreshing.

The deep fried pickles were good.  It had a nicely seasoned crispy batter.  The dipping sauce was just ok.  Personally a dill sauce would have been better.

The Artisan salad was fresh and crisp.  The amount of dressing perfect.

The salmon burger was good and came with nicely seasoned fries.

Overall it was a good dining experience and we would dine there again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7UT8AOPYwRxdwCdsDZmRvHv55kTZyEaHmJeAU&fid=0x0:0xfe43abe99f45cdb9"],"When":"2024-7-1"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mucahit Mert Alagoz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlZFzlr8OmJ6ReNSeqILjiXkPYOR-Wi6HlJhjaTTE_xGsRl7kohA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First of all, the restaurant is very clean. If you're a cleanliness freak or super picky about hygiene, this place is perfect for you. The bar, kitchen, plates, and forks – everything shines! I haven’t seen such a clean restaurant in Canada in a long time.

There was live music, which was another element that made me happy.

Now, let’s get to the food. We tried (I forgot the name, but I'll call it broccoli fries), and aside from that, I loved everything, especially the meat, which was incredibly delicious, and the portions were very large.

The prices are a bit high, but considering the portion sizes and the quality of the restaurant, it’s totally worth it.

You might have trouble finding parking, but other than that, everything was great. Big thanks to the staff for their attention and great service!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNQfyozV9UhZfpNabnL4liNRc94-Ll1rIbVgl4W&fid=0x0:0x463ff72a13f16c9b"],"When":"2024-10-25"},{"Name":"Jordan Ho","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW11-xeEA0Ih57ocfphXt0C50QwI614ll6t2qknklEqHoDt3aVy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A busy bistro with some delicious brunch options! The shakshuka was great, and the short rib hash had some really tender and flavourful meat, though the actual potatoes were not crunchy and a little soft and soggy. My friend did very much enjoy the pasta as well. The service was also excellent, as even though there was a car show going on this particular weekend and the restaurant was full to the brim, the waitresses were attentive, and very understanding and helpful with regards to our toddlers making accidental messes over the meal. A great restaurant with great service overall, and would come again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNeBIa2-q_6F6HNh-vPg-xIAg_rVqfEoEc3se4q&fid=0x0:0x463ff72a13f16c9b"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"Jenny Anderson (jennycanderson)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5zBrQ2SgSAq7cjPWmWTgRLDBFty535Ptns-qCKJ_Edl0iJO-X=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic meal, prices and service. We ordered the risotto, beet salad, and duck confit to share between 3 people, with an espresso martini and wine to drink. For dessert, we got the seasonal pear panna cotta which was amazing! I feel like the menu was very well curated and each dish was cooked perfectly - kudos to the chef 👏

I’d recommend this restaurant for a date or girls night. Friendly, attentive, and helpful service. The ambiance was lovely and calm for an early Thursday evening and the live music was a plus.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwRYA_-JP1Eos3hjeSCsdIuoNqAB9uC9fZTlDM&fid=0x0:0x463ff72a13f16c9b"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"Aneesh Vaghadia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLWrL7cKUXjPtxgV-J_aqDc0U8QhiCuyIUBtGHmUeqQs8V-GQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Located in Fort Langley, Saba is a great spot for a weekend brunch.  With double height ceilings and a brick feature wall, the atmosphere is open, modern and full of light.  The staff were pleasant and quick to provide service. At 11am on a long weekend, there was no wait for a table.

The menu theme is Mediterranean, and there are a mix of options for this and for a classic breakfast as well (see menu photo). The shakshuka was excellent, served piping hot in a cast iron skillet and full of flavour. The Croque Madame was also delicious. (We enjoyed dipping the fries in the leftover shakshuka if you have a willing partner!) Each dish is around $20-25 and was very much worth it for the serving size and the flavour. Also of note, the restaurant shares ownership with Saba Cafe around the corner, so the coffee is the same good quality.

Overall, this was a great spot to come on a weekend and would definitely come back again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMWsb_AGxONIELaF3dIw8FJrIaMZg3dURTvIf8&fid=0x0:0x463ff72a13f16c9b"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"Natasha Giesbrecht","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJVy0F6zEhg7cM_bDmObBvf-3ZxIl5dG3C2TBScZ2piRGny9g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love eggs bennies and I had the salmon benny today and added an avocado. It was very good. However, I had been looking at previous pictures posted here on Google Maps, and other pictures showed chunks of cooked salmon, and that's what I was expecting. Instead I got thin slices of raw salmon. I was disappointed and questioned the server on this and she explained that they had had a menu change a couple months ago. I'd never been here before so that really didn't mean anything other than the pictures posted from a year ago might not be valid any longer. In any case, the service I was given regarding my complaint was outstanding considering I still ate the full meal given and it was still delicious, just not what I was expecting. Seriously amazing service and I'll be back, though I will make sure to ask more questions before ordering the next time 😀","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJgIPq5vsZFX38dNuFHzvesb4oTxCVxrbZmxue&fid=0x0:0x463ff72a13f16c9b"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"AJ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX6v4uGyFg0WW8-vpkMo_Q1qI1_-YVeHcr9BrbnKxbwivkO5GDq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Peaches & Cream French Toast was fantastic, though I would recommend sharing it—it was a bit too sweet for me to finish on my own. The Lamb Kefta Flatbread was also really flavorful and delicious. Overall, it was a good brunch experience. The space has a beautiful open-concept design, but it can get quite loud inside.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_HrhNiPfFDJ23oVp-HFL_1jp3coO10XRhlWYV&fid=0x0:0x463ff72a13f16c9b"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"Darlene Kemp","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXgwwGuFoHvNYs2Uy7o6DnrTQFssfKNuG22yRrnqcR8DXBJmDcMGg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I absolutely love and recommended Saba Bistro in Fort Langley. The service,the ambiance, the food, the food presentation and selection of beverages that are available are great. A perfect sunny day to stop by for late lunch (after a nail appointment) was the perfect end to a fabulous afternoon with my girlfriend. We were greeted right away and seated at a nice table in the middle of the restaurant. Our server was friendly, knowledgeable and attentive. I started with a prosecco and had  their grilled Ceasars salad, dressing on the side, with chicken. It was delicious and the presentation was appealing.  We were able to have conversations (without being rushed) and really relaxed during our lunch. This is a fabulous spot to chill, enjoy a Thursday afternoon, great food and ambiance. I'd definitely recommend Saba Bistro (and their fantastic staff) ... see you soon and Thank you Thank you Thank you 🙏 🥰","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1x237tG-PKs3YjbTc2dcAJ_8w9-VFvaxybUfP&fid=0x0:0x463ff72a13f16c9b"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"Satnam S. Sangra ਸਤਨਾਮ ਸਿੰਘ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUDoRVzCpgfWfiLaL6rpEs8s72xDvTJgSn7X4IgOdgqRdDECOU8WA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The place was nice. I enjoyed the coffee. The menu was a little too rigid for my liking. You can remove things but can’t substitute them for something else! So essentially you may end up paying for less… Not Cool!

The veggie bowl was flavourful,  I have to say I’ve had better.

My partner ordered the breakfast sandwich on the brioche bun. It was okay….

I thought it was a little expensive for what you get…","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMPRFF4ndVsLyZJKh_HZ5a3te-hod4PLrC1fkIZ&fid=0x0:0x463ff72a13f16c9b"],"When":"2024-4-24"}]

[{"Name":"Uros Nikolic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqZKUGj61BfmTYu8vecdYC7cNoaJsQnfWJB3zipm50mUOPG3Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This Tim Hortons restaurant is cool place in Maple , very clean inside, quick with delivery for my order. My suggestion from menu is definitely Cilantro Lime chicken Habanero bowl 👌🏼and Boston Cream donut.
I highly recommend this place to visit if you’re around 240th street.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7nfnmuUPhclWcDg6kPfBW6LiiiF16p8njh8LE&fid=0x0:0xdf9068a50520f9c6"],"When":"2024-7-14"},{"Name":"Alec Alcott","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIrbBYeP6Cz2pgaDtxE_s2CKq3cllIgtH-skrj5CjadfpyfEQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Absolutely horrific experience going through the drive-through some little Filipino lady arguing with me about how something is ordered. This is literally something I ordered every morning on the way to work. It’s the exact same. I get a simply steak on a plain bagel. It cost $3.12, she tried charging me 550 and gave me the wrong sandwich I come back explain the mistake. She hand me $.60. I said this is still two dollars different from what I spend every morning then she tells me I don’t know what I’m talking about and offers me a receipt absolutely horrible. Will not go back.
Sept1,
Tried giving them another chance, this time instead of giving me the order i placed they missed half my meal yet charged me full price. Absolutely horrendous service","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Iona Albanese","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXullv75-Nknl73rZ1hp--SW5Uaie71kYcHAICwqnI1M73s_ws=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The scanner for the app at the drive thru window has been broken for weeks and I have missed out on a couple hundred dollars in points and nobody in that drive thru window gives a shit about me missing the points also they constantly mess up my order and I don’t have time to come back as I am headed to work and sometimes I don’t find out until I get to work.  Like today I ordered a Boston cream and the icing was stuck to the bag and I ordered a plain bagel doubled toasted with bacon and cheddar cheese when I got to work it was a plain bagel with herb and garlic cream cheese??? What the hell???  Please fix all this as your restaurant manager maybe needs to be replaced!!!!! We’ll still been another couple of weeks and still broken. This is unbelievable!!!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nic DeCook","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJwGqkUaZxY1kdjV4cflV5_vyzFqduLRDSsgfHYoQZNvYx3Og=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The big lady at the window in the mornings will completely ruin the experience. She is rude, impatient, and will mutter words at you under her breath. When asked to repeat herself, she wouldnt.
Im surprised they let someone with zero people skills hold a front window position. Can only imagine how she treats other staff.
Id recommend going to the 230th location. Much better service, much better food and coffee, much better atmosphere over all. The 240th location is not worth it.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Carey Griffin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzR_crfpeJsuScqNsHr9CIIigIHhMJtVIBjzpa9BlOhl8bsQI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Tim Hortons is supposed to be an institution for early morning commuting Canadian worker. This location is the absolute opposite. They claim to be open 24hrs but when we pulled up this morning at 445 we were informed that they had no eggs, no bacon, no sausage, no timbits. Why are they even open? Absolute joke. But the kicker that has now made our morning even better?  Getting halfway to work and noticing our double double coffees were both black and stale.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"A B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJmr4qjtMb9rUgKZwZcywHXl6S9hPq1LGpLI85239FYarJdVs2j=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Drive thru speaker did not work very well, the employee taking my order tells me to pull forward so I can order the rest then when I get to the window the female employee rushes me to complete my order and did not listen to my issue. I ended up paying for my drinks only and left. Very dissatisfied with the young Asians who do not understand English.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Barbara Bradbury","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWxEwrj5A3DxVGYjxL9uHkPeeJW1B8xrcmfAsmCc9Yd8x6TNVUHCw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Worst experience of my life at any Tim Hortons and I go almost daily.  Started out with the drive thru.  Watching the left lane fly by, car after car.  9 cars passed by as I sat in the right lane behind 2 cars.  I didn't see vast amounts of food handed out to anyone.  Sometimes this can't be helped but it was BRUTAL waiting! I realize this cant be helped but "Kali" who said he was the manager handed me food which I put in my purse only to say he needed it back because it was wrong and I said, whoa, I would like that-i touched it and had it in my purse and he said..doesnt matter, it's wrapped.  (what??)  i said..i wouldn't like that as a customer and he said "that's you".  Then he couldn't understand I was picking up 2 mobile orders and was getting frustrated and then called out to his staff that he has to know when there are 2!  I told him at least 4 times..2 at the ordering window and twice at the drive thru.  I asked for a manager and he said he was...Yikes!  Poor staff and customers on that one.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Deb","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLLfnS-Cv5wjz_iPa_Z9uzD9sdW7KcAY4DUF34SkSKK_b53iQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Chai tea latte was a disaster and had to be tossed. It was gross. I think it may have been someone new as he asked questions on how to make it. And asked me a few times. I couldn't understand why and repeatedly said no one has ever asked me this!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Krissy Vogel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLWFEp1ZjlsivRBmlmWdayO0mcFwBAEIts36l5mXdGiRPpRmA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’m so happy I found this company! I am diabetic on insulin and I’m able to cut my medication in half already using the diabetic program.  Normally I struggle to stick to diets because it feels too restrictive but I don’t find that at all with this program!  It’s going to be absolutely life changing for me as a busy mom and business owner myself I just don’t have time to prioritize making my own healthy meals.  I’m so glad I found meals a weight!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPSAQjZc9uWGtE65H_TINt3Hh-PEjMHDI_G8Ibm&fid=0x0:0xe462c53d946a75e8"],"When":"2024-11-1"},{"Name":"Emma Jane Davison","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUus1UolRFOV-nlAD_lgpSbML4nk1f88BwrdrkEiux7JDwpFYK3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We have a very busy schedule in our household, but eating delicious and nutritious food is so important to us. We love good food and enjoy cooking as a family when we have the time. However, on weeks that are a little *too chaotic of a schedule, we need support. We started to order  MealsAWeight to keep us fed, healthy and happy and moving at a fast pace on those weeks that are busier than others.
The service is surprisingly well priced- I was shocked at the low cost. They provide great portion sizes and wide variety of flavours so you don’t get bored.  We are so grateful to have found a company that serves meals that are both cost-effective and delicious for those weeks when we’re in a pinch.

Oh, and their team is super helpful and willing to modify for any dietary needs. It’s very personal. We love it!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jaime Libby","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXWcuQUZBXxCRF5-27cV4MrzyteNpvh8tPhlqiQSMkU18wPjoAf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely amazing company and the food is so good. You can choose what’s best for you and they work with you on this.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPbCVmLdJ9gjZi4qOgTGMatCjg0RvaTpJdZs0Of&fid=0x0:0xe462c53d946a75e8"],"When":"2024-10-29"},{"Name":"michael mallett","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJzehE4IF_DJ_aTkC2VgWbeLX6x8HQCfbwMhTPRgEieY-9OGQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've had amazing meals designed and created by Ellie @MealsAWeight. Super healthy and tasty. Very convenient. They deliver my weeks supply of meals and I'm set. I've also used Ellie's Catering services for parties as well. She loves to sit down and design a delicious menu that will blow your guests away. Highly recommend Ellie's services.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"jengrace1991","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXhK_DIv0w1gd2eg8ODCertp_6OP9U40Uq9-hLc7CDc-Lu32hwP=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I reached out and was immediately excited by what was available for so many different dietary requirements and how simple and personal the entire process was. The meals are delicious and have such a variety in foods and flavours! I chose delivery, which they have made so easy and convenient.
I have been on a journey to improve my health and to lose fat and having the meals prepared and ready to go with exactly the portion size I need is just that extra stress off of me. It really has allowed me to focus on my exercise plan and on my goals for where I want to get and stop panicking about what to cook and when to cook it.
I really have nothing but great things to say about the entire experience!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Matthew Marwick","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWbxIFdVLekHTge1X4TG0EMaptU7JXdrtxc7l5imNggu97xJzkC=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been using MealsAWeight for almost 2 years now and cant imagine life without it. Always making the adjustments I need especially with my training schedule and needs. I have recommended many friends that tried this service, and have continued to use it.

I highly recommend anyone reading this to at least do a trial period and see how much more easy it makes preparing for the week, and hitting your macro goals!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Judy Chavez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKSx87NDkzElQN7PMniHCHXOxUhlAeryAXiavISWFvI3J-kPA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best meal prep company in Vancouver!  Food is so yummy, healthy and has so much flavour!  Eli and her staff are all amazing, if you have questions or dietary restrictions Eli will modify your meals exactly how you want them!  Love them you won’t be disappointed","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Abhijit Pradhan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXiOOX8fJyUzpvN02EKIk9ridOV1v-9DhBfcQjyH4uuOQzrWNo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I would definitely recommend MealsAWeight meal prep service to everyone willing to try. Their services are outstanding and is the main reason I rate it as five stars. Meals are appropriately priced based on serving size and is about avg cost anywhere you would find in Vancouver. I am following macros based diet and these folks have been kind enough to accommodate the macros. In the first week of my subscription, I found the seasoning on the lighter side and required some other adjustments with the meals. I provided my feedback and these guys have not only accepted the feedback but acted on it. Ellie, the owner said she would personally look into my meal prep and make sure they adjust it to my tastebuds. I would like to thank Ellie for acting on her word. I am sure she goes above and beyond for all the customers. And ofcourse meals are tasty and serve their purpose.
Thank you team and wish you the best. Cheers!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"BandCfoodies","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLDhgnd3V_8FZmO2s3tPAUiCW-PCtVWqdvjqfjU6e_Boge0xA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Came for the lunch buffet with my kids and it was delicious. The fresh naan served to the table was fluffy and hot. The butter chicken was up there for taste and quality. Service was top notch too.
The downside is the steam table didn’t seem to be on/working so the food was just luke warm and the restaurant is a little run down looking.
But all in all, the price and quality of food makes it definitely worth a try!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPwdhnZons12Ny0VAhOmbQ_Vz_VfybcdTHwBGUz&fid=0x0:0xe6cb70e0f621d314"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Merlin Jose","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWcYx_3Zvjc8iJkthMK_lV6pMFulyPn4wKtWzuvrlUZ1YHIl40JLA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was delicious.the service was great.staff was so great and friendly.they have enough good enough space.small buffet but delicious .2 non veg 2 veg ,rice,and starters(samosa and pakora)and salad.It cost 12$ ,it is available from Tuesday to Sunday","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOA4E6M0ZPGe6pwpC3QLBKwW2UDuCMw3kNqyoSP&fid=0x0:0xe6cb70e0f621d314"],"When":"2024-2-4"},{"Name":"Roman Krzaczek Quadra Island Cortes Island and Campbell River Realtor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUcVEVXBFySu8YcMgVSOhN0lchLPLRTEHigvCzWxArNZf_NUJSS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Friendly service, fresh food. After seeing some of the previous reviews I was nervous but maybe they’ve changed some staff or whatever but we ordered a lot for take out. Portions were typical size. All was fresh and delicious. We were very happy!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpyf3U0xnw3NJAfVuK8wOE0mvv4GgsiUq0t_wu&fid=0x0:0xe6cb70e0f621d314"],"When":"2018-11-12"},{"Name":"duane r neufeld","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUhhlb1lcJQnDlyAPy1R2d_GOddZm-jMhyJJsiO9YhD02HRj38=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"While the dine in was empty today, the excellent food made up for the lack of company.  Wow the flavors are fresh and exceptional.  We've been buying samosas here for years, always fresh and very flavourful.  Don't let the plain entry or decor fool you.  I could come here every week !  I shall return!! The medium spiciness was perfect for me.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFLJLR5msM8fwLVf0-xZwIFCYkO4fuzxeyuNl1&fid=0x0:0xe6cb70e0f621d314"],"When":"2023-6-14"},{"Name":"Darlinda Mcleod (Dar)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqZ2WhyjrzdSSrCX7N-fGZSBCKWptPiqw5qRHl2Ahx7pYakBht=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Oh wow! Ordered for the first time last night I was so delighted as where we all it was delicious the saag chicken absolutely to die for! The veggie Pakora the Veggie samosas and yes, even the rice oh can’t forget the garlic naan. Everything was so enjoyed thank you thank you thank you will definitely be coming into dine in and it goes without saying that I’ll be ordering again from you guys for delivery amazing.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Megan Meyers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKZvvsDEoANgcpH7WCHx_ISotLwwapLOx-UcIDWu7mCfYR7eQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was delivered, fresh, hot! It looked appealing and the taste was out of this world! The owner delivered it and was super friendly! Definitely will order again and reccomend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7FD_-HiJKeanu-Ecgt0f3BcLtto-YBHQ6_4pl&fid=0x0:0xe6cb70e0f621d314"],"When":"2023-11-26"},{"Name":"Tino Boos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKegsrf7SzKGGtEt5EB0dDibASfc4ocjkOupfAr8EbzNEIr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came in for lunch not having been here for a long, long time. Food was delicious, prices were reasonable, and the service was friendly and polite. Perfect time.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mar CP","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcRL-p_42JomQd42RNT6MxCrpazQhO5PTicprb0awOrFvRvys=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best food and service is great!!
Very friendly and always had a great experience.
The spice butter chicken is absolutely amazing no matter how spice it's the hit brings you to another level and think about Indian food.
Thank you for brings the taste of the beautiful country.
Keep it up!! 🙂","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMS-yUYAYsOwqVy032rRm3CyZ5L3_dShrmGNII&fid=0x0:0xe6cb70e0f621d314"],"When":"2021-8-14"}]

descriptions: Funky pit stop for classic & fusion burritos including seasonal specials, coffee & small-batch beer.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Moira Casey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqH8ArDou9s_zoBtlaH2uA9ZPMDv3j1_WOTzaJd-UkxMhhAnEjxw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were very hungry when we came here and were happy to find they had burritos which they were happy to make to order due to dietary preferences/restrictions. The burritos were huge. Adriana was our lovely server but all the staff were friendly. Didn't realize until we were leaving that they serve margaritas but that will have to happen next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2ZatjMgYikkgK_0-Nn52JfGlgJhFcKoliXkzy&fid=0x0:0x7911bdee6ff125d6"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Maria Reyes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVT4VIguuWaBPRzr3vwjMN5Oxv5461iYNuM4q-kfJX1dGCzcrcp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Have heard many friends recommend this place. Finally got to try it for takeout. Had a four hour stretch from purchase to eating with a quick reheat (came from fridge). The wrap has a good flavour (huh? Wow the wrap has flavour?! Appreciate that!). Both burritos were delicious and filling. Actually only could eat ⅓ of each, will save for another day.
Will recommend to others.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMshMZwMPy3BVak2HSsy1QjeaKw458TF6MS0WtX&fid=0x0:0x7911bdee6ff125d6"],"When":"2024-9-24"},{"Name":"Ben Moreno","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbXIQA5QNY2om_rvFeJhZDcAcErydWjpf8dpxFoZ8JJurbSZgE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice restaurant with beautiful theme decorations, they keep all the sliding glass windows open when the weather allows it, making it feel  like the whole restaurant is a patio.
Very good taste and  good-sized burritos, good choices of beers, and soft drinks,  fast service,  friendly servers,  the seating areas are kept very clean, recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMB-G40Vox86v_d_g90w5UHE4TWUu8Euihzj6SE&fid=0x0:0x7911bdee6ff125d6"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"Kim Lishman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWoLip5cDVmyG9tqCTLI4iijakhf4W2VYZg3aEWyBWtOfnKc61HDQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really enjoyed the Little Donkey burrito and it kept me full for the entire afternoon. I loved reading the sign about the owner and meaning behind the restaurant. Would recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNoB9ObAapXrCDCy_XxWu-OG6uDiJ-3cIDMSVxl&fid=0x0:0x7911bdee6ff125d6"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"To Ching Chan (Raymond)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_JNaVYtt5g0NGwmOn0CZ8D3OYXoGeQEAGHictSSpxFK2__U6u=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great burrito that’s packed with flavour and value for the money. I ordered a little donkey burrito, it may look not too much from its appearance, but when I got it, it was really heavy and kept me satiated for the whole afternoon XD.

10/10 recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjVz7VacEj2vjQ1eRCZFYPR_c07t-1HaTs0Dwi&fid=0x0:0x7911bdee6ff125d6"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Josiah Johnson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUfIUxbBekeLBDf62gJ6QVeoeFzTIXl8WlsfLT8nsYKNjGbXs8j=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were going to go to a chain restaurant when we stopped in Langley but decided to walk through fort Langley instead! Boy were we pleasantly surprised by this unique burrito spot! Amazing taste, beautiful patio view, and very friendly and fast staff! Thank you!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8cSlP1uEVWoRq1FIEudj0_r5IAkC6Bcb_UDwT&fid=0x0:0x7911bdee6ff125d6"],"When":"2024-6-15"},{"Name":"harmen k","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUE3qJRedpffMosEWeiRlm3_opTsV7XQ8-2XOHWsUXGSuTzHgxK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food was good, and the service was really quick. Very cute spot in Fort Langley. We had a nice day out here, and little donkey was a great spot to get some food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM3r964Pr0cqjT4jD592eOeuwHyzUYzCA6S3Kn3&fid=0x0:0x7911bdee6ff125d6"],"When":"2024-5-19"},{"Name":"Paulina Pedrero Miranda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXoiOld2vaC2Dv18bWNi8EDRiykD7MSCRsU3RK7RESh6xQghXxb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing burritos!, we where starving!, and this place was excellent!, they prepared everything fast and the quality of the ingredients is sooo fresh!, the staff is very friendly!, the place is clean and have a very calm atmosphere, the burritos are big and pretty tasty! They give you valentina hot sauce😄, we order jarritos and enjoyed our meal!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOR3z2wYWdwW0yw9RcXJNR0Ebu2UHnr7WpHMOZq&fid=0x0:0x7911bdee6ff125d6"],"When":"2024-1-22"}]
