user_reviews: [{"Name":"Jordan Blaker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_iD6bb17qljNA2aSFr9JfMC0Jg6j51TZ3bv9L9X_-KFOAVyjatg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Such a nice and quiet Italian restaurant. The food is delicious, and the staff are very friendly. I have come here multiple times and had great experiences every time. A great place to go with friends or on a date. The location is good, and you can wonder Fort Langley before or after your meal which is nice. The restaurant is hidden beside Wendell’s so I don’t know if a lot of people know it’s there, so I’ve never had a problem getting a reservation. What I also like about this restaurant is they accommodate bigger groups, even though their restaurant is small. We had a family dinner with about 10 people and they did a wonderful job taking care of all of us.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPwMM7LSaT5OlSCHdD52o6Z3RPqxXH6GZ2bDBvh\u0026fid=0x0:0xf80280c4edf81822"],"When":"2024-11-10"},{"Name":"Eva Zia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJp1CScTOq-jdIBVBA-K4f_r74TZU-kRd9MclConVIiSCPfy3Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"We chose this place for lunch with our friends, I wish we didn't choose it. The quality of the food is poor, the service is awful, the men who took our order behaved very rudely with disrespect, he didn't take our order politely, he didn't take the bill politely, his behaviour with, racism completely made us feel bad, the amount of food is very small and the taste is ordinary, and it is also expensive compared to the amount. It is not recommended at all Even if you are hungry.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPxUpSTRrgtSNr-BJlLo5ebE39rlx3qIMYwNXxY\u0026fid=0x0:0xf80280c4edf81822"],"When":"2024-7-22"},{"Name":"Suman Kumar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJWA9Ue8ieMt0LJ2dBJ1w71cVbjmtHwxELi3E5si5x1Cseu1w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was the best place to celebrate our daughter's Birthday today. With great food and the exact ambience we needed, it was also embellished with a Birthday wish, song and even a dance by the dinner singer. I'd like to thank him and all the rest of the diners who joined the celebration, and for that moment we felt that the place was filled with friends. Very grateful to everyone who made it special for our girl. Appreciate the great service, food and the hospitality of the ever smiling young ladies. Will keep visiting always!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Marnie Eudela-Umlas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXg_gVRD_Hd9V3XIUh6_P71KHCryea9xsHYGqrZHTuXW_jdxEU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our first time here and it did not disappoint. We ordered Lamb Shank, Pizzas, Pastas, Calamari and Desserts and they were all good. Price was okay and service was awesome too. I liked the Patio dine in which was perfect for summer. We will surely be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcMisBVJezJpJcvHJk-qRGkcMXBoSPtXN3NqnO\u0026fid=0x0:0xf80280c4edf81822"],"When":"2023-8-20"},{"Name":"Taz C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ235c-1POJF85QGI4N_CFSzUmrADwRBXdKObCvBIDceTrCYTc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Most items ordered were average. The Vongole was a disappointment, dry, and undercooked. The house made bread burnt and hard. Calamari was oily and underseasoned.  Service was okay. Small portions for the price. All the drinks were great. Overall, it was an average experience with average food. The paper menu was pretty dirty with grease and stains, which was a turn-off.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzMXK0DzOYgBwFpMDhLLRoVYDP4FsopS3PEShF\u0026fid=0x0:0xf80280c4edf81822"],"When":"2023-9-17"},{"Name":"Angie Hallam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDRnMNO_Dh94L5sS51oaWPDwXJ11mwKshglWP_qM8VGKfyd5Oo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What an amazing place. Dinner was so good. We had the calamari starter and it was to die for!  Then my hubby and I had the lamb shank with risotto. There are not words expressive enough to say how very good it was. I had tiramisu for dessert and my hubby had the donuts. The atmosphere was great. The service was just wonderful. Their spritzers are so delicious too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPV5lVJ2Ml32a890sChJL5pIIunZTmKzBFAoEkb\u0026fid=0x0:0xf80280c4edf81822"],"When":"2023-12-3"},{"Name":"Ken B.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKi0UHEqvrtK9b7zXvBSni89V4qdFRQmlmzKuNqGFJ9iPTWGGw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A hidden gem, great spot for family reunions or date night. Cozy dining room and private rear patio. Food is fresh and high quality but the dome pizzas are exceptional. Prices are on the higher end side but with their service and high quality ingredients it’s worth it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkaN21ZfqPFep2L-fP35pJVDiThZrGVVzogSRJ\u0026fid=0x0:0xf80280c4edf81822"],"When":"2021-8-21"},{"Name":"Angel Claypool","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocInCmqnFK0WQ5UkL5con4MyZ2CXnepe1BfBoPVhZubxkFygiA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My husband and I had lunch there on Remembrance Day. We shared a Fungi Pizza and the Chicken Pesto spaghetti. We were impressed with both. It was so nice watching the chef putting wood in the oven before making our pizza. The pasta was really tasty and served perfectly cooked. The staff were all really friendly and the service was great. What a great little hidden gem in Fort Langley.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO2uWOCXA2ZIwv-imi-k6kp8nIh5xt7OHJt-QY0\u0026fid=0x0:0xf80280c4edf81822"],"When":"2023-11-12"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mochi Yamaha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKxEvadgO4wrQJ-lDz7F3fW-muiNbHvLJLXV__5XsEDvWEZwA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice restaurant with decent food and great customer service. Casey and her fellow waitress efficiently and effectively handled a large party of over 40 hungry athletes and parents for dinner. Ordered the chicken and waffles and food arrived in a reasonable time frame. Everything went very smoothly. Great job!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipME5tKQsRwGfx2RdV1UKUIOdjNS0u9JibkNuleZ&fid=0x0:0x71380e83264b3d4d"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"James Mendonca","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKDOYVs1G-8iT9QF6Fj3_nUauDo1DS6zISrEp3lZ9wij4inDQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I came to this restaurant before when it was called Rockwells and I did not like the food or the service back then. Now known as Five Forks, I came for dinner and had an excellent experience eating there. The waitress was very nice and showed great gaiety in serving me. I order the Lobster Mac & Cheese, which was their chef's special and their Blue Hawaiian cocktail. The Blue Hawaiian was very good and can taste the Malibu Rum and Blue Curacao in it. The mac and cheese exceeded my taste buds in how good it was. The entree has a nice gooey consistence from the cheese was baked, while the alfredo sauce was so flavoursome, and they make the sauce from scratch too. Despite the name, you are given one lobster tail for the mac and cheese, however the lobster was still great, especially when it is paired with the macaroni and cheese. It came with garlic toast too that I enjoyed. When I came there again, I ordered from their Brunch menu. I ordered their Forks Breakfast Bowl with coffee. Then entree tasted great overall; the rice tasted excellent, especially when paired with the hollandaise and salsa sauces. The coffee was good, not the best though. The interior design of the restaurant looks very high-class and clean as well. Because this is a large restaurant, there are different sections for you to dine at and the waiter would ask where you like to sit at. But I still recommend anyone to come and eat there during anytime of the day.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJGhsUhQgTW7DbxupBbeswsoWrPddWCQliqPGr&fid=0x0:0x71380e83264b3d4d"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Rayanne Boehm","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW7nXtx0vS86bw2PHY_udvCXyxr6MAucicGyxiWuXoTRwurJXG0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The husband and I enjoyed our time here. It wasn't too busy, but the food was delicious.
We got a starter of nachos with a whiskey smash, blue Hawaiian and bartenders special drinks
Then the main dishes are fish & chips and a 6oz sirloin steak.
And of course I had to try the cheesecake to celebrate my birthday, overall we had a good night.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJnObjhShKigKdfr4eV3eNxp0JDf0Pw0NLvViV&fid=0x0:0x71380e83264b3d4d"],"When":"2024-4-19"},{"Name":"Paulina K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKHESGuv2e44yh_7pNCkjXfHsSmzMLHqmPnws63OHRE0hDZGw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"They have an amazing view - the food came pretty quick but was fairly simple & bland. Quite on the pricier side, but the decor inside the restaurant is 5 stars for sure. Service is excellent.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM6B_WySm1bJo-Wd6oWfLNreQejExYeeUyUK87M&fid=0x0:0x71380e83264b3d4d"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"Sarah Cheltenham","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJzzdBsJXPMc-ChlsRzPojcMwPD7SwWrk5K5Ohbo8KvfXYtYg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"We did take out supper for the family tonight, what a mistake.  Our butter chicken came without the bread so basically we paid $26.00 for a cup rice and 6 pieces of chicken in a mediocre sauce.  I had the spaghetti which tasted like it was from a tin,  my meal was also missing the garlic bread.   The kids had the chicken strips which were tiny but had a ton of fries.  I wouldn’t return or recommend this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPI1f-N8s1UQ17W2xhHbQLPK3KMRjXX6ghyR5SF&fid=0x0:0x71380e83264b3d4d"],"When":"2024-8-28"},{"Name":"CM C MAC","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX9vmUDmNdEn-qNdF7VbuscNFEwru-AsEdenMbN2Qoc0g4p_vUXog=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"An excellent vibe when we first walked in. We ordered soup of the day, cauliflower bites, fish tacos and beer battered fish and chips.
The cauliflower was outstanding! However, the fish was bland on both meals but Fries were excellent.
The soup came out way too hot and took quite a while to cool to edibility.
I brought my concerns to the server and she did an excellent job in speaking with her manager asap.
The manager came to our table and handled the concerns professionally and courteosly. Very impressed that our concerns were immediately addressed.
We will definitely be back when passing this way again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sean Heidstra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKw8HLsqCObzrWAHFP5JvJYF3woSmCrLLoedHFINDFqhEIf=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It was a Monday, very slow ( I was a hotel guest). Whiskey was cold, steak was blue rare, and the cheesecake delicious. Server was great, would recommend. PS: don't let the hotel-that's-showing-its-age that's connected taint your image of the place; its clean and classy.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Donna S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWIL8dps5XjEG60llDeFgPQhj7Hzw_5Zn8BZma3ppiIXa7b6O5xtQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Finally got in to check this place out. I've always loved the atmosphere of this spot. It wasn't busy at all. Food came out fast. Ordered the cheese burger for the kids, myhusband had the smash burger with onion rings and I had the buttermilk salmon Hoagie with house salad I believe it was called firecracker sandwich or something along those lines. There was a buttermilk chicken option that would have tasted better with the sauce and toppings. All in all it was good. The kids menu was 14.95 and doesn't include a drink or dessert/ice cream. The burger was a good size but after a drink its $18. Most kids menus have that included and I think it would be a smart move. Their burger buns were ok but I'd love to drop a pack of my homemade buns off for them to give a try 🤣. This place has a lot of potential. I would love to give them a list of my ideas to help their business. Lol waitress was nice. I hope this place does well. Prices a bit high but thats just becoming the new norm.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1mIhGTHmc1H7NBPzwRqjqwdco5RGHCBmF8tNR&fid=0x0:0x71380e83264b3d4d"],"When":"2023-8-12"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mellie Fricker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXedPrBha6Dr5UkAzDR8QJg67GQLCT6B8dgmXQ74_XOEoPfcF8i=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My husband and I came to Rail & River last night for our anniversary and really enjoyed ourselves! Our server was very friendly and the food was fantastic!

We started with the crab dip, which was very yummy and had the perfect dip to chip ratio, which is hard to achieve! Definitely recommend. For our mains, my husband had the steak frites and I had the crispy chicken sandwich. Both were delicious. The chicken sandwich was one of the better ones I've had!

We will be back! 🫶","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipND73hA99uhQmr-f0gSRmDHbzWP4xVvk6cVWBck&fid=0x0:0x4dd0c7124faa2796"],"When":"2024-7-24"},{"Name":"Spike Luk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVljR41LewaD1cz5kVqUD3bmc9ybJSH00GIF-DrHusS8cKNejJe=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It’s the BC Day weekend and we decided to visit Fort Langley.  After a short walk we decided to dine at the Rail and River Bistro. The server was great.   Dog bowls were at every table.   We ordered an IPA and  Sangria.    Both were yummy.   The lettuce wraps were super flavorful!  My beet salad presented beautifully and tasted fresh.   The Brie burger was juicy!  Overall it was a very good dining experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJwFZIhdo1oQvTXIG7txCas9XpglhmcwXRi_rw&fid=0x0:0x4dd0c7124faa2796"],"When":"2023-8-7"},{"Name":"Volodymyr IV","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXZVGyvm5axHp2o0FXy9Qi9k5Kf-vIAC9ZH_P6Y5QSR5XqiYTr_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It was a great time to meet my friends, I fall in love their chicken Karri soup 😉 A waitress was kind and polite! I will come for a visit beautiful Fort Langley","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPrt5g-elOs-_eDZcsPmW_2ntTiFm5xu3tGOd3E&fid=0x0:0x4dd0c7124faa2796"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Fiona Bratvold","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVkKVshxGxVMEEGCFFS3gcEVu3bxn4uRZ1N7p-__IzVtiTHsl7bdw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We went on a Saturday lunch to a nice place by the river in Fort Langley. We sat in the covered patio. Nice ambiance. I had the brie burger which was absolutely delicious served with the bean soup. Prices were reasonable. My husband had a Quinoa salad with blackened chicken which he enjoyed. This place has an attached pizza restaurant on the side as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9gEGqkpsvbyk8dAOCsf3WC7or2EQEdTXb2tGs&fid=0x0:0x4dd0c7124faa2796"],"When":"2023-7-11"},{"Name":"Vanessa Siemens","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJKCfF96Py35XeRij3LfZ7iw1-PArlS476_Zv-0lpjLz3Xkx3yww=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everything from the food to the service and seating was fantastic. I ate outside because I had my dog. Each outdoor seating area has a dog dish with water and a nice private space where you're sitting. The service was fantastic and the food was delicious.
The bruschetta was perfectly toasted and was very flavourful. The war won ton soup had a really tasty broth and lots of great stuff in it. All in all a wonderful dining experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8FgHdN_WBkMWTb0h4XYDhDTxeSr0aXYIkFv5N&fid=0x0:0x4dd0c7124faa2796"],"When":"2022-7-7"},{"Name":"Emily Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYgM6xz9g4tOlfhgN75kH_RwKTdviii5aghI5D4awZ7zRrYA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"It is highly inappropriate for a server to add a tip without the customer’s consent.

I visited the restaurant with my kids for lunch today, and the server, claiming to be super busy, made us wait nearly an hour just for seating, the menu, and serving the food. We ordered burgers, pizza, and lettuce dishes, and while we tried to be understanding, the final moment was frustrating. When it came time to pay, the server quickly added a tip without my consent and handed me the machine before walking away. I’ve never had such an experience in any Canadian restaurant before. No matter how good the food may be, I wouldn’t recommend this place to anyone.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Karen Maughan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJFmwJ1J5oKrkRIipxb6dxd1O_v-_Uqeaz57eoj96AoJoABMA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Dog friendly patio 🐶 fully covered so perfect for any weather. Tables are separated by planters and spacious which is nice. 2nd time there for lunch, lots of menu selections and food is excellent. Both times the waitstaff were friendly and on point. Fis & chips & Tuna Poke were excellent. Highly recommended","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ankish Jain","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVtZtGDHPnah-DrtpgkggcAhhlSQVzJPmXNPvi48ydYGD1fNehDHA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I tried veggie PIZZA - which is amazing (it's very soft and tasty)
cheese & and toppings are very good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOoi8Zjw8F-Efen4IFrpwPZGCoVeEyZdDL7wlS_&fid=0x0:0x4dd0c7124faa2796"],"When":"2024-6-22"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Selena Crossland","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWWLe1RgQsIrdrrFgWveqgVWMWYardQdE6s5tHcE0xt0ncrTVv1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Our family normally orders all our pizzas from this location for years but no more. We ordered last week and the dough on both were very raw so I called \u0026 told them their oven must not be calibrated properly, they gave me a credit, we went back tonight and all 3 pizzas had raw dough again \u0026 undercooked again. I didn’t bother to call them this time- we will have to find a new pizza place. It’s pretty bad when you can actually knead the dough again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Colin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJvFgjJxxaJNXmYFM985fOV76JjLyWWI2SRC_1FM5CsDcPKHP-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered 20 pizzas for a function.   The delivery guy was a bit early which is way better than being late😉.  The pizzas were HOT, and absolutely delicious.  The crust was perfect.  The order was 100% completely correct.  I would 100% recommend.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Annie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJAG4UtHNdn-C74S5I053c9lMdRMdh_AH35u090AgjHoFmF2GSW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We are new to the area and definitely on the hunt for great pizza. We wanted to try something close by and so happy we did.\nThe dough is fluffy and pizza was flavourful. We will definitely be ordering again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOG3IIvBu0De8jtWOq-tytblBj5We0iyyR8VGws\u0026fid=0x0:0x13dcb43e46dee0bd"],"When":"2023-4-21"},{"Name":"Iona Albanese","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXullv75-Nknl73rZ1hp--SW5Uaie71kYcHAICwqnI1M73s_ws=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered a veggie thin crust but got a pepperoni on reg crust. Someone got my veggie. How can you screw this up. Not up to standards of what I expect as I do not like pepperoni pizza and did not have the time to wait another hour for delivery. Really disappointed and frustrated when you pay good money and they screw up. DO NOT RECOMMEND Pappa Leos Maple ridge at all\nThen when I went to use the credit on the restaurants screw up I had to order something else because they could not just deliver the pizza as their computer needs a $10 min for delivery even though it was there fault. NEVER EVER ORDER FROM THEM","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shaun Hildenbrand","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLRAl2hRqxROn3hdmuYJl4PDTsXnSDIPsNNc9bfSmR3IRtiLA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great pizza! We love a pizza with nice bubbly cheese, and a soft NOT soggy crust, that is exactly what we got. We ordered a medium Veggie and Pepperoni, both were delicious. We found the veggies to be super fresh! Lots of toppings! Delivery arrived quickly, customer service was great. Glad we found our new pizza place! 🍕","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNhGa6k0ckeebDM-sGwmCycGyQBl-JQ4qSXKAdw\u0026fid=0x0:0x13dcb43e46dee0bd"],"When":"2021-11-7"},{"Name":"Crystal Vossler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLzRectqT8Xrhje6T5gu8XLFO-tAqwjQqvPI7WqTINpTiLMKlXc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This is probably the worst pizza I ever had , it wasn’t even warm when I had brought it home. Must have been sitting under a heat lamp for a few hours and put into a box","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Trevor McLaughlin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKaqEPv5BF5FjC4OdWo9R34_D5igWVh8nbkqbChJ5Szjnwm_Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely HANDS DOWN, THE BEST pizza in Maple Ridge, and if the quality is the same across all locations, one of the best pizza, and bang for buck, you can get!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Stephanie Stover","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXQhMYQ4pW0SJjxJTfmGpSZIxTt2xgiZtg57V-ZGD4hD005PuY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good pizza,  2 pieces and a pop for $5. It was very busy but we were served quickly. The owner was quite friendly as well. Great place to buy pizza.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOa4-1rtzryJI_KgtoE_VppyIAfjGJtaPHqXPw\u0026fid=0x0:0x13dcb43e46dee0bd"],"When":"2017-1-29"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ross Farrell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK7z5kOS9KIlAAzusg7zKh4LAgseFjBjZtK4vLiqyxnUuFluQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place has it all. Amazing drinks, food, and atmosphere. There's something for everyone. Board games for kids, books for adults ect..   oh the staff couldn't have been more friendly or  helpful. Definitely my favorite coffee shop!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nolan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUvfeLdT7xJPAVVjy2rCnwq39qJZwxeys74Qs6poxQryb1itHGo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"When ordering coffee and food at this cafe recently, the lady taking our order became visibly annoyed with our lack of decisiveness and last second additions to our order, despite being the only ones in line. I ordered a soup, and it was served to me at an ungodly temperature. I don't think a hot holder can get soup this hot so I'm assuming it was superheated from the microwave. My tongue is still scalded the next day. Given the other reviews, it is possible we caught them on an off-day, but I can't say I enjoyed my experience or that I will be coming back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Joanne Antoniak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTQwhPcO13h_HhVjJVUrwpHjU5MeesKhPrxV5pA1ymdZ1edFkY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a lovely little neighbourhood cafe.  Cozy seating indoors and outside.  Specialty/regular coffee drinks and fun snacks available.  Nice little "shop local" gift area as well.
August 5 2023 ☕
Still awesome!  Had iced vanilla lattes today 😋.  Fantastic place to sit and relax - inside or out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMO7fRNTlXf-LN5bo_VjB0taC_gGGz6QVw4tRmM&fid=0x0:0x54bd5139cbba718"],"When":"2022-3-28"},{"Name":"O'Malley Katt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUswFv0nzHA7NhNwpFVResHe4Lv81x7oK88qk7321o7mi-BWKc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Recently moved into the area and this is my favourite place already. The staff are so friendly and it's great for morning coffee (including flavours of the month) or lunch, their soup it so nice and warms you up on the cooler days. There's even a book library!
Can get busy on a nice day but quality never drops!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMzLDqGLBL2b-YiV01qqItPYMc0Nkrc1jygU8FY&fid=0x0:0x54bd5139cbba718"],"When":"2024-3-21"},{"Name":"Kiran Vaidya","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUB6j8oAUTvPnzAEOS2ASHN4wPWHIhdEUfAL8p78-hsSYM9_9PPfA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is an absolute gem in the Albion  community! From the moment you step inside, you're greeted by a delightful array of coffee choices, cold beverages and the warmest, friendliest staff and baristas. The delicious panini, bagels, and those amazing large samosas are simply mouthwatering additions to the already fantastic coffee experience.

The community vibe is enchanting, and it's clear why this coffee shop is so popular among locals. The owner's personalized touch, knowing everyone by name, makes you feel like you're part of an extended family.

Working from this coffee shop is great experience , with ample plug points and  air conditioning to keep you comfortable all day.  For sunshine ☀ lovers they have large patio as well. And let's not forget the gorgeous library corner, a haven for book lovers.

I can't praise their coffee powder enough! The fact that you can enjoy the same excellent coffee at home is a testament to their dedication to quality.

As a small feedback, it would be great if they could offer more high-protein snacks, perhaps some more egg items for a fulfilling brunch experience.

Overall, I rate Kanaka Creek Coffee 5/5 for its superb coffee variety, friendly ambiance, and outstanding service. It's truly a hidden treasure that adds so much joy to the local community.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM26YnETFFnvm760rqWBnoG5DqHcFyGsjjCJJDz&fid=0x0:0x54bd5139cbba718"],"When":"2023-8-4"},{"Name":"Spike Luk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVljR41LewaD1cz5kVqUD3bmc9ybJSH00GIF-DrHusS8cKNejJe=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just went out for a morning ride to Maple Ridge and stopped for coffee here.  The staff were friendly.  My large vanilla latte was LARGE!  The muffin was yummy.  The patio was perfect for the nice sunny morning.  Looking forward to coming back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHdYFT6DuVT-AmmU34txHQsyYm0Ee-rRv34oli&fid=0x0:0x54bd5139cbba718"],"When":"2022-7-2"},{"Name":"Lisa Simmons","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLUCbM7Sv-M1pAApVUnGKleUtAL_QtjEhlmjRjJZl7LJUXJqg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great spot, lovely atmosphere.  They gladly accommodated my request for a sugar free beverage.  Hazelnut latte, so yummy. The Cinnamon buns are fabulous and huge. Met there for a book club. Was a little noisy for talking with a group. They have a big bookshelf full of books as well.  Definitely plan to return.  Awesome local spot.

Omg, the Hot Coconut milk latte, so yummy. And paired it with the cranberry lemon scone, scrumptious. Sorry, for to take pics.

Pumpkin steamer, yummy 😋","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Attila Péntek","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJVlXUNuyohDeoCx_oWUuRzRzImlIyN-Ho2e6eqBqYWNKnfow=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We just moved here to the neighbourhood, and have been “camping” in our new home while we wait for the truck to arrive with most of our stuff (including our coffee machine…).

Over the last few days we have already enjoyed some of the grilled paninis for breakfast and lunch, which are fully loaded, sizeable and very delicious.

Haven’t had a chance to sit in yet, but the atmosphere is great.

Glad to have this cozy corner coffee nearby!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Gerrit van Rensburg","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJ4WTTgEjSQukmbjBtP62w3iBMBayoaSqVEvR0Kf729iaQfrr-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super beautiful park. Picnic tables close to running streams and under tree cover or shade and some protection from rain.
The trails and bridges are really nice with great views of the running streams and small falls.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMH8INO5c4-vggYe17HoAQl4XRvkgwiHmCSAGqx&fid=0x0:0x53c9dd48c2d2eae8"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"Deependra Tomar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXc60cDz3TNdq98ZipDNo1XcS5r2ZtFYgprko8OpTL3736m-cWjNg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Spanning over 400 hectares, Kanaka Creek Regional Park is a wilderness haven located along 12 kilometers of Kanaka Creek in Maple Ridge, British Columbia. Established to protect the unique ecosystems and wildlife of the area, the park provides a tranquil escape for visitors seeking outdoor recreation and nature appreciation.
The park is divided into four main sections:
* Fraser Riverfront: This section offers scenic views of the Fraser River and features accessible washrooms and picnic tables.
* Lower Reach & Fish Fence: Here, you can observe the fish fence, which plays a crucial role in monitoring and enhancing chum, coho, and pink salmon populations.
* Mid Reach & Cliff Falls: This section is a popular destination for picnics and relaxation. Cliff Falls, a spectacular canyon carved by the creek, is the centerpiece of this area.
* Upper Reach & Hatchery: Explore the interpretive center at the Bell-Irving Hatchery and learn about salmonid enhancement programs.
Kanaka Creek Regional Park offers a variety of activities for visitors to enjoy, including hiking, biking, fishing, and bird watching. The park is also home to a diverse range of plant and animal life, making it a perfect place to connect with nature.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7QR63o4deDIO1g5QLjtqYeJVEVL_itU2IkK8y&fid=0x0:0x53c9dd48c2d2eae8"],"When":"2024-7-12"},{"Name":"Nihit Malhotra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXfeHWYeDGkDTZNd33AgDsCmLoJ4NSwzG1vpopgAV9OU-hgspcS7Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Peaceful Park with Scenic Trails

Kanaka Creek Regional Park is a lovely spot with some good trails, perfect for a peaceful day outdoors. Parking is a bit limited, so plan accordingly. It's a great place for picnics, with plenty of spots to sit beside the flowing creek and take in the serene surroundings. The trail to the falls is only about a kilometer, but honestly, the falls themselves aren't particularly impressive—if you're coming just for the falls, it might not be worth the trip.

That said, the trail along the creek is definitely worth the walk. It has some steep inclines, so it's not stroller-friendly, but the scenery more than makes up for it. You can easily spend a few hours here, enjoying the quiet, sitting by the water, or even dipping your feet in the creek. A nice spot to relax and unwind.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCycvGpZZ9IfzCB6ge1YwWL1si4Cmrja-Q4Gov&fid=0x0:0x53c9dd48c2d2eae8"],"When":"2024-9-4"},{"Name":"Helena","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLiYVJyd2ntFwLRumbYS9Kznuj6jXHoPn0UkQ_zdJDM29rWiQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A well-maintained Park for adventure. I was interested in the Bell Irving Hatchery. Glad to see hundreds of thousand salmon fry have been reared here. Learning more from the Kanaka Creek Watershed Stewardship Center. Great work! I’ll be back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOd2SGwK3WDk1dAdGwbnQfjoUfL3r_07R-PK-Bp&fid=0x0:0x53c9dd48c2d2eae8"],"When":"2024-6-28"},{"Name":"Chris L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIlo27yi0c3tMg1MEFW8gltVROJwlBrQGtk927fnMS7KkAAA0UJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went for a walk with the dog, gf and my mom here. Absolutely beautiful spot with alot of history! So many picnic tables and spots to stop and enjoy the view. The trails are well taken care of. Friendly people out there walking there dogs etc. Loads of parking. I enjoyed the bridge and the look out spots. Too cool. Looking for a good spot to check out some scenery.....this is it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNp-0rpmA_j1KKtCnctRs0htY7mhkQGUYrEJq3u&fid=0x0:0x53c9dd48c2d2eae8"],"When":"2023-5-5"},{"Name":"J. F","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUvnPrghjIIxyliVLQ5qdXC_aHHLxKWdRLtv7_c0XpUi4UfZmBiFQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great little park with a  creak running through it!  Nice old growth Trees and shade. Has pit toilets to use the washroom and free parking. The creek is easy to explore and very pretty!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOpzr-Vo-wKjvFCX4jKBDUiij-la4NWcc40Oo3x&fid=0x0:0x53c9dd48c2d2eae8"],"When":"2023-8-5"},{"Name":"Patrice Damico","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWjAfE8onCXZsWmnW9w_zvpyiMunHPXXLqQyfdyfWp-3ev2r4Im=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Loop trail beside the river is easy for almost anyone. Sometimes great things to photograph too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN--_3Yc_oy7SIAszjSafIvk043f3o-Btj3Db9Z&fid=0x0:0x53c9dd48c2d2eae8"],"When":"2024-12-3"},{"Name":"Tracey Huffman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVBwg14S4OvEKEJxR5zxVu4-POwTW7SwmTgt1_ga7n0rOSnw72D=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I grew up in the area ,so bringing my son now that he’s grown up and the dogs to a favourite spot of mine for a walk is so amazing! We brought our dogs and they loved it too! Check it out! It’s very peaceful , and across the street is a beautiful trail we have walked along also and got some amazing photos!! Check out one of my go to places to get away and listen to the water and the birds.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFMgOQMQzLCJWUd5MVP0QwaqqNdNdTwvgzdc1Q&fid=0x0:0x53c9dd48c2d2eae8"],"When":"2022-4-18"}]

[{"Name":"Eddie Sinclair","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKFqrOBhvuoQvDKegqV98iONkVz1P1ICuxXi-xbGYGDugEYag=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pizza was great! $13 medium for unlimited toppings, you can't go wrong. The lady was nice at the till. Good atmosphere. Great place to eat","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Glenn Nichols","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKeqUSNHgx1xqgJZ9eczbcpKYLmcpGp9zghEQ1buEH2ud9m3Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Picked up my two pizza order and brought home only to find that they had added feta to the wrong pizza.  The one with feta had onions to which the person who likes feta is allergic and the others can't tolerate. I called to complain only to be offered an apology being told that was all she could offer.  I asked for a manager and got the assistant who offered 10% off the next order.  I said one of the two pizzas I paid for is not going to be eaten so how is 10% fair?  After a bit she offered 20%.  I told her that was hardly fair either.  She asked to call me back in 5 minutes which she did and said that she could give 50% off the next order. So basically grudgingly they offered to compensate me for the pizza that was being thrown in the garbage as long as I give them more business.  Needless to say that will never happen and hopefully this review serves as a warning to others to avoid this store as they have no sense of customer service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Arin Nagpal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJsZfiRXlZBm0uAkOOM3ZY2XdfxKUL0zf9ccTu0XUIvWzOW=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The service and pizza was really good!!
I’ve tried their half vegetarian feast and half butter chicken pizza.it was served by Mahdi and Amir.
They were really wonderful!!✨","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcnwx1PECoPjV6Zjh4B_EoQe_V4Cf4ekB3OR4&fid=0x0:0x8df607844e6b55c7"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"mohit bhardwaj","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX1LTkRMS95xM35JF-5i2ZPndhQU9e76EzFg8Vha-vL2ZjTd5vk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It’s my bday today and jass made the best pizza 🍕 I ever ate wow # 7 stars","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOjX2iBY6JxIXdn6eMgpSwwTf6QOLPBfFrQP2Q8&fid=0x0:0x8df607844e6b55c7"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"Hardeep Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKHhNzcEafRHiFjOi28J9NqQtJMOFd5BELZ8CANk1P2xoepB2M=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good food and employees. I highly recommend them for anyone looking for a delicious meal and exceptional delivery service!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Parmida Moayer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU5u1Je-UpkcBRcNYL9tIPnov3Ya5ViyAs0XL3_JFR7eNPGLbsu=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"THIS IS GOING TO SHOCK SOME PEOPLE...

Going over to this branch for the first time and i was given more than what I've asked for. The promotions are good and the staff/ management actually care about the customer's satisfaction more than money or inventory. I was given extra sauce... and overall the store and kitchen is clean too!

These people do good work, treat them (like everybody) with kindness, they really deserve it! Yes the pizza was delicious","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Eduard Novikov","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJL98rjO3Kq1FDDl3Eq1FDDp10IPiGeI2amJQdN-mEQSAxLSKg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This is the burger I received last weekend. It was a mushroom swiss, which is generally a pretty messy burger, but this one was ridiculous. The grease was leaking through the wrapper and into the bag, and for some reason there seemed to be half a bottle of mayo on the burger. The fries were also ice cold.

I used to be a regular here because I work nearby, but the quality has been steadily getting worse over the last several months. Now it seems that the food is always cold, the portions are smaller, the staff less trained, and the prices higher. I will be finding somewhere else to go on my lunch breaks from now on.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqKlwpSOoDA4RUD-MmCreb_aQ7GU589pex1gaG&fid=0x0:0x2b90d77af75bd8e0"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Harley6.0","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0YNA_cDN710Z97fGmqku50-ldR6ud9yUGAGn-J2qr6tKKC85x=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Honestly pathetic. Took a while to get this “fast food” After finding a clean ish table with no sauces, dirt, or left over food on it.
The wrap was just the cherry on top of this 13$ expirience of people sleeping in a booth with an just awful chicken strip in it the wrap. Most dissapointing Dairy Queen experience ive ever had unfortunately.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP7M9wlOfRX9Sb_s9d3Tuesa8RcSvWzz7vpTcnt&fid=0x0:0x2b90d77af75bd8e0"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"Austin Bruce","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVDgSP-CiGZQU9IbF1EyZSoCamWWJ5gFcKGeQSrPhlIPNKeP-wQOg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Update: This review is now nearly 6 months old and may or may not reflect the current situation at this location. Please read with that in mind.

Preface: I tried to submit this complaint privately through their website 'contact us' page, however their feedback form only throws errors.

The manager or owner put up a sign stating that they wouldn't be accepting expired coupons anymore. That's fine, and totally fair. What isn't fine OR fair is that the sign subsequently blamed that change on a minimum wage increase, and suggested that the store wasn't profitable with the new wages. That's the work of a really, really bad leader. Simultaneously throwing employees under the bus to customers ("don't be mad at me, the one who should be accountable for this decision, be mad at my minimum wage employees!") while also announcing your resentment over being forced to pay minimum wage to your staff? That's really upsetting. Can you imagine being an employee and knowing your boss doesn't even think you're worth minimum wage? How awful for employee morale and retention. I can tell you for certain that, if I worked there and saw that, my motivation to work hard would disappear.

Shame on the manager/owner who posted that sign. Seriously. The minimum wage workers are the only reason you HAVE a business. You owe ANY success you have to them, not the other way around.

As for the staff we interacted with, they were all lovely people who were absolutely doing their best while crazy busy and understaffed. I have only positive things to say about the staff. They were far better than the manager of this location deserves.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPE7Rz5onbSbt9Q8K2tSwwLssMmrjwnGLdxmNEE&fid=0x0:0x2b90d77af75bd8e0"],"When":"2024-6-22"},{"Name":"Chris L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIlo27yi0c3tMg1MEFW8gltVROJwlBrQGtk927fnMS7KkAAA0UJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The famjam came here for a cool treat, which was perfect with the warm weather. We made our order and sat down, they even brought our food to our table. Service was great. The parking lot is hard to get out of when the drive thru is busy. Inside was almost empty when we went in. I had a cookie dough Blizzard (omg so good).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJMllTBX2ulIOgJdgP8s34WMwHDYlMsGnmDgA0&fid=0x0:0x2b90d77af75bd8e0"],"When":"2023-5-8"},{"Name":"Kevin R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLmk-hZYkAC3ARtrGA73ogA4rgOZmGYmt45F4aYD05VWT0tTw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Power was out at the West Ridge location, so gave this one a try.
I love DQ, but the South Asian Employee with the floppy hair made me cringe. "Working" in the food prep area(more like hanging out), then grabs his cell phone and scans it at the register. Then works a little drive thru and saunters back to the food prep area...cell phone in hand. Zero washing.
Not sure about you, but disgusting cell phones should be nowhere near food prep.
Will not be back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dr Yogi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK-qq8x0Qpi21fE63UXCn-27tpi-1gl3b-ffJjg0qAkEHiuWA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I wish they could be more selective when hiring people or train them better to get our orders correctly. Furthermore, one of the burgers came with a chunk of black rotten lettuce which shows poor quality control or perhaps they simply don't care. It was disgusting. Will never buy food there again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"jeremy dagg","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJor96dIwG_6DENW0Tt8PHMgX7LeLzmpwvKxe61z4kkrju_rQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"As a long-time Maple Ridge resident, I always enjoyed seeing how our local businesses hire local and young workers. It has been a few months since being here last, but I was surprised that there is a new owner and looks to have hired non Maple Ridge residents. Our youth have lost an opportunity of employment for corporate greed and government handouts. I'll be boycotting both Maple Ridge locations as I do with Tim Hortons. As a parent with 3 kids, I now see less opportunity for Canadians to find starter jobs to gain that experience they need. This location was great for local youth, and now there is only 1 person left, and I would give her 5 stars for her service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brett B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZMFBVQKBh4r7pfh4pwoYOtzSGxo0peBMhqMuuYHS1DWnTB7fR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Order 4 strips basket. These are the 4 strips I get. A small amount of fries. My wife ordered a "basket" of fries and she has maybe 8 fries more than I do. Didn't get our gravies. I bet you guys are just sitting there laughing at us right now aren't you. Who cares about what people pay for just give them whatever and send it out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfgYV0Vhyq3EQ7GM24Bmb988idf9UBBAerEXW-&fid=0x0:0x2b90d77af75bd8e0"],"When":"2024-1-20"}]

[{"Name":"The Shady Brunch","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW8EOrLQeiKlDFB7Fyh1o5H_EKBM54NMsfuxnC9Hv60Y3U8AUwV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious sushi! Great selection of celiac friendly gluten free sushi with knowledgeable friendly staff. Had the real crab roll, nigiri and a beef teriyaki bowl.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOPemkyyeeumBn5_eIa0bobchkeB9Hrsrc4QjxQ&fid=0x0:0x854248a203d40567"],"When":"2024-1-6"},{"Name":"RodrigoBastias - com","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBaYHv73axw2dBELdUSyVhaOsWZf52m46YXdlOxSdSaesDAtS-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Convenient prices, great location but very simple. 'That simple' that they forgot to include napkins on my take away order.

Second time here.. and I ordered online with more than 45min of anticipation, when I arrived to pick up my order, it was not ready and I had to wait another 15min...

OMG!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPA455SPmVH1fx7zUz1WSQQlGbD7AlYnT1e4Ldw&fid=0x0:0x854248a203d40567"],"When":"2020-4-24"},{"Name":"Gagan Dhillon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIs-COZWzYAhyE3c3wLbZszwLUK2k00necha5IOrNjTTF9wx5k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been coming to Wasabi Sushi for 5+ years, dine in and takeout. Amazing food, great service, and friendly staff. Extensive Gluten Free menu, including appetizers, rolls, and Donburi.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kim Hartley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIp5wbem_3UtimrikQTGr5a1s7pUdK_RnXOoSfCM1rQb4SjLw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Hate seafood...of any kind. So I ordered cucumber and avocado rolls but yuk!!  The Maki smelled and tasted so much like fish  just the smell of it made me sick to my stomach. Cudnt have the plate near me. Made me gag.  Very expensive and terrible wud not recommend to anyone!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Victoria","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLA-wCwvD1o24s9mPzDCihF9bmK17CQwGWyrjwWLEuRetyTew=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As someone who must eat gluten free, I have never been let down by Wasabi Sushi. They prepare quality food, while ensuring proper care to avoid cross contamination. As a celiac, this care is so appreciated, and I could not recommend this establishment enough!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cteam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUfKkRve9qxJxv0yqACW-PISSBPYpQI1WHcOUjIO17B7RnjA05Mpg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We've been coming to this restaurant for the past 2 years since moving to Maple Ridge for take out and dine in.
My husband loves getting the udon here. I am not an udon fan but I enjoy it here.
Food is always good. Staff is friendly.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Marguerite Pear","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWqiuQw8_O9eMY2GG0eJ044QNWUImQEPbxWEKM24ZQNX0K4h65Eqw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely people running Wasabi Sushi. We came by 15 minutes before closing tonight hoping for a couple GF quick rolls. We asked if this could be done and was greeting with a smile "yes please come in".

We ordered 4 rolls that most places don't offer GF.  Was a treat for my daughter.  The rolls were delicious and large, at reasonable price.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPSAo3NZV4UfwSq0OzPwghCnxPkfqXCq6Qyi9Q2&fid=0x0:0x854248a203d40567"],"When":"2022-11-25"},{"Name":"Patrick Laplante","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWEQ6rmzYgqU18BgeUeFbN3j9UzTXOfNOAqOLvy-TwFRIxBth-Q7g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We live in Surrey and make the drive out to Maple Ridge every time we are craving sushi. My wife and I are sushi lovers and know when we have found an establishment that is fresh and that takes care of the presentation and overall experience. Wasabi Sushi and Grill is extremely highly rated in our books. Thank you to all the staff for making our little date nights special and delicious!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNo3JghOdyyto-CbPn4mjLthhaJzlTBcYa9c29a&fid=0x0:0x854248a203d40567"],"When":"2020-1-19"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Pasha Balitsky","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXZ-y2LR47XKS9yo9LnyA4Tfh99gR1395NdzqCVY_ptH72WsrbO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"These sushi rolls were both massive and incredibly delicious! Each roll packed full of fresh ingredients and vibrant flavors. The portion sizes were very generous, ensuring that you get a satisfying meal. Every bite was a delightful mix of textures and tastes, making it hard to choose a favorite. If you're looking for big, flavorful sushi that won't disappoint, this place is definitely worth a visit!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQtnhwJftDULZv6mAuEIUYQmuC-t_dtcZl7bUQ&fid=0x0:0xed337e845351b1b"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"Shop Titan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6MvD1E8j5t4I09rgS6LHYLyCom0ljYR3ihDXzH9curRxCbMdP=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best sushi place ever! The price is super reasonable and great amount of food! Quality and quantity both are incredible! Their service is alright but we go there because of their sushi!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Renata Steele Vancouver / Kelowna area (Realtor Vancouver BC)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVY5AYokNodhccb7bLk1A7kSxqiXee9yFcQzGTeTsQYbtPKFk2s-rk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were excited to try the restaurant after reading all of the great reviews and were were even more impressed then we expected. The staff were all very friendly, they have a great menu selection. The food came quickly. The salsa were fresh and delicious. The sushi rolls were big and amazing. The tempura was lightly bartered and hot. Everything was perfect. The only thing we were a little disappointed about was that the bathroom was dirty. We are looking forward to coming back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKLOptC4I2B0tnwmHsNHoXW_U8Wl1_sFR4erW_&fid=0x0:0xed337e845351b1b"],"When":"2021-11-21"},{"Name":"Michelle V","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLrIynFOn0ZS4ZC9W_rODZYr1I_eRpDKOMhJmTsUnFlq0sRsA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Delicious! I have my usual spot but my friend wanted to go here. The food was delicious, fresh and large portions. We had the chicken teriyaki box and a couple rolls. Crispy roll and a mango roll  yumm! Will definitely be going back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPBTzenKWqeFwowwt6hlViDKdR4xT9hzTR5ypYR&fid=0x0:0xed337e845351b1b"],"When":"2023-12-12"},{"Name":"Prachi Bansal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL4PaxumqRqlFj7Spp_3xYIhHFyKN_knTm0o3NMKFM360WHGw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I went to this restaurant for first time today. Was really excited but the way everything turned out was disappointing. We ordered chicken and prawn and specifically mentioned not to deep fry but still when we received it, it was deep fried. The server was pretty polite with us and took away the food and asked to get us a fresh one. But when food came we realised, it was same chicken they served, they just removed the skin and served us. We were super annoyed, and wanted to leave without eating. We expected them not to charge us for the items we didn’t even touch but we ended up paying for it, coz according to their owner they had to make it twice. Didn’t make any sense to me. Never going back!!!!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Glen Kelleway (Canadian-Mortgage-Geek)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUdWsl-3P5-r9XgsA_L8mCOAlI71_fKKkbnnT2WwV4u3vwKfILMjQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Second time this year I've been to this local restaurant, the food is always consistently good albeit this time at lunch they were short staffed. Normally would give them a higher mark on staff...

Doc Livingston, local realtor and I had a meeting and arrived right at 12:00 and stayed till about 1:30. Right in the middle of the lunch rush. It gets quite busy in there and it was fairly noisy. If I knew it was going to be that busy I would have delayed lunch till 1:00... by 1:30 The place was almost empty. Yes a huge lunch rush kudos to the restaurant for their consistent good food and fair prices.

Both of us had the bento boxes.   My order was spicy salmon. I eliminated the tempura bringing the price down on the bento box by a small amount and had them bring me appetizer or side a sizable Gomei.  Doc had the Sashimi bento box and asked for extra ginger which they supplied quickly.

We had tea, although alcoholic beverages are probably available I didn't check. I would ask them next time to bring a teapot to the table if they have them. They seems they brew them and bring a carafe around and top up people's tea. Great when they are adequately staffed.  This lunch time when we were there midweek they were short-staffed. My food was delayed, but it went arrived it was to the standard I was used to. Note to the manager they adjusted the order and bought us an extra dish that we had not asked for as a sampler and a gratitude for the wait.

This restaurant does a huge takeout business... So if you're looking for takeout sushi in the Maple Ridge area, consider this place as they have three tables to place the takeout orders on near the front door.

The atmosphere there is definitely in need of a update. It is not a fancy Japanese style restaurant. There are others in Maple Ridge that have significantly better atmosphere. I go here because the food is usually a five-star every time. If you're looking for a nice decor, fancy restaurant you'll need to choose another one. If you're looking for good food at a fair price, and usually excellent service, this would be a place to go! Located centrally in Maple Ridge... Easy to get to.

Will I go there again, Yes!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7ExN2fi_5LlMpQnc-XpySAAA9L1yfUrbBIwKm&fid=0x0:0xed337e845351b1b"],"When":"2023-12-14"},{"Name":"Ashley Olson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWr_Bg75PDCyTzi7xr-R6hCQM2UnTwY5BQyFba1jmuk5T6zCAwv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They're so kind here very friendly
Always treat us well
We dine in weekly
Most of the time we get
veggie sonomono
ebi sonomono
2 deep fried and spicy California rolls
Regular California roll
Dynamite roll
And if we go in the afternoons or early dinner  we get the love boat for 2

It comes with
2 miso soup
2 sonamono
Chicken teriyaki or beef teriyaki
Mixed tempura
An assortment of nigiri and sashimi
Great options for kids meals
if the kids are picky there's always chicken nugget fries and rice","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMTYhF7NcNuPoQwK1OX9oF-AodaOqcVu8HZidnR&fid=0x0:0xed337e845351b1b"],"When":"2024-4-5"},{"Name":"Cam McCulloch","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJs_BbVWcpUUKI9dfnPpiFEmZLWaiLqGH5tp_lcnX4ECfVvGQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Please don't put yakibsoba in a reg sushi container. Made a big mesh of my car. Otherwise very good!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMfFXq9EHX38sYd4lmNVyen5_FbR2JCWMO1sqRK&fid=0x0:0xed337e845351b1b"],"When":"2024-8-2"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jass Aulakh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWbmM1j7u9yJwNXmQgnt0buVXOXW87adMfL7iNW6izsr0fEFNTy=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A Slice Above 👆🏻
Andiamo’s Pizza

If you're on the hunt for exceptional pizza, look no further than Andiamo’s. I recently indulged in three of their pizzas, and each one was a testament to their culinary expertise. The pizzas were not only delicious but also had a delightful melt-in-your-mouth quality that speaks to the care and quality of their ingredients.

The atmosphere at Andiamo’s is equally impressive. The restaurant is clean and well-maintained, reflecting a strong commitment to hygiene and customer satisfaction. Whether you're a local or just passing through, I highly recommend visiting Andiamo’s for an unforgettable pizza experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOvFGwaJ6uD8jz60x_yAy2R_yPD1VniOFC-I96u&fid=0x0:0xc8d4236b2754cc49"],"When":"2024-7-27"},{"Name":"George Coupland","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzexTD97DVmEnAG3tKPMwmiKmCIZZIWriICj0VZoeP3VwSFEI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I had heard that  Andiamos Pizza had been purchased by GM restaurant. I was hoping that the GM quality would have seeped over to the pizza but alas no.
I ordered the Andiamos Special and an Alfredo Chicken Pizza. The Andiamos Special didn’t look anything like the picture on their website. I have added a picture of the one on their website along with the actual pizza I received. It was supposed to have shrimp on it, there wasn’t any shrimp on it and it was terribly salty. The Alfredo was also horribly salty.
The one positive I will add is that the woman who served me was very friendly and pleasant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_SYugk5LvqdIoqEhJWlQx-EnqQy7LmZZaFboA&fid=0x0:0xc8d4236b2754cc49"],"When":"2024-7-25"},{"Name":"Sandi Maki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocItcaOKChuKmNvsvgz0cE7d6pyM9VQI0z2jx3OQNSSC9ZQP-Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We have been ordering from Andiamos for a long time and it was always good. Last time we ordered the pizza was disgusting and we ended up throwing it out. They use canned mushrooms not fresh, what they do to hide the lack of toppings they hide it under the cheese and the toppings are not cooked. When we called to complain they offered us a free pizza next time we ordered, Called a few months later to be told we waited to long and they would not honor their promise. Made all kinds of excuses. Needless to say we will never order from them again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ryan Ballinger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLD5a3B3-Ecgk2kT0trv96SQZurGDkcaK_Ugv4coToqzr4J1g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered three of their specialty pizzas and they were loaded with cheese and toppings. When I picked them up, I was greeted by a very friendly lady, and my pizzas were nice and hot. They were delicious. Highly recommend.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Elaine Payne","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLi-cZ79vVwFEPuZ0jB7xl3YujoVxBK2BTnin4mf8s3bdVAog=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Not a complaint but information I wish I had known so I hadn't ordered. The lasagna was a good size portion with a good layer of cheese and a piece of garlic toast. BUT, though it looked like a classic lasagna, the flavours weren't Italian and it had some spice to it. I didn't enjoy it and only ate a little. We both were very disappointed. I'll have to try to mix it with pasta sauce and Italian seasonings to see if I can save it.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cootsy Collins","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWXW7yU3MWvosAkJw22U9GvyXMv8HmPeuotrpOwu1E1X3C0dbI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Got the baked lasagna with meat sauce & was not disappointed. Reminds me of the place I’d get pasta from back home. My only complaint is that I might gain back some of the weight I lost lol. And lucky for me, I just found my new pasta place & it’s near my work. Thank you so much for the amazing dinner & awesome service. I’ll be seeing you guys soon!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brandon Nagy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU5geYbrbW68XZnK-xVVCQbMsaaLeInjrHXcusvGMOmVsZcXLQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We tried 10 pizza places in maple ridge and all agreed this one was the best so far! Soo much cheese. The large pizzas must weigh like 8-10lbs.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nigel Taylor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJRcTfPJfWRiLcIzFsLQorBBJTnv5z6Li3pJEBTa1z8BoCjrQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We go here for a great lasagne. Give the super-helpful crew a short heads-up and you can easily make "additions"!  Our favourite is the meaty tomato sauce with our chosen plusses of mushrooms, spinach and a pinch of chilli flakes. Large servings and garlic bread too. You won't be disappointed 👍👍","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Shweta Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXtnc5g-DhlNFKBuVm-Ri3EJhNR7eysyJfm0HrPZFoOOsluh9pj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Yummy! We love grabbing dinner from here for date night and having a little picnic beside the river next to the store. But you could easily sit inside as well. It's a small, cozy little place that's kept clean.\nWe got the half\u0026half chicken. If you get sides with it, you could easily feed a family of 4. My husband likes the sweet flavors and I enjoy spicy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNsKojRgMaIIBVNY7PaqCL1qEXbbKBJb8M3FzmZ\u0026fid=0x0:0x80987340ad104b5d"],"When":"2024-8-13"},{"Name":"Rolando_ Rose","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIQBfjayv2V3eqQ6nmwU1uOEqgsWCG5VdwRxO3uXCF1EsXQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Literally a hidden gem! Ordered a family krunch and it did not disappoint! If you’re craving for that umami yummy flavors, this is the place to go, or you can place your order through food delivery platforms. This is a small shop located in Osprey Village, Pitt Meadows. Near by the park and river. Few street parking spots, but there is ample parking nearby. Absolutely recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTtS_RpavQIVVMQ2R6RQvuhz9coWXIx1B6MXI\u0026fid=0x0:0x80987340ad104b5d"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Ben","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLUPgdSyWZ3aTWwwnESZaSRJf8t_y_oBRQlEfjK-SB4dJfKj64=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I saw great reviews, so I ordered takeout and had it at home. It was delicious. It would have been even better if they had bone - in chicken as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMr5ueVgM8RPokAl-VT3AG0G2XbcPf2wgrMs7sm\u0026fid=0x0:0x80987340ad104b5d"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"Malcolm Gray","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXh4yzyylSClLeWhPoF4GqgdScsO4v9CLr2CKeg4lUP5KuS32x_Fg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped for lunch on a bike ride on the long weekend. Service was a little slow with a new guy, but the chicken and waffle were worth the wait. Perfect indulgence and a good deal as well","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNf857WlWkUTeLx8kcFjnKeTtdYRwLmpcg72Iwf\u0026fid=0x0:0x80987340ad104b5d"],"When":"2024-9-5"},{"Name":"Rosario","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgGDUvVq0LHcDsGYS5Ajsq7op3PSBcKer8I_HtMpU1JHJRocg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Order off uber eats , foood is really good and still crunchy and hot , they were out of waffles for the combo but the gave me dumplings instead which is fine cause I love dumplings, I will order again from here :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPd1q_9plC8Ac2HdGuaVrFiDxv__S1t5H6NHGJT\u0026fid=0x0:0x80987340ad104b5d"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"Danny T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJRd3aS995IqqF_7Ys6VB8UCHMhDOHP8XFCzJFjYcXUNf7gnQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow the best sweet and spicy chicken with sticky rice. The owner added waffles as a surprise, wow, highly recommended this to everyone.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPbstvA7NvUgqbJawo5AFUbmrxVIZ-7ZWWyBjYI\u0026fid=0x0:0x80987340ad104b5d"],"When":"2024-10-2"},{"Name":"Harp Cheema","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKTLq2MVvuqO9mtCeZqvbJIqu0ne2b1Fs_eI3NTn1QdbfJUAQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was great! Will definitely be back to try the spicer flavors. Super crispy and not greasy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNYdajV1eok5geYcAInaEKQdug4FVgoJ2ynHlRH\u0026fid=0x0:0x80987340ad104b5d"],"When":"2024-8-5"},{"Name":"Madison G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVtZsEld-Yz5a2Swm5LesjF83lo03ZXPGgujeQvQiLn6WLaIuGx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Oh my goodness! I loved the chicken here. The customer service was so friendly and they had lots of choices to choose from.  We did the HALF order of Sweet \u0026 Spicy fried chicken and the portion was huge ! We also ordered fries which reminded us of our favourite fries from Costco ! So yummy! Everything is made fresh after you order it so be prepared to wait 10-15 mins. ( definitely worth the wait ) They had so many options and so many flavours I can’t wait to come back to try more. So delicious","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMzuy5hFH7JRE0PBJajiinmWoATKDBHsxUhdg_2\u0026fid=0x0:0x80987340ad104b5d"],"When":"2023-2-28"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Rolando_ Rose","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIQBfjayv2V3eqQ6nmwU1uOEqgsWCG5VdwRxO3uXCF1EsXQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered Lamb Biryani and it was delicious! Meat was properly seasoned and very tender. Price is very reasonable and the flavour was outstanding!!! I didn’t have to add salt and pepper as the dish was perfectly seasoned, and it wasn’t greasy at all. Located in Meadow Ridge Shopping Centre, easy to find and very accessible to both Lougheed Highway & 207 Street or Dewdney Trunk Road & 207 Street. A hidden gem if you’re craving for authentic and flavourful Indian food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMyfD5OT3HPfceWcdC3NC1_-uWwZ70n_fREjec&fid=0x0:0x5dc3122565fa06d5"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"J T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLXEjN5JGe3Mrw7txzZNbJPQzEJpLs8Rpa82nsQC7v0x9esng=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"HANDS DOWN , the best Indian food in Maple Ridge !!
Food is always fresh, DELICIOUS ( so much flavour!!!) and their prices are the best in town. We have been ordering from them for YEARS ( I can't believe this is the first time I'm writing a review :(
My partner and I stopped in for lunch last weekend and the service and atmosphere was lovely - not to mention we were both stuffed for $20 ( plus a good tip of course :) !!!
The server was GENUINELY pleased to hear that we loved the food - it's nice to see an establishment take pride in serving nothing but the best quality and taste  ( this rarely happens anymore).

I was also pleasantly surprised at their inexpensive lunch special prices !  ( although I shouldn't be surprised as they have excellent prices for all their menu items).
If you haven't tried their food and are a fan of Indian Cuisine, you must check them out!
You won't be disappointed.
Maple Leaf is truly a hidden gem !","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jaydeep Patel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBXLByJSfdj2nIcvUyl_WMvvevCVtJDF5tLCYak7E_L25sxLA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Maple Leaf Indian Cuisine in Maple Ridge is a hidden gem for anyone craving authentic Indian flavors. The food here is absolutely incredible—fresh, clean, and homemade, with spices that truly capture the essence of India. Each dish bursts with flavor, and the curries are a must-try!

On top of the amazing food, the service is top-notch. I’d especially like to commend Rushi Patel for providing exceptional service. Their attention to detail and friendly demeanor made our dining experience even more enjoyable.

Highly recommend this place for anyone looking for quality Indian cuisine and excellent service!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"GURNOOR DHALIWAL","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUyrwXokaVNx8XD-mGLglp7fNN6Y-6xMUXfgN_AE1q_FhLUVtA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"a week ago
New
Dine in  |  Dinner  |  $20–30
The restaurant had amazing food with dishes that offer so many flavours and spices. The service was over the top and very quick. Their staff is so friendly and welcoming. Overall, I had a great dining experience and I would recommend going here as it is a underrated restaurant!
Food: 5/5  |  Service: 5/5  |  Atmosphere","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Subhasis Raha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVhqQcflaEV8J43jv0eINDNNISH1YnNgulBQF-ey0oyVoWLyYyz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently took their dinner service for my son's first rice ceremony , it was absolutely great!! Excellent food , excellent ambience , excellent service , reasonable price!!  The food were enjoyed by my Indian , Canadian , Pakistani friends a lot and even they were so pleased ; they are also going to refer them to their communities.

I would like to thank Lavpreet and his crew to provide the superb service and hospitality.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"David Paton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZT6rhi-slGGqr3OeTtzYjdXIuZhmWQ7i8LsbmbFMrtbGDE0IJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was delicious, and got to us quickly. We sat down, ordered and ate all within half an hour.
Amrit was a great host. Very polite.
Will definitely be back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sue W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_PBDPStKirRvKGpUjtU2HGTN6XlGhzRPXtWXuYlY8saFqNqVa6g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pleasant staff. Prompt service.
Delicious food - I ordered the gluten free lunch box - it included gluten free naan and samosa!!!
Enjoyed it so much we ordered 2 more meals to bring to our friends!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"John Rachinski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQPizgKV4k6qSx1KXcBhJaLyQbc5ZNHoQM6QwC2JtwZe1T824=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time coming here   And  the food is so good. 😋 will be going back.  Price is responsible.
Staff are friendly and polite.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Natasha Fairweather","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBwqx0HIQY8WD9R5s-_c-R2N7C-rOceCAPnELP-NaBrqdfS2Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"As far as I can tell, this is a ghost kitchen for another restaurant at the same location. The servings were small, two of four items were incorrect, and the quality was not up to the price. My chicken Caesar salad was very small for the price and missing the chicken, and since this is a ghost kitchen, there is no way to contact them and work it out.\n\nThe gravy was delicious, the cheese curds were real, and the fried pickles were quite yummy, with good sauces.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPFugLEiHfHPGd7Kcx00X-rfyR9t0A9ROEVwKEM\u0026fid=0x0:0x4b90353eaf83d955"],"When":"2022-2-21"},{"Name":"Kaylea Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWw1fGMrS0lFaghRaNAip1aTokAepnFnZapgvNW_oEZDclmhz8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Got two of the triple threat and it got to us with literally only the pepperoni. No pulled pork, no bacon on either of them. Didn’t mess up just one but both. What a complete let down. Never again. If I could give zero stars I would.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"ElleVancouver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVQyRLMO7_l5QscpkbP3P7WRW1bAxEQogYsRsF_-K2EALb3QqH6Lw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Gee, don't know of I got lucky or not but I ordered (for delivery too) Beefy Fries and they were really good!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alexander Frech","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ_9Dh55JpLY8Y9XgxFtJ2MdUEN5Sn2Fft-A9J6KTIxmEsQiA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jimmy Chung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzp5FDXfixefSXXhwU3slzPlMr09Os9Fh-EHTWlZXIPqlokuE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Akasaka Japanese Restaurant
