user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Maria Fernanda Guaraná","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU949zWMPKzgd78YIgipV_4PUI5bJb069xY2JNqEIjY4HsjgWnfzQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Recently moved to Pitt Meadows and came across this restaurant online when looking for sushi restaurants nearby. Was very surprised by the food and prices. Me and my boyfriend had dinner there last Friday and the food was DELICIOUS, service was very fast and the atmosphere of a historic house gave us the idea of traditional homemade food which we loved! Their prices are very reasonable! I definitely recommend this place for anyone who love sushi!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNgc1jLdml4fIms8UicIA5u2MTjALS3l6HgCSJw&fid=0x0:0x129aa69be65c7000"],"When":"2024-10-30"},{"Name":"Muh Ruri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkStAcVhSLoWZluIOVQ74c2fLDnRh9SyZ_LHSDWUY1b4U3yJnx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Akasaka in Pitt Meadows offers a delightful Japanese dining experience where presentation and ambiance truly stand out. The restaurant is located in a small, cozy house with a fireplace, providing a very friendly and homely atmosphere. With only 4 to 5 tables, it feels intimate and personal, almost as if you're dining in someone's home. It's assumed that the top floor is residential, which adds to the unique charm of the place.

The presentation of the dishes at Akasaka is nothing short of impressive. Each plate is a work of art, meticulously arranged to please both the eyes and the palate. The vibrant colors and thoughtful garnishes enhance the overall dining experience, making each dish as visually appealing as it is delicious.

The quality of the food at Akasaka matches the high standards set by the restaurant’s ambiance and presentation. The flavors are authentic and fresh, providing a true taste of Japan. However, it’s worth noting that the pricing here is relatively high compared to its contemporaries. Despite this, they do offer a decent lunch special, which provides good value and allows diners to enjoy their exquisite cuisine at a more affordable price.

For those in Pitt Meadows looking for a restaurant that offers great food in a beautiful and cozy setting, Akasaka is the perfect choice. The combination of excellent presentation, a wonderful vibe, and the option of a well-priced lunch special makes it a standout destination for Japanese cuisine","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMAOJQqUztjjNjL7b9XVFYCbwwu28UD6YyzeTT6&fid=0x0:0x129aa69be65c7000"],"When":"2024-5-28"},{"Name":"wah chi yip","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKKBykHMUbkrtJ4cwRRXsjOnAzAcOzwrpq-XVjovUt6A3trFQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A really good atmosphere restaurant.  If you dine in this restaurant, you do feel you are dine at home. The decor of this house is an old farm house.
This house is nice in and out. The service are warmly and friendly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8EWLrhqQs2ewZT_xX3e7Y2UrVc4Nzz2mzA9fq&fid=0x0:0x129aa69be65c7000"],"When":"2024-7-15"},{"Name":"Nova Ember","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocInptqH07SvjBDYreZDili7yUF4N5-8pTdYburZcf75y3-E4w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"First time dined in this restaurant. We were the only customers there but the service was slow. We didn’t get water until we placed the order( it seems like they were waiting us to order before serving us anything)
The portion was surprisingly small for a Chicken Breast Teriyaki $24.95, and we didn't get the ice cream. Nothing stands out for us to return to this restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNWgrt0P3b7Tui0SaNgydWB4ZgoR_DKRpHcw_pO&fid=0x0:0x129aa69be65c7000"],"When":"2024-12-2"},{"Name":"Radical Reviews","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzxgdzIIKP9vqAYzRsir8K2Nid_X0M2c-rfedCHEHaELHzk40=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great sushi and always fresh!! I really like this place. I’ve never actually eaten inside but my wife and I get take out quite often. Their food is really consistent so you always know what you’re going to get. It’s a little bit on the pricey side but I’d rather pay a bit extra and get good quality. It’s about a 10min drive for me and I go past about 6 other sushi places on the way so that tells you it’s worth it. In the photos is a dinner box D, wild sockeye sashimi and salmon avocado roll with cucumber which came to a grand total of $57 after tax.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMC0nbZ-QR7sRuGMnKxalBiSC_PxBKIPvCQ98Lt&fid=0x0:0x129aa69be65c7000"],"When":"2023-1-14"},{"Name":"G W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVG1FFo9GTnRGQNpjln74dhjBn3V4nGRQE_Yjur_OV6HYJsv04F_g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice simple decor, matching Heritage Home.  The food was nicely presented. Pieces are a bit thin. Tempura was Perfect! The sauce was really nice too. I would recommend you take some time to do a good deep House Cleaning.  Your windows are filthy, some half Christmas star pieces stuck still on the glass. Check your pictures and dust control. Or I would have given you a 5. I recommend people try it. Perfect for a quiet date.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"J ason","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLK8lS8cjzF3ZgjIcZyXI7ooB5w1ArRePHhAcera0e4BMQGng=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super cool old house, great food and service highly reccomend","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNudU9k3Gfsg5qJdVn7xZqAIrgUo36V69zHgMgc&fid=0x0:0x129aa69be65c7000"],"When":"2024-7-27"},{"Name":"Kat","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9KU6JHMNV2dJVHVeBb2rvEzltNXWG-yaPrGGgPwOBW0ejMgGu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Definitely the go-to for my entire family for sushi in Pitt. High quality at a reasonable price. The takeout is great but eating in is an experience of it's own. It's at probably one of the oldest houses in Pitt; the Masson house. Service is great and the surroundings are interesting to look at. I can say that I've never been disappointed eating here so yeah, I'm repping the homies.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNc0olQehEexSbrSywuqPbQ0_1P19oYK7USkUg&fid=0x0:0x129aa69be65c7000"],"When":"2018-9-1"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jen Brown","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUIT4ZjvEJ_nCaBqe7fWtYrsC6d0dsqcwlth96meb-UAaVk_EJe=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Rode bikes over to try the new food place in Pitt Meadows. Food is fresh, place is clean and fair prices. I had the best Customer Service experience by Nipun (cashier). He was so friendly and helpful. Knows the menu and was able to give recommendations. Will be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcCcRym2y4HH5Kod0plETUSf1k7ICFw8pCTAfV&fid=0x0:0xddad2273cf242f75"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"Gautam Chauhan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJKIrHftaMcLoy7lh-w-M8IUlSOzf20roQNF6XA7tMCDEmen20=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently dined at Go Grill and had an exceptional experience! The food was fantastic, and the service was top-notch. Our server, Cristina, was attentive and friendly, making sure we had everything we needed throughout the meal. She had great recommendations and made us feel right at home.

The chef, Raju, prepared some of the best dishes I’ve had in a while. The flavors were fresh, perfectly balanced, and everything was cooked to perfection. You can really tell the passion and skill that goes into the food here.

Highly recommend Go Grill for anyone looking for delicious food and excellent service. We'll definitely be back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jeff Grimkowski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIPgPGBYZZc5HzizweI73snfhOql0F3cSkMD29JK-r-yK03KQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"first time going here with my wife and we really enjoyed it. the food is good and the prices are very affordable. I got the burrito bowl with chicken and guacamole and it is delicious. my wife got the garlic chili chicken which she thought was great. I really hope this place stays around because the fresh ingredients at the affordable price make eating healthy very easy.. parking is great when we went at dinner time. overall it was really good and we'll be coming back again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Saar Dvir","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKXGHkbuG2Ma3DU2io3X6uWQ0amHvz1IG2QLFeWhSBm-ndm9VYnQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Had the Mexican bowl.
The beef portion was too small. The meat was chewy. The vegetables portion was very small as well. The Guacamole was only a small tea spoon. The food had no flavor.  And just to put things in perspective: 90% of the bowl consisted of white rice. Flavorless.
Big disappointment.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Deepu Raj","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWj47A1-Z5jXIbT5XRjMaWmxYzLzzY3xYnQpm4Ik-G_M4cwdgRDcw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"New addition to Pitt Meadows airport area. The food taste and quality is very good .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMMl9IvQh0K3AeGOSLHmjutXmy12JjRmiVM6LFj&fid=0x0:0xddad2273cf242f75"],"When":"2024-8-26"},{"Name":"Samantha Garcia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKn4n6HUx6aGkgmuZK23Na9fGd6tB0UD9lumDFqZ1m7SbIT6A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Our first time ordering and unfortunately, our last.

My daughters school had go grill cater a hot lunch and they had a gluten free option for her (she is celiac). She has been talking about it since so we decided to order there tonight as there aren't many local options that will accommodate her.

I spoke to the PAC person and she told me the ginger garlic sauce was gluten free and showed the email from the manager confirming this. I went on the website to order but this sauce doesn't exist in the build your own bowl so I called. During the call, I told the person who answered about our school and gluten free and she confirmed the ginger garlic sauce was the one. I said I would call back with the rest of our order.

Less then 5 minutes later I called back and I said "okay I will get one of those ginger garlic with chicken and rice" then I ordered the rest of our meals. She said ok, it would be ready in 25-30 min. I told her my name and said my husband would be picking up and gave her name. This was not a rushed conversation. She had lots of time to clarify anything.

So my husband went in time to pick it up. He forgot his phone at home. I noticed it was taking super long to come back. When he finally arrived he told me that when he went to pick it up, the lady told him that she knows I wanted gluten free but nothing I ordered was gluten free. He said that was weird but paid anyway and left. He then had to go to a different restaurant to pick up something else for my daughter, spending more money and taking more time.

When he got home and told me, I called back and was told I ordered a different dish. I said if that was the case, and you knew I was ordering gluten free since I just spoke to her and I told them it was me asking about the gluten free, why did she not confirm with me at the moment of ordering instead of waiting for when my husband went to pick up? Even if he had confirmed that was wrong, he would have had to wait for them to remake the dish. It would have made much more sense for everyone if she just confirmed when I ordered instead of not saying anything, especially since I kept saying gluten free. I am not the expert of their menu, they are.

She kept essentially blaming my husband and kept condescendingly saying "I understand" (sounded like this was their training, because it was clear she did not understand). She offered no solutions so I ended the call. She called back and I chose not to answer. In the voicemail, she said she would make it no extra charge and we can go pick it up. But this isn't really a solution since 1. We already paid for the one they made that wasn't gluten free 2. I already spent extra having to get an alternate meal for her 3. It would have taken even more of my time to wait for it to be made and then drive back. Personally, I think they should have offered a refund or a coupon for the cost of the meal at the very be least.

As for the meal we got, those of us could eat it felt it was all just okay. Good value for money. It's a big serving. Had the customer service been good we would have tried again as it is good value for money.

Bad customer service combined with just okay food means we won't be repeat customers.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Erik Ostensen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKQpXi3wqlUgDP12KMcq1OauP6eTj3rkSzpWb3LA9l6F_pUCw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I work in the area and go here for lunch very often. Always fresh, perfectly cooked, and personable service. I also like you remember my order every time =)
Thanks for providing a healthy option for the area.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Christina Gomes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVR0XeP1ln2r2NSQUZ5Wk5de1kur7NBvUAAq1X4kd3xnYnf6IY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Go Grill is a fantastic spot for delicious and customizable food options. Their menu offers a wide variety of fresh ingredients that you can mix and match to create your perfect meal. The concept of choosing your own ingredients and watching your meal being prepared adds a fun and interactive element to the dining experience. The flavors are bold, and the portions are generous, making it a great choice for a satisfying meal. Overall, Go Grill is a must-try for those looking for a tasty and customizable dining experience.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Angela Longo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWY1oq49pKa6hIgCWasLoQyfZXLAxCQ6hu--JV9EUi6xd7-tSw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I can't get enough of this place. I have been here several times already, and every time we leave quite full and satisfied. The last time was on December 1st for our wedding anniversary. We ordered the veggie dinner combo, a side of dynamite rolls, and miso soup. The service is also top-notch. Our server, knowing that we were celebrating our anniversary, gave us a side of their dessert, fried ice cream. That was a nice and appreciated surprise. We will continue to support this establishment because they truly deserve it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkjT_NXLAgVOVK91erIwqsAiEH-WN44tbWSV9-\u0026fid=0x0:0xa4b5f4f236742b2f"],"When":"2024-12-3"},{"Name":"D MC","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKpC7RrSmxTvBQnrycmHk8RaExCMfuDFwhzqbvkpLlK-dzTjg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Sango Sushi is a great sushi restaurant option in Pitt Meadows. I had the lunch nigiri box and the portions are huge! The sushi was fresh and the side dishes were great. I'm not a fan of spring rolls in Japanese restaurants, so I would skip this in the future. For a Korean-run Japanese restaurant, I would definitely return if I'm in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPyL7Q8PFuW644bR6VClu_7G3IAZsX1T7Q-Mod5\u0026fid=0x0:0xa4b5f4f236742b2f"],"When":"2024-6-6"},{"Name":"SUNGHA HONG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJpys9pM2moaIRveDIiFAx3VbojxYKrAH5ZiigfCKg9RTXmDw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing and cozy sushi restaurant in Tri-city!! Easy to access from Coquitlam, Maple Ridge and even Langley as well!! Sushi expert and avengers are here. Owner is using very fresh fishes and vegetables, then kitchen foods are also very awesome 👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJD3F954ByLuPetZRAGrFg5WkKfB5V-Ar8Dxjn\u0026fid=0x0:0xa4b5f4f236742b2f"],"When":"2024-3-10"},{"Name":"VERONICA","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJIGASoyd_KbC_lsYvL_nRHwH7gDa1y7co5Vefue-pGUphByA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I found a new great restaurant! The sashimi was so fresh and the atmosphere was as pretty as a cafe. There was also a room, so I could eat quietly with my family. The taste and atmosphere service were good, too. I will visit again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM5Ztm1d4cglF8Eb560yzRI1DDqqQ1bS_Dj3K2p\u0026fid=0x0:0xa4b5f4f236742b2f"],"When":"2024-3-12"},{"Name":"Elie Amaral","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0qgeTcCD4lRK01GmIPB40Q73bEESOdpgxaOOn1kpjuOoUi2yY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Big lunch… sushi pretty good, home good, sunomono good except for the skinny flat shrimp (better to do a few tiny shrimps, tempura food the yam a bit too greasy and miso soup needed more miso! Overall a7-8 out of 10. A really good deal for $16.50!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNoEaZ9QY8KQrxVhstf-O3SPj1KJcVHB6RmewJh\u0026fid=0x0:0xa4b5f4f236742b2f"],"When":"2024-6-19"},{"Name":"Lloyd Smyth","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJO73zP8fsm01W-SAdN2zsTkTfpqxLYY4H2ASnShCMTC_XL9w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Have been waiting years to be back in Canada to have sushi again and Sango Sushi did not disappoint! Huge menu range for special sushi rolls - the Baked Salmon Roll is an absolute must! Service was attentive, friendly and very fast for our lunch for 9 people. Will be back !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNnUOlt8bwsy7v9DFJe5Z8zm2NbVg9e6Je18lK1\u0026fid=0x0:0xa4b5f4f236742b2f"],"When":"2023-6-22"},{"Name":"Suman Bhandari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLrnk9wt3gtXf77pcTHOn49F7Cf4BXrdzL7G_AYfSWCGcgKJQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a takeout. We liked all except Teriyaki chicken, a lot of cabbage, opted for extra chicken but the portion of chicken too small for extra $4. Rest was awesome. Really enjoyed rest.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOK2NqCWXxTYpjA1nwCHwJ543QJfkwq6rwVihMY\u0026fid=0x0:0xa4b5f4f236742b2f"],"When":"2024-2-25"},{"Name":"Nicole Eslinger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_ZKBs_btQnSWmtdNrE5qyv_ocoi5RfLPyOG3-rjtwIsnyVib-=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sango always delivers amazing quality food, I eat here multiple times a week, either in person or via delivery and I’ve never had a bad experience. But the main reason I always go back is because of the service. Every employee is kind and friendly, the service is quick, and I often am given freebies. Definitely my top choice for not only sushi, but any restaurant in Maple Ridge or Pitt Meadows! :)","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Foamers' Folly Brewing Co.
address: 19221 122a Ave, Pitt Meadows, BC V3Y 2E9
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Onsite services","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Alcohol","enabled":true},{"name":"Beer","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Bar on-site","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Thais Audibert","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmqiVpaZE4jUxQqAYgZclR0jTUQ1hX29eWeQ8HMCKvBpb-Md3Z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"3/5 I loved the atmosphere and the drinks. However, the pizza was disappointing. It was frozen and reheated it up (whatever that’s fine). But it took 30mn to arrive and the taste was bland. I would love to come back just for the drinks and atmosphere. i would highly recommend they ameliorate their food menu. more options would be great and better quality. Love the beers though!

4/5 Edit: I can see the owner put a lot of thought into their response which is very much appreciated. We were definitely not aware there was a medical emergency and we can see how that could have had an impact. Regarding the pizza, I definitely think it can be improved as well as the food menu. I give a higher rating to reflect the professionalism of the owner of this establishment. I absolutely plan on coming back and if the food menu improves, I will for sure give a 5/5

PS. please have hot sauce available. Always nice to sprinkle some on the pizza","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjv_SKo1DeAru7qK7zQyTfH03eDSa8KYKBKnb4&fid=0x0:0x6da2ae488cf0df24"],"When":"2024-7-17"},{"Name":"Brittney Cerritos Kroiss","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzs74OWdsTEXPNevXDKt4yjRt1tvG8kz7_IZQS_xePF-HLCrj-gA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our fave brewery in Pitt Meadows-Maple Ridge. It's our go-to. A good variety of great, consistent beer paired with a nice atmosphere and friendly staff. They also have some food options, from pizzas to pretzels to chips and a few more. They also sometimes have the odd food truck there. They also host fun events as well from love music nights to trivia to hosting drag shows and comedy shows! Fantastic place all around. Check them out and support them! :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Thomas Hut","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUldhrl_mlLGq3Tq4d_5kxmKfaDgU3pPox8cgoHn442R9Eur4T8MA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pretty great brewery overall! Great beer, really nice patio and tap room space too","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNevI5ZNyj_FWr1oF1jMt5JXrU-r3FpJPRS3pqt&fid=0x0:0x6da2ae488cf0df24"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"Sarah Grace","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX0P_FT3n0HZdmLMDEJ6UcRFNPyHbE7QJ8GW3gOL-SGGTFh-sFdQw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Large selection of in house beer, around 20! Family friendly. Delicious, always rotating beer list. Large outdoor space, and comfortable indoor area with lots of natural light. Downfall is parking when it’s busy there is no street parking available, if lot is full. Definitely worth a stop, always a sour beer on tap. Cans to go, beef jerky, chips, and sodas made by Foamers for the non alcohol options. Food available! Friendly staff and knowledgeable staff, generally enthusiastic.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8AtPdoclKw98QQTty09wnpSISsz6alEpHRxFu&fid=0x0:0x6da2ae488cf0df24"],"When":"2020-7-6"},{"Name":"Catherine Byrdy (Byrd)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV8uqMGqbkqGknJWQpYOqYnRycihvurvs3aDaz_7RfiDzMksAc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Probably the best place in Pitt Meadows to just hang. The staff are amazing. Super friendly, super helpful. And they’re always happy to welcome you back. We love the new outdoor patio!! And the live music 🥰🤗. This place is kid friendly, dog friendly and all around people friendly. We come for the wine, fizzy drinks and the ambience but I’m sure the beer is fantastic… well, from what we know Foamers Lager is the best","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPHH-W-udR3gNID5UYPcHhq_KG99lOFB7KvFSY&fid=0x0:0x6da2ae488cf0df24"],"When":"2022-7-20"},{"Name":"Pablo Fernandez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUalbYbdMUlU2hg6Ddb8mnhyzEXoAsMTybeKkeEvs9jcEpko0vV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Poor parking, nice atmosphere, good service, good beer, food was quite poor. The 20$ pizza was worse than a frozen pizza from superstore. 3.5/5","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tyeana Edgington","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZCFzaIgKU5lTB7YWfmS7VIENMgFFgSFxZC-9WXgh9Ek6j0oXRQw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great little spot to come for a beer with friends. The rotating cocktails are hit and miss but mostly pretty delicious. Pretzels are my favorite food item for sure but it's fun when they get food trucks in for more variety.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNiO1_88L3kLl2-7XBd9U-l3veFPByFszNuNaiJ&fid=0x0:0x6da2ae488cf0df24"],"When":"2024-1-8"},{"Name":"A Miraji","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKbtSn1-d3iEkTDQas0xH_xCGg1PKv8z1hKaZIhPkrsgM_kICp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great atmosphere and staff are very nice and helpful. Beers are very good too. Tried bunch of'm and no regrets! If you are around and wanna chill and drink this is the place you should hit!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPuI9wvZpGsmQBzHeETOmUo3OIYdR19eiLYdgmF&fid=0x0:0x6da2ae488cf0df24"],"When":"2021-8-1"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Shermin Shamji","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIzoJJyh5fvBMih9L-VBNOFD0DaR1aXaThEs6EOUndgVeUAQg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered the special 2 medium 2 topping with 2 pop on Friday. I must say the pizza was absolutely delicious. Flavourful sauce and enough of it, generous amount of toppings and perfect crust. I must say i really enjoyed this pizza. Good price and service also! This will be my new go to for pizza take out. Can't wait to have it again!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sebastian Castillo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIcnZFucde6xPMfQPlJVld3_oxVduXCLMqnsvKowqMxXGXz_w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"When ever my partner and I order pizza we always order from this location. Always friendly and welcoming customer service! Order times are usually 15-25 minutes. If you want to support local business, you know where to order from! Parking lot is a bit tight, but never had an issue finding a spot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMSWcWnSReMVyG5QT_89DlRgJbXMeEzcMVw66HW&fid=0x0:0x822ed9f0b6ad8e5"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"Kabir Anand","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJd-QUy3ttNTSJSws3BMMqIecLzNS8nw8MRGlYCothddrW7dQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our company, Real Earth Bounty, ordered pizza and lasagna from pizza 64. Both were excellent. Their food has become our new office favorite and we will be switching to Pizza 64 over all other pizza restaurants. Would highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Meaghan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIyfYYHs7vIchg_PfjW3Xg-yG8gaUHtHofdu0aqEsEJolCmkg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The owner was kind, accommodating and so sweet with last minutes changes on an order for my daughter's birthday. She even included some Indian treats as a Birthday surprise.
Pizza was great. I want to return to try the home made samosas.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tanushree Anand","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI6uK1G1-5ADLirqu3KvkXIlwuMU0WG_allL6YqvSFE5HeFag=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great pizzas, love the crunchy thin crust and both the veg n non veg options. We also love the ginger garlic addition the pizzas which give a fresh flavour.
This is our fav pizza joint in Pitt Meadows.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"seanbthe1","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ4cPqSn6dUfo_NaupmsYnsEJonP-zrXtwLP9DM-g6WiNb0-A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really enjoyed the pizza.
The lady behind the counter was friendly and made a delicious pizza.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNNoHPhY2SUrFD_sd5MNV4pjAWZgqbt2aWHGtBR&fid=0x0:0x822ed9f0b6ad8e5"],"When":"2024-8-23"},{"Name":"Inderbir singh Khehra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUo6aVa5HRHvutC8_ZxpkOoz8zq_lf-31XdO2plDtNN4zsSDq8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"These guys are so amazing. The taste of their pizza is so delicious. They provide home Delite their customs too. One day I ordered a India-style pizza from them around 10:45 pm and their employees treated me so nicely even though they were just ready to go to their homes. I recommend everyone to visit their at least one time.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Elham Shahbandy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU8v0FqiWfwrKZlKpvymmkhzMYhJ-PBGxv_Ot_SbQhp9uNsQ3Yb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love the Shahi paneer pizza and was completely new experience. Definitely worth trying different style of Indian pizza… the lady who got our order was very nice and welcoming..","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOqk7289lNLurYVF5DJRfhT699Dv4dIIDldeVbg&fid=0x0:0x822ed9f0b6ad8e5"],"When":"2023-2-18"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Pradyumna Gujjar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVHYwZPoeWTWb_r-Pj3URXZmwvjMuE8IJLkPSR4xqAVv86CR0HjQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"One of the better coffee spots this part of town.
Live their white chocolate mocha and caramel macchiato.
The crustless quiche was alright but their blueberry almond croissant was delicious l.
Ample seating space and a cozy atmosphere.
The staff are friendly and always greet customers with a warm smile!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9dRoqL3BsSp9XqSAU7gRN_nD5TgAc5tKMruzM&fid=0x0:0xdb649e8e70848e80"],"When":"2024-11-10"},{"Name":"MJ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlm_XRYtoUIMsDe0r0YhYfxDQnj37a3FGprKGl2_zxeQCNP_XX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Got a white mocha and an iced matcha latte, pretty mediocre - not bad.

The GF Bagel was dry, lacking something while the cheddar and kale scone was also lacking some flavour.

Cute sitting area, new view to look out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHJUzRGAyBksruWXWvJPvpMsi63q35C7vJuASE&fid=0x0:0xdb649e8e70848e80"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"K H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVo2hR2qKHBGSuFyVVc1kqvuNnr23GVLd19IdZCsiU8tz8tbtW-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good amount of outlets. Tables and chairs weren’t the most comfortable. Really high traffic on warmer days. Only thing was coffee was really not that good, none of us enjoyed it particularly. Prices are high.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMOfU_iw6MKN_VNcprT4qzkhpJDp8qhn7A8ihys&fid=0x0:0xdb649e8e70848e80"],"When":"2024-6-1"},{"Name":"George D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqMA7qbYytlO_4Jfi4rlocuHdAGheOdmR3fEbGAbM7yIf_VUe3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really good Chai lattes ❤️ just came here with my niece and mom for a coffee but we got a little something something 🫠 to go with our coffee. Highly recommend coming here for sure. If your into coffee and a walk by the  river adjacent to here also a popular thing to do.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONNpTeljW_1SvY-Hg84WnPOJkwF_nAxc0OGVow&fid=0x0:0xdb649e8e70848e80"],"When":"2023-12-17"},{"Name":"Simon Hardy-Francis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUB8AdQYxUYJCAE_cHqFT87JPS7eQsmUoL3mGal92dnU64RGEWt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Dry cappuccino was not dry, nothing really breakfast so ordered the quiche without the salad; price was $6 which seems steep. Nice atmosphere close to the river.

Update July 2017: Got a Cafe Frap but it tasted mostly of milk and not coffee :-(

Update Sept. 2024: 4 people were working in the cage but none were smiling. Nothing looked cleaned  or maintained. Napkin dispenser was almost out. My wife ordered a 20oz coffee and for myself only a 16oz. But we were given two 16oz coffees. Although busy, they told my wife that she was wrong about the size of her coffee. Think this will be our last visit :-(","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7INVkA9B6nvoTKjGfrHA8WRwuZS5xBIgO8zDZ&fid=0x0:0xdb649e8e70848e80"],"When":"2016-9-18"},{"Name":"Madison G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVtZsEld-Yz5a2Swm5LesjF83lo03ZXPGgujeQvQiLn6WLaIuGx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a cute place, great location and easy parking. Staff was friendly and the coffee ( Caramel macchiatos) we’re so delicious.
I got a grilled cheese, and my friend got a veggie bagel. The bread tasted very fresh. The building is pretty small so limited seating if it gets busy. But super cute cafe and look. Great experience","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNY98G5lU5qiX10hl6orPxomKrz9EF_g7gpoS-1&fid=0x0:0xdb649e8e70848e80"],"When":"2023-2-28"},{"Name":"Hawraa Rashidi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLnfXqnhjnxiVzwIzqwqkFNU9110Cm2o2ZtxwHhWm_d8FB4WA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"LOVE this cafe! The staff is very attentive, kind and friendly, and the cafe is very cute and doesn’t get loud. The sandwich selection is also very good and all the veggie sandwich options are so tasty. The coffee (I get the Spanish coffee) and pastries are the best I’ve had in all of Vancouver! Usually at cafes pastries are so sweet you can’t taste what you’re eating, but not here! The pastries are the perfect amount of sweetness and there are many to choose from. My favorite is the blueberry almond croissant :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Henry Yim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXyAeUh2CClKb5j6bPCfm4WTuRVeJI0Sj2rgBonFkle79yB2OU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Im my opinion, this is one of the best neighborhood cafe in the city area. It is quiet yet cozy . The  Club Panini with juicy chicken breast was delicious. My favorite place in Tri-Cities area for hangout on weekends or a sunny afternoon.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfxZD9wRETihmfUARtoMUNVjOP0bKFUmtU-uAU&fid=0x0:0xdb649e8e70848e80"],"When":"2023-6-8"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"E Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXSf46GoVDYA6DwVd9VW9_YDSbB2ZybZwD8Gjg5Qpn6bN0v14Wr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Food and service at this location are below the standard you would expect from other Boston Pizza. Not too many table (around 5-ish in the afternoon), but service was slow. Can see a few servers standing around chit-chatting. The ones that were working just kept walking around not sure what they were busy with. The "Slow-Roasted Pork Back Ribs" was boiled meat with sauce brushed on top. Kid's "Bugs n' Cheese" was swimming in tasteless soup-like liquid (have to use the team "liquid" because there is no way you can taste any sort of cheese). Only decent dish is the pizza.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPlbgXM8x2YZkq4S2QUsx77-SJhlVL3ujlZwm3&fid=0x0:0x3e7ec6a84363a6d3"],"When":"2024-4-22"},{"Name":"Sam Sepehri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVYthwgE8t4OmmLX3SIv6kEE1WHACJ1czP2SVCGU2ZI1HmJUI50=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Pro:
Beautiful restaurant
Good service and very kind staff

Con:

I think they forgot to put the pizza in the oven and the pizza dough wasn't cooked enough.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMgl9SU2g6nX5BAaE7xj3U_R6_moQPImdftD0t6&fid=0x0:0x3e7ec6a84363a6d3"],"When":"2024-11-23"},{"Name":"Dan Telep","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX1RA8i7GTOqg4UR9gQEmByxzNobvR0hsiUNFGl0520LZXbGNUt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Kids enjoyed their kids meal, but adult meals were served over 5.minutes after.the kids.  The kids actually stopped eating their good, hot.food, in order to eat with us (parents)  Adult meals were less than average serving size.  We will not be back.  Reduced menu and the experience described above are the major motivators.  So many better local options.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Blair Berks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYm9Znf4gcYJhRYQqCTxa556cWjh44hOC6Vs8l9n5T1WfxXBg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Tried to stop in for brunch this past Saturday. The greeter and only server working was fantastic and informed us two large groups were coming and suggested we sit in the bar which we agreed to. The manager immediately came out and told her that was not an option and to sit us next to the group as she was the only server working. The manager then tried to explain that our only option was to sit next to groups and we decided to just leave based on the option presented.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Annie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJAG4UtHNdn-C74S5I053c9lMdRMdh_AH35u090AgjHoFmF2GSW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Wednesday night date night and we enjoyed the appy’s all day menu. It wasn’t too busy, service was very good and restaurant had a casual atmosphere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIid5AyTplrBj4TWRIJWD0TD3CmHYZNE-Yv5Lh&fid=0x0:0x3e7ec6a84363a6d3"],"When":"2024-7-7"},{"Name":"makeshift auto","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLPk3PvFgBlWxLlrV5DLALlNHnj6fzB7P1Nl0LNZrAG1TKtZw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"was here yesterday, the place was fairly dead plenty of staff yet it took them a long time to come to my table, once they finally did i ordered my drink and food since i was well decided..... they brought it out but i was not happy with it. did they do their usual stop by to check how everything is after approximately 5-10 minutes? NO they certainly did not, in fact it took them 35 minutes to come by and by that time by food was cold and gross my beer was flat and i just wanted to leave. the service here is non existent i will not be going back to this location unless i want to spend my entire afternoon eating a cold TINY appetizer and drink a flat beer","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Aaron T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1nIjgQMvi7OUGd3rXyfWM-M_cvJENcCtThVA4n_LhbXrbbZ0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"What happened to you, Boston Pizza? I swear you used to have some decent food. Unfortunately the food is very sub par. Pizza has little toppings, and has a lot of crust. Lasagna barely has any meat. The wings are a huge ripoff at almost $2 ea, and were not spicy at all. The shaker cheese I didn't think could get any worse, but is now really small and tasteless instead of the larger round pieces of 'cheese'. Service was not bad, I believe it was the manager we had and he was quite nice. $70 plus tip for three really unforgettable items without any drinks. No thanks.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIR8Had75UooOUL8OPQJ3zVM7hZgvw1gumBMl8&fid=0x0:0x3e7ec6a84363a6d3"],"When":"2022-7-19"},{"Name":"Hope Hood","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmvHORJtBrNufhRRWHXz-abrBtZBcKpzL1NISQxoZzfm-AJYlk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The lady that served us was really nice and pleasant. The food was well made and tasted good. We ordered pasta for pasta tuesday for the good deal and got starter salad which was a good size for 3.99. We were so stuffed after but wanted to try out dessert which was fresh and hot and obviously the best part.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7XAs1JkkYIrmDlTSn0Os4uw8q7tUKpPpZcv8t&fid=0x0:0x3e7ec6a84363a6d3"],"When":"2018-7-4"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Amandeep Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIn-uRCpHlDPuaWrT03KerVwh4LVQXfyP_2DtevpQOjxddx-w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Customized and portioned really well, as I love my pizza to be. I love the pesto sauce and Avocado drizzle. The pizza dough is so fresh and not oily at all as being a migraine patient, I never got a headache eating the pizza from here as I do at some other places. Highly recommend and store is kept so well and neat and clean.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOldUWRC5L27P8-nL9z0yB8-Z51kfFUPjCd-da2&fid=0x0:0xe037a576d3a0fb4e"],"When":"2024-5-25"},{"Name":"Sukhman Sidhu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX7rVl9TI7D-wJIYLXerUGH36FbocxuPzNMLLIwaDNl-YjbWbby=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered a veggie pizza for take out. It was fresh out of the oven. They never hold back from the toppings. My favourite go-to pizza place in Maple Ridge. Very happy with their service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"dsafxzvsafdwerasdf","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJk7HWKM0IUfNrnV36nfESUJ-C6xFlpVs04xpec7S5dSIgh3A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Panago and Papa Leo's are the best pizza places in Maple Ridge. Just wish the Taco Chicken pizza would come back.

The wings can be variable in quality, but when you get a batch of large, high quality wings from Panago, they're the best chicken wings in the city.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"daren memon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJivVqzFK4CrBHceppTbj6Njta2V0-eY5A5WCkxDDPaO-a3-A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Right from the vibe of the place to the pizza and salad we were served was just perfect. Loved the service, making a great experience to hangout with friends. See you guys soon !","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shawn Hughes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK9jwPtCQLbaB7ZhNpL5LFLrv0p4RsZ4UFQr_F44r5nmKPbhg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been going to Me n Eds for close to 25 years, quality and service has always been great!! Our server Aleena was awesome!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bree N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLgrb0SHGtbUVisY15-DcrBk08WUXGaJVLrZ-6v-BYhsUZMKw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Since panago had become very vegan friendly I was happy to support but so upset to heated they’ve discontinued the beyond meat. Was the best meat alternative. Back to papa johns I go","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Navjot Kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXCbGr9D10v2qeuneBux0QXNBXi0b5yQcSHsY3OOpcGoEp3QLwa=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Give moldy garlic Dip.On call asked me to come back to store to return the dip so they can return my money.
It is not about money or couple of dollars.
It’s a Food safety issue.please keep/store products on right temperature.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPVmy0Xo6pvlc1vkJmrz5Z8buNjY9mfn0HmJsn1&fid=0x0:0xe037a576d3a0fb4e"],"When":"2024-3-6"},{"Name":"Palak Gaba","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGp6q9zSzgNXh3HzQHdkGW9BPo4NJkONHgfmhAH6StMpE7JBD7=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered chicken club, so delicious 😋, good service , super fast 🚚 delivery, surely recommend, just try once.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMG8n3CZmIyDy3Cizf4GSWkeraHsuiVQ7bk_Z4Z&fid=0x0:0xe037a576d3a0fb4e"],"When":"2024-5-21"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Smoll Bean","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVOiGGXc9C-nG6SZJHaVfYR_1EWz_FxTnHKGqEFC2VHnk5i2VU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Just garbo , food tasted like my high school poutine but $12 more. The cheese made me need to poop so hard , my tum tum hurts now. $100+ for mediocre everything and poopy (actually) tasting cold pepperonis","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"M. Emily Beatty","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5jNf1SKe7Bq03mAlTHyuHwO6BRqIxzmM2qix9g4yyTVCtOA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered online from Uber Eats and it took them incredibly long to get the food out. I wasn’t there so I can’t tell if the restaurant was busy or not but my driver was waiting for about 15 minutes after he arrived and it is a very short drive to my place from there. When it arrived it was cold and since it’s not a long drive the food must’ve been been cold already so why did my driver have to wait so long. The cheese was also barely melted and they didn’t layer anything so less than half the fries had toppings on them. Overall the food didn’t have much taste and honestly felt like something a 10 year old could make with frozen fries in a bag.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sara ten Brink","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKC5ggjSTEmziUmzkBFHaUuFK6tc2PzXbRrwk34Ic2OEfESWA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I spent close to 80 bucks for 3 poutines and 2 pieces of cheesecake. Terrible place to find with no signage, had i known i was ordering from the public house i would have never ordered. A waste of almost $20 for a single small poutine that you cant even get right","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alicia Price","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLLP1lGy3eRH8D3Gdo69oqm7oryWyXB3lb1wKS7TCEVNbMgNA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"What happened to your french fries?!? user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kelvin Liew","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW5_6qeykN2WiLweJ8YUQuifTCU3O13-PRLxMVMteoJHx-TVt3I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Local gem, love their presentation. The food is tasty and is definitely comparable to popular sushi spots in vancouver.

Tuna tataki in the photos.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1XSVrCm-LnqRXR5OHvBcK7lVLIe7Ca8cv4dnt&fid=0x0:0x8f86306f9fd3444a"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Sage","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZG5jDF-aYdeki0OFGxAs77w7rLWv2b6nYHO0jMEL4f4ztnhSNVw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great local sushi/Japanese in Pitt Meadows. Kind staff, and everything was super fresh.

The special bluefin Toro was at a great price for incredible quality bluefin.

And the oshi was on point for this Vancouver staple.

Also has Sapporo on tap!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9TPXOpHvWYuYVs8X5jGGFoSY_KEkvnjFUkh7w&fid=0x0:0x8f86306f9fd3444a"],"When":"2024-6-23"},{"Name":"Aple G.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLAlK_xYB-UEv4a0OvWRpvHvUfXzfMBueXFU0EYf8mRLuE9XLY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The service came slow, but at least they ask you twice if you want to order. The tonkotsu was crispy and moist. But if you want authentic ramen, keep looking - not recommended. We ordered the Spicy Tan Tan, featuring gyoza meat patty. The ramen peanut sauce more sweet than spicy. The pickles are special, reminds me of essential oil. The miso was served cold, but hey if you ask for hot they’ll at least meet you halfway at lukewarm, just like my feelings about this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPyopGpR710sjJ7VJMtHiPlpRTA8xG3MnwACrj1&fid=0x0:0x8f86306f9fd3444a"],"When":"2024-8-5"},{"Name":"Elisha R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLQi7E9QIgqhf-Aqp2-1839iyCuma_GAEGVE7WIfLRwgWpbWQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My husband had brought me here and said it was some of the best sushi he had tried so of course I needed to try it!

The first thing I noticed was the restaurant was very clean and they had very spacious seating, not like some where you are incredibly close to the table next to you or beside you.

Everything i tried was so fresh, very flavourful ! They offer a great variety of menu items along with the specials.
Most importantly the have a good variety of Gluten Free options that are affordable and great in taste!
It is hard to find a sushi restaurant that is consistent in their flavors and taste. Everytime i have been here it has been spot on.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Andre Bueno","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUH5SUaQ7I07ULutYyqq57BUbzjWcRO691ZQjx7O-gqyaKongm4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I'd say that this restaurant is the best I've tried so far in Metro Vancouver and Tri-Cities. The food is amazing. We can taste and see the high-quality ingredients, as well as the care in every single detail when preparing the food. The menu has many yummy options, and as much as I try, I want more. On top of that, the cleanliness is impeccable. The service is excellent with friendly and polite staff. I strongly recommend you try this restaurant. You won't regret it for sure. Congratulations to the owner(s) and all the crew! You are doing excellent work! Please keep it that way 🤩.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZYMTM4r7DN7JtqeZwj6BG9PJk-3FUnvMWvFH8&fid=0x0:0x8f86306f9fd3444a"],"When":"2023-8-12"},{"Name":"Elise Lien","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU2hWtg0KjFGoIRjgqbChDbDmwLwVmzWwwoNUOozeKB9F5ORzuraw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food and the portions are sufficient
Fabulous service
Excellent environment
Highly recommended👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOV9jk7ahkgKzVErwLTgORLSeWosvlLwPmPEpP8&fid=0x0:0x8f86306f9fd3444a"],"When":"2024-7-13"},{"Name":"Nadiia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKCI0bBdateEVyKA53tgft7NUABuW1QMLHiMMz3N4gl3dt9rQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Atmosphere is very nice, but food and service….

Portions are small. Wait is insane. Only 3 tables were busy but I had to wait almost an hour for my order of sushi.

Don’t recommend this place","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kiryoku Manzi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXjiOSPyyE4uQdHTEBLe4dOh0UKSxs22JymtGAdvGqnT2qyyWbUrg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"[Pro]
- Friendly staff
- Clean place
- Nice ambiance

[Con]
- Food is just decent
(Chashu don was served in a stone bowl but the rice did not get crunchy at all)
(Chashu ramen's soup was light but not rich in flavour. Very light body, noodles were clumped together)
- Service was slow and seemed very inefficient.
(Slow to take out orders. We waited over 20 minutes to get our food, then waited another 10 minutes just to pay. There were four people in the kitchen, four people up front. Despite all that, there doesn't seem to be food coming out of the kitchen, and the staff were all flustered and confused.)
- Tea is charged and it's a very small pot of tea

We could have caught them at a busy time (although it really doesn't look like it), but we wouldn't recommend and come back as we would rather travel somewhere else to get a better experience and food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxp0cMqnLchFcJHZX6yUM_edCCmpedr3ksMu_r&fid=0x0:0x8f86306f9fd3444a"],"When":"2024-1-28"}]

descriptions: Soft-serve ice cream & signature shakes top the menu at this classic burger & fries fast-food chain.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Barendina Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4gAXNw7bsOWNo-qAPQuFfFYX-uW_wVZHByRe8lPzJaAZZQQG6pQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Well I'd like to address prices. It's getting out of control how expensive it's becoming to go put to eat, & have a treat, not just just at Dairy Queen!

A mini blizzard, which is by the way micro mini size of inside of small palm is $6 & almost $7.5 for small, which is still very small. Photos are added so u can get a price example. It's just getting out of hand.

Although this location is 1st location I've been to in a while that's listened to me asking for extra pickles, there was little condiments on our burgers, which made them dry. I had to ask for more mustard & used ketchup packages.

Now let's move on to the Blizzard. This is what was most disappointing. $6 for this little tiny thing & she didn't hang it upside down when she brought it to me (I didn't know they were supposed to do) cuz I've never purchased blizzard before.  After she gave to me I walked to car & picked up spoon & was like wait a minute, this is milkshake texture so I went back inside asking her & her response "When I gave it to u it was thick"

I'm pretty sure that only took maybe 3 min from time she gave it to me till time I walk back in with it. Hardly not enough time for it to go from blizzard thickness to liquid that was running off spoon. I asked her to remake it, she was not very happy about that. The 2nd one she gave me was better, not thick, but better...at least it didn't fall out of cup when she hung it upside down 2nd time LOL

I got the new flavor Oreo chocolate brownie & it did not taste like chocolate at all, there was no brownies in it at all. Maybe it was just this location, I don't know. Wasn't very happy with it at all.

Moving along to cakes.... wow wow wow. Inflation sure has shown in the prices of these ice cream cakes. Almost $60 for most of them with tax,  gross!!

Stick with the value meal that includes a 🍨 much better buck","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPHbvEsyOjl7xT-tYl9diDKmB1rykUbXMgfTjTz&fid=0x0:0xe9d93214f425f79a"],"When":"2023-8-14"},{"Name":"Adolfo Garcia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXk76S2kbhMbdiRSvTJO85jQ-iHosG75dMnnm-bv3ncX6tkFuc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Unacceptable Customer Service

I had an extremely disappointing experience with this Dairy Queen location. Due to a glitch in the DQ app, my orders were mistakenly sent to this store instead of my default location. When I realized the mistake, I contacted the store to resolve the issue and requested a refund for the unclaimed orders. Despite being reassured multiple times by Dairy Queen’s corporate team that the franchise owner was contacted, I have yet to hear back from them after three follow-ups over nearly three weeks.

I strongly recommend caution if you choose to order online from this store, as they appear unwilling to assist or resolve customer issues. Don’t say you were not warned!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQbGzoFomJ7Ulq4-MtAr_xQmCjiYmNrAiS9sxo&fid=0x0:0xe9d93214f425f79a"],"When":"2024-11-28"},{"Name":"Scarlett Girl","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIR2nrPTmLtOAwVlMAEXvQQ3zVqd8VJ-NS2NBUuOPC1WrxNnw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"If I could leave 0 stars I would.  Pulled through the drive thru last night and ordered the same exact meal I always order at any other dairy queen.  The chicken strip meal deal.  And asked to upgrade the dessert to a snack size blizzard.  Normally this meal is 13 dollars anywhere else. So I was shocked to hear 18 dollars when I got to the window.  I said um no... I always order this exact same meal and it's 13 dollars with the upgrade.  The staff said oh we don't do that you have to pay for the blizzard separately.  I said you're the only dairy queen around that does this... you can cancel that whole order then.  I then proceeded to the other dairy queen in town and low and behold I only paid 13 dollars.... management really needs to train their staff better.  Not to mention they are insanely slow at food preparation I had to wait 15 minutes for two cars infront of me to get their food.  Seems excessively slow for "fast" food.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sister Carmen Herrera","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUPRWAIjWri-AtghrtLshw0FpoIF6m4cG0RmjFzKebqCTsETIc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Very disappointed.  The staff told me it was ok to eat the pineapple on my banana split even though it tasted fermented.  He reassured me it was a fresh batch of pineapple that just arrived and that it was meant to taste a bit sour.  I was sick later because of it.  The worst part is that it was my birthday and I was looking forward to a treat. Bad customer service or at least poorly trained staff. Will not eat there again.  The salads also leave a lot to be desired. Wendy’s salads are better for about the same price or less. Disappointed.
Recently at my local Dairy Queen in poco I asked if whether the pineapple is supposed to taste fermented and they said no. They even gave me a sample.  It was sweet and didn’t make my tongue tingle nor was it fizzy like it was releasing gasses nor anything like the one I had in Maple Ridge the previous week.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Elizabeth Hamming","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXF7zvrQBkhho5z2JaufXuwtctcjmHV3IQU5eLESqsRmXktAY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Got more like a milkshake than McFlurry. They remade it for me… the exact same way/milkshake consistency. This is a pic 2 mins after I got it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPwkH51v3UbPt0AnCaFseZGgiSCIT7nubCKTSmH&fid=0x0:0xe9d93214f425f79a"],"When":"2024-6-23"},{"Name":"Manpreet","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJLZ8pTdnPBbG-WNZ73ySzFycC-YyHoY4RJzCBa0-HkPh53W1E=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Just got my poutine from this place 30 minutes back. Looks like they barely put gravy in it. Its so dry and all the cheese is in middle. There was 3 girls they were so busy in taking. It could be a understandable if there was a big lineup of customers. No one was in the store neither on a drive thru. Very poor customer service and presentation.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO4t1oDfOsmF2ez39JbXCbLJvfLu9jNIfRdD_Nu&fid=0x0:0xe9d93214f425f79a"],"When":"2022-10-15"},{"Name":"Ashley T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJMgfJ5BeDkQBH8GDtey-vspO4L3doO-eFOQV3K5TUrfzOefg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Placed an order and it came to $30. Gave the guy $40 and he gave me a nickel back and left. Lol. I was dumb enough to stand there in shock for a minute before he left, but once it sunk in I tried to get his attention and was ignored. It’s possible that he was just confused, and then once he left he couldn’t hear me, but now that I’m reading these reviews I honestly don’t buy it. It seems like there’s something sketchy and off about this particular DQ.

Of course I could be wrong, and maybe it’s just that they hire people with special needs, which would actually be pretty cool. However, if that’s the case, there should still be a minimum requirement that the cashier be able to do grade 1 level math.

Word of warning to those who go here: double check your change! Better yet, don’t even go here. I know personally, I won’t be back, and hey, both my wallet and my waistline will only thank me for it.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Doris Escaravage","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUO3Yqt2t_lz040wu2YKnWfTpYtwu7zd3tuAMWCuwkfdyhDXC4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went there with my grandkids. Of course they loved it, they love ice cream! Service was quick, and tables and washrooms were clean.","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Burak Demirci","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLW38zcwba4pjT78TlCZvbOvE75UvCrFtj38mA9vdgrqL0YMQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered through Uber Eats and the Philly Steak Sandwich was amazing, I had a craving for a while and enjoyed it a lot. The chips were also quiet good and the food came warm with nice packaging. Also thank you guys for you nice gift from Uber Eats :) will definitely order again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cole","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKpRVirOsPiaygEAMglOS6J5UtNWFX0c3aGmG4pYSc7YfKA8A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Didn’t read reviews before ordering so my fault I guess.

The order was wrong, the sandwich was dry and flavourless, only had a tomato on one half, and the chips were soggy from their own grease and tasted like burnt cardboard.

Costing nearly $50 for 2 sandwiches. Overpriced garbage.

Overall, easily the worst food I’ve ever order on skip.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jeremy Vlogs","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUtkRCeAomQUd4-Oagu20SBeNF_BubC1-sWtXvE5AUGfVIsovI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"In the 5 years that I have ordered SkipTheDishes, I have never once left a review about a restaurant. This restaurant deserves the input. The almost $50 order consisted of two small, soggy sandwiches; salt must be the secret ingredient because it drowned out any flavour that was there. For the price of $50 we didn’t even receive our side dish. . .chips. I’m content even if a restaurant forgets something or it doesn’t taste as good as I was hoping, but this was just a mistake. I feel embarrassed to tell the person who gifted me this SkipTheDishes coupon that I spent the grand total of $50 on two sandwiches that were soaking in their on grease, minus the chips that were expected. If I can leave a negative review (even after reading the reviews before ordering, with my hopes still held high) then let this be a sign that this is not at all a place to consume a meal that will leave you feeling satisfied. Extremely disappointed and glad I can put this whole experience behind me.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alyssa Hunt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIZLKvqqhnnqhvoi8LwiW9c3MZGOgQ4DdKYaE9lUZslCYxDduQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Order the pulled pork sandwich from here once and it was amazing and so delicious that I decided to order it again. The second time it came completely made wrong. Menu says jalapeños, coleslaw, and pulled pork….. but it came with pulled pork and pickles??? It was awful without the coleslaw and it wasn’t even hot either. Awful","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lynn Marois","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYaClGT0H9hgzmu0XjjOpds59tZjK55ZEO3YNsCZWloToNkW3HLA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered the Phylly Cheesesteak and received a dry nasty pulled pork. Any attempt to rectify it was met with rudeness by the guy on the phone. I went back and read the reviews and came to understand that this is far more common than not.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Martin Matahari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUAn1gLSlBMeGXZBHUnKkSJRx9LUQmHP9VKEpiPVA6PU8EOwPbl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Why oh why didn’t I read the reviews first before ordering. Complete joke for what they are charging. I ordered the stak’d chicken bacon ranch sandwich. For $17 (before tax, delivery surcharge, tip etc) all I got was lousy soggy baguette with a limp piece of lettuce and miserable quantities of protein. The bacon had the consistency of plastic. To make matters worse it was ice cold. Please learn from my mistake and don’t order from here ever.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Johnny Silaphet","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUpL3l0oqBv2Alp7e9nzKsmNW67463F8ldTol-HD-nw9MhvUVQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Sandwich cold and dry Philly steak and I am missing my chips. Paid $25 for order through Uber from
Stamps landing. No contact info for the restaurant. Place is absolute garbage. Don’t waste your time and report it to the better business bureau","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Karan Gill","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJeGSyV1bXjGQDI0KR0K8cti80Wwqjbg-ZWHaecPP-DzFEDrg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We ordered from here during limited dining options and it sounded appetizing on uber eats. When the food showed up it looked like something you would get from Tim Hortons.  We got 2 Philly cheesesteaks with barely any meat and brutal tasting processed cheese also the chips straight up tasted like air with a bit of salt.  Can't remember the last time I was this disappointed in a meal. Horrible quality and overpriced, would not recommend.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mahshad Refahatnia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0MWQXxK5H2ziADPybrpxrMcK2Wslz2Div7r7YjJ_M8wxhH16N=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic! I just finished my lunch and didn’t waste any time writing a comment. I ordered the “Lunch Box B” (chicken), and I’m so happy with my choice! The waiter was also very polite and friendly. Good choice😊.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcqG20aRWSiZ8GlSxrDRuLReRtl6_ukd-QJrdM&fid=0x0:0x380b4b119dbe1d59"],"When":"2024-12-10"},{"Name":"Ana T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLY6qyNt5y_HddRrNE3HFvlLSKc1M3fIS2cKYSDXj52qO5dtQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I went to Meadow Sushi last month and sadly, will not be returning again. I held back on writing this review for a while because i don’t like writing bad reviews, but in this case because there are so many 5* reviews (which I myself mistakenly trusted before coming here), I feel it my duty to share my experience.

I walked in an hour before closing. The space/atmosphere was initially nice and cozy. However within minutes of being seated, there were several employes buzzing and rushing hurriedly around creating an uncomfortable rushed feeling that they all wanted to get out of there.

The waitress greeted me promptly, was very friendly and polite throughout service. Sadly, the great service cannot compensate for the horrible food. Everything i ate tasted unfresh and bad, even the water tasted off.

I ordered the beef teriyaki dinner box. First arrived water which had a strange unpleasant taste - how water can taste bad…i don’t know. Then came a complimentary “thing” (see photo) which was a nice touch and pleasant surprise. I call it a “thing” because I was not told what it was when it was brought to the table. Its taste was ok at first until I tasted dirty burnt frying pan. If you look at the photo you can actually see the burnt gunk on its edges. I’m not one to be ungrateful and complain about free things, but this was bad. The miso soup was the worst miso soup I’ve ever had (and I’ve had a lot in my life). It was lukewarm, watery, tasteless and had only 2 tiny pieces of green onion and no tofu whatsoever. The ebi sunomo arrived next. This tasted ok but the shrimp did not taste fresh and kind of grossed me out. The beef teriyaki was the worst. It came in a foul liquid instead of a sauce and believe it or not, tasted more like Chinese food than teriyaki. The gyoza, spring roll and tempura tasted good but old/unfresh. The salad was ok/standard. The dynamite roll was thick and packed but tasted fishy. I usually have a hard time taking food photos which convey the deliciousness of the food, but alas in this case the photos depict food which in reality tastes vile and unfresh. The friendly lady asks me “how was everything?” and of course I can’t say that everything tasted horrible, so i say “good, thank you”, what else can i say? I can’t very well complain about everything. I couldn’t finish my food and took the rest to go. I normally give leftovers to my dog but this time I wouldn’t because I didn’t want to risk him getting sick.

I really am sorry to have to write a bad review for a local business. If this was a matter of slight taste preference, portion size, slow service or mistakes, I never would have written this review. However, when they serve me food that is this unfresh and old (who know how many hours or days old), they knew exactly what they were doing and such a thing cannot be rectified or explained away. Unless you have so little respect for your customers that you think they can’t tell the difference between old stale food and fresh food. I would not eat this food again if they were giving it away for free. And I’m the least picky eater ever, I’ll eat just about anything and be content. The service was friendly though…what a shame…","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5r1mKxcRKBTg3bUDBvKDadIIChvLw_8dqYB8j&fid=0x0:0x380b4b119dbe1d59"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"Mandy Ouellett","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJKq9lp3Y1LfcLTPRaesiXyjPP6C2jhRCHNKPvuDgywEv1cAQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is my second time eating here and honestly it’s very good. The food is so fresh and full of flavour, everyone is so nice  and friendly! I don’t live close but work in the neighbourhood occasionally, this is my go to lunch now!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNaiUt1NxDo1WYR2cNRDacFaol4u10JM59CluS2&fid=0x0:0x380b4b119dbe1d59"],"When":"2024-9-6"},{"Name":"Avery","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwwOELl7oOpoi0mNOwdLpbzY0mhwgXaZoy5xy_h-LiWb_-5kc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This restaurant is the best!! Great sushi and miso soup. Very good service and nice staff, fast delivery too!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlQCxXXXI8EfX2plGCaujx1vPUvRQy9a7c9FYI&fid=0x0:0x380b4b119dbe1d59"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"Jacquie Pope","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKEbSAljgFnim-vUD1HEX7deTWXs4WABCPv4a9dNFSn82V_8Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Honestly just the best sushi out there. I haven’t had sushi this fresh in ages and I have fallen in love with the volcano roll, I get it every time I come here!! I am from Toronto and this is a must go to restaurant for me every time I visit the Vancouver area. The staff is attentive and wonderful and all the food is fresh and so delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNq4Ci-uSUpAa6Jo55xdrR00ZbmIH4nk0BEYk2B&fid=0x0:0x380b4b119dbe1d59"],"When":"2023-9-2"},{"Name":"Kaitlyn Schmidt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJvVixfNvoeqJ5ZqIx2wGxhhgnvbWvwCAda1KwpELNOIt2lSQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Pretty disappointed. I ordered a salmon and avocado roll and added cream cheese, and there was no cream cheese in it. Also, the spring were pretty soggy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOnNkn3utgCCXxldytG9YoqrmTsJ0Kcf-Vf7Xwg&fid=0x0:0x380b4b119dbe1d59"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"Emma Roberts","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKYfGOozHm7v5w244yWKspUwMUI3lnF7eG9c0o2MFpRxoMa=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really great service here, the employees are so kind and the food is always super tasty. Fish is also very fresh!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHXOxhz3ymqvu22jrFgeX6NvsxmVrB_MD2-eA&fid=0x0:0x380b4b119dbe1d59"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"Sampson Low - eXp Realty","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU5-nAJ3Hfrda7C10R7DZFzGI9EIQe40LQVumTj4ikshD9ogtV4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We went past this cute little eatery and decided to give it a shot. Turns out to be really good. Lady server was the kindest and friendliest and she was so patient with kids. The food was good too and I just love the tiny Christmas decorations and set menus they have. Fried ice cream was a hit with all of my family. ❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO95lvbpvK2aUPkY3K00aVG4iKLh5Z4ADnAA_Hn&fid=0x0:0x380b4b119dbe1d59"],"When":"2023-1-3"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"ME Parasad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIOVwm70lvKrH8SNGMhsCEsxGEwsTJV3lFYgSXa8w3iqxfeIA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Extremely overpriced. Purchased on skip the dishes, never ordered from this company before but assumed it would be good as it was a 9.2 rating.

Super disappointed.
I paid $18 for only 6 small wings. The description didn’t tell how many I was getting for quantity but gauging off the price I assumed it would be at least 12.

My husband got buffalo chicken poutine, paid $12 for this (mostly fries and I’d say the quantity was comparable to that of a small fries at McDonald’s). Again cost is wayyy too high for the portion given. Will not be coming back.

Went to go do review on skip the dishes for this company but there was no option. Makes me wonder if the skip review is a sham? I thought maybe it was based off google review but came here to find out there were no reviews.

Anyways don’t recommend this place unless you want to overpay for food.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Charlotte","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWM_s0RPsBVKdsIne2DZC-eLK_Q0b3GCgjcoVSu6bwcdeEwn6IA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Got chicken wings with suppose to be Cajun .. Very dry, Super cold, not tasty at all! GARBAGE!&&& too pricy for very little portion","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Aries Bilsky","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVP1U2-6GnxTvfKMXPOhiwsaHygXPPtN4E8zmkl1G3yXnlFocf=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ghost kitchen, don't buy from here.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Fckcom LoLg","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUuxfefVow7X1L0lk8o7ImV8WANrRjCGENGpPz_tMjgemI07gc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"lol buy one get one free still expensive","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Joey Ficetola","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLi7UePH0edrltQk-ieCDsFaHYQ5SlXhK1gOj1psFfCoRrT6g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"","Images":null,"When":""}]
