user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Paul Chu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL5lxnU3YfG8x9qJBbP15A_fXhwtTX1HkK0tPiOpx4539Uefw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Tried this place when I first moved to the area and thought it was decent.

This is my second time ordering here.  I ordered a well done pizza, got a undercooked one.    You can tell by the colour of the dough above the base of the pizza.     It was the most floppy pizza I've ever seen.    I'd rather order Domino's, at least it's always cooked.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpwWEQDU-rXFFvPCiB55GHYGOK1BiFjOQiHdhC&fid=0x0:0x49d7d6291e20e0a"],"When":"2024-7-21"},{"Name":"Tyso","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUe-PMAamIzccUC1PqMGbnx_ywowjHedHr-jT-4dCeppN2zSweu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Decided to give it a try because I was in the area and dang, their pizza rocks. The ingredients are super high-quality, the crust is delicious and the sesame seeds. Well, every pizza crust should have sesame seeds. A killer deal for a large two topping for 13.99.
Keep up the great work!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXMGW_bqbNKpuhoM6CALD5oiX9seqYeq6ntrtx&fid=0x0:0x49d7d6291e20e0a"],"When":"2024-10-8"},{"Name":"Arjun Suresh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWEpJoyxT6YA-E54KtAWnbG_xqHyiwWeMNVg-d8SkVDMsUSXZyK=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited Red Swan Pizza and it was hands down the best pizza experience I've ever had! The crust is perfectly crispy, the sauce rich and flavorful, and the toppings are fresh.

This exceeded all my expectations. Whether you're a pizza connoisseur or just looking for a great meal, this place is a must-visit. I can't wait to return and try more of their amazing menu. Highly recommended! 👍","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Heather Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK-FjuL-J5usI3tdhAx0shsC7MZVKxHrBgw_A8y0ONGYLmhjw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Pretty good pizza! Better than any of the big chain restaurants that is for sure!

Lots of toppings and nice amount and flavoured sauce. We ordered 2 gluten free pizzas - it was my first time trying gluten free pizza so I have nothing to compare it too; looked thin but maybe that’s normal?

They were running a bit behind, but I’m guessing it’s just because they just opened. The staff is very polite, and some of their pick up deals are insane. They are also open late which is nice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNv2M3Hi0AT-zYJtbGpcpIchJUzBFA6lxcGH1qf&fid=0x0:0x49d7d6291e20e0a"],"When":"2023-2-4"},{"Name":"Vimmi Kumar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIAuj0mWs9v0DtwLOyoLGiNRGr_AjmgYpm32RVSrAqlaydz7w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"My first time trying Red Swan. It wasn’t overly impressive. Just mediocre. The toppings especially mushrooms were scarce. Q","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkqR6YQlkSflOtk9-VMNz3lj9XkGQDbuVCVgCC&fid=0x0:0x49d7d6291e20e0a"],"When":"2024-6-19"},{"Name":"Wheels","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVsz1Rg53Q2-m5JHAwzfaowNSrC2JEVYhO1hHp4iyxB4sDy77VI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Only have got 1 pizza from this location. Staff are very friendly, there are some tables and chairs inside to sit down and eat. It's definitely a happening vibe with the music, the facilities are new and very clean! The pizza was ok, I got a spicy pierogi, but it's definitely not on the spicy side, tho. I think banana peppers would be a good add to the topings... just my opinion. Will definitely be back to try other pizzas.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN85oGfzEcTJV1ZmuG6fPGiVMy_RlD0Kbs7jG8P&fid=0x0:0x49d7d6291e20e0a"],"When":"2023-2-20"},{"Name":"Joseph Ng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXk_ILL6lzJT19B32s4QofXWam1Q3xrQ9wM4qN1TEB1_CFfyjY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I didn't know this pizza place was opened until today. Ordered a personal 8" pizza with Alfredo Chicken Bacon topping (there are 41 choices to pick). It requires 15 - 20 minutes to wait. I lost track of the time but it is not too long and when my pizza arrives, WOW! It is the best in town no doubt. The sesame crust is phenomenal, it is cripsy and tendered, the topping is full, all I can say this pizza is fresh and excellent. I also ordered a regular size wedges. It is very so tasty that the restaurant next door cannot compete. I wish to finish it but the portion of the wedges is big. I am going to try again to see if they are going to maintain the standard. Further, the staff is very courteous and friendly. The interior of the restaurant is clean and tidy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkT8z6mV57KWYaPEoh1lMS3JkDEjbEMPrAFExN&fid=0x0:0x49d7d6291e20e0a"],"When":"2023-7-10"},{"Name":"Ashish Sam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXP1lm96XEfH5oggDIqnPQ0PW8yNitVv1eEAHR2soD7K03hbZs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Trying second time newly opened restaurant in town! friendly staff and verity of items to choose. ordered tandoori chicken pizza, wings and potato wedges. everything was delicious, wedges cook perfectly with nice seasoning and wings was one of the best that I ever had, with tender and right amount of seasoning. Definitely come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNGsI5PhjPMmi1ozy65sYbVHV1MEuY9W2qSbRQ&fid=0x0:0x49d7d6291e20e0a"],"When":"2023-1-31"}]

The staff was friendly, and the overall atmosphere was comfortable, making me want to come back often. If you love sushi, Ill highly recommend this sushi restaurant!🍣🍣🍣🍣🍣👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNYCBNmkuyGqfsJHkjtlMdq0QcsWipGNk20WUH1&fid=0x0:0xb7f21762547edabb"],"When":"2024-10-24"},{"Name":"Haas Back","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI9A1VZhH2itsMjKVfKcTVO5JMrxsMSbTRG-dcQ-e5ZBT0TEg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hataru restaurant is super cozy and the food was amazing!

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"カイテン","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU2xZtgNct2pr5d6ZT0hrISWo4RAMAR1E3B4oR9MUqY8Qf6ZnWb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"This is the farthest from authentic I have ever seen for Thai food. People claiming this is authentic has not eaten from street carts in Thailand...

The pad thai is made from ketchup instead of tamarind... which is literally the essence of pad thai. Gone is the flavour of tangy sour noodles to disgustingly sweet bright red ketchup noodles. Plenty of chicken in there, barely any tofu. Not even a lime wedge. HIGHLY NOT RECOMMENDED.

The Tom Yum Rice, which I have never seen, had a decent spicy flavour however the short grain rice they use was mostly overcooked and mush.

I'm not 100% certain if the thai iced tea was done north american style with sugar and half and half, but it didn't taste anything what I am used to from thai teas. However it wasn't half bad.

Perhaps it is more catered to western tongues, but it certainly is the farthest from real thai food I have ever seen. The portions are pretty small compared to other thai places, but there was plenty of the protein.

The interior is also incredibly dirty with dead flies on the windowsills.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQtvOVxfZ1NR5bT2ZkOiaAklW-4CliweRtwYLQ&fid=0x0:0x138cc6888409a8ac"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Karen Learmonth","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWAYLqvwPqKN1kTBLaAVkwsaxCfbuBqQ76DtTJc9JuAX7yorH1j=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great little restaurant that is great for tasty healthy meals and knowledgeable about gluten free foods.
Food spectacular! Service good; they never hover, but are happy to get you what you need. Atmosphere nice, cafe style decor.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODUo4jzr8n1N3v6UZEWas_aA99VIFZP2DAaj59&fid=0x0:0x138cc6888409a8ac"],"When":"2024-5-11"},{"Name":"Kevan Dobsin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLrtZpUOl51Lg3ds8u47ssKb_t5IWw54ZHPItjLc2hK0TnBQw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We have dined in and got take out many times. Their food is consistently delicious and we often get take out for larger groups. The owners are courteous and very pleasant to work with. If you haven't tried Thai food, we highly recommend you give them a try and you will probably be a repeat customer like us.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Yana","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCD4K9QJKK6AEC5_mUtlnhQveSuAP0ka9XxJ2Ol6F1xsiRJw4u=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Ordered online for pick up in 45 mins for a weeknight dinner. When I showed up (on time) they haven’t even started cooking. Had to wait an additional 25 mins with little kids in the car waiting to be fed. Owner not even apologetic for the delay.

[{"Name":"Eric Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9BQ9-guwzVZgMdx6E5TMWxOgM0bRFcsx3ziShqChLONeWOF-5iQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was craving a roll that combined some fish and mangos so the chef personally came by to ask me what I wanted to make and created this yummy creation below.

Hope this restaurant continues to do well!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFQiLbqzkzO-n7XiGFJ09FZqeJuJGqMQS6ve55&fid=0x0:0xf92f08e701b7895b"],"When":"2024-12-20"},{"Name":"Youn-Gyou Kook","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzb-HO1nkWlb74MtGBqbHQbgN2n6BsyaP8WL_hqvt-Kmmr3zRBeQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's one of the best sushi I've had in the Tri-Cities!  The portion was generous and the fish was very fresh.  The staff are also very friendly.  I brought guests from all over Edmonton and they all gave it a thumbs up, saying it was so delicious!  In particular, the bento lunch box was well prepared and delicious, and the grilled LA ribs were also very delicious!  I went from afar, but I definitely want to go back next time I get a chance when I'm nearby!  thank you","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOAptu-6MaxO_y5fB6qI_gp3_S5mY0ytGlzXdUl&fid=0x0:0xf92f08e701b7895b"],"When":"2023-11-21"},{"Name":"Daniel Liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKwMXnjjWRSOu6HQEOnfaMdC0M7dE8D7GnkR2-oRaj6cYthB-A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I visit this restaurant so often, and today I brought one of my friends who doesn’t normally like sushi to come eat. He LOVED it! The sushi was so fresh and the deep-fried tempura was extremely crispy and so well made. The house made sauce leaves hits the tongue with a bunch of heavenly flavours. Of course, I wouldn’t normally leave a review, but my friend’s opinions changed so much that I felt it was necessary to show our love for this restaurant. We’ll definitely be coming back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJWpUOgTgna84V87iwSa5YBin_Dj1jHWMgtuGY&fid=0x0:0xf92f08e701b7895b"],"When":"2024-2-18"},{"Name":"Ana T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLY6qyNt5y_HddRrNE3HFvlLSKc1M3fIS2cKYSDXj52qO5dtQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Updated Review:
I frequent Sushi House regularly now, it’s my favourite place to eat out in Pitt Meadows. No matter what time of day or day of the week, and no matter what I order, I’m always completely satisfied. The food is consistently delicious and fresh, the service is always exceptional, and the prices are very reasonable. My favourites are the Dynamite roll and the gyozas, (especially the veggie gyoza, it’s sooooo delicious). I highly recommend Sushi House!
**********
Original Review:
I recently visited Sushi House and was very impressed by the exceptional customer service, the delicious food at an unbeatable price, and the clean and inviting atmosphere.  I highly recommend this place!

When I entered, I was immediately greeted by the warmest, sweetest lady and by a friendly chef. I sat down and was brought a menu immediately. I asked for a glass of water which arrived instantly. I ordered the dyna-cali lunch combo special (dynamite roll, California roll and miso soup). You can’t find a better price for this combo anywhere. I hope they will keep this special.

As I waited for my food (which was not very long), I admired the space. It is the perfect welcoming atmosphere; very tidy, everything is precisely in its place, the decor is minimal and warm. But the level of cleanliness makes this place stand apart. I don’t think I have ever seen a restaurant this clean, it was spotless. There was not so much as a crumb on the floor, a streak on the table or a smudge on a glass, the place was immaculately clean.

The food arrived fast (but not rushed clumsily). The presentation was beautiful and clean just like the restaurant. The food was delicious and clearly made with love and attention to detail. The miso soup was flavourful and warm, the California roll and dynamite rolls were both fantastic and perfectly rolled. I especially enjoyed the dynamite roll; it was phenomenal.  The lady was attentive and checked on me the perfect amount and exactly as much as I needed/wanted her to without being overbearing.

As I ate, I overheard some “difficult customers” (you know, the type who want to power trip on others to compensate for the lack of control they have over their own meaningless existence). Customers making numerous ridiculous requests like “no green onions is the miso soup, no vegetables in the sushi and so on, and on…). The lady (owner/employee) dealt with them and their ridiculous demands so politely, without argument, and with so much grace and kindness (which they did not deserve). Indeed, the customer service here is ABOVE OUTSTANDING.

For once eating out, my bill did not give me a heart attack. Both the lady and chef thanked me and said goodbye before I left. Overall, a wonderful experience and I will definitely return! I only wish they were open Tuesdays so I could come here and go to a Hollywood 3 movie next door on cheap movie Tuesdays.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQT1nrRpwZnJ7DkhsXZ-uWj0eA-yoi6FqySLlI&fid=0x0:0xf92f08e701b7895b"],"When":"2024-5-13"},{"Name":"korn vorakijkamjorn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXKidx-Bl_RSOibV1JgF_iKUpQdRfa440hevV_KxRqmN0ZHh0Gh=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I do not normally leave reviews, but I must say, the atmosphere was so welcoming, and the owners were super nice! Food was AMAZING, definitely worth the experience 🙏🏻

Anyone near Pitt Meadows or just coming into the Tri-Cities should definitely drop by. 11/10.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNXqVr7Gvvmi8ZrFiD_nGFeBn2i3fIH-UeMNEav&fid=0x0:0xf92f08e701b7895b"],"When":"2023-12-2"},{"Name":"Jesus Hernandez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJZV6A6BHISR3SmG_3nO2585tMHA5tJNpBnjLa0XvliKe2nMQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food is really delicious, just as the service is excellent, very fast, affordable prices and excellent taste.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMVuCi7_x6j7pmoobICv-u2zUX2k2LB_ioLw46L&fid=0x0:0xf92f08e701b7895b"],"When":"2024-8-22"},{"Name":"Sanam Moazed","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUUOYhkX29z9qCjgd10EkrpiAtczSR92vfn2lbtPdDrjk2eoT6=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Highly recommend! The service was amazing and the quality of the fish was out of this world. They are my new go to!!! The Salmon don was exquisite and their rice was to die for. The ambience of the restaurant only added to the experiences. You can’t go wrong with choosing sushi house!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHg5EzWIlICPmDRjb4bBGg29-S32z0nmcHAf2M&fid=0x0:0xf92f08e701b7895b"],"When":"2024-2-23"},{"Name":"Lance","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLpK049YxjLTfPjPvPIegILVFEA0U7wjDRNGKhK6TidH_6qprU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I tried this place for the first time today and loved it. The people running this spot are so nice, and I greatly enjoyed my sushi lunch box - everything tasted fresh and delicious, and I felt all the food I got was a good deal for the $18 I paid. I'll definitely be back in the future.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNMvnKZX5fcLaGKF2ZwIMLLnB-6Zhj42HU_CXsl&fid=0x0:0xf92f08e701b7895b"],"When":"2023-9-7"}]

My frosty looked like it was half eaten just like my 6 piece nuggets obviously were and I guess they just forgot to give me the cinnabits. I did report this discrepancy to Uber eats to be faced with not eligible for refund (even though I sent pictures of my order and what was missing) nope they didn't care! So I've taken to google for my review of this location! I want my money back Wendy's I'm not paying for your staff to eat my food! So despicable. Will not ever be ordering from this establishment ever again! Stay clear of this place 😞","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Daniel Gerlach","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKrEvt8WPP6iriDpH0OkxJmJYGPkDnaeurZUiT5zf5D4GtWug=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Food is usually pretty good. I've had missing items from my drive through order. Also don't come here when they are busy. They seem short staffed. I've waited 30min to order and receive my food before. Like most fast food places they prioritize skip and uber and drive through and leave the customer who come inside feeling forgotten about. Hire more staff if you can't keep up.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN4lHp1xaS9fuDL8ehRwtF1BG_sk7DTce36yt19&fid=0x0:0xf6a9f673239af39d"],"When":"2022-2-24"},{"Name":"Luke Sweet","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9QeFiL7Y_5vgEXhwPtQROLfzuFoGuUMMTWJA3gL_TYNU4OALy=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Super unprofessional.. I was going through the drive through waited 2 mins for them to say something at the speaker and all I could hear in the background was laughing and messing around while taking my order. After that I pulled up to the window to see them screwing around and laughing while spilling my coffee all over my cup and then proceeded to hand me a wet straw.. and yes they’re cardboard straws so I got a soggy straw and a coffee which was also spilled all over the cup. Super disappointed won’t be going back again anytime soon.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Heather Ulrich","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWD6f9LeJuwM9yA12l9039u49wt8-HhJCcGbAHaOypdE6Pofbaq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I ordered a large chili with cheese, no cheese,
I ordered a large fry well don, they were soggy and cold.
I ordered spicy nuggets, got regular ones
Ordered a Dave’s double with heavy pickle and mayo. No heavy pickle or mayo and it’s cold.
Also no straw for my lemonade.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michelle Hillock","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJrzRoOQIhVr_Azv33mg4FgqnXjS5clP8SiddvR3MVEWC9e9w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hot and fresh and does customized orders with perfection. They are so fast. Amazingly fresh and juicy. They don't use old stuff. I saw a woman manager leading the team.

Thanks! Please keep up the good work!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSNAC5XGHJfC5BHKoGZjuFeEb92JoAj6X5MDCp&fid=0x0:0xf6a9f673239af39d"],"When":"2022-7-28"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jeremy Hannaford","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJh4gJaa4fTCJIngBRIGMrmmqMdx4ZxIh5c_eHCdtOqz7VOAFhyQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The sushi is hands down some of the best I've ever had. I was really surprised with the Palm Springs roll. The fruit additions to it were fresh and delicious!
The initial walk in was friendly and the prices were great. Only negative I have is my empty glass of water sat at the edge of the table the entire meal and no one came to check.

Besides that, absolutely coming back for take out. Fantastic sushi.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOd13ee-_lNif4B6HscdfH6OARv74e_3spbD5G7&fid=0x0:0x9ad7ed6103c94826"],"When":"2023-12-20"},{"Name":"Chloe D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQcQz8Kl8hKO23hZqVCOss3Om6Wt10FQPjv4VNUIFeAKqYp8i8Ig=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The tuna was still frozen in the middle. One of the pieces had a piece of plastic on it. I’ve also never seen sashimi cut so thick. Their portions are large, but I wouldn’t recommend this restaurant if you’re looking for quality sushi.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOsySJQYlMb1p21OGcjunsPJjh2UoL_NmF20Zpw&fid=0x0:0x9ad7ed6103c94826"],"When":"2023-5-2"},{"Name":"Joe blow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKTmAYUihSjY3aQxhMRCf3kvXeQny8FVYLOtxkJ4rrloGmArw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We’ve had both dine in and take out. Food is always really good. Staff are really really friendly and polite. When dining in they have the AC turned up so high you freeze. Are they trying to get people to leave quicker? Kind of kills the experience. Take out was typically very good, but lately when opening up our orders at home the contents of the box look like they’ve been kicked across the kitchen. Rolls falling apart and all over the box. Need to start taking more care with the orders. Its not how people want to see their food when opening the boxes. And this has happened several times..","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNM817o5Azmoiq9FTboZKIthN9aIX119KnLzOla&fid=0x0:0x9ad7ed6103c94826"],"When":"2024-2-10"},{"Name":"J Kilroe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUCCkMIsqr6iMJr68mDRYoNX0qzCw95JzN3Mrcx-eKfVje5_5s=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a work lunch here today and we arrived as soon as they opened.

They were super friendly, food was quick, and it was also delicious! We had 6 in our party and we ordered a ton of food! They had no trouble dealing with the order volume and the food was all fresh and top quality.
We will see you again!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Soo Park","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJU8KYvTGbyxQiIHNiW7cHF-utfJfwdb_uH14Fu7SkzU6ovOw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Contrary to my expectations, I had a bad experience as their service and food quality were poor. The fish was not fresh, and it also smelled really bad. The dishes seemed not cleaned properly as lipstick stains remained on the cup and dried rice was on the soy sauce plate. I had to pay the bill for the disgusting food I did not even eat and left. Truly a nauseating experience!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"J Hendley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIyoBLsRcF2O0U93f7arqHkg_MXEXD8l4p3n-VIAex5mWH3Ug=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was our first time ordering from Kabuki and I can say this will be our new go to place for sushi in Pitt Meadows! The service was great and the food was fresh and delicious. We ordered the salmon oshi, California roll, chicken roll and gomae roll. Can’t wait to try more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPsdGvohH7Plm3xpmWh1hl1Fci_eg4qAe6VuzQ&fid=0x0:0x9ad7ed6103c94826"],"When":"2023-6-7"},{"Name":"Jason Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVkvHVZqne9KN9-ofplOlt6HLyyrR3C1usZfRX3AV_AG5Fb_VSV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We Played 1 team 4 golfer at Golden Egle Golf North course.
Beautiful outumn leaves & Mountains snow view of blue sky is fantastic!!
We ordered Special menu...
# 4 person x Golf A (ref..Pictures)
Very delicious 😋 & good value pric
Staff were very kind serving.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjpdQ5AB7IOH461znEIi_EpwMQcavZTCsddi80&fid=0x0:0x9ad7ed6103c94826"],"When":"2022-11-13"},{"Name":"Michael E.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLihbFa0W9-WIgTsNnCtV6xiWC6NIuIC6HQzX7GDEoZRsJmcA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Ordered sushi for dinner, wife's teriyaki roll were dry and tasted old.  My salmon roll and tuna nigiri had an off taste, ended up tossing it to be safe, beef teriyaki roll was good.  Overall disappointed..we have friends in the area that swear by this place and rank it high on their list but unfortunately for us it was a big miss.  Hopefully it's a one off situation but I don't think we will be trying it again any time soon.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Karen Rowe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJkxNCxvt79ifEHM7sVnF58Eb7gttmzYhtoqCyeAgIG1iDyCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Today my wife and I attended A\u0026W west Lougheed , I proceeded to tell the attended I had a coupon for two teen burger combos .at the price of 18.99 . when we got home I looked at the receipt and saw the attended charged us for two single combos at 13.99 each , there are no coupons for single teens, so I guess she did not even use our coupon. our meal should have cost us about $29 this would consist of two teen combos 18.99 , up grade one fry to onion rings $ 180, and two teen patties for the pups at $5.98 . We were charged 37.96, with the coupon. We are two old pensioners and can not afford to have such mistakes to occur . We will be very careful from now on, when ordering drive through at A\u0026W .Please be careful and check your receipt before you leave the parking lot.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Doug S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJF5vWY-Wh-0xmdBoDPCCBTyVzK1RrVsZjfSDn1gW7RWYKR5A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"A\u0026W has always been a dine out spot we looked forward to as it had been consistently good food. Unfortunately, after decades of dining at A\u0026W quality has deteriorated which, was punctuated with our most recent experience extremely disappointing . We ordered a Mama burger and Burger buddy. Surprisingly the size of burger were the same yet the Mama burger was $7 vs $4 for the Burger buddy. This sadly was not the worst of it; the Mama burger was almost completely absent of the condiments…\nThis is certainly not the standard or pride that A\u0026W underpins its advertising on…?","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCoo8VhyBwi6jcx6YnxFzEfxVIF052SlFOZYin\u0026fid=0x0:0xee4809162bab10bc"],"When":"2024-5-21"},{"Name":"Derek Hansen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXaBRm-VY_m99UwZ6UwdvGjzB7nw1EejvhcMIUbGB5N2HHxrZpHjw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Classic A\u0026W with friendly staff featuring a small outdoor seating area in front. We really enjoyed the crispy chicken buger.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPGsF6Stt2GXTAcZJL6EgXc3f0UtzS7Yapkr6-m\u0026fid=0x0:0xee4809162bab10bc"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Paige Miller","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL9dk-fdUxNlAh-v8t-nDfKi3e6rWnIFf9cKzN79eeD274eNQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We went on Oct 5th for a quick dinner between soccer games. The cashier was amazing (I wish I got her name). She was super helpful when my daughter wanted to order a build your own burger as hers has a few dietary restrictions and wanted to order herself. Service with a smile the entire time. At the end she made a point to give both kids root beer sucker's even though they are young teens and not little kids. It was such a nice treatment we are not used to in fast food. The restaurant was clean and had a great set up for getting food and where to put dishes after.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"James Wilson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXCxWQNKWWz0yGDObF5fi9FKJRlT5tXEFM4e_nGjTOaOhGJ1c=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Mushroom mama and chicken burgers were good.  I did a mobile order and they didn’t add the cheese on my chicken burger.  Fries and rings were good.  All good was warm for a change.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tania Burgi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVpi7NKlyqDEXOLRvBE3Dr7tmOG6VaYa2gOhM0xeer3UrvuAgE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So welcoming clean and bright. Staff are a DELIGHT and caring. Not your average fast food place - way above and beyond. Special thx to Elishba for connecting with me and making me feel welcome","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chris C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW8SMb3mWn8X4NGNbczT3PTMXhp3vKcVv6UvB1BggVmR-n21IonXA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here for a quick lunch and wow, this fast food restaurant has by far the best service... Especially considering it was free root beer day.     The general manager walked around and encouraged the kids to grab coloring sheets and even offered to bring to us if they didn't want to walk to other side of restaurant.... Wow.  I've been to much fancier places and forced to give tips out with much less service and smiles!  Great job!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lynn Heffernan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUoQybdaqEnaHotq6tBBP-Ni4YR4YD2g5SWouunInMW2GqPTv5Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Really fresh toppings on the burger having an included a tomato, lettuce and onions on a teen burger. I don't remember getting all that before. The fries were nice and hot and the gravy was good.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sia Ghaem","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUEMQ83Io5sE_IiypwGW5tpjSnD5RcP1dPzKLkdTOi-SisSW8bCuA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"By far the best pizza place I have ordered from. We looked up this place online and drove to order and pick up in person.
Nick (the owner) greeted us like we have been there many times. Patiently explained the pizzas and their most popular options.
While we were waiting for our order, he brought a bowl of water for our dog. Then one of the staff Naomi brought us 3 slices of freshly baked banana bread - it was amazing - all and all, they left of with a great experience. The pizzas were also delicious!
We will definitely come back to this place.
Truly a hidden gem.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPRrvLFQn7wJEUb-9WIzydplCsVD5MjVl7bcEol&fid=0x0:0x27bf3a99276ef6a"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"Maryam BG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYOocnrrI0wz1xy1UzzrfX002uyW86PfiNNhxdXyfBusTbUhlS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely incredible service, you can tell the owner is very passionate and takes pride in his work!

We ordered the Artista pizza and it did not disappoint; in fact, it exceeded expectations by far out of all the stone pizzas we've tried. Was a gem close to home!

We will definitely be going back regularly and recommending this place to all our friends and family!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPRrNKkyqs9yJQ-QYHLFnuN1JgYkZF6unmuCVYJ&fid=0x0:0x27bf3a99276ef6a"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"Genina Sanico","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIF_qw6gdGzlbkVrAxN3BqViWc3kP3ISjy9jSuxwN14MmSsBQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We tried Artista for the first time today after being recommended by a friend. We didn’t realize that it’s much better to call and order ahead, but the wait for the pizza was definitely worth it. Ordered the Talk Honey pizza and it was delicious. Can’t wait to try others from here. The owner Nick was so pleasant and chatted everyone up and was so kind to let us try the massive Nutella cookies. Even after we ate our pizza and he saw us getting back into our car from inside the shop, he took the time to come outside and ask us how it was. Will definitely be back. Thank you!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMiR54Af8HhOLJ7Ll3lvpy3iEQdaI2ySA5jSd36&fid=0x0:0x27bf3a99276ef6a"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Brittney Cerritos Kroiss","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzs74OWdsTEXPNevXDKt4yjRt1tvG8kz7_IZQS_xePF-HLCrj-gA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our favourite take out pizza from the Tricities to Maple Ridge. We especially love their white F&P (fig and procsuitto) pizza. Owners are also super friendly.

They get busy so you may want to order early. It's pick-up and cash only.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNTQ9-9Uk87Qw5Oe2RHU02Ash7ot8Tm5JLgUcyk&fid=0x0:0x27bf3a99276ef6a"],"When":"2024-12-1"},{"Name":"Jeremy Brooks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9h-pOVPEAO5xTo8LGpQ0sa5A7PNB_Rp1SEXGX_qf0-nayw0WaDQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"From the phone call to the pizza this place is a gem in the rough. Order anything and you'll be happy. Best pizza in Vancouver? It's in the running. Best part is the dude that runs the place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM-n69G1nbWwtcMnm1tmOoOSYRgYQwgbiawzYFG&fid=0x0:0x27bf3a99276ef6a"],"When":"2024-7-21"},{"Name":"AF Marketing","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPdZHxbhbOeibJn9XiyQqrcfmXro1ul-Qsns_fIQGg9H8CXQQ8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A geniune experience, the owner is a absolute character. The pizza is the reason I wrote the review though, and the nutella cookie was an amazing addition! Will be going back as much as I can while I am visiting, can’t beat it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMANoLwmS5dDRmlye_NTpz8Vve8RScgxsCKRhP3&fid=0x0:0x27bf3a99276ef6a"],"When":"2024-9-16"},{"Name":"Ron V","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLTegioHVvjjbpZSBVKahhv5o4DFw_D_ru9b3GGxnNM5kjBaw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fabulous find!  This pizza rocks. Honestly, one of the best pizzas I’ve ever had the pleasure of enjoying. Reminds me of a place in NYC I visited many years ago.  Top notch.  Wood fired oven, great dough, cheese and sauce. The owner Nick seems very sincere in his mission to provide fantastic personalized customer service.   Naomi, the girl making the pizza, looked genuinely happy to be there.  Note – bring cash -no cards accepted.  I will definitely hit this place again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Steve Middleton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKa6CDh1NqY_ttVOKKFD3vdMwnTdhYr4eAdK2OX4TwgkcLtWI8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Do not miss this hidden gem! Authentic hand made pizza in a wood fired oven. Absolutely incredible! Not like all the other cookie cutter pizza joints out there. And Nick, the owner is amazing - such great service! From the time he answers the phone, you can tell this guy cares about people! He's authetic, down to earth, and offers service second to none. An easy 5 stars!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Marcos Garcia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrIx99K0w17o1_jz1_EhQur2HjhBKK7Idj_Dw1mjT3aruNUbguXA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Got the Bacon Bourbon pizza and yam fries. Amazing match! Gotta thanks the waiter for the recommendation. It fed two adults, and we left quite satisfied.
Plus, I finally found a brewry with stout beer during summer.
Great isrish style stout! Please don't stop serving it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMh3Ar4G5dD-l0CW4pMCAx32wVm1cY4GfM_A0eA&fid=0x0:0x5f717eeda86fa95d"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"James Mendonca","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKDOYVs1G-8iT9QF6Fj3_nUauDo1DS6zISrEp3lZ9wij4inDQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I went to Witchcraft Bistro as my alternative restaurant when Big Feast Bistro was closed. I am glad I did because this was an exceptional restaurant, as far as bar and grills go. When I took my seat, I was served with complimentary popcorn, which is a first for any restaurant I went to. I ordered the Cobb Salad with Ranch dressing. The ingredients were fresh and tasted great with each other, both the meat and vegetables. The interior also had a charming, antiquated look to it with some memorabilia decor. It looked as if I was in a brewery. The service was good as well. The restaurant was not too busy on a Saturday, which was good for a comfortable experience. If I happen to be in Maple Ridge again, I will make sure to come back here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOpKh-rWJZNyWUp7CRpbijRMTYYqb7Gf9slBxTx&fid=0x0:0x5f717eeda86fa95d"],"When":"2024-1-28"},{"Name":"Dev Deteriorate","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW174d3q1C68k3CIpTb3Y2mjhbzxdBX3351-dOCoOvMShWcsYWq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Been going to The Witch for quite awhile as a local. I love the staff, the environment, but the food took a bit of a nosedive upon my last visit. Chicken was cold on the nachos, toppings were distributed poorly, but hey, compared to a lot of places in Ridge they still come out on top for the price.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPn-nVLjhB9d7fWh-RIkQwxFdhZFR6ni3Mgka85&fid=0x0:0x5f717eeda86fa95d"],"When":"2024-6-28"},{"Name":"MemoirsOfATaco","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQ5DdT6mOsHuY3dVXp6jjjmxgHYhM1OThCPrwnDkIC5BCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Their patio was open, it was slightly raining however it's heated, great food and drink options, definitely need more servers as ours appeared to be the only one working. The burger was phenomenal, the mac n cheese was bland, the chili was tasty and the Cornbread was the star of the show.

Bourbon Bacon Burger
Mushrooms, Bacon, Maple Bourbon Glaze, White Cheddar, Onion Straws on a house made patty, lettuce and tomato; opted for Mac n Cheese.

Chili
Hearty Bean and Veggie Chili will warm your soul…with a touch of spice! Served with Warm Cornbread on the side","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfn3WuqfNzyXNY9HHxRjcAQAcSamb0XCikP4g&fid=0x0:0x5f717eeda86fa95d"],"When":"2023-5-7"},{"Name":"Stacey Loyer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJb25-9L3z8l-uQ3sV-lfk_-XymjGohRjUkpMUjUR9RUVg32A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A-mazing burger!!! Had the Witchcraft Bacon Chedder burger. So tasty, so fresh, with the best fries. Hubby had the Cajun chicken soup - the soups are always good!!
Great atmosphere on the patio on a nice sunny day. Great service","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOu7b2Poxz_XRemrwjdMBoqUDjR3cIOhFFp5NFz&fid=0x0:0x5f717eeda86fa95d"],"When":"2024-7-14"},{"Name":"Fran Fernandez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUY8cTrDAIV2uuA1AnOK6YWoMWcwOAd6RQynZ2wV2ujPfJ4pZ4X=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I loved the place, I didn’t have any problem, the food was really good, the service was fast, we didn’t wait at all and the person was really nice! 👍🏻","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOEKiccwu98Efq3YHPpqpUxoJdCEFvC457w4EkZ&fid=0x0:0x5f717eeda86fa95d"],"When":"2024-6-27"},{"Name":"Amanda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9MO0wCjI3eHFcpwJIbNEoOJF-dENYGFlKJbu1QuPzKRpml52x=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best pizza I’ve ever had! I had the bourbon bacon pizza. Watermelon sour was amazing! Server was super nice. My partner got a forty creek BBQ burger, amazing. Was the best first experience someone could ask for, will be back for sure. Left my phone at home so here’s my leftovers:","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPg_bPR9WoDapdwzyY1BsT3xUjTmXXUsDbygYV3&fid=0x0:0x5f717eeda86fa95d"],"When":"2022-9-3"},{"Name":"Gareth Anderson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUp9plk8U5ZTE_JEQpERglsO1AgdZCpFAY72fA0J30Y_nsJrBJOQg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This Sunday my wife and I decided to checkout Maple Ridge. We spotted Witchcraft Beer Market and stopped in. The waitress was very friendly. We had their kettle chip nachos and it was amazingly delicious. There are three versions to choose from, we had the buffalo chicken. Their beer selections was pretty good, however there was two we were interested in trying that wasn’t available but that did not take away from the great experience.. Definitely worth a visit and we’ll sure be back✌🏾","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJMoDBYzePl9_kha4iVonrKCcMOiSaHbnex37H&fid=0x0:0x5f717eeda86fa95d"],"When":"2023-7-24"}]

title: Thornhill Community Hall
address: 26007 98 Ave, Maple Ridge, BC V2W 1T3
about: [{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true}]},{"id":"children","name":"Children","options":[{"name":"Good for kids birthday","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews: [{"Name":"Carolyn Browne","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLbo_4BBpY-qqW0RyhEqXosu5DHABd_UOfdgR3pjBsTfrHoRQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We had a celebration of life for my father in law here. The hall was clean and we thought everything was in perfect shape. The hall is a bit old but it definitely has a rustic charm. The people who run the hall were kind and amazing people.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Debbie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVywiURI8wAtYd_iJpx0H7IbqPnhDBrcKTReNrpmFau5YdLyf1P6g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We had our Father's celebration of life here.  The morning I picked up the keys they told me that the day before they had found out that the fridge had stopped working.  They could have informed me at that time so I was prepared, as we had a lot of cold foods which would have given us a day to find coolers and ice, instead we had a couple of hours.  Once we got to the hall and began to set up there were mice droppings on the floor, the bar, in the kitchen, in the drawers.  Something if they had been there the day before for the fridge they definitely would have noticed.  We swept and cleaned up the spaces we needed.  When we pulled out the chairs they were moldy and had mouse droppings on them as well so were unusable.  So we had to make the event standing which was hard on the older guests and caused a lot of early departures as it got to be to much.  With all of the extra cleaning and sanitizing we had to do we couldn't get it set up on time, food didn't get out and served and we had to throw out half of it as waste.  All they said they could do to compensate was $25.00 back.  I was also overcharged as their website says the hall rental is $200.00 for a celebration/day use and I was charged $250.00, which I only just noticed today looking at the site info to see who manages the hall.  I would never recommend this place to anyone.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Belinda B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKXqn7rTojP4MXVryUqjgwCTos4gm75rJRJFw13FKFUfuS0bA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This place was gross, went for a celebration of life couldn't use the chairs, spider webs all over the place. I felt bad for the hosts as it was a emotional day with many disappointment's, people were uncomfortable with having to stand, and you could see that they were still trying to set up and clean while people were arriving. also watching the hosts throw out food as they were informed in the morning of the event of a broken refrigeration unit that the hall knew about the day prior.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Phoenix Braund","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJmjHG6nGovc2akowXmTecyV6XF_rcoaKTD0iI94TKGTA0OZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I wouldn't recommend this hall for anything, we rented it for a celebration of life. We ended up not being able to use the chairs as while I was setting them up I found mouse droppings all over them and they were moldy. It was disgusting there was even mouse droppings in the drawers of the kitchen which we couldn't use the fridge as it was broken and they didn't tell us until the day of the event when we picked up the keys. There was cobwebs in the bathroom like they hadn't been cleaned in months. It was a very disappointing experience making an already stressful day even worse. If I could give 0 stars I would!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rita .A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPcPEbWu_De4r50YbllEm0QYkNWsu4DWQh7CaPRN6lEUhA9OA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"My daughter's rented this hall yesterday July 10th for celebration of life for their dad. Would not recommend this place couldn't use chairs they were moldy hall dirty. They new event was happening and didn't clean any thing mouse droppings every were. To bad you can't give zero star","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rose K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVoCr4kBFnqVi6E3MQEhRAhVdAkkj0-5N7sTDHCW0rORNV9078=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Thornhill Park is a great 13 hole disc golf course which I recommend you try. user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Lisa Simmons","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLUCbM7Sv-M1pAApVUnGKleUtAL_QtjEhlmjRjJZl7LJUXJqg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Gotta say, I read complaints about service here not long ago. Not our experience at all. Service was quick, food was great. Ate it so fast, I didn't think about taking a picture of it. But the pesto chicken sandwich with fries was FAB. Hubby had pizza and loved it.

30 July 2024

Both of us had burgers, mine was the Alehouse burger, with fries. So good. Fries, were so fresh. Hubby had a burger as well, he very much enjoyed it, and he scarfed down the fries first, because they were so good. Obviously we ate so fast I didn't get a picture of the entire meal. Lol. Great spot, good service, loved the food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMuM_CDNorBgY6WhcxWPFWJrWXNFvaFxojPeYNq&fid=0x0:0x5353b6ce1ac8c1ee"],"When":"2024-5-28"},{"Name":"Grant M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXRWL_i5cZiVpXExK1H8xMkwx4_6CHC_xRkP2HoYZIVJehiW1g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A group of us that have known each other since Elementary School and High School, have been meeting and getting together at the Billy Minor Pub for about the past Five years.

It's convenient as one of our friends lives in the Cayman Islands, and his parents live walking distance to the Pub. So meeting here just makes it easier for him that way.

We always have a great time getting together and of course sharing some great memories along the way.

We've always been treated well at the Billy Minor Pub and well taken care of as well.

We always enjoy the food and the nice Beer selection as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO2-3Tu-9Z7RpRbX_-KVdQw0jYQBGmOHRUMbE6r&fid=0x0:0x5353b6ce1ac8c1ee"],"When":"2023-10-15"},{"Name":"Tanisha Bamforth","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ0LC_3KUtsRX1orCCIwBlT-_-eWOVwy4ooCYtcq_-eG4d2WA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious food and good service. The cornbread is one of the best I’ve ever had and the house salad even as a side is very well made and much better than the average salad you get elsewhere. Prices are very reasonable, large selection of beers and good range of food options. Will definitely be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMMTYrjL7ZeVUfYtaKAX8I31X6zpQsbdcu6QPXl&fid=0x0:0x5353b6ce1ac8c1ee"],"When":"2024-4-23"},{"Name":"Sarah Barnes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1ca2s2Ju78fXB3WcTna5eoONK6rtbXd-or7AsBLVFqiGf04UKIg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been here a couple times now. The prices are really fair compared to other restaurants. The portion sizes are huge. Not what you'd expect considering the price. Lots of taps of beer to choose from. Definitely order the cornbread with maple butter.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBJFOhK53KqjnTAdAUEPDfx9L0jJ9Y885SMEEV&fid=0x0:0x5353b6ce1ac8c1ee"],"When":"2024-1-14"},{"Name":"Chris Fraser","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLdFrFnRzpExWWxWQEfkMvL6U9ji3VSY-gP7YyePpl68UHCbQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place. The patio is large and has a great view.  We went on a monday and the patio was still busy with lots of seats to choose from inside.  The pizza is great and the beer is cold.  Amazing view of the river and a great place for a stroll before or after.  The patio is a great place to celebrate in the sun or watch the sunset.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOVC_gkf1CGV2esSdsNz_5jLIblKof9l-q0mj20&fid=0x0:0x5353b6ce1ac8c1ee"],"When":"2023-6-28"},{"Name":"Ken B.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKi0UHEqvrtK9b7zXvBSni89V4qdFRQmlmzKuNqGFJ9iPTWGGw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"All the food was so tasty. The garlic sauce combined with the bbq chicken was insane, so creamy and tangy. The bell ringer burger was surprisingly good, perfect amount of spice and the chilli sauce wasn’t too sweet, it was perfectly balanced. The pizza was shockingly good, one of the better pizzas I’ve had, only issue was because the ingredients were laid on heavy it needed a bit more sauce added such as Bbq sauce or ranch on top. They have a massive beer list to choose from as well. If you haven’t tried this place yet you are missing out!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOr3INzI5mzur2sOpw0U4lDjMMR1Qv48QmvlQoY&fid=0x0:0x5353b6ce1ac8c1ee"],"When":"2021-9-11"},{"Name":"Andre Xado","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV4pF2kcxQctE24BGb5mTVOt8Vw7IK0bjuvwABeQ4ZahtlItYM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Recently went to visit this well known place that has intrigued me for the longest time.  The atmosphere is amazing.  Love the location and the decor.  Food was also great except for the wings.  Ordered hot wings and they were a tad gamey and flat.  The sauce was normal but it seems they just poured the sauce on them and heated them up.   Service was good except it seemed as though server was a bit angry or in a bad mood at first? Appeared to calm down after a while.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michael N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI8o8LmUdbsatKosLCY7Szl1T_faKG4qFUELCdfPSbHQ5n4Zw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food tastes great.  First time trying the pizza.  Generous amount of toppings which is the way a pizza should be made.  The crust was salted therefore tasted like a soft pretzel. So good.  Also had the outlaw chicken burger.  I had that last time and craved it again.  Had the house salad on the side and it was also very well made.  Will look to come again next time I'm in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMq8sSvU23Shd6jhmPJv4VyEPUCW4By2NSrfqQj&fid=0x0:0x5353b6ce1ac8c1ee"],"When":"2023-10-31"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Carly Haugen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUxBNye1tWvMjS29gv0mbDoe6F4YQaWLhPEgfMTo4qkUAxBzoK6=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been buying there homemade kimbap for a while now and wow it is amazing! So fresh and so much flavour. They also have a glass noodle dish that is sometimes a lunch special and holy! It is the best thing I’ve had, the taste of the noodles just made my taste buds dance. If you haven’t tried their homemade food you have to! And the portions are perfect for the price. You get so much food!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jennifer Dela Rosa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcPRV7zeb2pB8SwLQ9IzAyLinRy8_fqkD1zgtlXkWxhrkKmP8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"After learning from a local Facebook group they sell homemade kimbap here, I had to check it out! I tried the bulgolgi kimbap and loved it! So fresh. 👌 I don't have to venture all the way to H-Mart in Port Coquitlam for kimbap anymore!\n\nAdditionally, the owners are very friendly - they greeted me at the door and thanked me when I left (I had a baby). I will definitely return.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOnusf-oKUoDzCzqDix2YzVdZ2rPzTrvR8e0zoB\u0026fid=0x0:0xdbe3c680eb7e903c"],"When":"2024-6-9"},{"Name":"EvelynMariel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWf6NQtNhiy0tgrRiQRxNChL5lajAq_1ooXpoBFVPzcwm1wpt8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This corner store is absolutely amazing! The owners are very sweet and have curated a delightful collection of items from various cultures, plus many other useful goodies. Some highlights include freshly made Korean foods like kimbap and egg sandwiches. They also offer a great selection of instant ramen and fresh veggies. The egg sandwich was incredible—I wish I had gotten two! And to top it all off, they have the cutest dog ever!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Zaineb Ghlayem","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVMHEv-QdKyM49uJuUeAUhAmxqOUvfnab4uqIvr5csyPIi6CRM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I visited this store today after I learned through a Facebook group that they have Korean food.  I tried the Japchea and I have to admit that the flavor was amazing.  I also got the Kimbap and I am looking forward to eat it as well. The store owner is a nice gentleman. Now I know where to get my Japchea when I am craving it.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nikki Tabbert","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ4iQtWGvtd55qfOk1fcciftsB1HMNOP2WjM999aUOCIbOySw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This store is very surprising, they stock the most bizarre variety of imported sodas and candies, while also carrying all the usual corner store stuff plus fresh made food. The staff is very friendly. Check it out for candies you haven't seen since you were a kid and they even have Bob Ross energy drinks amongst many other unusual sodas 🤣","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"jayden owen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVpbMHIm65Zc1LtdJsuZAHIKtXwLvX7M2X3d3lTVoIAOVXmSDY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I work up the street from here, come here everyday for lunch. Awesome homemade food and nice owners.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Aleksander Amer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGOAz6hZJ2NwhTQXXReoo8ipuBBnVUyRU2feoLZjGgiTMM8r_W=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I heard great things about this place and drove by it all the time not knowing it was the perfect corner store. I love this place! Very friendly folks there and have a variety of good food ready to go if you are in a hurry. There is also a good spread of grocery/household stuff. I highly recommend swinging by sometime!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kara Binkley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWj2xRtHH1a-UwDfTyyQ4oJ7WWDrySL_fMPhLXgYxmR1MG_2k4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing store with the most friendly and kind owners. They have wonderful fresh food and a large selection of items.","Images":null,"When":""}]
